daa bli' bsedile' ḻegake' ḻega beṉ' za'len yeḻ' wṉabia', aga ka chli' chsedi beṉ'ka' chzajnii ḻegake' leya'.
Na' ka biyetj Jesúza' lo yaana', beṉ' zan zinogake'ne'.
Na' kwite'na' bllin to beṉ' che'ile' lepra', na'ch bc̱hek' xibe' lawe'na', chi'ene': ―X̱an', ṉezid' wak yikwaso' yillwe'ni chak' sheḻ' gueenilo'.
Na'ch Jesúza' bx̱oa neena' yic̱hje'na', chi'ene': ―Cheenid'x. Na' ṉaate yikwasa'n. Na' kon ka golle' ka', lii biyakteyi beena'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Ni to kono yoo ka nak daa ba ben' c̱ho'. Ḻete wyaj lao bx̱oza' kwenc̱he ile'ile' ba biyakilo', na' jwa' daa chiyaḻ' lljoo lao Chioza' ka nllia dii Moiséza' bia' goncho kwenc̱he iṉezi beṉ' ba biyakilo'.
Ka billin Jesúza' yell Capernaúma' lii bllinte to x̱an soldad lawe'na', na' got'yoile'ne',
chi'ene': ―X̱an', xmosaa die' lillaa, na' net tḻaa kwerp c̱he'na' na' ḻe chey chle'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Na' sa' yiyonee.
Na' che' x̱an soldadka'ne': ―X̱an', aga zakii nad' kwenc̱he shoo ḻoo yoo lillaa. Kon ben mandad yiyakile' na' wiyakkzile'.
Nia' ka' ḻa' zoa beṉ' chṉabia' nad', na' nad' ḻekzka' chṉabia' soldad c̱ha'ka'. Kat' chep' toe': “Wyaj ni'”, na' chaje'; na' kat' chep' stoe': “Da ni”, na' chide'; na' kat' chizep' xmosaa: “Ben dga”, na' chone'n.
Ka beni Jesúza' cho'a xtilleena', bibanile' na' chi'e beṉ'ka' nogake' ḻe': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', bigaṉ' lljtia' to beṉ' Israel beṉ' gonḻilallee nad' ka chonḻilall' beeni nad'.
Na' nad' nia' le', beṉ' zan beṉ' zaak doxen yell-lioni gonḻilall'gake' nad' na' lljazoalengake' txen dii Abrahama', dii Isaaca' na' dii Jacoba' yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'.
Na' ka nak beṉ'ka' wlej Chioza' nan lljazoagake' gana' chṉabi'e, zane' wzaḻee gana' shgasj shc̱hoḻ, gana' kwellyesh'gake' na' gaoyaax̱ax̱j ḻeye'ka' daa ḻe gakshejlall'gake', daa bi goongakile' iṉabi'e ḻegake'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' x̱an soldadka': ―Biyaj lillo'na', na' gak ka cheenilo' daa chajḻi'o c̱ha'. Na' lo lla lo gorzə biyaki xmose'na'.
Na'ch wyaj Jesúza' lill Pédrona', na' ble'ile' de tobiiṉ c̱he'na' yo'e dii ḻana'.
Na' bex̱' Jesúza' neena' na' bicheje' dii ḻana'. Na' lii wyastie' bene' dii wdaogake'.
Na'ch ka ba chxoa wbilla', jwa'gake' beṉ' zan gana' zoa Jesúza', beṉ' yoo dii x̱iw'ka', na' shcho'azə dillaa bi'e bichejgakan. Na' ḻekzka' biyone' yog' beṉ' bi shao'.
Gok ka' kwenc̱he gok ka wna dii Isaíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne', daa wne': “Ḻe' bikee yillwe'ka' che'icho na' bene' ka bigaa yeḻ' chey chla c̱hechona'.”
Na' ka ble'i Jesúza' beṉ' zan inlleb ba nec̱hjgake'ne', bene' mandad telene' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen shḻaa nisdo'na'lə.
Na' wbig' to beṉ' chli' chsedi leya', chi'ene': ―Maestro, cheenid' sa'len' li' gattezə shajo'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Bez'ka' nongakb yech ga chiyoogakb, na' byiṉdo'ka' non lilldo'gakb, san nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, bibi lill' de.
Na' bchej sto beṉ' nake' Jesúza' txen na' chi'ene': ―X̱an', wza'len' li' gattezə shajo' ka yiyoll guet x̱a'na'.
Na'ch goll Jesúza'ne': ―Da, dino nad'. Wikwash'kzə ljwell beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch wyoo Jesúza' ḻoo barkwa' len beṉ'ka' ba nakgake'ne' txen.
Na' shlak zej barkwa' wtese'. Na' wzolo wzechga be'na' lo nisdo'na', na' wzolo chas chataan na' biyoll nisa' ḻoo barkwa'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen jasbangake'ne', na' che'gake': ―¡X̱an', bisla cho'! ¡Ba chbe'cho yel!
Na'ch che' Jesúza': ―¿Berac̱he chlleblikzle? ¿Bic̱he bi nx̱enilall'le nad' kwasḻoḻ? Na'ch wyase' bsheshlene' be'na' len nisdo'na', na' wlezgakan.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle'len Jesúza' ḻoo barkwa' bibangakile' ka bene', na'ch che' ljwellgake': ―¿Noran nak beeni, lla? Ax̱t be'na' na' nisdo'na' chzenaggakan c̱he'.
Na' ka bllin Jesúza' yell-liona' mbani Gadárana' daa llia shḻaa nisdo'na', c̱hop beṉ' yoogake' dii x̱iw'ka' bchejgake' ḻoo kapsanta' jatiḻgake'ne'. Na' daa ḻe zṉiagake' aga no chak te lo neza' chde gana' zoagake'.
Na' besyaagakan che'gakan Jesúza': ―¿Bic̱he za'zo' gani zoanto', Jesús, Xiiṉ Chios? ¿Aba za'zelo' zidsak'zi'o neto' ḻa'kzi biṉ' illin lla sak'zi'nto'?
Na' gaoz lle' ba zan kush chaogakb.
Na'ch got'yoi dii x̱iw'ka' Jesúza', che'gakan ḻe': ―Shi yibejo' neto' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ'ki, we'gacho' latj yiyoonto' kushka'.
Na'ch goll Jesúza' ḻegakan: ―Wakkzan. Ḻi yiyoo shka'. Na'ch bichej dii x̱iw'ka' na' biyoogakan kushka', na' kushka' lii bxoṉjtegakb na' jabix̱gakb to cho'a yaa na' bxoptegakb ḻoo nisdo'na' na' wche'gakb yel.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' chap kushka' bixoṉjdogake', na' ka billingake' lalle'ka' gollgake' beṉ' yellka' doxen ka gok c̱he beṉ'ka' yoo dii x̱iw'ka'.
Na'ch wza' yog' beṉ' yellka' zjatiḻgake' Jesúza', na' ka ble'gakile'ne' got'yogakile'ne' yiyaje' gan yoblə.
Na' biyoo Jesúza' to ḻoo barkw, na'ch biḻag'gake' shḻaa nisdo'na' na' billine' yell c̱he'na' gana' wzee.
Na' bllinlengake' to beṉ' net ṉi'a neena' lawe'na', nx̱oagake'ne' to lo daa. Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' ḻe nonḻilall'gake'ne', na'ch golle' beṉ' we'na': ―Btiplalloo, xiiṉ', ba biyakxen xtoḻoona'.
Na'ch baḻ beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' che' ljwellgake': “Ba chonz kwin beeni ka Chioza' daa ne' ka'.”
Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' daa wza'lall'gake', na' chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Bic̱he chza'lall'zle ka'?
¿Achakile chyalljchid' yeḻ' wak xench yep' beeni: “Ba bizi'xen' saaxya c̱ho'na'”, ka daa yepee: “Biyas na' bigoo nez”?
Na' wliid' le', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza', nap' yeḻ' wṉabia' yell-lioni kwenc̱he yizi'xen' saaxya c̱he beṉ'. Na'ch golle' beena' net ṉi'a neena': ―Biyas, bitob daa c̱ho'na', na' biyaj lillo'na'.
Na'ch biyas beena' net ṉi'a neena' na' ziyaje' lille'na'.
Na' ka ble'i beṉ'ka' ka gok, bibangakile', na' be'la'ogake' Chioza' daa bi'e yeḻ' wak xenna' to beṉ' yell-lio.
Ka biza' Jesúza' na', ble'ile' to beṉ' wic̱hixj, lie' Mateo, chi'e gana' chc̱hixje'. Na' chi'ene': ―Da, dino nad'. Na'ch lii wzolla'te Matewa' janoe'ne'.
Na' shlak chi' Jesúza' lill Matewa', bllin beṉ' zan wic̱hixjka' na' zan beṉ' zeyi c̱heyi bi nsa' c̱hegake' wen, wche'gake' cho'a mesa' wdaolengake' Jesúza' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen.
Na'ch ka ble'i fariseoka' chaolen Jesúza' beṉ'ka', na'ch wṉabgakile' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, che'gake': ―¿Bic̱he chaolenz maestro c̱heleni beṉ' wic̱hixjki len beṉ'ki bi nsa' c̱heyin wen?
Na' beni Jesúza' daa goll fariseoka', na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―Aga beṉ'ka' shawaan chyalljgakile' wen rmecha' san beṉ'ka' bi shawaan chyalljgakile'ne'.
Ḻi yiyaj na' ḻi lljased bin zeji Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' nan: “Nad' cheenchid' yiyeshii ljwell-le, aga ka daa witle bayix̱'ka' kwenc̱he we'la'ole nad'.” Aga bid' ni c̱he beṉ'ka' nak beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', san bid' ni c̱he beṉ' saaxyaka'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nak Juanna' txen jabig'gake' kwit Jesúza' na' wṉabgakile'ne' che'gake': ―Neto' na' fariseoka' zeyi c̱hento' chzoanto' wbas'. Na' ¿bic̱he beṉ'ka' nakgake' li' txen bi chzoagake' wbas'?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Kat' chak to wishagna' beṉ'ka' chdi'a chllag lill beṉ' byona' aga chdagake' nyesh', san cheej chaogake'. Na' ka'kzan beṉ'ki nakgake' nad' txen, cheej chaogake' ṉaa zoalen' ḻegake', per wllin lla wkwas beṉ' nad' kwite'ka', kana'chan soagake' wbasaa.
’Ni to kono chida' lat' lech' kob ḻee lech' gola', ḻa' kat' shechan na' yibe' lech' koba' na' wsho'chan dii gola' na' gana' nllo' gakchan dii xench.
Na' aga no chgaa vino daa zi' bchejte ḻoo yid gola', ḻa' wchez' yid gola' na' ḻaljə vinona', na' ka vinona' ka yida' kwiayi'gakan. San chiyaḻ' sholl vino daa zi' bchejte ḻoo yid koba' kwenc̱he ni ton bi kwiayi'.
Na' ni choe'te Jesúza' dill', ka bllin to beṉ' wṉabia' na' bc̱hek' xibe'na' lao Jesúza', chi'ene': ―Shintg wit to bi' nool c̱ha'; per shi li' sa'gacho' na' wx̱oa noona'b' na' yibam'.
Na'ch lii wzolla'te Jesúza' zejlene' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen lill beṉ' wṉabia'na'.
Na' ka zejgake' lill beṉ' wṉabia'na' jano to noolə ḻegake', na' ba gok shlliṉ yiz chzoe' wbaa. Na'ch wbiguee koll' Jesúza' bex̱ee xe'na',
ḻa' chakile': “Kon sheḻ' ba bex̱aa xe'na' wiyakkzid'.”
Na' biyec̱hj Jesúza' na' ka ble'ile' noola' chi'ene': ―Btiplalloo, xiiṉ', ba biyakilo' daa chonḻilalloo nad'. Na' lii biyakteyi noola'.
Na' ka bllin Jesúza' lill beṉ' wṉabia'na' ba lle' beṉ'ka' chkwell blleja' na' beṉ' zan ba chosyaagake' chbellgake'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' beṉ'ka': ―Ḻi yillesh ni. Aga witba'n san cheszbaan. Per bxill-ligake'ne'.
Na' ben Jesúza' byen billeshgake', na' wyo'e na' bex̱ee na' bi' nool weta' na' lii biyasteb'.
Na' yog' yellka' llia gaoz wze dill' daa bene'.
Na' ka biza' Jesúza', c̱hop beṉ' lc̱hoḻ janogake'ne'. Na' chosyaagake' zilljə che'gake': ―¡Biyesh'lall'gachi neto', xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Daví!
Ka biyoo Jesúza' ḻoo yoona', beṉ' lc̱hoḻka' jabig'gake' kwite'na'. Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Achajḻe'le wak gon' ka ile'ile? Na'ch goll beṉ' lc̱hoḻka'ne': ―Awe, X̱annto', wak gono' ka ile'into'.
Na'ch bex̱' Jesúza' jalawe'ka' na' golle' ḻegake': ―Daa chonḻilall'le nad' na' gak ka cheenile.
Na'ch bile'gakile'. Na' Jesúza' golle' ḻegake': ―Ḻi gon byen kono ye'le ka'.
Per ka biza'gake' kwite'na' lii wzolotegake' choe'gake' dill' doxen gana' mbani yella' daa ben Jesúza' c̱hegake'.
Shlak chiza' beṉ'ka' gok beṉ' lc̱hoḻ, bllin beṉ' yoblə lao Jesúza' nc̱he'gake' to beṉ' bi chak iṉe daa yo'e dii x̱iwaa.
Na' kon ka bibej Jesúza' dii x̱iwaa yoo beena' na' biṉie'. Na' bibani beṉ'ka' lle' na', nagake': ―Ni shlin biṉ' ile'icho yell Israeli to yeḻ' wak ka dga ba ben beeni.
Per fariseoka' che'gake': ―Beeni chibeje' dii x̱iw'ka' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he daa chṉabia' ḻegakan.
Na' wda Jesúza' yog' yellka', ka yell xen ka yelldo', chli' chsedile' to to gana' chdop chllag beṉ' Israelka' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza'. Wdix̱je'ile' ḻegake' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' na' biyone' beṉ' che'i bittezə yillwe'.
Na' ble'i Jesúza' beṉ' zan zejlengake'ne' na' biyeshile' ḻegake', ḻa' gokbe'ile' ka nyesh'lazan chak c̱hegake', ka xil' ba kono x̱anin zoa.
Na'ch golle' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―Dii ḻi nia' le', beṉ'ka' zi' gonḻilall'gake' Chioza' zaklebgakile' to dii wlliachga to lo yell-lio, na' chyallj no yizi' yilapan, per to c̱hopchga wen llinka' zoa.
Na' ḻi iṉabi X̱ancho Chioza' wzanche' beṉ'ka' wtopgake' beṉ'ka' gonḻilall'gake'ne'.
Na'ch biti'a Jesúza' beṉ'ka' shlliṉ wleje' na' bi'e ḻegake' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he gak yibejgake' dii x̱iw'ka' yoo beṉ', na' yiyongake' beṉ' che'i bittezə yillwe'.
Na' kin le postlka' shlliṉ: zigaate wleje' Simónna', beena' ḻekzka' che'gake' Pedro, len beṉ' bishee Andréza', na'tech Jacóbona' len beṉ' bishee Juanna', beṉ'ka' nak xiiṉ Zebedewa',
na'ch Felípena', Bartoloména', Tomáza', Mateo, beṉ' wic̱hixja', Jacobo xiiṉ Alfewa', Tadewa',
Simón, beena' bsi'gake' Zelote, na' Jud Scariota', beena' bene' Jesúza' lo na' beṉ' malka'.
Na'ch bseḻ' Jesúza' beṉ'ka' shlliṉ je'gake' cho'a xtill' Chioza', na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Bi shajle yellka' gana' zoa beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel, ni bi shajle yellka' llia gana' mbani Samáriana'.
San ḻi shaj gana' lle' beṉ' Israelka', beṉ'ka' nak ka xil' ba wnit.
Ḻi shaj ḻi lljtix̱jee ba zoa gaoshosh iṉabia' Chioza' beena' zoa yabana' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ'.
Ḻi yiyon beṉ'ka' bi shao' na' beṉ'ka' che'i lepra, ḻi yisban beṉ' ba wit, na' ḻi yibej dii x̱iw'ka' yoo beṉ'. Na' ka beṉ Chioza', beṉe' le' yeḻ' waka' ka'z, ka'kzan le' bibi wc̱hixjle yiyonle beṉ'.
’Na' bi wa'le mech de or, de plat ni de cobre.
Na' ni bi gaḻ'le no yix̱j les, ni bi gox̱'le zi shkwe' xale, ni zi shkwe' xel-le, ni bi gox̱'le yag bar, ḻa' to wen llin chidoḻee yeej gawe'.
’Na' kat' illinle to to yell xen wa yelldo'zə, c̱hiljle to beṉ' nsa' c̱he' wen, na' yigaaṉle lille'na' na' na'tezə soale ax̱t ka illinch lla yiza'le.
Na' ka sho'le lille'na' ye'lene': “Chioza' wzoe' le' mbalaz.”
Na' shi dii ḻi beṉ'ka' lle' na' nakgake' beṉ' wen, wakkzə daa ye'le ḻegake'; san shi bi nakgake' beṉ' wen, na' aga wakan.
Na' gattezə illinle shi kono wleb le' na' ni bi wzenaggake' c̱hele, na' yiza'le lill beena' wa yella' gana' gongakile' le' ka' na' yishible bishtena' llia ṉi'aleka'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', kat' illin lla wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he beṉ', yeḻ' zak'zi' xench ile'chi beṉ' yellka' gana' gongakile' le' ka' aga ka beṉ' yell Sodómana' na' yell Gomórrana'.
’Nad' chseḻaa le' ka xildo' ladj ba zṉiaka'. Na' chiyaḻ' gakle beṉ' sin' na' beṉ' wen.
Wsak'gale, ḻa' wchej beṉ' lljwee le' lao beṉ'ka' chṉabia' na' wit c̱hingake' le' gana' chdop chllagcho choe'ḻwillcho Chioza'.
Na' lljwa'gake' le' lao beṉ' wṉabia' xenka' daa chonḻilall'le nad', na' ka' gak we'lenle ḻegake' cho'a xtillaana' na' ka'kzə beṉ'ka' bi nakgake' beṉ' Israel.
Na' kat' gongake' le' lo na' beṉ'ka', bi sele wṉeyi naklə iṉale wa bi iṉale, ḻa' ka gaḻ' iṉele, Chioza' wx̱oe' dillaa cho'a ḻoll'leka'.
Ḻa' aga len' iṉele, san Espíritu c̱he X̱acho Chiozan' gone' ka iṉele.
’Beena' zoa beṉ' bishee ḻeteze' gone'ne' lo na' beṉ'ka' witgake'ne', na' beena' zoa xiiṉe' gone'b' lo na' beṉ' wite'b'. Na' soa beṉ' yizoshyi'e x̱axṉeena' na' gone' ḻegake' lo na' beṉ'ka' witgake' ḻegake'.
Yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' gakzbangakile' le' daa nonḻilall'le nad', per beena' so sakile' bittezə daa yen ile'ile' ax̱t kat' guete', beenan' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
Shi to yell yilaggake' le', ḻi yiyaj yell yoblə. Ḻa' dii ḻi nia' le' bilaṉ' yiyoll tale yog'ḻoḻ yellki mbani Israeli kat' illin lla yiyed' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza'.
’To beṉ' chsed aga zak'che' ka beena' chli' chsedi ḻe', na' ka'kzə to wen llin aga zak'che' ka x̱ane'na'.
Na' beena' ni chsed yibaile' gake' ka beena' chli' chsedi ḻe', na' ka'kzə wen llinna', yibaile' gake' ka x̱ane'na'. Nad' nak' x̱anle, na' shi nagake' c̱ha' non' txen dii x̱iwaa daa le Bezlo, ¿alelə ki iṉagake' c̱hele ka'?
Bi illeble beṉ'ka' biya dii wc̱hi' wsak'gake' le'. Ḻa' daa kono ṉezi ṉaa, wllin lla ila'lawin, na' aga ga de to dii ngash' dii bi illin lla ila'lawin.
Diika' chli' chsedid' le' do ngash'zə, ḻi we'n dill' ladj lkwe' beṉ'. Na' diika' nia' le' to le'zə, ḻi wzenin yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'.
Bi illeble beṉ'ka' cheengakile' witgake' le', ḻa' kwerp c̱hele na'zan witgake', aga bi gak gongakile' yic̱hjlall'do'lena'. San Chiozan' chiyaḻ' illeble, ḻa' ḻen' wakə wlliayee kwerp c̱helena' len yic̱hjlall'do'lena' lo yi' gabiḻa'.
’Ḻa'kzi wak si'cho c̱hop byiṉdo' kon to sintabdo', ni tob bi guet shi X̱acho Chioza' bi wi'e latj.
Na' ka nakle le', ax̱t yish' yic̱hjlena' nḻabe'.
Daan bi chiyaḻ' illeble, ḻa' zak'ch le' aga ka ba zan byiṉdo'ka'.
’Beena' we' dill' lao beṉ' iṉe' nake' nad' txen, ka'kzə nad' yep' X̱a'na' zoa yabana' nake' nad' txen.
Na' beena' bi chc̱heb lao beṉ' nan nake' nad' txen, ka'kzə nad' yep' X̱a'na' zoa yabana' bi nake' nad' txen.
’Bi gakzile bid' lo yell-lioni kwenc̱he gon' ka soalen ljwell beṉ' mbalaz. Aga daan bid', san bid' kwenc̱he wx̱ia' wdiḻ.
Daa bid' na' yidiḻ-len beṉ' byona' x̱e'na' na' noola' yidiḻ-lene' xṉeena', na' beena' zoa xoolille' yidiḻ-lene' ḻe'.
Na' beṉ'ka' zoa toz yoo gakzbani ljwelle'.
’Beena' chakchile' x̱e'na' wa xṉeena' aga ka nad', bi chidoḻee gake' nad' txen, na' ka'kzə shi chaktechile' xiiṉe'na' ka nad', ḻekzka' bi chidoḻee gake' nad' txen.
Beena' bi chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' yen ile'ile' bittezə kwenc̱he gone' ka nia', bi chidoḻee gake' nad' txen.
Na' beena' chakile' sheḻ' kono wc̱hi' wsak' ḻe', beenan' kwiayee. San beena' chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' yen ile'ile' bittez daa nonḻilallee nad', beenan' gat' to yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
’Beena' wlebe' le', nad'kzan chlebe'. Na' beena' wlebe' nad' ḻekzka' Chioza', beena' bseḻ' nadaan, chlebe'.
Beena' wlebe' to beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne', lenkzen' ikee ka laxj beena' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'. Na' ḻekzka' beena' wlebe' to beṉ' chone' daa nak shḻi daa chibaile' nake' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', ḻekzka' lene'n ikee ka laxj beena' chon daa nak shḻi.
Na' beena' we' ḻa'c̱h' lat' nis yeej beṉ'ki nakgake' nad' txen, dii ḻi nia' le', de laxje'.
Na' ka biyoll goll Jesúza' beṉ'ka' shlliṉ bin chiyaḻ' gongake', na'ch bizee na', na' jali' jasedile' beṉ' na' jtix̱je'ile' ḻegake' cho'a xtill' Chioza' yellka' llia gana' mbani Galileana'.
Na' Juanna' beena' chchoa beṉ' nisa', ba die' lillyana'. Ka wṉezile' daa chon Crístona', na'ch bseḻee c̱hop beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen gana' zoe'.
Na' jaṉabgakile'ne' che'gake': ―¿Alin' beena' ba llia bia' yid?, ¿anti chiyaḻ' kweznto' sto beṉ' yoblə?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi yiyaj na' ḻi lljayell Juanna' daa chenile nia' na' daa chle'ile chon'.
Ḻi lljayelle' chon' ka chle'i beṉ' lc̱hoḻka', na' chiza' beṉ'ka' bi chak sa', na' chiyaki beṉ'ka che'i lepra, na' chiyeni beṉ' kwellka', na' chisban' beṉ'ka' ba wit, na' chyix̱je'id' beṉ' yesh'ka' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Chioza'.
Chakomba beena' chajḻe' c̱ha' na' bi chakc̱hoplallee.
Na' ka biza' beṉ'ka' bseḻ' Juanna', na'ch wzolo Jesúza' be'lene' beṉ'ka' lle' na' xtill' Juanna', chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Nakran nsa' c̱he beena' jawiale latja' gana' bibi chashj chḻeb? ¿Anake' to beṉ' chakc̱hoplallii c̱he dill'ka' cho'e?
Shi bi nakan ka', ¿nakran nak beena' jawiale? ¿Ato beṉ' nakw xalaane' dii ḻe nakə? Bi nakan ka'. Ḻa' ṉezkzile beṉ'ka' nakw xalaangake' dii ḻe nak zoagake' ḻoo yoo lill beṉ' wṉabia'ka'.
¿Nakrakzan nak beena' jawiale? ¿Ato beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'? Dii ḻi kan' chone', na' chontechle' ka beṉ'ka' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza' ḻegake'.
Ḻa' c̱he beenin cho'e Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' dill' daa nan: Wseḻaa beena' kwialo lawo'na', na' c̱hix̱ji'e xtilloona' kwenc̱he soa beṉ' wzenaggake' c̱ho' kat' illino'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', ladj yog' beṉ' yell-lioki, ni toe' biṉ' ichej gake' beṉ' zak'chi' aga ka Juanna' beena' chchoa beṉ' nisa'. Per nottezə beena' choe' latj iṉabia' Chioza' yic̱hjlall'do'ena', zak'teche' aga ka Juanna'.
’Kon ka wzolo Juanna' bchoe' beṉ' nisa' ax̱t ṉaanlla, zoa beṉ' chsej chllongake' kono wleb yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza'.
Librka' daa bzej dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' na' leya' bzej dii Moiséza' wdix̱jeegakan c̱he yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza', na' ḻekzannan' cho'e Juanna' dill' ṉaa blee.
Na' shi cheenile shajḻe'le dga nia' le', ḻekzen' Elíaza', beena' nagake' yid kwenc̱he c̱hix̱ji'e cho'a xtill' Chioza'.
Ka le' chenile dga nia', ḻi sen wṉeyi.
’¿Bera ka wsaklebid' le' mbanle ṉaa? Le' chonle ka bi'do'ka' lle' gana' chak yaana' na' chosyaagakb' che' ljwellb':
“Bkwellnto' blleja' na' bi byaale, na' beḻnto' daa chon nyesh' na' ni bi wchellkzle.”
Ḻa' Juanna' bi weej wdawe' dii wen dii shao', na' wnagake' c̱he': “Dii x̱iwaan yo'e.”
Na'ch wdena' bid' nad' nak' Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, na' cheej chaw', na' nagake' nak' to beṉ' waox̱at na' to weezo, na' ḻekzka' nagake' non' txen beṉ' wen dii malka' na' beṉ' wic̱hixjka'. Per yeḻ' sin' c̱he Chioza' chli'lawin ka chsa' c̱he beṉ'ka' chzenaggake' c̱he'.
Na'ch wzolo Jesúza' bsheshlene' beṉ' yellka' gana' bli'che' yeḻ' waka', daa bi biyaj bilengakile' xtoḻeeka'. Na' wne':
―¡Nyesh'laz gak c̱hele, le' beṉ' yell Corazín! ¡Nyesh'laz gak c̱hele, le' beṉ' yell Betsaida! Ḻa' sheḻ' beṉ'ka' lle' yell Tírona' na' yell Sidónna' ble'gakile' yeḻ' wakka' ba ble'ile, lii biyaj bilenteljagakile' xtoḻeeka', na' gokwljagake' lech' zeshaa na' bllaagake' dena' yic̱hje'ka' daa ḻe gokyesh'gakile', sheḻ'ka'.
Na' daa bi biyaj bilenile, ba nia' le', llana' wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he ben', dii walch sak'zi'le aga ka beṉ' Tíroka' na' beṉ' Sidónka'.
Na' le' beṉ' Capernaúm, ¿achakile willinle yabana'? Aga willinle na', san latj gana' sak'zi'len yillinle. Ḻa' sheḻ' beṉ' Sodómaka' ble'gakile' yeḻ' wakka' daa ba ble'ile, balja biyaj bilengakile' saaxya c̱he'ka' na' ni ndia yella', sheḻ'ka'.
Daan nia' le', kat' illin lla wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he beṉ', dii walch sak'zi'le aga ka beṉ' Sodómaka'.
Na' lo gora' wṉe Jesúza', chi'e: ―X̱a, li' nako' x̱an yabana' na' yell-lioni, choe'lawaa li' daa bkwashilo' beṉ' sin'ka' diika' ba bliilo' beṉ'ka' bibi chajnii.
Beno' ka', X̱a, ḻa' kan' wyazlalloo.
Na'ch goll Jesúza' beṉ'ka': ―X̱a'na' bene' lall' na' yog'ḻoḻ daa chon'. Na' ni to kono nombia'yeṉ' nad' ḻete X̱a'na', na' ḻekzka' kono nombia'yeṉ' X̱a'na' ḻete nad' nak' Xiiṉe' len beṉ'ka' cheenid' gon' ka gombia'gake'ne'.
Ḻi gonḻilall' nad', yog'le le' ba chjshiaile na' nakle ka beṉ' ntakw nc̱hej to dii zii dii zshab, na' nad' gon' ka yizi'lall'le.
Ḻi gon ka nia', na' ḻi wzenag daa chzajniid' le', ḻa' nad' nak' beṉ' gax̱jlall' na' gon' ka gat' yeḻ' wixi'lall' c̱hele.
Daa nia' le' gonle aga nakan dii bi gak gonle, na' daa chli' chsedid' le' bi nakan dii bi so sakile.
To lla sabd, llana' chombaaṉ beṉ' Israelka', wdelen Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen to ga naz to beṉ' trígona', na' beṉ'ka' zejlengake'ne' wzolo wdishjgake' trígona' na' wdaogake'n.
Na' ka ble'i fariseoka' daa chon beṉ'ka', na'ch che'gake'ne': ―Bwia ka chon beṉ'ki nakgake' li' txen, chongake' daa bi chiyaḻ' goncho llani chombaaṉcho.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Abiṉ' wlable ka ben dii Davina' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen ka wdongake'?
Wyo'e ḻoo lill xḻatj Chioza' na' wdoyoe' yetxtilka' daa naki c̱he Chioza' daa toz bx̱ozka' de lsens gaogake'.
¿Abiṉ' wlable leya' gana' nan aga bi xya nakan c̱he bx̱ozka' ḻa'kzi chongake' llinna' ḻoo yoodo'na' llaka' chombaaṉcho?
Na' nia' le', ladjleni zoa to beṉ' zak'che' aga ka yoodo'na'.
Bilja wyajniile bi zeji Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' daa na: “Nad' cheenchid' yiyeshii ljwell-le, aga ka daa witle bayix̱'ka' kwenc̱he we'la'ole nad'.” Ḻa' sheḻ' le' wyajniilen, aga waole xya c̱he beṉ' bi nap doḻ', sheḻ'ka'.
Nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, chṉabi'a lao llani chombaaṉcho.
Na'ch biza' Jesúza' latja', na' biyaje' gana' chdop chllag beṉ' Israelka' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza'.
Na' ladj beṉ'ka' len to beṉ' net tḻaa neena'. Na' fariseoka' chwiagake' naklə ka si' sengake' kwenc̱he gaogake' xya c̱he Jesúza', na'ch wṉabgakile'ne', che'gake': ―¿Beran na leya'? ¿Ade lsens yiyoncho to beṉ' bi shao' llani chombaaṉcho?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Shi nole zoa to xil' c̱hele na' ixopb to ḻoo yech llaki chombaaṉcho, ¿abi yibejleb?
Na' ¡zak'techlə beṉec̱ha' aga ka xilaa! Daan de lsens goncho daa nak wen llaki chombaaṉcho.
Na'ch golle' beena' net tḻaa neena': ―Bḻi noona'. Na' ka bḻi neena' lii biyakten ka nak daa zi shḻaa.
Na' ka biza' fariseoka' gana' chdop chllaggake', be'gake' dill' nak sho' xṉezi witgake' Jesúza'.
Ka gokbe'i Jesúza' daa cheengakile' gongake', na' bizee ziyaje' gan yoblə. Na' beṉ' zan inlleb janoe'ne' na' biyone' yog' beṉ'ka' bi shao'.
Na' golle' beṉ'ka' biyone' bi we'gake' dill' daa chone'.
Daa bene' ka', billinin ka wna dii Isaíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne', kana' wne':
Beenin nake' wen llin c̱ha', beena' ba wlej', na' ḻe chakidee na' chazlallaa ka chone'. Na' wzoa' Espíritu c̱ha'na' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena', na' c̱hix̱je'ile' beṉ'ka' lle' yell-lioni ka cheenid' gongake'.
Bi gakdiḻ-lene' beṉ', na' ni bi gosyee wi'e dill' yawi nez.
Aga wisyoll wistoe' c̱hishje' yax̱tila' daa ba chashjə. na' aga wisole' mesha' daa ba chiyol, ax̱t ki gone' gan wli'lao yeḻ' ḻi yeḻ' shao' c̱he'na'.
Na' beṉ' lle' doxen yell-lioni gongake' lez ḻen' gaklene' ḻegake'.
Jwa'gake' lao Jesúza' to beṉ' yo'e dii x̱iw' na' bi chle'ile' ni bi chak iṉie'. Na' bibej Jesúza' dii x̱iwaa yo'e, na' bile'ile' na' gokte biṉie'.
Yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' bibangakile' ka nak daa bene', na' chisne': ―¿Aaga beenin xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Davina', beena' chbezcho, lla?
Ka beni fariseoka' dillaa choe' beṉ'ka', na' che'gake': ―Aga bi yeḻ' wak nap beeni. San yeḻ' wak c̱he Bezlona', daa chṉabia' dii x̱iw'ka'zan, chibejile' diika'.
Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' daa chza'lall' fariseoka', na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―Shi gana' chṉabia' to beṉ' na' tiḻgake' to ḻezgake' na' gakgake' c̱hoplə, na' kwiayi' gana' chṉabi'e, na' ka'kzə shi to yell wa beṉ' lle' toz yoo gakgake' c̱hoplə aga wdiagake'.
Ka'kzə Satanáza', shi yibej ljwell dii x̱iwiinka' yoo beṉ', aga wdia yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱heyinna', sheḻ'ka', ḻa' to ḻezgakannan' chidiḻ-len kwingakin.
Le' nale chibej' dii x̱iwaa yoo beṉ' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Bezlona' daa chṉabia' ḻegakan. ¿Shera beṉ'ka' nakle txen? ¿Aḻekzka' ḻennan' chibejlengake' dii x̱iw'ka' yoo beṉ'? Daa bi nakan ka', na' chli'n nakllejile.
Na' shi nad' chibej' dii x̱iw'ka' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Espíritu c̱he Chioza' zejin ladjleni ba bla' yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza'.
’Aga no gak sho' lill to beṉ' wal na' kwane' dii de c̱he' shi bi wc̱heje'ne' zigaate. Na'chan gak kwane' lille'na'.
’Beena' bi chone' nad' txen, ḻen' chakzbanile' nad'; na' beena' bi chaklene' nad' kwenc̱he wzenag beṉ' c̱he Chioza', ḻen' chsej chllone' wzenaggake'.
’Na' nia' le', wizi'xen Chioza' yog' saaxya c̱helena' na' yog'te dii mala' daa chbell chṉele, san shi iṉele zban c̱he Espíritu Sántona' na' c̱heyi diika' chone', aga wizi'xen Chioza' c̱hele.
Na' shi no iṉe c̱ha', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, ḻekzka' wizi'xen Chioza' c̱he', san beena' iṉe c̱he Espíritu Sántona', aga wizi'xene' c̱he' ṉaa zoe' yell-lioni ni kat' illin llana' wc̱hogloe' c̱he beṉ'.
’Ṉezicho yaga' daa nak wen chbian dii wen, na' yaga' daa bi nak wen aga bi dii wen chbian. Kon ka nak yaga', ka'te nak daa chbian.
¡Le' beṉ' wen dii mal! ¿Nakra gonle iṉele daa nak dii wen daa nakle beṉ' mal? Ḻa' yog' dill' daa chchej cho'a ḻoll'chona' za'n ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'chona'.
Beena' nak beṉ' wen cho'e dill' wen, daa yoo dii wenna' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena'; na' beena' nak beṉ' michian bi cho'e dill' yejni'alallii, daa yoo dii michianna' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena'.
Na' nad' nia' le', kat' illin lla yizi' Chioza' kwent c̱he yog' beṉ', kanan' yidele kwent c̱he yog'te dill'ka' konteḻe wṉele.
Ḻa' shi le' choe'le dill' wen, na'ch iṉa Chioza' bibi doḻ' naple; per shi le' bi choe'le dill' wen, na' wc̱hogloe' c̱hele sak'zi'le.
Na'ch baḻ fariseoka' na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' che'gake' Jesúza': ―Maestro, cheeninto' ile'into' gono' to yeḻ' wak kwenc̱he gakbe'into' shi Chiozan' bseḻee li'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Le' nakle beṉ' mal na' beṉ' bi chzenag c̱he Chioza' chṉable ile'ile' yeḻ' waka' kwenc̱he wli'n shi Chiozan' bseḻee nad', per aga wliid' le' daa cheenile. Ḻete ile'ile to dii nak ka yeḻ' wak daa ben Chioza' c̱he dii Jonáza'.
Ḻa' Jonáza' wyo'e shoṉə lla shoṉə yel ḻoo ḻee beḻ xenna', na' ka'kzə nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, shoṉ lla shoṉ yel igaaṉa' ḻoo bana'.
Kat' illin lla wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni, kanan' dii beṉ' Níniveka' gaogake' xya c̱hele, le' zoale ṉaa, ḻa' ḻegake' biyaj bileni saaxya c̱he'ka' kana' wdix̱je'i dii Jonáza' ḻegake' cho'a xtill' Chioza'. Na' nad', zak'techid' aga ka dii Jonáza' na' bi chzenagle c̱ha'.
Na' ḻekzka' llana' kat' wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni, noola' wṉabia' yellka' lle' do lli'lə gawe' xya c̱hele, le' zoale ṉaa, ḻa' ḻen' wzee zit' nlleb bidzenague' dill' sin' daa wṉe dii Salomónna'. Na' nad', zak'techid' aga ka dii Salomónna' na' bi chzenagle c̱ha'.
’Kat' chichej dii x̱iwaa yoo beṉ', na' chdan gana' bibi chashj chḻeb chyiljan gana' yizi'lalliin. Na' kat' bi chllelin gana' yizi'lalliin,
na'ch chakin: “Yiyaach' dii yoblə gana' bichejkz'.” Na' kat' yillinan gana' bichejan, nakan ka to yoo desh dii nxi nḻoa.
Na'ch lljaxi'n zi gall dii x̱iw'ka' nakch dii malch aga ka ḻen, na' sho'gakan beena'. Na' gaktech mal c̱he beena' aga ka gok c̱he' dii nech. Ka'kzan gak c̱he beṉ' malka' lle' ṉaa.
Ni choe'lente Jesúza' beṉ'ka' dillaa ka bllin xṉeena' len beṉ' bisheeka' goklall'gake' wshaljlengake'ne' na' wzegake' lesh' chyoona'.
Na' goll to beṉ' Jesúza': ―Xṉoona' len beṉ' bishooka' zegake' lesh' chyoona' cheengakile' wshaljlengake' li'.
Na' che' Jesúza' beena' golle'ne' ka': ―¿Noran xṉa'na' na' noran beṉ' bishaaka'?
Na'ch bli'e beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' chi'e: ―Beṉ'kin xṉa'na' na' beṉ' bishaaka'.
Ḻa' nottezə beena' chon ka cheeni X̱a'na' zoa yabana', beenan' nake' beṉ' bishaa, beṉ' zan' na' xṉa'.
Na' lo llana'tezə wza' Jesúza' yoona' gana' zoe' na' jc̱hi'e cho'a nisdo'na'.
Na' daa bdop beṉ' zan gana' chi'e, na' wyepe' jshie' to ḻoo barkw. Na' yog' beṉ'ka' bdop bllag wzegake' cho'a nisdo'na'zə.
Na'ch bseesee zan jemplka' kwenc̱he bli' bsedile' ḻegake', chi'e: ―To beṉ' goz gooṉ wzee zeje' goza'.
Na' ka zej chzaḻee biṉna', bxop baḻan cho'a neza' na' bllin byiṉka' wdaogakban.
Na' zi baḻan bxop ladj yajka' gana' bitek chi' yona', na' ḻobe' bilaan daa bi wyazan zitj.
Na' ka wṉa'n wbilla', bkwedan na' wbillten daa bitek bde loinna'.
Na' zi baḻan bxop ladj yag yesh'ka', na' bgol yag yesh'ka' na' bi be'gakan latj igolgakan.
Na' zi baḻan bxop lo yo wenna', na' wlliachgan. Baḻan wllia to guiyoa, na' zi baḻan wllia guiyon na' zi baḻan wllia shichoa.
Ka le' chenile dga nia', ḻi sen wṉeyi.
Na' beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen jabig'gake' kwite'na', wṉabgakile'ne': ―¿Bic̱he chseesoo jemplka' kat' chli' chsedilo' beṉ'?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Chioza' cho'e latj iṉezile ka nak yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he'na' daa kono ṉezi. Na' beṉ'ka' bi nak nad' txen, bi cho'e latj iṉezgakile'n.
Ḻa' beena' ze wṉeyi shajniile' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza', zizikli shajni'chile'n. Na' beena' bi se wṉeyi shajniile'n, na' gaḻ-lallee daa ba wyajniile' lat'.
Daan chseesaa jemplka' kat' chzajniid' ḻegake'. Ḻa' beṉ'ka' chwiategake' na' bi chakbe'gakile' bin zeji daa chon', na' chengakile' daa chṉia' na' bi chajni'gakile' bin zejin, daa bi chajḻe'gake' c̱ha'.
Na' daa chongake' ka', chillinin ka wna dii Isaíaza' ka wdix̱ji'e daa goll Chioza'ne', daa na: Ḻa'kzi yengakile', aga wyajni'gakile' bi zeji daa yengakile'. Na' ḻa'kzi ile'gakile', aga wakbe'gakile' bi zeji daa ile'gakile'.
Ḻa' yic̱hjlall'do'eka' nc̱hoḻ nnitin, na' chongake' ka beṉ' ndap naguin na' ka beṉ' nshod' jalawin. Sheḻ' bi chongake' ka', na' shajni'gakile' daa chzajniid' ḻegake' na' c̱hazan ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'eka' na' yiyaj yilengakile' dii malka' chongake', na' yiyongakee sto beṉ' wen.
’Per chakomba le' chakbe'ile bi zeji diika' chle'ile chon' na' chajniile diika' chli' chsedid'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', zan dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' na' zan dii beṉ'ka' bsa' c̱heyin wen lao Chioza' goklall'gake' ile'gakile' ka dga chle'ile ṉaa, na' bi ble'gakile'n. Na' goklall'gake' yengakile' ka dga chenile ṉaa na' bi bengakile'n.
’Ḻi wzenag bin zeji jempl c̱he beṉ' goz gooṉa'.
Beena' cheni cho'a xtill' Chioza' daa chzajniin ḻe' c̱he yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he'na', na' bi chajniile'n, nake' ka cho'a neza' gana' bxop binṉa' daa wdao byiṉdo'ka', ḻa' dii x̱iwaa chikwasan cho'a xtill' Chioza' daa wyoo ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena'.
Na' beena' cheni cho'a xtill' Chioza' na' ḻe chibaile' chlebe'n, nake' ka ladj yajka' gana' bxop biṉna'
daa bitek bi loin bde na' bi bdian. Ḻa' kat' bi chak c̱he' wa chc̱hi' chsak' beṉ' ḻe' ni c̱he cho'a xtill' Chioza', na' lii chbejte yic̱hje'n.
Na' beena' cheni cho'a xtill' Chioza' per chi' yic̱hje' diika' chak c̱he' na' chzelall'tie' yeḻ' wni'ana', na' chsej chllongakan gon xshin cho'a xtill' Chioza' lo yeḻ' mban c̱he'na'. Beenan' nake' ka daa bla' ladj yag yesh'ka' daa bi be'gakan latj igolan.
Per beena' cheni cho'a xtill' Chioza' na' chajniile'n na' chone' ka nan, nake' ka yo wenna' gana' bxop biṉna', na' baḻan wllian to guiyoa, baḻan do guiyon, na' zi baḻan wllian shichoa.
Na' bsees' Jesúza' sto jempl, chi'e ḻegake': ―Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' nakan ka to beṉ' goze' biṉ wenna' lo yell-lio c̱he'na'.
Per waḻ chela' shlak chese', wyaj to beṉ' chakzbanile'ne' jeze' ladj trígona' daa nak x̱enin, na' ka biyoll bene' ka' bizee.
Na' ka bgol trígona' na' wllian, na' ḻekzka' bgolte x̱eninna' ladjinna'.
Na' wyaj wen llinka' jellgake' x̱aninna': “Beṉ'do', ¿aaga biṉ wennan jezo' lo c̱ho'na'? ¿Gara wza' x̱eninna' lenzan ladjinna', lla?”
Na' che' x̱aninna' ḻegake': “Nochod' beṉ' chakzbanile' nad' jene' ka'.” Na' goll wen llinka' ḻe': “¿Acheenilo' shajnto' lljaḻall'nto'n?”
Na' chi'e ḻegake': “Bi lljaḻall'len, ḻa' nxoll lente trígona' wḻall'le.
San igol-lenchan trígona', na' kat' illin lla yic̱hoggake'n, na' yep' beṉ'ka' zigaate yiḻall'gake' x̱eninna' na' gongake'n shḻen wej kwenc̱he sheyan, na'tech yitopgake' trígona' na' yigooshao'gake'n ḻoo lillinna'.”
Na' ḻekzka' bzoa Jesúza' sto jempl, chi'e: ―Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' nakan ka sa mostásana' daa goz to beṉ' lo yell-lio c̱he'na'.
Ḻa'kzi sa mostásana' nakan ḻiizelozi diido' yid lao bichlə sa yix̱' kwan, kat' chḻa'n na' chgolan na' chakan dii xench aga ka yix̱' kwanka' sto, na' ax̱t byiṉdo'ka' chon lillbka' lo xoziinna'.
Na' ḻekzka' bzoe' sto jempl, chi'e: ―Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' nakan ka levadúrana' daa chc̱hix̱ to noolə shoṉa rob yezja' kwenc̱he yisgolan kwa c̱he yetxtila'.
Jesúza' toshiizi bc̱hine' jemplka' ka bi'e dill' ladj lao lkwe' beṉ'.
Na' daa ben Jesúza' ka', billinin daa wdix̱jee to beṉ' daa goll Chioza'ne', ka wne': Wc̱hin' jemplka' ka we'len' beṉ' dill'. We'len' beṉ' dill' c̱heyi daa konoṉ' iṉezi dezd kana' bx̱e bsilte Chioza' yell-lioni.
Na' bisa' Jesúza' beṉ'ka' lle' na', na' biyo'e ḻoo yoona'. Na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen jabig'gake' kwite'na' che'gake'ne': ―Bizajnii neto' bi zeji jempl c̱he x̱en trígona'
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Kin zejin: Nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, zaklebid' beena' goz trígona'.
Na' doxen yell-lioni zaklebin gana' goz beena' trígona'. Na' beṉ'ka' choe'gake' latj chṉabia' Chioza' yic̱hjlall'do'eka' zaklebgakile' trígona'. Na' beṉ'ka' choe'gake' latj chṉabia' dii x̱iwaa yic̱hjlall'do'eka' zaklebgakile' x̱en trígona'.
Na' dii x̱iwaa zaklebin beṉ' mala', beena' jez ladj trígona' daa nak x̱enin. Na' llana' chilapgake', zaklebin llana' kwiayi' yell-lioni. Na' anjlka' zaklebgakile' beṉ'ka' chizi' chilap trígona'.
Na' ka chitopgake' daa nak x̱en trígona' kwenc̱he wzeygake'n, ka'kzan gak c̱he beṉ'ka' chṉabia' dii x̱iwaa yic̱hjlall'do'eka' ka illin lla kwiayi' yell-lioni.
Nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, wseḻaa anjl c̱ha'ka' kwenc̱he yitopgake' beṉ' wen dii malka' na' beṉ'ka' chzechgake' beṉ' yoblə gongake' dii mala'.
Na' wzaḻ'gake' ḻegake' lo yi' gabiḻa' gana' kwellyesh'gake' na' gaox̱ax̱j ḻeye'ka' daa ḻe gakshejlall'gake'.
Na' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao'ka' sho'gake' balaaṉ choo balaaṉ xen yabana' gana' chṉabia' X̱acho Chioza'. Ka le' chenile dga nia', ḻi sen wṉeyi.
’Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' nakan ka to mech xen dii ngash' to lo yell-lio c̱he beṉ' gana' to beṉ' jadi'en. Na' na'tezə bikwasheen, na' chibaile' jayet' jadie' yog' dii de c̱he' kwenc̱he bizi'e yell-liona' gana' ngash' mecha'.
’Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' zaklebin to beṉ' chone' delgens c̱he perla dii zak'chga.
Na' ka bllelile' to dii ḻiizelozi zakii, na'ch jayet' jadie' yog' dii de c̱he' kwenc̱he wxi'en.
’Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' zaklebin to yix̱j c̱he beḻ. Beṉ'ka' chzen beḻa' chzaḻ'gake' yix̱ja' ḻoo nisdo'na' na' chzenan zan kwen beḻ.
Na' kat' chilla' yix̱ja' na' chibejgake'n cho'a nisdo'na' na' chbe'gake' chibegake' beḻka' nak wen na' chgooshao'gake'b to ḻoo llom, na' baka' bi nak wen, chchooṉgake'b.
Kan' gak c̱he beṉec̱ha' ka illin lla kwiayi' yell-lioni. Anjlka' yibegake' beṉ' wenka' ladj beṉ' malka',
na' wzaḻ'gake' beṉ' malka' lo yi' gabiḻa' na' kwellyesh'gake' na' gaox̱ax̱j ḻeye'ka' daa ḻe gakshejlall'gake'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―¿Azajniile yog' daa ba bli' bsedid' le'? Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―Awe, zajniinto'n.
Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Beena' chli' chsedi leya' na' nzedile' c̱he yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chios, beena' zoa yabana', zaklebile' to x̱an yoo beṉ' ngooshawee dii zan dii zakii, ka dii kob na' ka dii gol, na' chbeje'gakan chc̱hine'gakan.
Ka biyoll bsees' Jesúza' jemplka', na' bizee.
Na' ka billine' yell Nazareta' gana' bgole', na' bli' bsedile' beṉ' Israelka' chdop chllag gana' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza'. Na' bibani beṉ'ka', che'gake': ―¿Gara jx̱i' beeni yeḻ' sin' c̱he'na', na' nak chak chone' yeḻ' wakka'?
¿Aaga xiiṉ karpintera'zan na' xṉeena' lie' María? Na' ¿aaga beṉ' bishee Jacóbona', Joséna', Simónna' na' Júdaza'?
Na' beṉ' zane'ka' zoagake' lallchoni. ¿Gara jasede' yog'ḻoḻ diiki chli' chsedile', lla?
Na' daa bi wyajḻe'gake' c̱he Jesúza', na' golle' ḻegake': ―To beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne', gattez chgoogake'ne' balaaṉ san lall lille'na' aga no chgoo ḻe' balaaṉ.
Na' aga bitek yeḻ' wak ben Jesúza' yell Nazareta' daa bi wyajḻe'gake' c̱he'.
Na' do kana', Heródeza', beena' chṉabia' gana' mbani Galileana', benile' ka nak daa chon Jesúza'.
Na' golle' beṉ'ka' chon xshine'na': ―Beenan' dii Juanna', beena' bchoa beṉ' nisa'. Ba bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', daan chak chone' yeḻ' wakka'.
Ḻa' kana' ni mban dii Juanna', Heródeza' bseḻee beṉ' bex̱'gake'ne' na' wloogake'ne' lillyana' ni c̱he Herodíaza' xool beṉ' bisheena', beena' le Felipe.
Ḻa' dii Juanna' golle' Heródeza': ―Bi nakan wen nkoo xool beṉ' bishoona'.
Na' daa golle'ne' ka' goklall' Heródeza' wite'ne', per bi biyaxjile' daa bllebe' beṉ'ka' chajḻe' daa nak Juanna' to beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'.
Per ka wya'i Heródeza' yiz, bi' nool wew' c̱he Herodíaza' byaab' lao beṉ'ka' lle' lṉina'. Na' daa ḻe biyoolallii Heródeza' ka byaab'
ax̱t bzoe' Chioza' de tasc̱hiw bc̱hebe' wi'eb' bittezə dii iṉabib' ḻe'.
Na' kon ka bzajnii xṉa'baab' bem', na' che'b' Heródeza': ―Yic̱hj Juanna', beena' chchoa beṉ' nisa', cheenid' goṉo'n nad' to lo plat llilj.
Na' gokyeshii Heródeza', per daa ba bc̱heble' lao yog' beṉ'ka' goxe' lṉina' wi'eb' kon daa iṉabib' ḻe', benshaze' byen we'gake'b' daa wṉabb'.
Na' bseḻee beṉ' jac̱hoggake' yic̱hj Juanna' ḻoo lillyana'.
Na' blliagake'n to lo plat llilj na' be'gake'n bi' nool wewaa na' be'baan xṉa'baa.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' wdalen Juanna' txen wyajgake' jaxi'gake' kwerp c̱he'na' na' bkwash'gake'n. Na' wdena' jellgake' Jesúza' ka gok.
Na' ka wṉezi Jesúza' daa gok c̱he Juanna', bizee gana' zoe' na' biyo'e to ḻoo barkw ziyaje' gana' kono beṉ' lle'. Na' ka wṉezi beṉ'ka' lle' yellka' llia gaozə cho'a nisdo'na' galan zej Jesúza', na'ch wloogake' nez janogake'ne'.
Na' ka bichej Jesúza' ḻoo barkwa', ble'ile' beṉ' zan inlleb ba lle' na', na' biyeshile' ḻegake' na' biyone' beṉ'ka' bi shao'.
Na' ka ba wlle', na'ch beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen jabig'gake' kwite'na', che'gake'ne': ―Ba wlle' ṉaa, na' gani lle'cho kono zoa wit' dii gaocho. Goll beṉ'ki yiyajgake' yellka' llia gaozə kwenc̱he lljx̱i'gake' dii gaogake'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Bi chonan byen yiyajgake'. Len', ḻi we' dii gaogake'.
Na' che'gake'ne': ―Gay'chga yetxtil na' zi c̱hopchga beḻ noa'nto' ni.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi goṉshkin ni.
Na'ch golle' beṉ'ka' kwe'gake' lo yixa'. Na' bex̱ee yetxtilka' gay' na' beḻka' c̱hop na' bḻis lawe'na' yabana' na' bi'e Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken. Na'ch bxoxje' yetxtilka' na' bi'en beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen kwenc̱he be'gake' c̱he c̱he beṉ'ka'.
Na' wdao yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' ax̱t ka beljgakile'. Na' ka bidaogake', na'ch bitopgake' diika' bgaaṉ, na' biyakan shlliṉ xet'.
Na' beṉ' byoka' wdao gokgake' ka do gayaa mil, na' bi blabgake' noolka' na' bi'do'ka' wdao.
Ka wde dga bigoo Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen to ḻoo barkw kwenc̱he yiḻag'gake' shḻaa nisdo'na' to ḻezgake', na' ḻe' bigaaṉe' kwenc̱he bisee beṉ'ka' bdop bllag.
Na' wde bisee beṉ'ka', na'ch wyepe' to lo yaa kwenc̱he jeḻwille' Chioza' toze'. Na' ni zetie' lo yaana' ka goḻ.
Na' barkwa' gana' ziyoo beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen ba zejan gchoḻ nisdo'na'. Chakan to ki to ka'lə daa chas chat' nisa', na' be'na' bi cho'en latj yiyajan shḻicha.
Na' zbaḻz biyetj Jesúza' lo yaana' na' bizee tlo nisdo'na' zeje' gana' zejləgake'.
Na' ka ble'i beṉ'ka' non Jesúza' txen zeje' tlo nisa', ḻe bllebgake' na' ax̱t besyaagake', nagake': ―¡Ba za' to yel bx̱en!
Na' lii wṉete Jesúza' ḻegake', chi'e: ―Bi illeble. Nad'kzan'.
Na'ch wṉe Pédrona' chi'e: ―X̱an', shi lin', ben ka gak saa lo nisi kwenc̱he yid' kwito'na'.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Dashka'. Na'ch bchej Pédrona' ḻoo barkwa' na' wzoloe' chzee tlo nisa' nan shaje' kwit Jesúza'.
Per ka gokbe'ile' zechga be'na', na' bllebe' na' lii wzolote chbi'e yel, na'ch besyee chi'e: ―¡X̱an', bisla nad'!
Na' lii biyox̱'te Jesúza' neena', chi'ene': ―¿Berac̱he gokc̱hopzilo'? ¿Bic̱he bi nx̱enilalloo nad' kwasḻoḻ?
Na' kon ka biyoogake' ḻoo barkwa' na' bgan be'na'.
Na' beṉ'ka' bgaaṉ ḻoo barkwa', be'la'ogake' Jesúza' na' gollgake': ―Dii ḻi, lin' Xiiṉ Chioza'.
Na' ka bḻag'gake' shḻaa nisdo'na' na' bllingake' gana' mbani Genesareta'.
Na' beṉ' Genesaretka' biyombia'gake' Jesúza' na'ch bzengakile' beṉ' yellka' lle' gao nan ba bllin Jesúza'. Na' jwa'gake' yog' beṉ'ka' bi shao' lawe'na',
na' got'yogakile'ne' wi'e latj ḻa'c̱h' gox̱' beṉ' we'ka' xe'na', na' yog' beṉ'ka' bex̱'gake'n biyakgakile'.
Baḻ fariseoka' na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya', wza'gake' Jerusalénna' na' wyajgake' lao Jesúza', wṉabgakile'ne':
―¿Bic̱he beṉ'ki nakgake' li' txen bi chongake' ka wyoolo dii x̱ozxto'choka'? Ḻa' bi chix̱is chiyib neeka' ka zi' gaogake'.
Na' wṉabi Jesúza' ḻegake' chi'e: ―¿Bic̱he chyishjle daa nllia Chioza' bia' gonle na' zechle wṉeyi chonle ka ben dii x̱ozxto'choka'?
Ḻa' kin wna Chioza': “Ḻi gap x̱axṉa'le balaaṉ”, na' “Beena' iṉe zban c̱he x̱e'na' wa xṉeena', chiyaḻ' guete'.”
Per le', nale wak ye' beṉ' x̱axṉeena': “Bi gak gaklen' le', ḻa' yog' daa nap' ba nc̱heb' wi'an Chioza'.”
Na' beena' yee x̱axṉeena' ka', cho'allalene' daa nale bi chonan byen gaklene' ḻegake'. Na' daa chonle ka', chonile daa nllia Chioza' bia' goncho ka to dii bibi zakii kwenc̱he nole diika' wyoolo dii x̱ozxto'choka'.
¡Le' beṉ' wxiye', le' wen gan! Kwasḻoḻ inlleb be' dii Isaíaza' xtill'le, ka wne':
Beṉ'ki choe'la'ogake' nad' de cho'a ḻoll'zgake', ḻa' aga do yic̱hj do lall'gaken' choe'la'ogake' nad'.
Bibi zjanayin chonzgake' ka beṉ' choe'la'o nad'; na' diika' chli' chsedgakile' nakgakan c̱he beṉ' yell-lioz.
Na' wṉe Jesúza' beṉ'ka' lle' na', golle' ḻegake': ―Ḻi wzenag dga iṉia' le' na' ḻi shajniin.
Aga daa cheej chao beṉaan chx̱iṉj chḻenan yic̱hjlall'do'ena', san dill'ka' chchej cho'enan', ḻennan' chx̱iṉj chḻenan yic̱hjlall'do'ena'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen wbig'gake' kwite'na', gollgake'ne': ―¿Azakbe'ilo' gokzi'chgayi fariseoka' ka bengakile' wno' ka'?
Na'ch goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Nottezə beṉ' bi chzenague' c̱he X̱a'na' zoa yabana', yiyol yinite', na' gak c̱he' ka chak c̱he to yag dii chḻall' beṉ' do loyin.
Jwayishazi fariseoka', ḻa' nnit nc̱hoḻgakilen'. Na' ṉezicho shi to beṉ' lc̱hoḻ wc̱hi'e sto ljwell lc̱hoḻe', c̱hoptie' lljabix̱.
Na'ch Pédrona' golle' Jesúza': ―Bizajnii neto' bi zejin jempla' daa ba bseesoo.
Na'ch goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Aḻekzka' lenle biṉ' shajniile bi zejin daa ba wnia'?
¿Abi ṉezile nan daa cheej chaocho chjc̱he'n ḻoo ḻeechona' na'tech chiden?
Per ka nak daa chṉecho, ḻennan' chalj chxen ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'chona'. Na' shi chṉecho dii bi nak wen, ḻennan' chx̱iṉj chḻenan cho'.
Ḻa' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉec̱han' chalj chxe diiki bi nak wen: yeḻ' chon xya, yeḻ' chṉelen ljwellin, yeḻ' wban, yeḻ' chyiljlall' c̱he beṉ', na' yeḻ' chbell chṉe c̱he beṉ'.
Diikin chx̱iṉjan yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ', aga daa bi chix̱is chiyib neena' ka zi' gawen'.
Na' biza' Jesúza' wyaje' gana' mbani yell Tírona' len yell Sidónna'.
Na' to noolə cananea zoe' gana' mbani yellka' wbigue' kwite'na' na' wṉie' zilljə, chi'ene': ―X̱an', Xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Daví, biyesh'lall'gachi nad', ḻa' bi' nool c̱ha'na' yoob' dii x̱iwaa na' ḻe chsak'zi'n ḻeb'.
Per Jesúza' bikzə bi golle' noola'. Na'ch beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen wbig'gake' kwite'na' gollgake'ne': ―Goll nooli yiyaje', ḻa' kon chosyee zidnoe' cho'.
Na'ch goll Jesúza': ―Bseḻ' Chioza' nad' kwenc̱he gaklen' to beṉ' Israelka'zə, beṉ'ka' nak ka xil'ka' wnit.
Na'ch noola' jabiguee kwit Jesúza' na' bc̱hek' xibe'na' lawe'na' chi'ene': ―¡X̱an', goklengach nad'!
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Bi nakan wen yikaacho yeḻ' wawa' chao bi'do' c̱hechoka' na' we'chon bekw'ka'.
Na'ch noola' chi'ene': ―Lekzilo', X̱an', per chak chao xikw'choka' diika' chxop lo yona'.
Na'ch goll Jesúza'ne': ―¡Noolə, nonḻilall'likzo' nad'! Na' gak ka cheenilo'. Na' katena' lii biyakteyi bi' nool c̱he'na'.
Na' biza' Jesúza' na', na' billine' cho'a nisdo' c̱he Galileana' na' wyepe' to lo yaa jc̱hi'e.
Na' beṉ' zan bllin lawe'na' nc̱he'gake' no beṉ' bi chak sa', no beṉ' lc̱hoḻ, no beṉ' bi chak iṉe, no beṉ' nxiṉj, no beṉ' chak bichlə yillwe'. Na' bzoagake' ḻegake' lao Jesúza' na' biyone' ḻegake'.
Na' bibani beṉ'ka' ka gok, ḻa' beṉ'ka' bi chak iṉe wṉegake', na' beṉ'ka' nxiṉj biyakgakile', na' beṉ'ka' bi chak sa' wza'gake', na' beṉ' lc̱hoḻka' ble'gakile'. Na'ch yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' be'la'ogake' Chios, beena' choe'la'o beṉ' Israelka'.
Na'ch gox Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, na' golle' ḻegake': ―Ḻe chiyeshid' beṉ'ki, ḻa' ba gok shoṉ lla zoalengake' cho' ni, na' aga bi de dii gaogake'. Na' bi cheenid' yisangakee daa biṉ' gaogake', ḻa' nxoll ikwidgakile' tneza'.
Na' che' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―Per ¿ga lljx̱i'cho dii gao yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ki?, ḻa' gani lle'cho kono zoa wit' dii gaocho.
Na'ch wṉabi Jesúza' ḻegake', chi'e: ―¿Zi baḻchga yetxtil c̱hechoka' de? Na' che'gake'ne': ―De gall yetxtilka' na' sto c̱hop beḻ.
Na'ch goll Jesúza' beṉ'ka' kwe'gake' lo yona'.
Na' bex̱ee yetxtilka' gall na' beḻka' na' bi'e Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken, na' bxoxje'n bi'en beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen kwenc̱he be'gake' c̱he c̱he beṉ'ka'.
Na' yoguee wdao ax̱t ka beljgakile'. Na' wdena' bitopgake' dii lao'ka' bichooṉan, gokten zi gall xet'.
Na' beṉ' byoka' wdao nakgake' tapa mil, na' bi blabgake' noolka' ni bi'do'ka' wdao.
Na' biyoll bisa' Jesúza' ḻegake', biyo'e to ḻoo barkw len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' biyajgake' gana' mbani yell Magdálana'.
Fariseoka' len saduceoka' jawiagake' Jesúza' na' wṉabgakile'ne' gone' to yeḻ' wak dii ile'gakile' kwenc̱he wli'n shi Chiozan' bseḻeene'.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Shlle'na' chwiale xan yabana' na' nale: “Ḻe yillaa wx̱e, ḻa' ḻe nḻatjcha.”
Na' shi chibe'cha shzila' na' nale: “Wak yeja' ḻa' ba bibe'cha.” Le' chakbe'ile shi gak zey' wa gak yej daa chwiale ka nak xan yabana', per aga chakbe'ile bin zeji diika' chon Chioza' llaki zoacho ṉaa.
Le' nakle beṉ' mal na' beṉ' bi chzenag c̱he Chioza', chṉable ile'ile' to yeḻ' wak kwenc̱he wli'n shi Chioza' bseḻee nad', per bi wliid' le' daa chṉable. Ḻete ile'ile sto yeḻ' wak ka daa ben Chioza' c̱he dii Jonáza'. Na' wde goll Jesúza' ḻegake' ka', na' bizee kwite'ka' ziyaje'.
Na' ka bllingake' shḻaa nisdo'na', beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen goḻ-lall'gake' wa'gake' yetxtila'.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Wsak'gale bi shajḻe'le dill' wxiye' c̱he fariseoka' na' saduceoka', daa zaklebi levadúrana'.
Na' che' ljwellgake': ―Daa goḻ-lall'cho wa'cho yetxtilan' ne' cho' ka'.
Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' daa che' ljwellgake' na' golle' ḻegake': ―¿Bic̱he nazle bibi yetxtila' bia'le? ¿Bic̱he bi nx̱enilall'le nad' kwasḻoḻ?
¿Abikzaṉ' shajniile ka nak diika' chon'? ¿Abi chjadinile kana' wdao gayaa mil beṉ' kon gay'zə yetxtilka' na' baḻ xet' dii bixjka' bitople?
Na' ¿shera kana' wdao tapa mil beṉ' kon gallzə yetxtilka'? ¿Abi chjadinile baḻ xet' dii bixjka' bitople?
¿Bic̱he c̱he yetxtila'lə wyajnizile ka wnia' wsak'gale c̱he levadura c̱he fariseoka' len saduceoka'?
Na' kana'ch wyajni'gakile' nan aga c̱he levadura c̱he yetxtilan' chi'e ḻegake' wsak'gake' san diika' chli' chsedi fariseoka' len saduceoka'lan.
Na' ka bllin Jesúza' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen gana' mbani yell Cesarea c̱he Filípona', na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Non na beṉ' yell-liona' nak', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni?
Na' che'gake'ne': ―Baḻe' nagake' nako' dii Juanna', beena' bchoa beṉ' nisa', na' zi baḻe' nagake' nako' Elíaza', na' zi baḻe' nagake' nako' dii Jeremíaza', na' baḻe' nagake' nako' sto beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'.
Na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Shera le'? ¿Nora nale nak'?
Na' Simón Pédrona' chi'ene': ―Lin' Crístona', Xiiṉ Chios yaa Chios banna'.
Na' Jesúza' chi'ene': ―Chakomba li' Simón, xiiṉ Jonás, ḻa' aga nochlan bzajnii li' daa ba wno'. X̱a'na' zoa yabanan' ba bzajniile'n li'.
Na' nad' nia' li', lin' lio' Pedro, daa zeji yaj, na' gako' ka to yaj wal na' lin' wc̱hin' kwenc̱he gono' ka shanch beṉ'ka' gonḻilall'gake' nad', na' ni yeḻ' wita' bi yizoin wlliayi'n beṉ'ka' ba wlej' kwenc̱he nakgake' lall' na'.
Na' goṉ' li' yeḻ' wṉabia' daa zaklebi to xiiṉya dii chsaljan yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'. Na' diika' iṉo' bi chiyaḻ' gon beṉ' yell-lioni, ḻekzka' iṉa Chioza' zoa yabana', na' diika' iṉo' wak gongake', ḻekzka' iṉa Chioza' zoa yabana'.
Na' goll Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen ni to kono ye'gake' ḻen' Crístona', beena' bseḻ' Chioza' iṉabi'e.
Na' lo llana' wzolo Jesúza' bzajniile' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen daa llia bia' gak c̱he'. Golle' ḻegake' chonan byen yiyaje' Jerusalénna' kwenc̱he gake' lo na' beṉ' golka' chṉabia' na' lo na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' lo na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya', na' ḻe wsak'zi'gake'ne', na' chonan byen witgake'ne' na' ka gak shoṉ lla yibane' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch Pédrona' wleje' Jesúza' ladj beṉ'ka' chi'ene': ―X̱an', ¡bat gak c̱ho' ka ba wno'!
Na' biyec̱hj Jesúza' chi'e Pédrona': ―Kwas ka'lə, Satanás. Cheenzilo' bi gon' daa llia bia' gon' daa bi yoo yic̱hjo' daa cheeni Chioza', san daa nak c̱he yell-liozan yoo yic̱hjo'.
Na' che' Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―Shi no cheeni gon nad' txen, chiyaḻ' wsanlall' kwine', na' izani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' yen ile'ile' bittez ni c̱ha', na' gone' ka chazlallaa.
Ḻa' beena' bi chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na', beenan' kwiayi', san beena' chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' yen ile'ile' bittez ni c̱ha', beenan' gat' to yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
¿Bera zjanayin gap beṉ' yog'te dii de yell-lioni, shi ḻe' kwiayee? Aga bi de wi'e lo laz yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' kwenc̱he bi kwiayee.
Ḻa' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, yiyed' len anjl c̱ha'ka' zinsa' balaaṉ xen c̱he X̱a' Chioza'. Kana'chan c̱hixj' to to beṉ' kon ka dii bene'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', baḻ-le lle'le ni, ni mbanle ile'ile yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱ha'na', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni.
Ka wde x̱op lla, bc̱he' Jesúza' Pédrona', na' Jacóbona' len beṉ' bishee Juanna', na' to ḻezgake' wyajlene' to lo yaa xen.
Na' ka lle'gake' lo yaana', gok Jesúza' nlla'lə lawe'ka'. Wyep wyeeni' cho'alawe'na' kakzə wbilla', na' xe'na' nakwe' gokan xtil llyish ax̱t chey cheeni'n.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle'lengake'ne' ble'gakile' dii Moiséza' na' Elíaza' chshaljlengake' Jesúza'.
Na'ch Pédrona' golle' Jesúza': ―X̱an', ḻe mbalaz zoacho ni. Shi cheenilo', gon' shoṉ ransh, ton cho', ston c̱he Moiséza' na' ston c̱he Elíaza'.
Na' ka golle' ka', betj to bej dii chey cheeni' na' bkwashaan ḻegake', na' ḻoo beja' bengakile' che' Chioza': ―Beenin Xiiṉaa, beena' chakid', na' chazlall'chga' ka chone'. Ḻi wzenag c̱he'.
Na' beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen, ka bengakile' wṉe Chioza', ḻe bllebchgagake' na' to bdoszgake' lo yona'.
Na' wbig' Jesúza' kwite'ka' bex̱ee ḻegake', chi'e: ―Ḻi yiyas. Bi illeble.
Na' ka biḻis yic̱hje'ka', koch no beṉ'ka' ble'gakile', stochga Jesúza'.
Na' ka biza'gake' lo yaana' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ni to kono ye'le ka nak dga ba ble'ile ax̱t kat'ch nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, ba biban' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen che'gake'ne': ―¿Berac̱he naz beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' zigaate Elíazan' yiyed?
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi ka nakannan', zigaate Elíazan' yiyede' yigwee xṉezi yog'ḻoḻte.
Per nad' nia' le', ba biyed Elíaza', na' bi gokbe'gakile' shi ḻen'. Na' bengakile'ne' kon ka wnazan c̱hegake'. Na' ka'kzan gongakile' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni.
Na' gokbe'gakile' nan c̱he Juanna', beena' bchoa beṉ' nisan' cho'e dill'.
Na' ka billingake' gana' lle' lla' beṉ', na'ch bchej to beṉ' jabiguee kwit Jesúza' na' bc̱hek' xibe'na' lawe'na', chi'ene':
―Maestro, biyesh'gachi bi' c̱ha'ni. Chazb' shoṉ na' ḻe chzak'zi'b'. Zan shii ba bzaḻa'n ḻeb' lo yi'na' na' ḻekzka' ḻoo nisa'.
Na' ba jwa'b' lao beṉ'ka' nakgake' li' txen na' bi gok yiyongake'b'.
Na' goll Jesúza': ―¡Zi'tegalə c̱helena', le' beṉ' mal na' beṉ' bi chajḻe'! ¿Zi ka'k'tek chiyaḻ' soalen' le'? Na' ¿zi ka'k'tek chiyaḻ' soid' le'? Ḻi da diwa' bi' xkwidaa ni.
Na'ch bsheshlen Jesúza' dii x̱iwaa yoob' na' bichejan. Na' katena' biyakib'.
Na' ka biyoll gok ka', beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen bshaljlengake'ne' to ḻezgake', gollgake': ―¿Bic̱he bi gok yibejnto' dii x̱iwaa yoo bi' xkwidaa?
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Bi gok yibejlen, ḻa' bi chajḻe'le Chioza' gone' ka yichejan. Dii ḻi nia' le', sheḻ'ka' yeḻ' chajḻe' c̱helena' nakan ḻa'c̱h' ka sa mostásana' daa nak diido'zə, wakte ye'le yaani: “Bkwas ni na' jsoa gan yoblə”, na' wkwasan ka'lə. Aga ga de to dii bi gak gonle sheḻ'ka' chajḻe'le c̱he Chioza'.
Kwenc̱he gak yibejle dii x̱iwaa ka daa bibej' bi' xkwidaa, chiyaḻ' soale wbas' na' soac̱hec̱hle we'ḻwill-le Chioza'.
Na' shlak chdalen Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen gana' mbani Galileana', golle' ḻegake': ―Nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, gak' lo na' beṉ' malka'.
Na' witgake' nad', na' ka gak shoṉ lla yiban' ladj beṉ' wetka'. Na' ka golle' ḻegake' ka', ḻe gokyesh'gakile'.
Na' ka billin Jesúza' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen Capernaúma', beṉ' Israelka' beṉ'ka' chc̱hixj c̱he yoodo'na' jawiagake' Pédrona', na' wṉabgakile'ne': ―¿Achyixj maestro c̱helena' daa chidoḻ'cho we'cho c̱he yoodo'na'?
Na' goll Pédrona' ḻegake': ―Awe, chyixje'n. Na' ka biyoo Pédrona' ḻoo yoona' gana' zoagake', Jesúza' bkwialoe' dillaa chi'e: ―¿Nak ka chakilo', Simón? Beṉ'ka' chṉabia' yell-lioni, ¿abeṉ' wlall c̱he'kan' chc̱hixjgake'?, ¿awa beṉ' zit'kan'?
Na' billii Pédrona' xtilleena': ―Beṉ' zit'kan' chc̱hixjgake'. Na' goll Jesúza'ne': ―Zejin beṉ' wlall c̱he'ka' bi chonan byen c̱hixjgake'.
Per kwenc̱he bi wshaachogake', wyaj cho'a nisdo'na' na' wzaḻoo daa chzenilo' beḻa'. Na' beḻ necha' seno' wx̱oo cho'aba' na' ḻoo cho'aba' yillelilo' to mech. Waktekzin lljtixjo' c̱he c̱hoptecho.
Na' do kana'kzə, beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen jabig'gake' kwite'na' che'gake'ne': ―¿Noran nak beṉ' zak'chi ladj beṉ'ka' chṉabia' Chioza'?
Na' wṉe Jesúza' to bi'do' na' bzie'b' ladje'ka'.
Na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', beena' bi yiyak yic̱hjlall'do'ena' ka c̱he bi'do'ni kwenc̱he iṉabia' Chioza' ḻe', bi ḻene' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' Chioza'.
Daan beena' wḻex̱j yic̱hje' wzenague' c̱he Chioza' ka chḻex̱j yic̱hj bi'do'ni chzenagb' c̱he x̱axṉa'baa, beenan' zak'chi ladj beṉ'ka' chṉabia' Chioza'.
Na' beena' wlebe' to bi'do' ka bi'do'ni daa chonḻilallee nad', nad'kzan chlebe'.
’Nottez beena' wchix̱e' to beṉ' zi' chzolo chonḻilallee nad' gone' dii mala', naklan wen wwaḻ'gake' yene'na' to yaj c̱he molin na' lljḻekgake'ne' yel ḻoo nisdo'na' aga ka daa wchix̱e' beṉ' lao dii mala'.
¡Nyesh'laz c̱he beṉ' yell-lioki!, ḻa' biga iyallji daa gonan ka wx̱iṉj wḻengake'. Per ¡nyesh'lazch gak c̱he beena' gon ka wx̱iṉj wḻen beṉ' yoblə!
’Na' shi noona' wa ṉi'ona' gonan ka ibix̱o' lao dii mala', naklan wen wc̱hogo'n na' c̱hooṉo'n, ḻa' wenchlan bi de noona' tḻaa wa ṉi'ona' tḻaa yillino' kwit Chioza' aga ka daa yiyaj doxentio' lo yi' gabiḻa' daa biga yiyol.
Na' shi daa ile'ilo' kon jalawo'na' gonan ka ibix̱o' lao dii mala', naklan wen wḻec̱hjo'n na' c̱hooṉo'n, ḻa' wenchlan yillinleno' tḻaaz jalawo'na' kwit Chioza' aga ka daa yiyaj doxentio' lo yi' gabiḻa'.
’Bi gonile nakzi ni to beṉ'ki zi' wzolo chonḻilall' nad'. Ḻa' nia' le', anjl c̱he'ka' toshiizi zoagake' lao X̱a'na', beena' zoa yabana'.
Ḻa' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, bid' kwenc̱he yisla' beṉ'ka' yoo nez daa wlliayi'n ḻegake'.
’¿Nak chakile? Shi to beṉ' lle' to guiyoa xil' c̱he' na' ṉit tob, ¿abi wkwaaṉe' baka' taplaḻj twaḻj na' shaje' lljadilje' bana' wnit?
Na' shi yillelile'b, ḻech yibaile' c̱heb aga ka c̱he baka' taplaḻj twaḻj baka' lle' tozga.
Ka'kzan X̱acho Chioza' zoa yabana' cheenile' ni to beṉ'ki zi' wzolo chonḻilall' nad' bi kwiayi' sheḻ'ka'.
’Shi to beṉ' nakle txen nonḻilall'le Chioza' gone' to dii mal c̱ho', je'lene' dill' to li' to ḻe' daa bene' c̱ho'. Shi ba bzenague' c̱ho', ba beno' gan bizoaleno'ne' wen.
Per shi bi wzenague' bin yoone', na'ch wc̱hi'o sto c̱hop beṉ' kwenc̱he gakgake' tasc̱hiw c̱he daa yoone'.
Na' shi ni ka' bi wzenague' c̱hele, wak ye'le yog' beṉ'ka' nakle txen nonḻilall'le Chioza' ka nak daa ba bene' kwenc̱he we'lengake'ne' dill'. Na' shi ni c̱he beṉ'ka' bi wzenague', na'chan gonilene' ka to beṉ' bi nonḻilall' Chioza' wa ka to beṉ' wic̱hixj.
’Na' dii ḻi nia' le', diika' iṉale bi gon beṉ' yell-lioni, ḻekzka' iṉa Chioza' zoa yabana', na' diika' iṉale wak gon beṉ' yell-lioni, ḻekzka' iṉa Chioza' zoa yabana'.
’Na' ḻekzka' nia' le', shi c̱hople idiḻi xtill'lena' yell-lioni kat' bi iṉable lao X̱a' Chioza', beena' zoa yabana', na' gone' daa iṉabilene'.
Ḻa' gana' chdop c̱hope' wa shoṉe' choe'la'ogake' nad', na'kz zoa' ladje'ka'.
Na' wbig' Pédrona' kwit Jesúza', chi'ene': ―X̱an', ¿baḻ shii chiyaḻ' yizi'xen' c̱he bish' ljwellaa shi bi dii mal chone' c̱ha'? ¿Azeelo gall shii?
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Aga nia' li' zeelo gall shii yizi'xeno' c̱he bish' ljwello'na', san nia' li' chiyaḻ' yizi'xeno' guiyon shin'c̱hopə shii.
’Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' zaklebin to beṉ' wṉabia' beena' bizi' kwent c̱he mecha' daa chaḻ' wen llin c̱he'ka'.
Na' ka wzoloe' chizi'e kwent c̱he to toe', jwa'gake' to wen llin c̱he'na' beena' chaḻ' dii xen inlleb.
Per aga bi mech nap beena' kwenc̱he yiyixje' daa chbaguee, na' x̱ane'na' bene' mandad wit' wdegake'ne' do xiiṉ do xoole' na' yog'ḻoḻ dii de c̱he' kwenc̱he yiyaxj xyana' daa llie'.
Na' beena' chbag' mecha' bc̱hek' xibe'na' lao x̱ane'na', chonyeshee, chi'e: “X̱an', wdapgach yeḻ' chxenlall' c̱ha', wiyixjkz' doxen daa chbagaa c̱ho'.”
Na' x̱ane'na' biyeshile'ne', na' bene' ka'z doxen daa chaḻee c̱he', na' bisane'ne'.
Per ḻe', ka bicheje' lill x̱ane'na', billague' sto wen llin beṉ' chaḻ' lat'do' xmeche', na' lii bṉiztie' yene'na' chi'ene': “¡Biyoṉ xmechaa daa chaḻoo!”
Na' bc̱hek' xib beena' lawe'na' na' chonyeshee, chi'ene': “Wdapgach yeḻ' chxenlall' c̱ha', wiyixjkz' doxen daa chbagaa c̱ho'.”
Na' bi goonile', san lii wyajtie' ji'ene' part kwenc̱he wloogake'ne' lillyana' ax̱t ki yiyixjche' doxen daa chaḻee c̱he'.
Na' ka ble'i wen llinka' sto ka bene', na' gokyesh'gakile' na' jayellgake' x̱ane'ka' doxen ka bene'.
Na' wizax x̱ane'na' ḻe', chi'ene': “Beṉ' mal inlleb nako'. Nad' ben' ka'z doxen daa chaḻoo c̱ha' daa benyeshoo lawa'.
Ka'kzan nan chiyaḻ' yiyeshilo' bish' ljwello'na' chaḻ' c̱ho', ka biyeshid' li'.”
Na' daa ḻe bllaachga x̱ane'na', bene'ne' lo na' beṉ'ka' wdix̱jgake'ne' lillyana' na' wit c̱hingake'ne' ax̱t ki yiyixjche' doxen daa chaḻee.
Na'ch goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ka'kzan goni X̱a'na' beena' zoa yabana' le' shi bi si'xen c̱he ljwell-le do yic̱hj do lall'le.
Na' ka biyoll be' Jesúza' dill'ki, bizee Galileana' na' biyaje' gana' mbani Judeana' daa llia shḻaa yao Jordánna'.
Na' beṉ' zan zjanogake'ne', na' na' biyone' beṉ'ka' bi shao'.
Na' wbig' baḻ fariseoka' lao Jesúza' daa goklall'gake' wi'e dill' dii wchix̱a'n ḻe', na' che'gake'ne': ―¿Ade lsens yiḻaa xool beṉ' ni c̱he bizə diido' chone' dii bi chiyoolallee?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Abiṉ' wlable gana' nan ka wxe wzil yell-lioni Chioza' bene' beṉec̱ha', beṉ' byo na' noolə?
Na' wne': “Daan, wḻaa beṉ' byona' x̱axṉeena' kat' ikaa c̱he', na' soalene' xoole'na' gakgake' toz.”
Na' bich nakgake' c̱hop, san ba nakgake' toz. Na' daan bi chiyaḻ' yiḻaa xool beṉ', ḻa' Chiozan' ba btiḻe' ḻegake'.
Na' gollgake'ne': ―Na' ¿bic̱he ben dii Moiséza' mandad kat' to beṉ' yiḻaa xoole'na' chiyaḻ' wḻise' to yish dii we'n dill' bich nake' xoole' na' wak yichooṉe'ne'?
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Yeḻ' widenag c̱helenan' be' dii Moiséza' latj yiḻaa xool-lena'. Per ka ben Chioza' beṉ' nechka', bi gokan ka'.
Nad' nia' le', shi nool c̱helena' bi chdalene' beṉ' yoblə, bi chiyaḻ' yiḻaalene' na' yikaale nool yoblə, ḻa' shi ka' gonle, na' chonle ka beena' zoalente xoole'na' na' chdalene' noolə yoblə.
Na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen gollgake'ne': ―Shi ka' nak c̱he beena' chshagna', naklan wen kono wshagna'.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Aga yog' beṉ' chajni'gakile' dga, ḻete beṉ'ka' chon Chioza' ka shajni'gakile'n.
Ḻa' de dii chllonan wshagna' beṉ'. Baḻ beṉ' bi chshagna'gake' daa bi nak kwerp c̱he'ka' wen ka chaljtegake', na' zi baḻe' bi chshagna'gake' daa bx̱iṉj beṉec̱ha' kwerp c̱he'ka'. Na' zi baḻe' bi chshagna'gake' daa cheenchgakile' gongake' xshin Chioza'. Beena' wlebe' dga, na' gonin c̱he'.
Na' wyaj beṉ' jwa' bi'do' c̱he'ka' lao Jesúza' kwenc̱he wx̱oa neena' yic̱hjb'ka' na' we'ḻwille' Chioza' ni c̱hegakb'. Per beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen bsheshlengake' beṉ'ka' zjwa' bi'do'ka'.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi we' latj yid bi'do'ki lawa'ni, bi wllonle, ḻa' Chioza' chṉabi'e ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ'ka' nak ka ḻegakb'.
Na' ka biyoll bx̱oa na' Jesúza' yic̱hj bi'do'ka', na'ch bizee ziyaje' gan yoblə.
Na' bllin to bi' wew' lao Jesúza' che'b' ḻe': ―Maestro, ¿bi dii wennan' chiyaḻ' gon' kwenc̱he gat' to yeḻ' mban c̱ha' zejḻi kaṉi?
Na'ch goll Jesúza' ḻeb': ―¿Bic̱he chṉabzilo' nad' c̱he daa nak wen? Toz Chioza' nake' beṉ' wen. Na' shi cheenilo' gat' to yeḻ' mban c̱ho' zejḻi kaṉi, chiyaḻ' gono' diika' bllia Chioza' bia' goncho.
Na' goll bi' wewaane': ―¿Bera diika' chiyaḻ' gon', lla? Na' che' Jesúza': ―Bi wito' beṉ', bi soaleno' nool bi nak nool c̱ho', bi kwano' bi de c̱he beṉ', bi c̱hiljlalloo bizə gon iṉo' c̱he beṉ'.
Wdap balaaṉ x̱axṉoona' na' goki bish' ljwello'na' ka chaki kwino'.
Na' che' bi' wewaane': ―Yog' diika' chon' kana' naktia' bi'do'. ¿Berachan ni chyallj gon'?
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻeb': ―Shi lekzilo' cheenilo' gako' dowalj beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', biyaj jayet' yog' dii de c̱ho' na' xmechinna' wyoon beṉ' yesh'ka', na' yido' gono' nad' txen. Na' kat' yillino' yabana' na' goṉ Chioza' li' yeḻ' shawaa.
Na' ka beni bi' wewaa dga, nyesh' inlleb gokib' na' biza'b', ḻa' bi' wni'a nlleban nakb'.
Na' goll Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―Dii ḻi nia' le', lallj inlleb chonan c̱he beṉ' wni'ana' yilline' yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'.
Sto shii nia' le', ḻobe'ch te to kamey to xan yesh' aga ka to beṉ' wni'a yilline' yabana' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'.
Na' bibangakile' ka wne', na' che' ljwellgake': ―¿Notg gak yillin lao Chioza', shka'?
Na' bwia Jesúza' ḻegake', na' golle': ―Ni to beṉ' yell-liona' bi gak gone' dga, san Chioza' yog'ḻoḻte chak gone'.
Na' che' Pédrona'ne': ―Neto' ba wlej yic̱hjnto' yog' dii de c̱hento' kwenc̱he naknto' li' txen. ¿Bin gonnto' gan?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', kat' illin lla yikob yog'ḻoḻ dii de, nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, kwi'a iṉabi'a gana' sho'a balaaṉ xen wal, na' le', shlliṉtele, nakle nad' txen kwe'le kwitaa kwenc̱he iṉabia'lenle nad'. Na' yizi'le kwent shlliṉ kwente yell c̱he beṉ' Israelka'.
Na' nottez beena' ba wlej yic̱hje' lille'na', beṉ' bisheeka', beṉ' zane'ka', x̱axṉeeka', wa xiiṉ xoole', wa yell-lio c̱he' ni c̱ha', Chioza'kzə wi'ene' dii zak' dii xen inllebch aga ka daa wlej yic̱hje', na' ḻekzka' wi'ene' to yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi.
Per beṉ' zan nakgake' beṉ' zakii, wllin lla bich bi sak'gake', na' beṉ' zan bi nakgake' beṉ' zakii, wllin lla gakgake' beṉ' zakii.
Na' wna Jesúza': ―Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' chzaklebin daa gok c̱he to x̱an yell-lio beena' naz yag uvana'. Na' shzildo' wzee zeje' zjtilje' wen llinka' kwenc̱he lljengake' llinna' gana' naze' yag uvaka'.
Na' bgaaṉgake' dill' c̱hixje' ḻegake' c̱he lla, na'ch bseḻee ḻegake' gana' lljengake' llinna'.
Na' ba gok shoṉ gor chon beṉ' nechka' llinna' ka wyaje' dii yoblə gana' chak yaana', na' ble'ile' lle' beṉ' bibi llin de gongake'.
Na'ch chi'e ḻegake': “Ḻi shaj ḻi lljen llinna' gana' naz' yag uvana' na' c̱hixj' le' daa chidoḻ'le.” Na' wza'gake' zejgake' llinna'.
Na' do ka gobill wizaje' dii yoblə, na' ḻekzka' chida shoṉə, bizllelile' beṉ' yoblə lljengake' llin c̱he'na'.
Na' do ka chida gay', wizaje' dii yoblə na' bizle'ile' beṉ' lle'zgake'. Na'ch chi'e ḻegake': “¿Bic̱he bi benle llinna' ṉaanlla?”
Na' goll beṉ'ka'ne': “Ḻa' ni to kono bc̱he' neto' llinna'.” Na' golle' ḻegake': “Ḻi shaj, lla, ḻi lljen llinna' gana' naz' yag uvana'.”
Na' ka wzeḻes yela' na' che' x̱an yag uvana' beena' ngoo lo nee llinna': “Biyax wen llinka' na' wdixjgake'. Zigaate beṉ'ka' zi' wyoo llinna' c̱hixjo', na' yiyoll-lin beṉ'ka' wzolo nech.”
Na' bene' kon ka goll x̱ane'na', na' wdixje' zigaate beṉ'ka' wyoo llinna' do ka chida gay'. Na' wdixje' to toe' c̱he llakzə.
Na' ka goḻ' c̱hixje' beṉ'ka' wyoogake' llinna' shzildo', gokgakile' wx̱oache' laxje'ka'. Per bich bi bx̱oe' san c̱he llachokzə wdixje' ḻegake'.
Na' ka ba nox̱'gake' laxje'ka', wzologake' biz chon chnagake' c̱he x̱an llinna',
na' gollgake'ne': “Do lla wzento' lo bana' bennto' xshino'na' na' toz ka wdixjo' neto' len beṉ'ka' zi' wyoo, na' zi' tgorchga bengake' llinna'.”
Na' che' x̱an llinna' toe': “Bish'dawaa, aga bi laxjo' chzeshaa. ¿Aaga bgaaṉcho dill' c̱he llan c̱hixj' li'?
Wkaa laxjo'na', na' biyaj. Nad' cheenid' c̱hixj' beṉ'ka' wyoo llinna' ba wlle'ch ka to daa ba wkoo.
Jwayishaz nad' bi gonid' xmechaa. ¿Anti chakziilo' daa chonid' beṉ' wen?”
Na' ka wde bzoa Jesúza' jempli, na' chi'e beṉ'ka': ―Ka'kzan beṉ' zan nakgake' beṉ' zakii, wllin lla bich bi sak'gake', na' beṉ' zan bi nakgake' beṉ' zakii, wllin lla gakgake' beṉ' zakii.
Ka ziyaj Jesúza' Jerusalénna' wṉie' to beṉ'ka' shlliṉzə, chi'e:
―Ṉaa ba ziyajcho Jerusalénna', gana' gongake' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' yell-lioni, lo na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' lo na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya', na' wc̱hoglogake' witgake' nad'.
Na' gongake' nad' lo na' beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel kwenc̱he wtitjgakile' nad' na' wit c̱hingake' nad', na'tech wda'gake' nad' ḻee yag cruza', per ka gak shoṉ lla yiban' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na' Jacóbona' len Juanna', beṉ'ka' nak xiiṉ Zebedewa', wbig'lengake' xṉeeka' kwit Jesúza', na' xṉeeka' bc̱hek' xibe'na' lawe'na' wṉabile'ne' to goklen.
Na' goll Jesúza'ne': ―¿Bera goklenan cheenilo' gon' c̱ho'? Na' golle'ne': ―Cheenid' gongacho' goklen kweko' bi' c̱ha'ki shḻaa wej kwito'na' kat'ka' illin lla iṉabi'o.
Na' goll Jesúza'ne': ―Ni bi ṉezile bin chṉable. ¿Awizoile wtiḻ-le yeḻ' zak'zi'na' ka daa wtiḻ' na' gak c̱hele ka daa gak c̱ha'? Na' gollgake'ne': ―Wizokzinto'n.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Lekzile wtiḻ-le ka daa wtiḻ', na' gak c̱hele ka daa gak c̱ha', per daa nale kwe'le shḻaa wej kwitaa bi nak lo na' gon' ka nale, san X̱a'nan' ba mbeje' beṉ'ka' wi'en.
Na' beṉ'ka' zi shi, bllaagake' Juanna' len Jacóbona' daa wṉabgake' kwe'gake' kwit Jesúza'.
Na' bitop Jesúza' ḻegake', na' chi'e: ―Ṉezkzile zoa beṉ' wṉabia' na' beṉ' zakii c̱he to to yell na' chongakile' kon daa nazan c̱hegake' beṉ' yell c̱he'ka'.
Per aga kan' chiyaḻ' gonle. Shi nole cheenile gakle beṉ' mbejlawin chiyaḻ' gakle ka to beṉ' chon xshin beṉ'.
Na' shi nole cheenile gakle beṉ' zakii, chiyaḻ' gakle ka beṉ' ndoo lla yel chone' xshin beṉ'.
Ka nak nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, aga bid' kwenc̱he gaklen beṉ' nad', san bid' kwenc̱he gaklen' beṉ' na' wi'a yeḻ' mban c̱ha'ni kwenc̱he yisla' beṉ' zan lao saaxya c̱he'ka'.
Na' ka biza' Jesúza' yell Jericóna' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, beṉ' zan inlleb janogake'ne'.
Na' cho'a neza' chi' c̱hop beṉ' lc̱hoḻ, na' ka bengakile' bide Jesúza' kwite'ka' na'ch besyaagake', che'gake': ―¡X̱an', xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Daví, biyesh'lall'gachi neto'!
Na' beṉ'ka' zejlen Jesúza' bsheshlengake' ḻegake' kwenc̱he nan kwe'gake' lliz, per ziziklə besyaachgake', che'gake': ―¡X̱an', xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Daví, biyesh'lall'gachi neto'!
Na'ch wlez Jesúza' na' wṉie' beṉ' lc̱hoḻka', na' chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Beran cheenile gon' c̱hele?
Na'ch che' beṉ' lc̱hoḻka'ne': ―X̱an', bengach ka ile'into'.
Na' biyesh'lallii Jesúza' ḻegake' na' bex̱ee jalawe'ka'. Na' katena' gok ble'gakile' na' janogake' Jesúza'.
Na' ka ba zoa yillingake' Jerusalénna', bllingake' cho'a yell Betfagéna' daa llia kwit Yaa Olívoza'. Na' wlej Jesúza' c̱hop beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' bseḻee ḻegake' yella'.
Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Ḻi shaj yella' daa llia shḻaana'. Na' ile'ile to burr ba noolə da'b yag na' nc̱he' to xiiṉdo'b. Na' wsell-leb wc̱he'legakb nilə.
Na' shi no bi iṉa le', na' ye'lene': “X̱annto'nan' chyalljile' ḻegakb, na' lii yidsantento'gakb.”
Na' daa gok ka', billinin ka bzej dii beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne' daa wne':
Ḻi ye' beṉ'ka' lle' yell Siónna': “Ḻi wwia, ba za' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱helena', nake' beṉ' gax̱jlall' na' llie' to burrdo'; xiiṉ to ba choa' yoa'.”
Na' wza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen zejgake' yelldo'na' gana' bseḻ' Jesúza' ḻegake' na' bengake' kon ka golle' ḻegake'.
Na' jx̱i'gake' burra' len xiiṉba' na' bc̱he'gake' ḻegakb kwit Jesúza'. Na'ch bx̱oagake' xe'ka' koll'bka', na'ch wllia Jesúza'b zeje' Jerusalénna'.
Na' beṉ' zan wdix̱jgake' xe'ka' tneza', na' zi baḻe' bc̱hoggake' no zin na' wdix̱jgake'n tneza' gana' zeje'.
Na' beṉ'ka' llialo lao Jesúza', na' ka'kzə beṉ'ka' nogake'ne', wzologake' chosyaagake', nagake': ―¡We'la'ocho beeni nak xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Davina'! ¡Gonḻeeyshga X̱ancho Chioza' beeni ba bseḻee! ¡Ḻi da we'la'ocho Chioza' zoa yabana'!
Na' ka wyoo Jesúza' yell Jerusalénna', na' yog' beṉ'ka' lle' na' bllesh bcheeṉgake', nagake': ―¿Noraz beeni bla' ni, lla?
Na' beṉ'ka' che'gake': ―Beenin Jesúza' beṉ' Nazareta' yell daa mbani Galileana', beena' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'.
Na' wyoo Jesúza' lesh' chyoodo'na' na' bisheshe' yog' beṉ'ka' chit' chde na'. Na'ch bishi'e mes c̱he beṉ'ka' chsha' mecha' na' bzoles bzolline' gana' chi' beṉ'ka' chit'gake' palomka'.
Na' ka wde bene' ka' chi'e ḻegake': ―Cho'a xtill' Chioza' nan: “Lillaa nakan ga choe'ḻwill beṉ' nad'”, na' le', ba nonzlen ka to ga chdop chllag wban.
Na' shlak zoa Jesúza' yoodo'na', baḻ beṉ' lc̱hoḻ na' beṉ' bi chak sa'gake' wen bllingake' lawe'na', na' biyone' ḻegake'.
Na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' ḻe bllaagake' ka ble'gakile' yeḻ' wakka' chon Jesúza', na' bengakile' chosyaa bi'do'ka' lesh' chyoodo'na', che'gakb': “¡We'la'ocho beeni nak xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Davina'!”
Na' gollgake' Jesúza': ―¿Achenilo' ka na bi'do'ka'? Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Awe, chenkzid'. ¿Abiṉ' wlable Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' na: Chc̱hino' cho'a ḻoll' bi' xkwid'do'ka' na' bdo'ka' ni chall' chxop kwenc̱he choḻ chṉegakb' li' ka chiyaḻ' we'la'o beṉ' li'?
Na'ch bicheje' ladj beṉ'ka', na' bizee yell Jerusalénna' ziyaje' yell Betániana' gana' wdie' yel.
Na' betiyo biza'gake' shzildo' yell Betániana' kwenc̱he biyajgake' yell Jerusalénna' dii yoblə, na' tneza' wzolo chdon Jesúza'.
Na' ble'ile' to yag yix̱wew dii zoa cho'a neza', na' jawie' shi llian. Per zeelo xḻaguiinna'z llia. Na' golle'n: ―¡Batch kwio' yix̱wewa'! Na' katena' lii wbillte yaga'.
Na' ka ble'i beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen ka gok, ḻe bibangakile', na' che'gake'ne': ―¿Berac̱he lii wbilltelikazə yag yix̱wewa'?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', shi nonḻilall'le Chioza' na' bi gakc̱hoplall'le, aga daazan gak gonle, san wakte ye'le yaani: “Bkwas, na' jsoa ḻoo nisdo'na'”, na' gak ka ye'len.
Na' yog' daa iṉabile Chioza' ka we'ḻwill-lene' goṉkze'n kon shi nonḻilall'lene'.
Na' wyaj Jesúza' dii yoblə yoodo'na' kwenc̱he jali' jasedile' beṉ'ka'. Na' shlak chli' chsedile' ḻegake', bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' beṉ' golka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' bllingake', na' che'gake'ne': ―¿Nora lsens c̱heyi chono' diiki? ¿No beṉ li' yeḻ' wṉabia'na'?
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻekzka' de to dii cheenid' iṉabid' le'. Na' shi le' iṉale nad' daa iṉabid' le', na' iṉia' le' no lsens c̱heyi chon' yog' diiki.
Ḻi iṉashki nad', ¿noran bseḻ' Juanna' kwenc̱he bidchoe' beṉ' nisa'? ¿AChioza' anti beṉ' yell-lioni? Na' wzologake' chakguedgake' to ḻezgake', nagake': ―Shi ye'chone' Chioza' bseḻeene' na'ch iṉe' cho': “¿Bic̱he bi wyajḻe'le c̱he', lla?”
Na' shi ye'chone' beṉ' yell-liona' bseḻee Juanna', ḻe xoll bi goni beṉ'ki cho', ḻa' yog'ḻoḻe' chajḻe'gake' Chioza' bseḻee Juanna' kwenc̱he bidtix̱ji'e daa golle'ne'.
Na'ch che'gake' Jesúza': ―Bi ṉezinto' non bseḻ' dii Juanna'. Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻekzka' nad', aga wnia' le' nora lsens c̱heyin chon' diiki.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Bi ka iṉale c̱heyi dga wseesaa? To beṉ' zoa c̱hop xiiṉe', na'ch golle' bi'na' to: “Xiiṉdawaa, wyajgach jen llinna' gana' nazcho yag uvana'.”
Na' che' xiiṉe'na'ne': “¡Bi sha'!” Per na'tech biyajib' na' wyajkzb' jem' llinna'.
Na' wyaj x̱abaa jelle' bi'na' sto ka golle' bi' bish'baa, na'ch goll bi'na'ne': “Wakkzə x̱a, na' sha'.” Per bi wyajb'.
Ḻi iṉashki, ¿nora bi'ka' c̱hop ben ka cheeni x̱ab'ka'? Na' goll beṉ'ka'ne': ―Bi'na' golle' ka' dii nech. Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', beṉ' wic̱hixjka' na' noolə wdaka', ḻelgaken' zigaate we'gake' latj iṉabia' Chioza' ḻegake' aga ka le'.
Ḻa' ka bid Juanna' bchoe' beṉ' nisa', bidzajniile' le' ka chiyaḻ' soa kwezle, per le' aga wyajḻe'le c̱he', ḻete beṉ' wic̱hixjka' na' nool wdaka'chgan wyajḻe'gake' c̱he'. Na' le' ṉaalla, ḻa'kzi gokbe'ile ba chajḻe'gake' c̱he', aga biyaj bileni saaxya c̱heleka' na' shajḻe'le c̱he'.
’Ḻi wzenag jempli sto. Wzoa to beṉ' biyaze' yag uva lo yell-lio c̱he'na' na'ch wlo'en leej, na'tech benshawee to ga wsigake' uvaka'. Na' ḻekzka' bene' to yoo sibə gana' kwia beena' gap wwie'n. ’Na'tech bene'n lo na' to c̱hop beṉ' na' wzee zeje' zit'.
Na' ka goḻ' yishibgake' uvaka', na'ch bseḻee to c̱hop wen llin c̱he'na' gana' lle' beṉ'ka' chapgake' yag uvaka' kwenc̱he lljaxi'gake' uvaka' daa chidoḻee.
Per ka bllingake' gana' lle' beṉ'ka' chapgake' yag uvaka', na'ch bex̱'gake' beṉ'ka' bllin, toe' bet wdingake'ne', na' stoe' bettekzgake'ne' na' beena' sto btakwgake'ne' yaja'.
Na'ch bseḻ' x̱an yag uvaka' zanch wen llin c̱he'ka' aga ka to beṉ'ka' bseḻee dii nech, per beṉ'ka' chap yag uvaka' bengakile' ḻegake' ka bengakile' beṉ' nechka' bllin.
’Na'ch x̱an yag uvaka' bseḻee kwinkz xiiṉe'na', chakile': “Wapgake' balaaṉ bi' c̱ha'ni na' we'gake'b' daa chidoḻaa.”
Per beṉ'ka' chap yag uvaka' ka ble'gakile' xiiṉe'na', na'ch che' ljwelle': “Bi'nin xiiṉ x̱an yag uvaki na' ḻeban' yigaaṉlem' yog' dii nape'. Ḻi da witchob' kwenc̱he yigaaṉlencho daa gaki c̱heb'.”
Na'ch bex̱'gake'b' bibejgake'b' gana' lle' yag uvaka' na' betgake'b'.
Na' Jesúza' chi'e beṉ'ka' lle' na': ―¿Nakra ka chakile gon x̱an yag uvaka' c̱he beṉ'ka' chapgake'n ka illine' kwine'?
Na' che' beṉ'ka': ―Ba nakten wite' ḻegake' na' bi yiyeshile' ḻegake' daa nakgake' beṉ' mal. Na' yiyone' yell-lio c̱he'na' lo na' beṉ' yoblə, beṉ' yiyoe'gake'ne' daa chidoḻee kat' yishibgake'n.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Abigaṉ' wlable Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' na: Yaja' daa bi wyoolall' wen yooka', ḻeyeṉ'lannan' yaja' daa ba nc̱hejcha yoona'. Dgan ben X̱ancho Chioza' na' nakan to dii yibanicho?
Daan nia' le', kon ka gon x̱an yag uvaka' yiyone' yell-lio c̱he'na' lall' na' beṉ' yoblə, beṉ' gongake' ka cheenile', ka'kzan gon Chioza' c̱hele. Kwej yic̱hje' le', na' beṉ'ka' wzenaggake' c̱he', si'gake' banez yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he'na'.
Na' ka nak yaja', nottezə beṉ' lljc̱haze' lawinna' kwiayee, na' shi idakwan beṉ', ax̱t wshoshjan ḻe'.
Na' ka biyoll bzenag bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' fariseoka' jemplki bzoa Jesúza', na'ch gokbe'gakile' c̱hegake'n chṉie'.
Na'ch goklall'gake' gox̱'gake'ne', per bi biyaxjgakile', ḻa' bllebgake' beṉ'ka' lle' na' daa chajḻe'gake' Jesúza' nake' to beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'.
Na' Jesúza' bseesile' ḻegake' sto jempl, chi'e:
―Yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza' chzaklebin to beṉ' wṉabia', beṉ' bene' to lṉi c̱he xiiṉe'na' ka bshagna'b'.
Na' bseḻee wen llin c̱he'ka' lljaṉegake' beṉ'ka' ba bye', per beṉ'ka' bye' bi goongakile' shajgake'.
Na'ch bizseḻee zi shkwen wen llin c̱he'ka' chi'e ḻegake': “Ḻi lljell beṉ'ka' ba bya' yid lṉi c̱he bi' c̱ha'na' ba de daa gaocho. Ba betgake' gooṉ c̱ha'ka' na' nochlə baka' ḻe nak, na' ba de yeḻ' wawa'. Ḻi lljellgake' yidgake' kwenc̱he yeej gaocho.”
Per beṉ'ka' ba bye' bi bengake' kwent daa goll wen llinka'. Toe' wyaj jawia' yell-lio c̱he'na' na' stoe' wzee zeje' delgens c̱he'na'.
Na' beṉ'ka' sto bex̱'gake' wen llinka' na' biya dii bengakile' ḻegake' ax̱t ka witgake'.
Na' ḻe bllaachga beṉ' wṉabia'na', na'ch bseḻee soldad c̱he'ka' kwenc̱he jetgake' ḻegake' na' bzeygake' yell c̱he'ka'.
Na'ch chi'e wen llin c̱he'ka' sto: “Ba gok daa yeej gaocho, na' wentelan bi wlen beṉ'ka' bya'.
Na' ḻi shaj lyell na' ḻi wc̱he' kon no beṉ' yillagle tneza' kwenc̱he yidgake' yeej gaogake'.”
Na'ch wza' wen llinka' zejgake', na' jx̱i'gake' kon no beṉ' billaggake', ka beṉ' wen ka beṉ' mal. Na' billa'cha lill beṉ' wṉabia'na'.
’Na' ka wyoo beṉ' wṉabia'na' chwie' beṉ'ka' ba ndop nllag, na' ladj beṉ'ka' len to beṉ' bi nakw xe'na' daa chiyaḻ' gakwe' gana' chak wishagna'na'.
Na' goll beṉ' wṉabia'na'ne': “Bish'dawaa, ¿nakra gok wyoozo' na' bi nakw xo'na' daa chiyaḻ' gako' kwenc̱he ḻeno' gani chak wishagna'ni?” Na' beena' bikzə bi billel-lallee yeene'.
Na'ch che' beṉ' wṉabia'na' beṉ'ka' chde yeḻ' wawa': “Ḻi wc̱hej ṉi'a na' beeni na' ḻi yibeje' na' ḻi wzaḻee gana' shgasj shc̱hoḻ, gana' kwellyeshee na' gaox̱ax̱j ḻeye'na' daa ḻe gakshejlallee.”
Ḻa' beṉ' zan nak beṉ'ka' chax chṉab Chioza', per baḻchgagake' kweje' gakgake' lall' nee.
Na' biza' fariseoka', na' wloogake' xṉezi naklə gongake' kwenc̱he we' Jesúza' dill' dii wchix̱a'n ḻe'.
Na'ch bseḻ'gake' baḻ beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' zi baḻ beṉ'ka' nak Heródeza' txen kwenc̱he wyajgake' lao Jesúza' na' jellgake'ne': ―Maestro, ṉezinto' nako' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' na' chli' chsedilo' beṉ' c̱he nez ḻi c̱he Chioza' kon ka nakan, na' bi chshoo cho'a xtilloona' lao nottezə beṉ', ḻa' bi chwio' no nakgake'.
Daan cheeninto' iṉagacho' neto' nak ka chakilo': ¿Achiyaḻ' c̱hixjcho daa chṉab beṉ' wṉabia' Césara', anti bi chiyaḻ' c̱hixjchon?
Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' aga do lall'gaken' gollgake'ne' ka', na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―Le' beṉ' wxiye', aga dii leilen nale ka'.
Ḻi wli'shki nad' to mech daa chyixjile beṉ' wṉabia'na'. Na' be'gake'ne' to mech.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Nora cho'alawin na' no leyin da' ḻee mechi?
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―C̱he beṉ' wṉabia', Césaran'. Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Na'len, ḻi we' Césara' daa naki c̱he', na' ḻekzka' ḻi we' Chioza' daa naki c̱he'.
Na'ch bibangakile' daa goll Jesúza' ka'. Na' biza'gake' kwite'na' ziyajgake'.
Na' lo llana'kzə saduceoka', beṉ'ka' bi chajḻe'gake' yiban beṉ' wetka', wyajgake' lao Jesúza', na' wṉabgakile'ne':
―Maestro, dii Moiséza' wne' shi to beṉ' byo guete' na' kono xiiṉe' wzoa, beṉ' bisheena' chiyaḻ' yikee xool dii beṉ' bisheena' kwenc̱he soa xiiṉ dia c̱he dii beṉ' weta'.
Na' ki gok c̱he gall bish' beṉ' nakgake' neto' txen. Beṉ' necha' bshagnee, na' wite' na' kono xiiṉe' wzoa, na' beṉ' bishee, beṉ' wchopina', bikee xoole'na'.
Na' ḻekzka' wit beṉ' wchopina' na' kono xiiṉe' wzoa. Na' ka'kzə wit beṉ' wyoṉina' na' ax̱t biyate beṉ'ka' gall wit. Na' ni togake' bi wzoa xiiṉgake'.
Na' ka wde wit yog'ḻoḻe' na'ch ḻekzka' wit noola'.
Na' kat' yiban beṉ' wetka', ṉaa, ¿nora beṉ'ka' gall bish' gaki xoole' noola'? ḻa' yog'ḻoḻen' wkaagake'ne'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Nakllejzilen daa bi ṉezile ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza', na' ka nak yeḻ' wak c̱he'na'.
Ḻa' kat' yiban beṉ' wetka', koch no yikaa ljwellin, ni koch no wit' wde xiiṉin, san yiyakgake' ka anjlka' lle' yabana'.
Na' ka nak daa yiban beṉ' wetka', ṉaa, ¿abiṉ' wlable daa wna kwin Chioza', gana' nan:
“Nad nak' Chios c̱he Abrahama', Isaaca' na' Jacoba'”? Na' bi nake' Chios c̱he beṉ' wet, san nake' Chios c̱he beṉ' ban, ḻa' lao Chioza' mban beṉ'ki.
Na' ka beni beṉ'ka' lle' na' daa wna Jesúza', ḻe bibangakile' ka chli' chsedile'.
Ka wṉezi fariseoka' ba wleklli Jesúza' saduceoka', na'ch wyajgake' kwite'na'.
Na' to beena' chli' chsedi leya' wṉabile' Jesúza' kwenc̱hezə wchix̱eene', chi'e:
―Maestro, ¿beran llialote nllia leya' bia' goncho?
Na' Jesúza' golle'ne': ―“Chiyaḻ' gakilo' X̱ancho Chioza' do yic̱hj do lalloo na' ax̱t ga zeelo chajniilo'.”
Dgan ḻiizelozi chonte na' llialon lawi yog' diika' nllia leya' bia'.
Na' de wchopina' nakan katekzə dii necha', na' nan: “Chiyaḻ' gakilo' bish' ljwello'ka' ka chaki kwino'.”
Na' diiki c̱hop chejin doxen ka na leya' len diika' bzej dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake'.
Na' shlak ndop nllag fariseoka' kwit Jesúza'
wṉabile' ḻegake': ―¿Nak ka chakile c̱he Crístona', beena' iṉabia'? ¿No xiiṉ dia c̱heyin nake'? Na' che'gake'ne': ―Xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Davinan'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Na' ¿berac̱he ben Espíritu Sántona' ka goll dii Davina'ne': “X̱an'”? Ḻa' kin na daa bzeje':
X̱ancho Chioza' golle' X̱an'na': “Wche' kwit' de shḻini, shlak wzoa' xṉi'ona' beṉ'ka' chakzbani li'.”
Na' shi kwin dii Davina' golle' Crístona': “X̱an'”, ¿berac̱he nazle nake' xiiṉ dia c̱he', shka'?
Na' ni toe' bi gok yilliigake' xtilleena'. Na' zeelo kana' koch no biyaxji bi iṉabgakile'ne'.
Na'ch Jesúza' golle' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen len beṉ'ka' lle' na', chi'e:
―Beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' na' fariseoka' nak lo na'gake' wzajni'gakile' beṉ' daa bzej dii Moiséza'.
Na' chiyaḻ' wzenagle c̱hegake' kat' chzajni'gakile' le' leya' na' gonle ka nan. Per bi gonle ka chongake', ḻa' ḻegake' bi chongake' ka nagake' chiyaḻ' gonle.
Dii zan dii che'gake' beṉ' chiyaḻ' gongake', na' nakan ka to yoa' xen dii chwa'gake' beṉ' dii kono so saki, na' ḻegake' bikz bi chda na'gake' kwenc̱he gaklengake'.
Na' yog' diika' chongake' chongake'n kwenc̱hezə ile'i beṉ' ka chongake' na' we'la'ogake' ḻegake'. Na' kajdo'ka' nak de yid daa yoo lat' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' daa chda' loxgue'ka' na' daa chc̱heḻ neeka' chongake'n dii xench aga ka c̱he beṉ' yoblə, na' chtoṉchgake' lox xe'ka' aga ka c̱he beṉ' yoblə.
Na' kat' chajgake' lṉika', ḻe chibagakile' kwe'gake' gana' chbe' beṉ'ka' zakii, na' ḻekzka'yeṉ' chjengake' gana' chdop chllaggake' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza'.
Na' ḻe chibagakile' gap beṉ' ḻegake' balaaṉ kat' chillaggake' ḻegake' ga lle' lla' beṉ' na' ye'gake' ḻegake': “maestro”.
’San le', bi we'le latj iṉa beṉ' le' “maestro”, ḻa' toz nadaan nak' Maestro c̱hele na' yog'le nakle ka bish' ljwellin.
Na' kono ye'le “x̱a” lo yell-lioni, ḻa' toz Chioza', beena' zoa yabana', nake' X̱ale.
Ni bi we'le latj iṉagake' le' “maestro”, ḻa' toz nad', Cristo, nak' Maestro c̱hele.
Ḻa' beena' nak beṉ' gax̱jlall' na' chaklene', beenan' nake' beṉ' zak'chi ladjlena'.
