Na' bllin to lla, shlak chli' chsedi Jesúza' beṉ'ka' lesh' chyoodo'na' na' chyix̱je'ile' ḻegake' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Chioza', bllin bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' len beṉ' golka' chṉabia'.
Na' che'gake'ne': ―Wnashki neto', ¿bi yeḻ' wṉabia' napo' chono' diiki? Na' ¿nora beṉ li' yeḻ' wṉabia'ni?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻekzka' nad' de to dii iṉabid' le', ḻi iṉashki nad':
¿Noran bseḻ' Juanna' kwenc̱he bidchoe' beṉ' nisa'? ¿AChiozan' bseḻeene'? ¿Anti beṉ' yell-liona'zan bseḻeene', lla?
Na'ch wzologake' choe'len ljwellgake' dill', che'gake': ―¿Nakra ka ye'chone', lla? Shi ye'chone' Chioza' bseḻeene', ḻobe' iṉe' cho': “¿Berac̱he ki wyajḻe'le c̱he', shka'?”
Na' shi yize'chone' nozə beṉ' bseḻeene', yog' beṉ'ki wlliagake' cho' yaj witgake' cho', ḻa' yog'gake' chajḻe'gake' Juanna' bi'e dill' daa goll Chioza'ne'.
Na'ch gollgake' Jesúza': ―Bi ṉezinto' no bseḻ' beena'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻekzka' nad' aga wnia' le' noran beṉ nad' yeḻ' wṉabia'na' kwenc̱he chon' diiki.
Na' Jesúza' bseesee to jempl lao beṉ'ka' lle' na': ―To beṉ' billee yag uva, na' bene'n lall' na' beṉ'ka' gap wwian, na' wzee wyaje' ssha gan yoblə.
Na' ka bizi' bilap beṉ'ka' uvana', x̱aninna' bseḻee to wen llin c̱he' kwenc̱he lljelle' beṉ'ka' nak lall' na'gake' yag uvaka' we'gake'ne' daa chidoḻee yikee. Na' beṉ'ka' chapgake' yag uvaka' bex̱'gake'ne' bet wdingake'ne', na'tech bilaggake'ne' to ka' che'.
Na'ch bseḻee sto wen llin c̱he'na'. Na' ḻekzka' bet wdingake'ne', na' biya dii bengakile'ne', na' bizlaggake'ne' to ka' che'.
Na'ch de wyoṉ shii, bizseḻee wen llin yoblə, na' ḻekzka' bengake'ne' bido we'zi, na' bizlaggake'ne'.
’Na'ch chaki x̱an yag uvaka': “¿Nakra ka gona'n? Wseḻ'shkid' bi' c̱ha'ni, bi'ni ḻe chakid'. Shera shicholə wzenaggake' c̱heb'.”
Na' ka ble'i beṉ'ka' chap yag uvaka' xiiṉe'na', na'ch che' ljwelle': “Bi'nin yigaaṉlem' yell-lioni. Ḻi da witchob' kwenc̱he yigaaṉlenchon.”
Na' wlejgake'b' gana' lle' yag uvaka' na' betgake'b'. Na'ch wṉabi Jesúza' beṉ'ka' chzenag: ―¿Nakra ka chakile goni x̱an yag uvaka' beṉ'ka', lla?
Ba nakten shaje' na' lljete' beṉ'ka' chap yag uva c̱he'na' na' yiyone' yell-lio c̱he'na' lall' na' beṉ' yoblə. Na' ka beni beṉ'ka' wne' ka', na' wnagake': ―¡Bat we' Chioza' latj gak ka'!
Na' bwia Jesúza' ḻegake', chi'e: ―¿Beran zejin Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' na: Yaja' daa bi wyoolall' wen yooka', ḻeyeṉ'lannan' yaja' daa ba nc̱hejcha yoona'?
Nottezə beṉ' lljc̱haze' lawinna' kwiayee, na' shi idakwan beṉ', ax̱t wshoshjan ḻe'.
Na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' goklall'gake' gox̱'gake' Jesúza' ka biyoll golle' ka', ḻa' gokbe'gakile' c̱hezgaken' wṉie' daa bi chajḻe'gake' c̱he'. Per bllebgake' beṉ'ka' ndop nllag na'.
Na'ch bseḻ'gake' to c̱hop beṉ' wiwia wiyi, na' bentezgake' ka beṉ' cheenchgayi wzenag c̱he'. Per aga do lall'gaken' wyajgake', san kwenc̱hezə kwejyelgakile' Jesúzan' na' lljadaogake' xya c̱he' lao beena' chṉabia' gana' mbani Judeana'.
Na' wṉabgakile'ne': ―Maestro, ṉezinto' daa no' na' daa chli'o nakan dii ḻi, na' aga chwio' nak nak beṉ', shi nake' beṉ' zakii wa shi bi nake'. Ṉezinto' chli'o nez ḻi c̱he Chioza' kon ka nakan.
Wnashki neto': ¿Achiyaḻ' c̱hixjcho daa chṉab Césara', beena' chṉabia', anti bi chiyaḻ' c̱hixjchon?
Na' gokbe'i Jesúza' aga do lall'gaken' wṉabgakile'ne', na'ch chi'e:
―Ḻi wli'shkayi nad' to mech. ¿Nora cho'alawin na' no leyin da'n? Na' che'gake'ne': ―C̱he Césaran', beena' chṉabia' Rómana'.
Na'ch chi'e: ―Na'len, ḻi we' Césara' daa naki c̱he', na' ḻekzka' ḻi we' Chioza' daa naki c̱he'.
Na' ni shcho'a dill' daa bi'e lao beṉ'ka' bi gok wc̱hingake'n kwenc̱he gaogake' xya c̱he'. Na' bibangakile' ka golle' ḻegake' na' bibe'gake' llizə.
Ka wde dga, bllin baḻ saduceoka' lao Jesúza', beṉ'ka' bi chajḻe' daa yiban beṉ' wetka'. Na'ch che'gake' Jesúza':
―Maestro, leya' bzej dii Moiséza' nan: shi to beṉ' byo guete' na' igaaṉ xoole'na' wizeb na' kono xiiṉgake' wzoa, beṉ' bish' beṉ' weta' chiyaḻ' yikee nool wizeba' kwenc̱he soa xiiṉ dia c̱he dii beṉ' bisheena'.
Ki gok to shii, wzoa gall bish' beṉ', na' beṉ' necha' bshagnee, na' wite' na' kono xiiṉe' wzoa.
Na' beṉ' wchopina' bikee noola', na' ḻekzka' wite' na' kono xiiṉe' wzoa.
Na' beṉ' wyoṉina', ḻekzka' bizkee noola', na' wizete' na' kono xiiṉe' wzoa. Na' ḻekzka' beṉ'ka' zi tap bizkaagake' noola' na' witgake', na' ni to beṉ'ka' gall bi wzoa xiiṉgake' kon noola'.
Na' ka bllin lla ḻekzka' wit noola'.
Na' kat' yiban beṉ' wetka', ¿norayeṉ'en' gak beṉ' c̱he', lla?, ḻa' galltien' wzoalene'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Beṉ'ka' lle' yell-lioni ṉaa chkaa ljwellgake', na' ḻekzka' choe' yeḻ' wishagna' c̱he xiiṉe'ka'.
San beṉ'ka' iṉa Chioza' zak'gake' yiyajgake' gana' zoe' ka yibangake' ladj beṉ' wetka', aga ka'chan gongake'. Ḻa' koch no wshagna' gana' zoa Chioza',
ni koch no guet, san soagake' ka zoa anjlka'. Na' gakgake' xiiṉ Chios daa ba bisbane' ḻegake' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Kwin dii Moiséza' bzeje' kwenc̱he iṉezicho yiban beṉ' wetka' kana' bzeje' c̱he yag yeshaa daa ble'ile' chaḻ'ṉiṉ. Na' wne' X̱ancho Chioza' nake' Chios c̱he Abrahama', Isaaca' na' Jacoba'.
Na' Chioza' aga nake' Chios c̱he beṉ' wet, san nake' Chios c̱he beṉ' de yeḻ' mban c̱heyin. Ḻa' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' nx̱enilallii Chioza', dekzə yeḻ' mban c̱hegake'.
Na'ch baḻ beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' gollgake'ne': ―Maestro, ka ba wnayeṉoon nakan.
Na' bich bi biyaxjchgakile' iṉabchgakile'ne'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Berac̱he nazə beṉ' Crístona' nake' xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Davina'?,
len kwin dii Davinan' bzeje' ḻee libr c̱he Sálmoka' gana' na: X̱ancho Chioza' golle' X̱an'na': “Wche' kwit' de shḻi ni
shlak wzoa' xṉi'ona' beṉ'ka' chakzbani li'.”
¿Berac̱he chakzile Crístona' nake' xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Davina', len kwin Davina' golle'ne': “X̱an'”?
Na' shlak chzenag yog' beṉ'ka' lle' na', Jesúza' golle' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen:
―Ḻi wsak' bi gonle ka chon beṉ'ki chli' chsedi leya'. Ḻe chibagakile' gon xe'ka' dii toṉ, na' cheengakile' yog'zə beṉ' gapgake' ḻegake' balaaṉ ladj lkwe' beṉ'. Na' gana' chdop chllagcho choe'ḻwillcho Chioza' chbagakile' kwe'gake' gana' chbe' beṉ'ka' zakii, na' ka'kzə chongake' ga de yeḻ' waw.
Na' ḻekzka' chkaatezgake' lill nool wizebka', na' chongake' ka chshaljlen Chioza' ssha nlleb kwenc̱he gaki beṉ' ḻe wen chongake'. Na' daa chongake' ka', ba nakten ile'gakile' yeḻ' zak'zi' wala'.
Na' ble'i Jesúza' ka chgoo beṉ' wni'aka' mecha' gana' chgoo beṉ' mech c̱he yoodo'na'.
Na' ḻekzka' ble'ile' to nool yesh', beṉ' wizeb, wlo'e c̱hop sintabdo'.
Na' goll Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', ḻa'kzi nool wizebi nake' beṉ' yesh', ba be'che' dii xench aga ka yog'te beṉ'ka'.
Ḻa' yog'gake' choe'gake' daa chichooṉan c̱he'ka', na' ḻe', naktie' beṉ' yesh', wlo'e doxen daa nape', ḻa'kzi chyalljile'n.
Na' baḻ beṉ'ka' choe'gake' xtill' yoodo'na' ka xochi nak yajka' nongakile'n na' diika' bzani beṉ' be'gake'n yoodo'na'. Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake':
―Ka nak diiki chwiale ṉaa, wllin lla kwiayi' yogaan, ni sto yaj bich kwia koll' ljwellin.
Na'ch wṉabgakile' Jesúza', che'gake'ne': ―Maestro, ¿batran gak dga ba wno'? ¿Bera ka ile'into' gak kwenc̱he iṉezinto' nan ba zoa gaoshosh gakan?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi wsak' bi we'le latj no siye' le'. Ḻa' beṉ' zan zi ichej gonzgake' ka nad', na' iṉazgake': “Nadaan Crístona'”, na' ḻekzka' iṉazgake': “Ba bllin lla kwiayi' yell-lioni.” Bi gonle ḻegake' txen.
Na' ka yenile chak no wdiḻ wa chtop chshag ljwell beṉ' kwenc̱he soshyi'gake' beṉ' wṉabia'ka', bi illeble. Chonan byen zigaate gak diiki, per aga lii tete c̱he yell-lioni kat' ba chakgakan.
Na'ch golle' ḻegake': ―Ganga kwe' wdiḻa' na' tiḻ yell kon yell.
Na' gak no bedxo' wal, na' gat' wbin, na' biya yillwe' kwe' lo yell-lioni, na' biya dii gak xan yabana' dii wwall wsheban beṉ'.
’Na' ka zi gak diiki, gox̱'gake' le' na' biya dii gongakile' le'. Na' lljwa'gake' le' gana' chdop chllagcho choe'ḻwill-cho Chioza' na' yiya yiyiljgake' le' na' koogake' le' lillya, na' lljwa'gake' le' lao beṉ' wṉabia' xenka' na' lao beṉ' wṉabia'ka' sto ni c̱ha'.
Na' kat' gak c̱hele ka', na'chlə gat' latj we'le cho'a xtillaana' lawe'ka'.
Na' bi sezle wṉeyi naklə iṉale kat' lljsele lao beṉ' wṉabia'ka',
ḻa' nad'kzan wzajniid' le' nakan iṉale na' goṉ' le' yeḻ' sin'na' kwenc̱he ni to beṉ'ka' chakzbangakile' le' bi sogakile' iṉagake' bi nakan ka nale.
Na' no x̱axṉa'tezle, no beṉ' bish'le, no dialla c̱hele, na' no beṉ' zoalenle wen gongake' le' lo na' beṉ' wṉabia'ka', na' witgake' baḻ-le.
Na' ax̱t yog'zə beṉ' gakzbangakile' le' daa nonḻilall'le nad'.
Per ḻi koo yic̱hjle, Chioza' gaklene' le' na' ni tlish' yish' yic̱hjlena' bi kwiayi'.
Na' shi sechale lawi daa yen ile'ile na' bi gakc̱hoplall'le, na'chan gat' to yeḻ' mban c̱hele dii bi te c̱heyin.
’Na' kat' ile'ile nec̱hj soldadka' Jerusalénni, kanan' iṉezile nan ba zoa kwiayi'n.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' lle' gani mbani Judeani, chiyaḻ' wxoṉjgake' lljakwash'gake' do yaa yaoka', na' beṉ'ka' lle' yelli, chiyaḻ' wxoṉjgake', na' beṉ'ka' zej lyix̱aa, bichoklə yiyedgake' yelli.
Ḻa' kanan' gon Chioza' yeḻ' zi' c̱he yog'ze' kwenc̱he yillinin doxen ka na Cho'a Xtilleena'.
¡Nyesh'laz wal gak c̱he noolka' noa' na' noolka' chwall' chx̱op llana' gak diiki! Ḻa' dii xen daa yen ile'i beṉ' Israelki.
Baḻgake' guet lo wdiḻa' na' zi baḻe' wc̱he'gake' pres yell zit'ka'. Na' beṉ' zit'ka' wlej wshoshjgake' yell Jerusalénni ax̱t kat'ch illin lla yiyoll yido ka llia bia' gongake'.
’Na' lo wbilla', lo bewaa na'ch lo beljka' gak dii gonan ka yibani beṉ'. Na' beṉ'ka' lle' yell-lioni gakshejlall'gake' na' illebgake' kat' gon nisdo'na' sshag wal daa so' kwe'n.
Na' ax̱t ic̱hoḻ-lall' beṉ' daa chllebgake' kwiayi'lengake' yell-lioni, ḻa' ax̱t yog' diika' llia xan yabana' iṉibgakan.
Na'ch ile'gakile' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, zizaa to lo bej kon yeḻ' wak xen na' balaaṉ xen.
Na' kat' solo gak diiki, ḻi wtipch lall'le, ḻa' ba zoa gaoshosh yidsla' len'.
Na' ḻekzka' bsees' Jesúza' to jempl chi'e: ―Ḻi wwiakachi yag yix̱wewa' wa bichlə yag.
Kat' chle'ile ba chibia xḻaguiinka', chakbe'ile ba zoa yiyoo la'o linna'.
Ka'kzə, kat' ile'ile ba chak diiki ba wnia', chiyaḻ' iṉezile ba zoa gao wli' Chioza' yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he'na'.
’Dii ḻi nia' le', aga ba wit beṉ'ka' zoa ṉaa kat' gak yog' diiki.
’Yabana' na' yell-lioni te c̱hegakin, san cho'a xtillaana' aga wde bi gak ka nan.
’Ḻi wsak' bi we'le latj sho' diika' wxiṉjan yic̱hjlall'do'lena'. Bi wḻanzle yeḻ' weezo, na' bi sezle wṉeyi bi chak c̱hele. Ḻi wsak' kwenc̱he aga sha c̱hel-le chon llana' zizaa.
Ḻa' tokonganzan gak diiki yen ile'i yog'te beṉ'ka' lle' doxen yell-lioni.
Na' le', ḻi se wṉeyi, ḻi iṉabi Chioza' toshiizi gaklene' le' kwenc̱he yilale lao yog' diiki llia bia' gak, na' kwenc̱he bi gall illeble sele lawa'na', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni.
Na' Jesúza' bli' bsedile' beṉ' yog' lla yoodo'na', na' ka chaḻ, chjagaaṉe' lo Yaa Olívoza'.
Na' yog' zil yog' beṉ' chajgake' yoodo'na' chjazenaggake' daa chli' chsedile'.
Ba zoa gaozə lṉi Paskwa' kat' chaogake' yetxtil daa bi nc̱hix̱ levadúrana'.
Na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' len beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' chiyiljlall'gake' naklə gongake' witgake' Jesúza' ka kono gakbe'i, ḻa' bllebgake' shi bi goni beṉ' wlall c̱he'ka' ḻegake'.
Na'ch x̱an dii x̱iw'ka' daa le Satanás wyoon ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' Jud Scariota', beena' nak txen beṉ'ka' shlliṉ.
Na' wyaje' lao bx̱ozka' chṉabia' len lao beṉ'ka' ngoo lall' na' beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na', na' bi'e dill' nakan gone' Jesúza' lall' na'gake'.
Na' ḻe bibagakile' na' bc̱hebgake' we'gake'ne' mech.
Na'ch bc̱hebe' gone'ne' lall' na'gake'. Na' wzolo chinoe' batan gat' latj kat' kono beṉ' lle' gone' Jesúza' lall' na'gake'.
Na' bllin llana' chsini'agake' c̱he lṉina', llana' chzolo chaogake' yetxtil daa bi' nc̱hix̱ levadúrana' na' chitgake' to xil'do', bana' gaogake' lle' Paskwa'.
Na'ch wlej Jesúza' Pédrona' len Juanna' na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Ḻi lljasini'a daa gaocho lṉi Paskwi.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Garan cheenilo' lljasini'anto'n?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ka sho'le Jerusalénna', na' ile'ile to beṉ' byo zino'e to chee nis, na' ḻi lljanoe' ax̱t yoona' gana' yilline'.
Na' ye'le x̱an yoona': “Maestrona' chṉabile' li': ¿Garan zoa yoona' wyoone' gana' gaolene' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen lle' Paskwi?”
Na' wliile' le' to yoo xen dii llia shkwiana' cha'lə ga ba nonshao'tie'. Nan' wsini'ale daa gaocho xshe'na'.
Na' wloogake' nez zejgake', na' kon kayeṉ' golle' ḻegake' gok. Na' bsini'agake' daa wdaogake' lle' lṉi Paskwa'.
Na' ka goḻ' gaogake' xshe'na', Jesúza' wche'lene' postl c̱he'ka' cho'a mesa'.
Na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―Ba goklall'chga' yeej gaolen' le' lṉi Paskwi ṉaa biṉ' witgake' nad'.
Na' ba nia' le', zeelo ṉaa cheej chaw' dga. Bichga yeej gawa'n ax̱t ki illin llana' wli' Chioza' yeḻ' wṉabia' xen c̱he'na', kana'ch yeej gawa'n dii yoblə.
Na' bex̱ee kopa' na' bi'e Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken, na' chi'e: ―Ḻi gox̱' dga, ḻi yeejan lat' wej.
Na' nia' le', bichga yeej' nis uvani ax̱t ki illin lla wli' Chioza' yeḻ' wṉabia' xen c̱he'na'.
Na'ch bex̱ee yetxtila' na' bi'e yeḻ' chox̱ken Chioza'. Na' bxoxje'n bi'en ḻegake' kwenc̱he wdaogake'n, na' chi'e: ―Dgan kwerp c̱ha'ni, chzanlallidaan ni c̱hele. Kin gonle kwenc̱he lljadinile nad'.
Na' ḻekzka' bene' ka wde wdaogake' xshe'na', bex̱ee kopa' sto shii, na'ch chi'e: ―Dga yoll ḻoo kopi zejin xc̱hen'na' daa ḻaljə ni c̱hele daa gonan ka gakḻi dii koba' bc̱heb Chioza' gone'.
’Na' ṉaa, beena' gone' nad' lo na' beṉ'ka' chakzi'gakile' nad' chi'lene' nad' cho'a mesi.
Ḻa' ba bllin lla gak ka nak daa llia bia' gak c̱ha', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, per ¡nyesh'laz gak c̱he beena' gone' nad' lo na' beṉ' malka'!
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen wzologake' chṉabi ljwellgake' noen' gone'ne' lo na' beṉ'ka'.
Na' ḻekzka' chakdiḻ-len ljwellgake' nogaken' nak beṉ' zak'chi.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Zoa beṉ' wṉabia' to to nación, na' chongake' byen chzenag beṉ' c̱hegake', na' nagake' c̱he kwingake' ḻe chaklengake' beṉ'.
San le', bi chiyaḻ' gonle ka'. Shi nole nakle beṉ' zakii, chiyaḻ' wc̱hek' yic̱hjle ka to bi' xkwid', na' shi nole chṉabia', chiyaḻ' gonle ka nottezə beṉ' wen mandad.
¿Noran nak beṉ' zak'chi?, ¿abeena' chbe' cho'a mesa' chawe'?, ¿anti beena' chon mandadan', lla? Beena' chi' cho'a mesan' nake' beṉ' zak'chi. San nad', ḻa'kzi naktia' x̱anle, zoa' ladjleni ka to beṉ' wen mandad c̱hele.
’Le' ba wzoalenle nad' lao yog'te daa ba gok c̱ha'.
Na' daan, goṉ' le' yeḻ' wṉabia'na' ka daa beṉ X̱a'na' nad'.
Na' yeej gaolenle nad' gana' iṉabi'a. Na' kwe'le gana' iṉabia'le yizi'le kwent c̱he shlliṉ kwen beṉ'ka' nak xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Israela'.
Na' ḻekzka' golle' Simón Pédrona': ―Simón, Simón, Satanáza', daa chṉabia' dii x̱iw'ka', ba wṉaban le' gakle lo na'yin kwenc̱he gondinj gonganin le'.
Na' nad' ba wṉabid' Chioza' gaklene' li', Simón, kwenc̱he gonḻilall'cho nad'. Na' kat' ba biyajilo' c̱heyi daa gono', na' gakleno' beṉ'ki nako' txen kwenc̱he soac̱hec̱hgake' gonḻilall'gake' nad'.
Na' che' Simónna': ―X̱an', ba nc̱hoglallaa ḻaa lillyana' sa'len' li' wa ax̱t guetlen' li' txen.
Na' che' Jesúza': ―Pedro, nia' li', ṉaanlle' shoṉ shii bi wc̱hebo' shi nombi'o nad' ka zi' kwell shikwteza'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Azyalljile bi byalljile kana' bseḻaa le' na' bibi bex̱'le, ni ga koo xalaanle, ni mech na' ni xel-le? Na' che'gake': ―Bibi byalljinto'.
Na'ch golle': ―Per ṉaach nia' le', shi de ga chgoo xalaanle, ḻi gox̱aan, na' shi de xmechle, ḻi wa'n; na' shi nole bi de spad c̱hele, ḻi lljayet' xalena' na' ḻi si' tlisha'n.
Nia' le', chonan byen gak c̱ha' kon ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' na: “Gongakile'ne' ka chongakile' to beṉ' wen dii mal.”
Na' che'gake': ―X̱an', ni napnto' c̱hop spad. Na' chi'e: ―Lliz ḻi soachoklə.
Na'ch biza' Jesúza', na' kon ka yooloe' chone' biyaje' lo Yaa Olívoza', na' zjano beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen.
Na' ka bllingake' latja', na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Ḻi we'ḻwill Chioza' kwenc̱he bi we'zle latj gon beli chenna' le' gan.
Na' bkwase' kwite'ka', ka to ga zeelo chllin to yaj dii chzaḻ'cho, na'ch bc̱hek' xibe'na' be'ḻwille' Chioza'.
Na' golle': ―X̱a, shi li' cheenilo', bislagach nad' lawi dga ba zoa idiḻ illag'; per aga gak ka cheenid', san gak ka cheenilo'.
Na'ch bli'lao to anjl beṉ' za' yabana' ḻe', na' biyo'ene' fuerz.
Na' daa ḻe chakyesh'chgaile', zizikli be'ḻwillche' Chioza' ax̱t biyaklolje'. Na' nis yes c̱he'na' daa chxop lo yona' nakan ka to bllon wej chen.
Biyoll be'ḻwille' Chioza', na' bizollee biyaje' gana' lle' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, na' ka billine' kwite'ka' ba chesgake' daa chakyesh'gakile'.
Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Berac̱he cheszle? Ḻi c̱has na' ḻi we'ḻwill Chioza' kwenc̱he bi we'zle latj gon beli chenna' le' gan.
Ni choe'te Jesúza' dill', ka bllin beṉ' zan, na' beena' le Jud, beena' nak txen beṉ'ka' shlliṉ, nc̱hi'e ḻegake'. Na' ka blline' jabiguee kwit Jesúza' na' bnope' x̱agueena'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Jud, ¿akon dga bnopo' nad' chono' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, lo na' beṉ'ki?
Na' beṉ'ka' lle'len Jesúza', ka ble'gakile' ka ba chak c̱he', na'ch gollgake'ne': ―X̱an', ¿awṉiayinto' spadki?
Na' toe' lii wdintie'n to mos c̱he bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna' bc̱hogtie' nague' de shḻina'.
Na' che' Jesúza': ―Bich bi gonile beṉ'ka'. Na'ch bida' Jesúza' nag beena'.
Na' daa bllin bx̱ozka' chṉabia' len beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na', na' beṉ' golka' chṉabia', kwenc̱he gox̱'gake'ne', chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Berac̱he za'zle nox̱'le yag na' spad kwenc̱he zidṉizle nad' ka to no beṉ' wban?
Yog' lla wzoa' ladjlena' yoodo'na' na' bi bex̱'le nad'. Per ṉaach bllin lla gonle ka cheenile na' ṉaayeṉ' chṉabia' dii mala' daa chṉabia' gana' shgasj shc̱hoḻ.
Na'ch bṉizgake' Jesúza' na' bc̱he'gake'ne' lill bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna', na' zit' zit'lə zjano Pédrona'ne'.
Na' bxengake' yi'na' lesh' chyoo c̱he bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna' na' wche'gake' cho'a yi'na', na' wlen Pédrona' ḻegake'.
Na' to noolə wen mandad, ka ble'ile' chi' Pédrona' cho'a yi'na', lii wzetie' chwie'ne', na' chi'e: ―Ḻekzka' len beenin nake' Jesúza' txen.
Na' Pédrona' aga bc̱hebe', na' chi'ene': ―Noolə, aga nombi'a beena'.
Na' gokzə xtit bizle'i beṉ' yoblə Pédrona' na' chizi'ene': ―Ḻekzka' lenon' nako' beṉ'ka' txen. Na' Pédrona' chi'ene': ―Bi len' nak' beṉ'ka' txen.
Na' wizak ka do zi' tgor na' wize' sto beṉ' yoblə: ―Dii ḻikzan len beeni nake' txen Jesúza' ḻa' ḻekzka' beṉ' Galilean.
Na'ch che' Pédrona'ne': ―¡Ni bi ṉezid' bi dillaan choo! Na' ni che'telə Pédrona' ka', ka wchell to shikwtez.
Na'ch biyec̱hj X̱ancho Jesúza' bwie' Pédrona', na' Pédrona' jadinile' daa golle'ne', kana' chi'e: “Ṉaanlle' shoṉ shii bi wc̱hebo' shi nombi'o nad' ka zi' kwell shikwteza'.”
Na' bichej Pédrona' gana' lle' beṉ'ka' na' wchellyeshee.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' chapgake' Jesúza' btitjgakile'ne' na' wdap' wlall'gake'ne'.
Na' bsejgake' jalawe'na', na'ch wlall'gake'ne', che'gake'ne': ―¡Wnashki non wlall' li'!
Na' biya dii gollgake'ne' kwenc̱he gakile' zi'.
Na' ka wyeeni', bidop beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka', len bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya'. Na' bdegake' Jesúza' lawe'ka'. Na'ch wṉabgakile'ne', che'gake':
―Wnashki neto' shi li'kzan Crístona', beena' chbeznto'. Na' che' Jesúza': ―Shi iṉia' le': “Awe, nadaan”, aga wyajḻe'le c̱ha'.
Na' shi iṉabid' le' bi dii iṉabid' le', aga williilen na' ni bi yisanle nad', shi ṉaa.
Na' ṉaate, nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, kwi'a kwit de shḻi c̱he Chioza', beena' nap yeḻ' wak xenna'.
Na'ch yog'ze' wṉabgakile'ne': ―¿Ana' lin' nako' Xiiṉ Chioza'? Na'ch che' Jesúza': ―Awe, shḻikzan ba wnale.
Na'ch che' ljwellgake': ―Kochno chyalljicho gawe' xya c̱he beeni. Kwintekzcho ba benicho ka ba wne'.
Na'ch yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' bizolla'gake' na' jwa'gake' Jesúza' lao Pilátona'.
Na'ch wzologake' chaogake' xya c̱he Jesúza', che'gake': ―Ba bidoḻinto' beeni chta chṉie' beṉ' wlall c̱hento'ka'. Chi'e bi chiyaḻ' c̱hixjcho daa chṉab Césara', beena' chṉabia', na' ḻekzka' naze' nake' Crístona', na' daa ne' ka' zejin nake' to beṉ' wṉabia'.
Na'ch wṉabi Pilátona' Jesúza', chi'ene': ―¿Alin' nako' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelki? Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Kan' nakan.
Na'ch che' Pilátona' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' yog' beṉ'ka' lle' na': ―Ni to dii mal bi chillelid' chon beeni.
Na' zizikchli che'gake': ―Diika' chli' chsedile' chta chṉen yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' lle' doxen lallnto'ni. Wzoloze' Galileana', na' ax̱t Judeani ba bide'.
Ka gollgake' Pilátona' ka', na'ch wṉabile' ḻegake' shi nak Jesúza' beṉ' Galilea.
Na' ka wṉezile' nake' beṉ' Galilea, na'ch bdie'ne' lao Heródeza', beena' nḻane' chṉabi'e Galileana', ḻa' kana'yeṉ' zoa Heródeza' Jerusalénna'.
Na' ḻe bibayi Heródeza' ka ble'ile' Jesúza', ḻa' ba wlla cheenile' ile'ile'ne' daa ba benile' choe' beṉ' xtilleena'. Na' goki Heródeza' ile'ile' gone' to yeḻ' wak.
Na' biya dii wṉabile' Jesúza', na' ni to daa wṉabile'ne' bi billi'e.
Na' ḻekzka' na' lle' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' len beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya', na' zizikli chaogake' xya c̱he Jesúza'.
Na'ch Heródeza' len soldad c̱he'ka' biya dii bengakile'ne', na' btitjgakile'ne' bwakwgake'ne' to lech' ka daa chakw to beṉ' wṉabia'. Na'tech bizseḻ' Heródeza'ne' lao Pilátona'.
Na' lo llana' bizoalen Pilátona' Heródeza' wen, ḻa' kana'te chakzbani ljwelle'.
Na'ch biti'a Pilátona' bx̱ozka' chṉabia', na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia'gake' beṉ' Israelka' na'ch beṉ' yell,
na' golle' ḻegake': ―Le' bidwa'le beeni lawii, nale chta chṉie' beṉ', na' nad' ba wṉabidee laoleni, na' bi chillelid' ni to daa nale c̱he' shi ḻi ka chone'n.
Na' ni Heródeza' bi billelile' shi bi doḻ' nap beeni, na' ba bizseḻeene' laochoni. Na' ba ble'teile aga bi bene' iṉacho wc̱hoglozcho guete'.
Na' ṉaa gon' mandad wit c̱hingake'ne' na'tech yisanee.
Na' ka chakz yog' yiz, chiyaḻ' yisane' to beena' nej lillyana' kat' chaḻ' lṉi Paskwa'.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' ndop nllag na', wzologake' chosyaagake', che'gake': ―¡Guettega beeni! ¡Na' bisan Barrabáza'!
Nyix̱jgake' Barrabáza' lillyana' daa bx̱ie' wdiḻa' yell Jerusalénna', na' bettie' to beṉ'.
Na' daa cheeni Pilátona' yisane' Jesúza', na' stokzə wṉabile' beṉ'ka' shi wisane'ne'.
Na' beṉ'ka' zizikchli chosyaagake', che'gake': ―¡Bdee ḻee yag cruza'! ¡Bdee ḻee yag cruza'!
Na' de wyoṉ shiyi che' Pilátona' ḻegake': ―¿Bera dii malan' ṉezile ba ben beeni, lla? Bi chillelid' ni to dii mal dii ba bene' kwenc̱he guete'. Gonch' mandad wit c̱hingake'ne' na'tech yisanee.
Na' beṉ'ka' wzeyidgake' chosyaagake' chṉabgakile'ne' wdeene' ḻee yag cruza'. Na' daa wzeyidgake' chosyaagake', bengake' gan wzoa xtilleeka'.
Na' bc̱hoglall' Pilátona' gone' ka cheeni beṉ'ka'.
Na' bisane' beena' wṉabgake', beena' de lillyana' daa bx̱ie' wdiḻa' na' daa bettie' to beṉ'. Na' bene' Jesúza' lo na'gake' kwenc̱he gongakile'ne' ka chaklall'gake'.
Na' ka nc̱he'gake' Jesúza' lljada'gake'ne' ḻee yag cruza', billaggake' to beṉ' Cirene lie' Simón zizee lyix̱aa. Na' bex̱'gake'ne' bwa'gake'ne' yag cruz c̱he Jesúza' na'ch janoe'ne'.
Na' beṉ' zan zjanogake'ne', na' zan noolka' chbellgake' na' chosyaagake' ni c̱he Jesúza'.
Na' biyec̱hj Jesúza' bwie' ḻegake' na' golle': ―Le' nool Jerusalén, bi kwellzle c̱ha'; ḻi kwell c̱he kwinle na' c̱he xiiṉleka'.
Ḻa' wllin lla kat' iṉa beṉ': “Chakomba nool willka', beṉ'ka' bi wxan na' bi bwall bx̱opgake'.”
Na'ch beṉ'ka' zoa llana' gak ka', solo iṉagake': “Sheḻ' iyiṉjtega yaa yaoki idakwtegan neto'.”
Shi yag yaa yag banna' chongakile'n kon daa nazan c̱hegake', ¿alechla ki gongakile' yag billa'?
Na' ḻekzka' nc̱he'gake' c̱hop beṉ' wen dii mal kwenc̱he witgake' ḻegake' txen len Jesúza'.
Na' ka bllingake' latja' gana' le Llit Yic̱hj Beṉ' Wet, bda'gake' Jesúza' ḻee yag cruza'. Na' ḻekzka' bda'gake' c̱hopte beṉ' wen dii malka' shḻaa wej kwite'na'.
Na' ka chda'gake' Jesúza' ḻee yag cruza', chi'e: ―X̱a, wxi'xen c̱hegake', ḻa' aga ṉezgakile' bin chongake'. Na' soldadka' bengake' to wyitj kwenc̱he wṉezgakile' nogake' yidoḻ' xe'na'.
Na' lle' beṉ' zan chwiagake', na' ax̱t beṉ'ka' chṉabia'gake' beṉ' Israelka' btitjgakile'ne', nagake': ―Gok bisle' beṉ' yoblə, na' ṉaa yislashki kwine' shi leile' ḻen' Crístona', beena' ba wlej Chioza'.
Na' ḻekzka' soldadka' btitjgakilene', na' jabig'gake' kwit yag cruza' gana' nda'gake'ne' na' bshabgakile'ne' to vino dii nak zic̱hj zḻa'.
Na' che'gake'ne': ―Shi lin' nako' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelki, bislashki kwino'.
Na' yic̱hj yag cruz c̱he'na' bda'gake' to dii cho'en dill' bic̱he nda'gake'ne' ḻee yag cruza', nan: “Beenin beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka'.” Bzejgake'n dill' griego, dill' latín na' dill' hebreo.
Na' to beṉ' wen dii mala', beena' da' kwit Jesúza', biya dii golle'ne', chi'ene': ―Shi lin' Crístona', Beena' Bseḻ' Chioza' iṉabia', bislashki kwino' na' ḻekzka' bisla neto'.
Na' beena' sto bsheshlene'ne', chi'e: ―¿Abikzə chall chlleblatoo Chioza'?, len kon ka chak c̱hen' ba chak c̱ho'.
Cho', ka chiyaḻ'kz gak c̱hechon' kwenc̱he c̱hixjcho c̱he dii mala' daa bencho; san beeni aga bi dii mal bene'.
Na'ch golle' Jesúza': ―Jesús, lljadingachilo' nad' kat'ka' solo iṉabi'o.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Dii ḻi nia' li', ṉaanlla soaleno' nad' latja' gana' nak mbalaz.
Na' do ka gobill bic̱hoḻ doxen yell-liona', bllinte do ka chida shoṉ,
daa bich bzeeni' wbilla'. Na' lechaa ze ḻoo yoodo'na' bllon' gokan c̱hop ḻaalə.
Na'ch besyaa Jesúza' zilljə, chi'e: ―X̱a, chiyon' bishbe c̱ha'ni lall' noo. Na' biyoll golle' ka' na'ch wite'.
Na' ka ble'i beena' chṉabia' soldadka' diika' gok, be'lawee Chioza', chi'e: ―Dii ḻi beeni nake' dowalj beṉ' wen.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' lle' na', ka ble'gakile' ka gok, ziyajgake' chball'gake' cho'alc̱ho'eka'.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' nombia'gake' Jesúza', do noolka' za'lengake'ne' ax̱t Galileana', wzegake' zit'lə chwiagake' ka gok.
Wzoa to beṉ' wlie' José, beṉ' yell Arimatea, daa mbani Judéana'. Na' Joséna' nake' txen beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka'. Nake' to beṉ' wen na' to beṉ' chon ka cheeni Chioza',
na' zoe' chbeze' wseḻ' Chioza' beena' iṉabia'. Na' Joséna' aga wyoolallee ka ben beṉ'ka' chṉabia'lene' daa betgake' Jesúza', na' bi benlene' ḻegake' txen.
Na'ch wyaje' lao Pilátona' na' wṉabe' lsens yiḻetje' kwerp c̱he Jesúza'.
Na' biḻetje'ne' ḻee yag cruza', na'ch bitobe'ne' to lech' xen na' jḻo'ene' to ḻoo blej daa benshawee, ga biṉ' wkash'gake' ni tlish' beṉ' wet.
Na' llana' gok diiki nakan lla chsini'a beṉ' Israelka' c̱hegake' kwenc̱he bibi llin gongake' lla sabda', llana' chombaaṉgake', na' zi lat'zə chyallj solo llana' chombaaṉgake'.
Na' noolka' za'lengake' Jesúza' ax̱t Galileana', wyajgake' jawiagake' bleja' na' jale'gakile' nak wdix̱jgake' kwerp c̱he'na'.
Na'ch biza'gake', na' ka billingake' gana' zoagake', benshao'gake' daa chḻa' zix̱. Na' bizi'lall'gake' lla sabda' kon ka na leya'.
Na' lla necha' chizolo xmanna', wizaj noolka' ni baḻ cho'a bana', nox̱'gake' diika' chḻa' zix̱ daa benshao'gake', na' wyaj zi baḻ noolə yoblə kon ḻegake'.
Na' ble'gakile' aga chi'ch yaja' cho'a bana'.
Na' wyoogake' ḻoo bleja', na' ble'gakile' aga bich bi kwerp c̱he X̱ancho Jesúza' de na'.
Na' shlak chakgakile' bera zejin dga, kat'kzali ble'gakile' c̱hop beṉ' byo, nakwgake' lech' dii chey cheeni', zegake' kwite'ka'.
Na' noolka' bllebchgagake' na' bc̱hek' yic̱hje'ka' ax̱t lo yona'. Na'ch beṉ'ka' zena' che'gake': ―¿Berac̱he chiyiljzle beena' mban ladj beṉ' wetki?
Kochno de ni. Ba bibane' ladj beṉ' wetki. Ḻi lljadini daa wne' le' kana' zoalene' le' Galileana'.
Wne' chonan byen Beena' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni gake' lo na' beṉ' malka', na' witgake'ne' ḻee yag cruza', na' ka yiyoṉ lla yibane' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch jadini noolka' daa goll Jesúza' ḻegake'.
Na' biza'gake' biyajgake' gana' lle' postlka' shnej len yog' beṉ'ka' sto gokgake'ne' txen, na' be'gake' dill' yog' daa gok c̱hegake'.
Na' noolkin jayellgake' postlka' daa gok c̱hegake': María beṉ' yell Magdálana', Juánana', María xṉa' Jacóbona', na' len zi baḻ nool yoblə.
Na' postlka' ni lat' bi wyajḻe'gake' daa goll noolka' ḻegake' daa gokgakile' bizan chon chnagake'.
Na' Pédrona' wzee zejdoe' cho'a bana', na' ka blline', bwie' ḻoo bleja' na' ble'ile' lech'ka' chi'gakan ka'lə. Na'ch bizee zjade' gana' zoe' chibanile' ka nak daa ba gok.
Na' lo llana' gok ka', c̱hop beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen wyajgake' to yell dii le Emaús, na' nḻaa ljwellin ka do shnej kilometro kon Jerusalénna'.
Na' lo zej ngoogake' nez choe'gake' dill' c̱heyi diika' ba gok.
Na' shlak choe'gake' dill' c̱heyi diika' gok, na' jabig' kwin Jesúza' kwite'ka' na' zejlene' ḻegake' txen.
Na' ḻa'kzi chwiagake'ne', aga gokbe'gakile' no beena'.
Na'ch wṉabi Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Bera dillaan choe'le za'le ni? ¿Berac̱he chakyesh'zile?
Na' toe', beena' le Cleofas, chi'ene': ―Yog'zə beṉ' ṉezgakile' daa ba gok Jerusalénna' llaki ba wde. ¿Astozo' li' bi ṉezilo' daa ba gok?
Na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Beran gok? Na'ch che'gake': ―Diika' gok c̱he Jesús, beṉ' Nazareta'. Goke' to beṉ' wdix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne', na' bene' yeḻ' wak na' bi'e dill' zakii dii nak shḻi lao Chioza' na' lao beṉ'.
Na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia'gake' cho' beṉ' Israel bengake'ne' lo na' josc̱hiska' kwenc̱he bc̱hoglogake' c̱he' guete', na' bda'gake'ne' ḻee yag cruza'.
Neto' nonnto' lez nan ḻen' yibeje' cho' beṉ' Israel lo na' beṉ' zit'ka'. Na' ba gok shoṉ lla gok diiki.
Na' baḻ noolka' nak neto' txen wyajgake' cho'a bana' daa baabaḻi, na' ḻe bibaninto' ka wnagake'
bich ble'gakile' kwerp c̱he'na' gana' bkwash'gake'ne'. Na'ch bila'gake' nagake' ble'gakile' c̱hop anjl, beṉ' goll ḻegake' mbankzə Jesúza'.
Na'ch wyaj baḻ beṉ' byoka' nonlennto' txen cho'a bleja', na' nakan kon ka wna noolka', per aga no Jesúza' ble'gakile'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¡Le' beṉ' bi chajnii! ¡Bi llabia' bat shajḻe'le daa bzej dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake'!
¿Abi ṉezile lliakzə bia' biya daa yen ile'i beena' nak Crístona' ka zi' yiyo'e gana' sho'e balaaṉ xenna'?
Na'ch wzoloe' chzajniile' ḻegake' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' cho'en dill' c̱he kwine', wzoloe' zigaate kon daa bzej dii Moiséza', na'tech diika' bzej yog' beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake'.
Na' ka bllingake' yella' gana' zejgake', bentezə Jesúza' ka beṉ' shaj gan yoblə.
Na' beṉ'ka' bengake' byen yigaaṉlene' ḻegake', che'gake'ne': ―Bigaaṉlen neto', ḻa' ba wlle' ṉaa, na' ba chaḻ. Na'ch wyoo Jesúza' bigaaṉlene' ḻegake'.
Na' ka ba chi'gake' cho'a mesa', bex̱ee to yetxtil na' bi'e yeḻ' chox̱ken Chioza', na'tech bxoxje'n na' bi'en ḻegake'.
Na'ch biyombia'yeṉ'gake' nan ḻen' Jesúza', na' to binitloze'.
Na'ch che' ljwelle': ―¡Bera daan, ax̱t mbalaz inlleb chibayi lall'do'chona' kana' za'cho tneza' choe'lene' cho' dill' chzajniile' cho' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza'!
Na'ch lii biza'tegake' ziyajgake' Jerusalénna'. Na' ka billingake', ndop nllag postlka' shnej na' nochlə beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen,
na' gollgake' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻikzan ba biban X̱anchona' ladj beṉ' wetka'. Ba bli'lawe' Simónni.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' c̱hop gollgake' ḻegake' ka gok c̱hegake' tneza', na' ka biyombia'gake' Jesúza' ka bxoxje' yetxtila' bi'en ḻegake'.
Na' shlak ni choe'gake' dillaa, tokonganzi jaze Jesúza' ladje'ka' na' bwape' ḻegake' chiox, chi'e ḻegake': ―Soashgale mbalaz.
Na' ḻe bllebgake' daa chakgakile' yel bx̱enzan chwiagake'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Berac̱he chllebzle? ¿Bic̱he chak c̱hoplall'zle?
Ḻi wwia ṉi'a na'ki kwenc̱he iṉezile nad'kzan. Ḻi gox̱' nad' kwenc̱he iṉezile aga nak' to yel bx̱en, ḻa' to yel bx̱en bibi bel' bibi llit yoon ka nak' nad'.
Na' ka golle' ḻegake' ka', bliile' ḻegake' ṉi'a neena'.
Na' yeḻ' chiba chizaki c̱he'ka' na' yeḻ' chibanina', ni bi chakbe'gakile' shi ḻekzen'. Na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Abi de lat' dii gaocho?
Na'ch be'gake'ne' lat' beḻ ba bwey'gake' lo yi'na'.
Na' bex̱eeb wdawe'b chwiategake'.
Na' chi'e: ―Ka nak daa ba gok c̱ha', ḻennan' wnia' le' kana' ni zoalen' le', kana' wnia' llia bia' yillinin gak c̱ha' yog' diika' bzej dii Moiséza', na' diika' bzej dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' na' diika' da' ḻee sálmoka'.
Na'ch ben Jesúza' ka wyajni'gakile' diika' na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza',
chi'e ḻegake': ―Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: chonan byen Crístona', biya dii yen ile'ile' na' witgake'ne' na' yiyoṉ lla yibane' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na' ḻekzka' nan: ides cho'a xtilleena' daa nan shi yiyaj yileni beṉ' dii malka' chongake' na' yiyakxen c̱hegake'. Na' solozan Jerusalénni na' illiljan doxente.
Na' le' chiyaḻ' ye'le beṉ' yog' diiki ba ble'ile gok c̱ha'.
Na' nad' wseḻaa beena' bc̱heb X̱a' Chioza' goṉe' gaklene' le', na' ḻi soatezə Jerusalénni ax̱t kat'ch X̱a'na' goṉe' le' yeḻ' waka' daa za' yabana'.
Na'ch bc̱he' Jesúza' ḻegake' wyajgake' yell Betániana'. Na' bḻis neena' benḻeeye' ḻegake'.
Na' ni chonḻeeytie' ḻegake', ka bikwase' kwite'ka' na' biyepe' yabana'.
Na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, biyoll be'la'ogake'ne', biza'gake' ziyajgake' Jerusalénna' chiba chizakgakile'.
Na' wzoatezi wzoagake' be'la'ogake' Chioza' yoodo'na'.
Ba zoakzə beena' le Xtill' Chios ka wxe wzil yog'ḻoḻte dii de. Ḻen' ba zoalene' Chioza', na' ḻekzen' Chioza',
na' dezd nechte ba zoalenkze' Chioza'.
Ḻen' bene' yog'te dii de, na' biga de to dii bi bene'.
Ḻen' cho'e yeḻ' mban, na' nake' beeni' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni.
Na' beeni' c̱he'na' chzeeni'n yell-lioni gani nak shgasj shc̱hoḻ ni c̱he dii mala', na' yel c̱hoḻa' bi bizoyin yisolan beeni'na'.
Wzoa to beṉ' bseḻ' Chioza' wlie' Juan.
Juanna' bidyee dill' c̱he beena' nsa' beeni'na' kwenc̱he yog' beṉ' gonḻilall'gake'ne'.
Aga Juanna'yeṉ'nan nsee beeni'na', san to bidtix̱je'ze' c̱he beena' nsa' beeni'nan'.
Beena' nsa' beeni'na' daa nak dowalj daa wzeeni'n lao yog'ḻoḻ beṉ', ba zee yell-lioni.
Na' beena' nsa' beeni'na' bidsoe' yell-lioni, na' ḻa'kzi ḻe' bx̱e bsile' yell-lioni, beṉ'ka' lle' lawinna' aga gokbe'gakile' non nake'.
Blline' ladj beṉ'ka' nak beṉ' yell c̱he', na' ḻegake' bi blebgake'ne'.
Per yog' beṉ'ka' blebgake'ne' na' benḻilall'gake'ne', bene' ḻegake' xiiṉ Chios.
Na' aga daa nakgake' beṉ' de beli chenan, wa daa cheeni beṉ' soalen ljwellen', ni aga daa cheeni beṉ' soa xiiṉen', san daa benḻilall'gake'nen' gokgake' xiiṉ' Chios.
Na' beena' le Xtill' Chios golje' goke' to beṉ' de beli chen na' wzoe' ladjnto'ni. Na' ble'into'ne' nake' beṉ' zakii nlleb daa nake' Xiiṉ tlish' tyaj X̱acho Chioza', na' nake' beṉ' lall'do' xen inlleb na' bli'e do ka nak dii ḻina'.
Na' Juanna' bi'e dill' c̱he' wne': ―C̱he beenin bzajniid' le' kana' wnia': “Beena' zi' za' nake' beṉ' zak'chi aga ka nad', ḻa' ba zoakze' kana' zi' soa' nad'.”
Daa nake' beṉ' wen inlleb na' daa chakchgaile' cho', dii zan dii wenka' ba bene' c̱he yog'cho.
Dii Moiséza' bzajniile' cho' diika' bllia Chioza' bia' goncho; per Jesucrístona' bli'e yeḻ' chiyesh'lalli c̱he Chioza' len dii ḻi c̱he'na'.
Ni to konoṉ' ile'i Chioza', per Xiiṉe'na' nak tlish' tyaj, beena' zoalene'ne', ḻen' bidliile' cho' ka nake'.
Beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' lle' Jerusalénna' bseḻ'gake' to c̱hop bx̱oz na' sto c̱hop beṉ'ka' nak xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Levína' kwenc̱he jaṉabgakile' Juanna' non nake'.
Na' bi bkwashee non nake', san golle' ḻegake': ―Aga nadaan Crístona', beena' chbezcho wseḻ' Chioza'.
Na'ch wizṉabgakile'ne': ―¿Norakzan nako' shka'? ¿Alin' Elíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne' kani'yi? Na' Juanna' chi'e: ―Aga ḻe' nad'. Na'ch chize'gake'ne': ―¿Alin' beena' ba llia bia' yid kwenc̱he c̱hix̱ji'e daa che' Chioza'ne', shka'? Na' che' Juanna': ―Akza ḻe' nad'.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Norakzə li', shka'? Cheeninto' iṉezinto' kwenc̱he lljayellnto' beṉ'ka' bseḻ' neto' non nako'. ¿Bi ka iṉo' c̱he kwino'?
Na'ch che' Juanna' ḻegake': ―Dii Isaíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne' kani'yi, dill' c̱han' bi'e kana' wne': “To beṉ' gosyee zillj latja' gana' bibi chashj chḻeb, na' iṉe': Ḻi se kwas kwenc̱he wzenagle c̱he X̱anchona' kat' zee.”
Na' beṉ'ka' bseḻ' fariseoka'
wṉabgakile'ne': ―¿Berac̱he chchoazo' beṉ' nis shi aga lin' Crístona', ni Elíaza', ni beena' llia bia' wseḻ' Chioza' kwenc̱he c̱hix̱ji'e daa chi'ene'?
Na' che' Juanna' ḻegake': ―Nad' chchoa' beṉ' nis, per ladjleni zoa to beṉ' bi nombia'le,
na' ḻen' zi' wli'lawe'. Na' nad' ni bi zakaa gak' xmose' kwenc̱he galj' ḻa'c̱h' xele'na'.
Yog' diiki gok gana' le Betania, daa llia shḻaa yao Jordanna', gana' bchoa Juanna' beṉ' nisa'.
Na' betiyo ble'i Juanna' Jesúza' zeje' kwite'na', na' chi'e: ―Ḻi wwia, beenin bseḻ' Chioza' na' zaklebile' xil'do'na' chitcho, ḻa' ḻen' yikwase' saaxya c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni.
Na' xtill' beenin bi'a kana' wnia': “Zi' za' to beṉ' zak'chi ka nad', na' ba zoakz beeni kana' zi' soa'.”
Ni nad' bi wṉezid' no xtilliin bi'a, per kwenc̱he gombia' beṉ' Israelki ḻe', bidchoa' beṉ' nis.
Na' Juanna' wizne': ―Ble'id' Espíritu c̱he Chioza' betje' yabana' nake' ka to palom na' jsoalene' ḻe'.
Ḻa' ni nad' bi wṉezid' no xtilliin bi'a, per Chioza', beena' bseḻ' nad' chchoa' beṉ' nis, wne': “Ile'ilo' yetj Espíritu c̱ha'na' lljsoalene' beena' wlej', na' ḻen' gone' ka yidsoa Espíritu Sántona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ'.”
Ba ble'id' gok ka wna Chioza' nad', na' ṉaa nia' le' beenin Xiiṉ Chioza'.
Na' betiyo Juanna' zelene' c̱hop beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen.
Na' ka ble'ile' chda Jesúza' na', na'ch chi'e: ―Ḻi wwia, beenin bseḻ' Chioza' na' zaklebile' xil'do'na' chitcho kwenc̱he chiyakxen saaxya c̱hechoka'.
Na' c̱hop beṉ'ka' nak Juanna' txen, ka bengakile' wna Juanna' ka', na' janogake' Jesúza'.
Na'ch ka biyec̱hj Jesúza', ble'ile' zjanogake'ne' na' chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Bin cheenile? Na' che'gake'ne': ―Rabí, ¿garan zo'? (Na' Rabí zejin: beṉ' chli' chsedi beṉ'.)
Na' che' Jesúza': ―Ḻi da wwiale. Na'ch wyajlengake'ne' na' jale'gakile' gana' zoe', na' bigaaṉlengake'ne' ax̱t ka wde llana', ḻa' ka do chida tapan billinlengake'ne' gana' zoe'.
Na' beena' le Andrés, beṉ' bish' Simón Pédrona', len sto beṉ' yoblə gokgake' c̱hopə janogake' Jesúza' ka bengakile' daa wna Juanna' c̱he'.
Na' Andréza' lii jadiljtie' beṉ' bishee Simónna', na' chi'ene': ―Ba billelinto' beena' nak Mesíaza'―. Na' Mesías zejin Cristo, beena' chbezgake' wseḻ' Chioza' kwenc̱he iṉabi'e.
Na'ch Andréza' bc̱hi'e Simónna' gana' zoa Jesúza', na' ka ble'i Jesúza'ne', chi'ene': ―Lin' Simón, xiiṉ Jonáza', na' ṉaa yilio' Cefas―. Na' Cefas zejin Pedro.
Na' betiyo ka zi' yiyaj Jesúza' gana' mbani Galileana', billague' Felípena' na' chi'ene': ―Da dino nad'.
Felípena' nake' beṉ' yell Betsaida, gana' nak lall Andréza' na' Pédrona'.
Na'ch jadilj Felípena' Natanaela' na' chi'ene': ―Ba billelinto' beena' bzej dii Moiséza' xtilleena' ḻee libr c̱he leya'. Na' ḻekzka' c̱hen' bzej dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' kani'yi. Ḻen' Jesúza', beṉ' Nazareta', xiiṉ Joséna'.
Na' Natanaela' chi'ene': ―¿Aka Nazareta' ichej to beṉ' zakii? Na' Felípena' golle'ne': ―Dakachi kwenc̱he gakbe'ilo'.
Na' ka ble'i Jesúza' zej Natanaela' gana' zie', golle': ―Ni za' to beṉ' nak dowalj beṉ' Israel, to beṉ' bi nak beṉ' wxiye'.
Na'ch goll Natanaela'ne': ―¿Nakra chak nombi'o nad'? Na' Jesúza' golle'ne': ―Ka zi' yidṉelə Felípena' li', ble'id' li' xan yag yix̱wewa'.
Na' goll Natanaela'ne': ―Maestro, lin' nako' Xiiṉ Chioza'. Na' lin' beena' zidṉabia' neto' beṉ' Israel.
Na' goll Jesúza'ne': ―¿Adaa wnia' ble'id' li' xan yag yix̱wewan' chajḻi'o c̱ha'? Zi' ile'chilo' dii xench aga ka dga.
Na' ḻekzka' gollch Jesúza': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', ile'ile yabana' nyaljan, na' beṉ'ka' nak anjl c̱he Chioza' chep chetjgake' lawa', nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni.
Na' biyoṉ lla got' to wishagna' yella' le Caná daa llia gana' mbani Galileana', na' na' len xṉa' Jesúza'.
Na' ḻekzka' goxgake' Jesúza' na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen.
Na' shlak chak lṉina' bibill vino c̱he'ka', na' goll xṉa' Jesúza'ne': ―Ba bibill vino c̱he beṉ'ki.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―¿Berac̱he nazo' nad' ka'? Biṉ' gaḻ' gon' daa llia bia' gon'.
Per xṉeena' golle' wen mandadka': ―Ḻi gon kon bin iṉe' le'.
Na' na' zoa x̱op yes' xen de yaj, dii choll nis, diika' chon llin kat' beṉ' Israelka' chixi chiyechgake' kon ka na ley c̱he'ka'. Na' to to yes'ka' chollan ka do shoṉ yid nis.
Na' che' Jesúza' wen mandadka': ―Ḻi kaa nisa' ḻoo yes'ki. Na' wda'gake'n ax̱t ka billa'chagakan.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi gash' lataan ṉaa na' ḻi lljeen beena' ngoo lo neen. Na' bengake' ka golle'.
Na' beena' ngoo lo neen bnix̱e' nisa' daa biyak vino, ni bi ṉezile' ga wza'n. Tochga wen mandadka' ṉezgakile', ḻa' ḻegaken' wdaagake' nisa'. Na'ch beena' ngoo lo neen goxe' bi'na' chshagna',
chi'eb': ―Yog' beṉ' zigaate chdie' vino wenna', na' kat' ba weej beṉ'ka' len lṉina' dii zil, na'ch chdie' daa bi naktek wen. San li', ba bzagoo vino wenni na' ax̱t ṉaach chdio'n.
Yeḻ' waki dga ben Jesúza' yell Canána' daa llia gana' mbani Galileana', ḻennan' bene' dii nech. Na' ka' bli'e yeḻ' wak c̱he'na' nape', na'ch beṉ'ka' nongake' ḻe' txen benḻilall'gake'ne'.
Na' ka wde, biyaje' Capernaúma' len xṉeena', len beṉ' bisheeka' na' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, na' wzoagake' na' to c̱hop shoṉ lla.
Na' ka ba zoa gaḻ' lṉi Paskwa' daa chon beṉ' Israelka', wyaj Jesúza' Jerusalénna'.
Na' ka blline' lesh' chyoodo'na', ble'ile' lle' beṉ' chit'gake' gooṉ, xil', na' palom, na' ḻekzka' na' chi' beṉ'ka' chisha' mecha'.
Na' ka ble'ile' ka chak, bene' to do tashj, na' kon ḻen bisheshile' yog'ḻoḻe' lesh' chyoodo'na' lente gooṉka' na' xil'ka'. Na' bzaḻee xmech beṉ'ka' chisha' mecha' lo yona' na' bishi'e mes c̱he'ka'.
Na' beṉ'ka' chit' palomka', golle' ḻegake': ―¡Ḻi yishesh baki ni! ¡Bi gonzle lill X̱a'na' ka lao yaa!
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen jadingakile' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' nan: “Daa ḻe chakid' lill xḻatjo'na' ḻen wlliayi'n nad'.”
Na'ch beṉ' Israelka' lle' na' che'gake' Jesúza': ―¿Bi yeḻ' wak gono' dii wli'n napo' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he chono' diiki?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi yic̱hinj yoodo'ni na' lo shoṉə llazə yiyona'n.
Na'ch che' beṉ' Israelka' ḻe': ―X̱opiyon yiz bengake' yoodo'ni, na' li' nazo' shoṉə llazə yiyono'n.
Per daa goll Jesúza' ḻegake' ka', kwerp c̱he'nan' bsaklebile' yoodo'na'.
Na'ch ka biban Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka', jadini beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen daa wne', na' wyajḻe'gake' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' na' dill'ka' be' Jesúza'.
Na' shlak zoa Jesúza' lṉi Paskwa' Jerusalénna', beṉ' zan wyajḻe'gake' c̱he' daa ble'gakile' yeḻ' wakka' bene'.
Per Jesúza' bi bx̱enilallee ḻegake', ḻa' nombi'e yic̱hjlall'do' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'.
Aga byalljile' no yee ḻe' nakan nak beṉec̱ha', ḻa' kwasḻoḻ nombi'e yic̱hjlall'do'eka'.
Wzoa to fariseo beṉ' wle Nicodemo, na' goke' to beṉ' wṉabia' ladj beṉ' Israelka'.
Na' Nicodémona' wyaje' jawie' Jesúza' waḻ-lə na' chi'ene': ―Maestro, ṉezinto' Chioza' bseḻee li' kwenc̱he wli' wsedilo' neto', ḻa' bi gak gono' yeḻ' wakka' chono' sheḻ' bi zoalen Chioza' li'.
Na'ch Jesúza' chi'ene': ―Dii ḻi nia' li', beena' bi yiyalj dii yoblə aga wak lljazoe' gana' chṉabia' Chioza'.
Na' che' Nicodémona'ne': ―¿Nakra gon to beṉ' gol yiyaljze' dii yoblə? Ḻa' aga wak yiyo'e ḻoo ḻee xṉeena' kwenc̱he yiyalje' sto shii.
Na' Jesúza' chi'ene': ―Dii ḻi nia' li', kono gak yiyaj gana' zoa Chioza' chṉabi'e shi biṉ' galjlenile' nis na' yikob Espíritu c̱he Chioza' yic̱hjlall'do'ena' kwenc̱he gake' ka beṉ' galj sto shii.
Beena' nak xiiṉ beṉ' de beli chen, de beli chenchokzan nake'. Per beena' chikob Espíritu c̱he Chioza'ne', nake' xiiṉ Chios na' de to yeḻ' mban c̱he' daa bi te c̱heyin.
Bi yibanilo' daa nia' li': “Yog' beṉ' chiyaḻ' galje' dii yoblə.”
Kat' chze be'na' na' chajan kon ga cheenin, na' ḻa'kzi chenicho ka sshag chonan aga ṉezicho galan za'n, ni bi ṉezicho galan zejan. Ḻekzkan' aga ṉezicho nakan chon Espíritu c̱he Chioza' kwenc̱he chiyalj beṉ' dii yoblə.
Na'ch wizṉabi Nicodémona'ne': ―¿Nakra gak gakz dga?
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Len naktio' to beṉ' chli' chsedi beṉ' Israelki, ¿ana' bi ṉezilo' diiki?
Dii ḻi nia' li', choe'nto' dill' c̱he daa ṉezinto' na' daa ben ble'into', per bi chajḻe'le daa nanto' le'.
Shi bi chajḻe'le daa wnia' le' c̱he diika' chak yell-lioni, ¿alechlə shi we'len' le' dill' c̱he daa nak c̱he yabana'?
’Ni to konoṉ' shep yabana', toz nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, nak' beṉ' za' yabana'.
Na' ka ben dii Moiséza' gana' bibi chashj chḻeb bdee beḻ de broncena' ḻee yaga', ka'kzan gongakile' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni. Wda'gake' nad' ḻee yaga'
kwenc̱he nottez beṉ' gonḻilall' nad' bi kwiayee, san gat' to yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
’Daa ḻe chakchgayi Chioza' beṉ' yell-lioni, bseḻee Xiiṉe'na' tlish' tyaj kwenc̱he nottez beṉ' gonḻilalleene' bi kwiayee, san gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
Chioza' bseḻee xiiṉe'na' yell-lioni aga kwenc̱he wlliayee beṉaan, san kwenc̱he yisle' ḻegaken'.
’Beena' nonḻilall' Xiiṉ Chioza', bich nchoglo c̱he' sak'zi'e, san beena' bi nonḻilalleene', ba nchoglo c̱he' kwiayee daa bi nonḻilallee Xiiṉ tlish' tyaj Chioza'.
Ba nchoglo kwiayi' beṉ' yell-lioni daa ba bla' beena' nsa' beeni'na', na' daa chongake' dii mala', wyazlall'chgake' yel c̱hoḻa' aga ka beeni'na'.
Yog' beṉ'ka' chon diika' bi yejni'alallii chakzbangakile' beeni'na', na' aga willjabig'lat'gake' lawinna' daa chllebgake' wli'lawi dii mala' chongake'.
San beṉ'ka' zoagake' chongake' ka na dill' ḻi c̱he Chioza', chbig'gake' lao beeni' c̱he'na' kwenc̱he gakbia' chongake' ka cheeni Chioza'.
Ka wde, wyaj Jesúza' Judeana' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' wzoagake' na' xtit wen, na' bchoagake' beṉ' nis.
Na' Juanna' ḻekzka' chchoe' beṉ' nis gana' le Enón, gaozə gana' le Salim, ḻa' na' de nis zil, na' chaj beṉ' kwenc̱he chchoe' ḻegake' nisa'.
Diiki gokgakan kana' zi' koogake' Juanna' lillyana'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nakgake' Juanna' txen gokdiḻ-lengake' sto beṉ' Israel ni c̱heyi diika' yoologake' chongake' kwenc̱he chixi chiyechgake' lao Chioza'.
Na' wyajgake' jellgake' Juanna': ―Maestro, beena' wzeleno' shḻaa yao Jordanna', beena' bi'o xtilleena', ba chchoe' beṉ' nis na' yog'zə beṉ' chajgake' kwite'na'.
Na'ch che' Juanna' ḻegake': ―Kono gak bi gon shi Chioza' bi wi'e latj.
Kwinkzle benile kana' wnia' aga nadaan Crístona', beena' chbezcho wseḻ' Chioza', san nak' to beṉ' bseḻee kwenc̱he kwialoa' lawe'na' na' yep' beṉ' wzenaggake' c̱he'.
To ga chak wishagna', bi'na' chshagnan' ikaab' noola'. Na' bi'na' nllaguib' chi'b' kwitbaa, ḻe chibaib' ka chenib' chshaljb'. Kayeṉ'nan chak c̱ha', ḻe chibaid' daa chzenaggake' c̱he Crístona'.
Ḻen' zizikchli seyi c̱he', na' nad' bichtek seyi c̱ha'.
’Ka nak beena' za' yabana', ḻen' zak'chi' aga ka yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'. Na' beṉ'ka' lle' yell-lioni, chinogake' daa de lo yell-lionizə, na' c̱he yell-lionizə choe'gake' dill'. San beena' za' yabana' zak'che' aga ka yog'ḻoḻte beṉ',
na' choe' dill' c̱heyi diika' ba ben ble'ile' yabana', per baḻchga beṉ' chajḻe' xtilleena'.
Na' nottez beena' chajḻe' c̱he', chli'e Chioza' cho'e dill' ḻi.
Beena' bseḻ' Chioza', cho'a xtill' Chiozan' cho'e, ḻa' Chioza' no'ene' do ka nak Espíritu c̱he'na'.
Chioza' chakile' Xiiṉe'na', na' ba bene' lall' nee yog'ḻoḻte dii de.
Na' beena' gonḻilall' Xiiṉ Chioza' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi. Per beena' bi cheeni gonḻilalleene' bi gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi, san ile'ile' yeḻ' zak'zi'na' we' Chioza'.
Fariseoka' gokbe'gakile' beṉ' zanch nakgake' Jesúza' txen, na' beṉ' zanch chchoe' nisa' aga ka Juanna',
ḻa'kzi aga kwin Jesúzan' bchoe' beṉ' nisa', san beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txenan.
Na' ka gokbe'i Jesúza' ba ṉezi fariseoka' beṉ' zanch nakgake'ne' txen, na'ch bizee gana' mbani Judeana' ziyaje' gana' mbani Galiléana'lə.
Na' kwenc̱he yilline' gana' mbani Galileana' chiyaḻ' yidie' gana' mbani Samáriana'.
Na' billingake' to yell dii le Sicar, daa llia gana' mbani Samáriana'. Na' yella' llian gaozə gana' de yell-liona' be' dii Jacoba' xiiṉe' dii Joséna'.
Na' lo yell-liona' llia posa' wden dii Jacoba'. Na'ch wche' Jesúza' cho'a posa' daa ba chjx̱akchgaile' zingwee neza'. Na' ba chonan ka gobill.
Na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen zejgake' yella' zjx̱i'gake' daa gaolengake'ne'. Na' cho'a posa' chi' Jesúza' ka bllin to noolə Samaria zjx̱i'e nisa'. Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Beṉ lat' nis yeej'.
Na'ch che' noolə Samáriana'ne': ―¿Berac̱he chṉabzilo' nad' nisa' yeejo'?, ḻa' beṉ' Israel li', na' nool Samaria nad'. Golle' ka' ḻa' beṉ' Israelka' bi zoalengake' wen beṉ' Samáriaka'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Sheḻ'ka' ṉezshailo' daa choṉ Chioza' na' no nad' chṉabid' li' nisa' yeej', ba wṉabilo' nad' goṉ daa yeejo', sheḻ'ka', ḻa' nap' to nis yaa nis ban daa goṉ li'.
Na' noola' chi'ene': ―Beṉ'do', bibi nox̱oo wḻepilo' nisa', na' posi ḻe zitjan. ¿Gara lljx̱i'o nis yaa nis banna' goṉo' nad' nazo' ka'?
Dii x̱ozxto'cho Jacoba' bkwaaṉlene' neto' posi gani weeje', na' weej xiiṉe'ka' na' bayix̱' c̱he'ka'. ¿Achakilo' zak'chilo' ka ḻe'?
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Nottezə beṉ' cheeje' nis c̱he posi, wbiḻchkzile' dii yoblə.
San beena' yeej nisa' daa wi'ane', aga wbiḻchile'. Ḻa' nisa' daa wi'ane' nakan ka to dii galchga ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena' na' gonan ka gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
Na'ch che' noola'ne': ―Beṉ'do', beṉ nad' nisa' no' ka' kwenc̱he bich ibiḻid' na' bich yid beja' ni.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Biyaj jaṉe beṉ' c̱ho'na', na' dalene' ni.
Na' che' noola'ne': ―Aga no beṉ' c̱ha' zoa. Na' Jesúza' chi'ene': ―Lekzilo' no' ka', aga no beṉ' c̱ho' zoa.
Ḻa' ba gok gay' beṉ' c̱ho'ka', na' beena' zoaleno' ṉaa ni bi nshagna'lenkzo'ne'. Shḻikzan ba wṉio'.
Na'ch noola' chi'ene': ―Beṉ'do', ba gokbe'id' nako' to beṉ' chyix̱jee daa na Chioza'.
Dii x̱ozxto'nto'ka' be'la'ogake' Chioza' lo yaani, na' le' beṉ' Israel nale chonan byen we'la'ochone' Jerusalénna'.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Noolə, wyajḻe' c̱ha', wllin lla kat' bich gonan byen yidle lo yaani, ni bich gonan byen shajle Jerusalénna' kwenc̱he we'la'ole X̱acho Chioza'.
Le' beṉ' Samaria ni bi nombia'le non choe'la'ole, san neto' beṉ' Israel nombia'nto' Chioza', beena' choe'la'onto', ḻa' ladjnto'nan' ichej beena' yisle' beṉ' kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'gake'.
Ba zoa illin lla, wa ba bllinkz llana' beṉ'ka' dii ḻi choe'la'ogake' X̱acho Chioza' we'la'ogake' beena' nak dowalj Chios do yic̱hj do lallgake', ḻa' kan' chaklall' X̱acho Chioza' we'la'ochone'.
Chioza' nake' Espíritu, na' beṉ'ka' cheengakile' we'la'ogake'ne', chiyaḻ' we'la'ogake'ne' dowalj na' do yic̱hj do lall'gake'.
Na' che' noola'ne': ―Ṉezid' wla' beena' chbezcho wseḻ' Chioza' beena' nsi'e Mesías wa Cristo. Na' kat' yide', wzajniile' cho' yog' diiki.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Nad'kzan' beena' no' ka', na' ḻen' chshaljlene' li'.
Na' shlak choe'lene' noola' dill', billin beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' bibangakile' daa chshaljlen Jesúza' to noolə. Per ni toe' bi biyaxji iṉabile'ne' bin cheeni noola' wa bi dillaan chshaljlene'ne'.
Na'ch noola' bkwaaṉe' chee nis c̱he'na' na'zə, na' biyaje' jayelle' beṉ' wlall c̱he'ka':
―Ḻi da lljawiacho to beṉ' ba wne' nad' yog' diika' ba ben'. ¿Aaga ḻen' Crístona', lla?
Na'ch blleshgake' yella' wyajgake' gana' chi' Jesúza'.
Na' shlak ziyaj noola' zeyid beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen che'gake'ne': ―Maestro, wdao lat'.
Na' Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―De to yeḻ' wao c̱ha' daa bi nombia'le.
Na'ch che' ljwell beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―¿Anti no ba bidwa' dii wdawe', lla?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Yeḻ' wao c̱ha'na' nakan daa chon' ka cheeni beena' bseḻ' nad' na' wzeeloa' daa cheenile' gon'.
Le' nazle: “Chyalljch zi tap beo' kwenc̱he yizi' yilapcho.” Per nad' nia' le', ḻi wwiakachi ba de daa yizi' yilapcho.
Beena' chyix̱jee cho'a xtill' Chioza' ṉaa, zaklebile' to beṉ' ba chilaḻile' chizi' chilape'. Na' beṉ'ka' chzenag daa chyix̱ji'e, gat' to yeḻ' mban c̱hegake' zejḻi kaṉi, na' beena' goz yibalenile' beena' chizi' chilap.
Nakan ka dillaa de daa na: “Beṉ' yoblan chaz na' beṉ' yoblə chizi' chilap.”
Nad' ba bseḻaa le' lljalaple gana' bi bllaglole gozle, ḻa' le' gonle ka wzenag beṉ' cho'a xtill' Chioza' daa wdix̱jee beṉ' yoblə.
Beṉ' zan beṉ' Samáriaka', beṉ'ka' lle' yell Sicara' benḻilall'gake' Jesúza' daa goll noola' ḻegake': “Ba wne' nad' yog'te dii ba ben'.”
Na'ch ka bllingake' gana' chi' Jesúza', got'yogakile'ne' kwenc̱he yigaaṉlene' ḻegake'. Na' bigaaṉe' na' c̱hop lla.
Na' beṉ' zanch benḻilall'gake'ne' daa bengakile' dillaa cho'e.
Na'ch che'gake' noola': ―Ṉaach ba chajḻe'nto', aga daa wnazo' neto' kan', san kwinkznton' ba beninto' cho'e dillaa na' ṉezinto' dii ḻi ḻekzen' beena' yisla beṉ' yell-lioni kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'gake'.
Na' ka gok c̱hop lla, bizee biyaje' gana' mbani Galileana'.
Kwinkz Jesúza' wne' nan to beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne' aga no chgoo ḻe' balaaṉ lalle'na'.
Na' ka billine' gana' mbani Galileana', blebgake'ne' daa ble'gakile' yog' daa bene' Jerusalénna' ka goḻ' lṉi Paskwa'.
Na' dii yoblə wizaj Jesúza' yell Canána' daa llia gana' mbani Galileana', gana' biyone' nisa' vino. Na' yella' zoa to beṉ' zakii beṉ' chon llin c̱he beṉ' wṉabia'na', na' zoa to xiiṉe' bi' byo bi shao'b'.
Na' ka wṉezile' ba billin Jesúza' Galileana' zizee Judeana'lə, na' wyaje' lawe'na' got'yoile'ne' shaje' lljayene' bi' c̱he'na' daa ba chakshwetb'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Aga wyajḻe'le c̱ha' shi bibi yeḻ' wak gon' ile'ile.
Na' beṉ' wṉabia'na' chi'ene': ―Beṉ'do', ben goklen dagach ṉaate, shategali biṉ' guet bi' c̱ha'na'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Biyaj, jawia. Aga wet bi'na'. Na' beena' wyajḻi'e daa goll Jesúza'ne' na' bizee.
Na' ka ba zoa yilline' lille'na' jatiḻ xmose'ka' ḻe', che'gake'ne': ―Ba biyaki bi' c̱ho'na'.
Na'ch wṉabile' ḻegake' ka do bi gor wzolo chiyakshao'lall'b'. Na' che'gake'ne': ―Daa ṉeji do ka chida to bichejb' dii ḻana'.
Na'ch gokbe'i x̱abaa biyakshao'lall'b' ka gora' goll Jesúza'ne': “Biyaj jawia. Aga wet bi'na'.” Na' ḻe' len yog' beṉ'ka' zoa lille'na' benḻilall'gake' Jesúza'.
Dga gok de wchopi yeḻ' wakka' ben Jesúza' Galileana' ka zizee Judeana'.
Ka wde gok diiki, goḻ' to lṉi c̱he beṉ' Israelka' Jerusalénna', na' biyaj Jesúza' lṉina'.
Na' Jerusalénna', gaozə cho'a puerta' le Puert C̱he Xil'ka' llia to tang dii le Betesda dill' hebreo. Na' gay' koridor nec̱hjan tanga'.
Na' ḻoo koridorka' de beṉ' zan beṉ' we', no beṉ' lc̱hoḻ, no beṉ' bi chak sa' wen, na' no beṉ' net ṉi'a nee, chbezgake' ta nisa'.
Ḻa' zoa kat' chetj to anjl cho'a tanga' chte' nisa', na' beena' chyobi cho'e ḻoo nisa' chiyoll chta anjla'n chiyakile' bittezə yillwe' che'ile'.
Na' ladj beṉ'ka' lle' na' len to beṉ' ba gok shin'shoṉichoa yiz bi shawee.
Na' ble'i Jesúza'ne' na' gokbe'ile' ba wlla die' ka', na'ch chi'ene': ―¿Acheenilo' yiyakilo'?
Na'ch beena' bi shao' chi'ene': ―Beṉ'do', aga no zoa c̱ha' wḻetje' nad' ḻoo nisi kat' chdan. Na' kat' chakid' yetj' ḻoo nisa', beṉ' yoblə lii chjsho'tie' ḻo'inna'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Biyas, bitob daa c̱ho'na' biyoa'n na' bigoo nez.
Na' katena' biyakile' na' lii bitobtie' daa c̱he'na' biyo'en na' bigwee nez. Gok dga lla sabda', llana' chombaaṉgake'.
Na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' gollgake' beena' biyaki: ―Lla chombaaṉcho ṉaa. Aga bi lsens de woo daa c̱ho'na'.
Na'ch che' beena' ḻegake': ―Beena' biyone' nad' ḻen' wne': “Bitob daa c̱ho'na' biyoa'n na' bigoo nez.”
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Nora beena' wna li': “Bitob daa c̱ho'na' biyoa'n na' bigoo nez”?
Na' beena' biyaki aga ṉezile' non biyon ḻe', ḻa' Jesúza' ba bikwase' ladj beṉ'ka' lle' na'.
Na'tech billag Jesúza'ne' lesh' chyoodo'na', na' chi'ene': ―Ba biyakilo' ṉaa. Bich bi dii mal gono' kwenc̱he ki wtiḻcho' dii walch.
Na'ch beena' biyaje' lao beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' jayelle' ḻegake' nan Jesúza' biyone'ne'.
Na' daa ben Jesúza' yeḻ' waka' lla sabda', llana' chombaaṉgake', goklall'gake' witgake'ne'.
Na' Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―X̱a'na' bittezə lla chone' llin na' ka'kzə nad'.
Na'ch beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' goklall'gake' witgake'ne' aga toz daa wdishje' leya' daa cho'en dill' c̱he llana' chombaaṉgake', san ḻekzka' daa chon kwine' ka Chios daa chi'e Chioza' nake' X̱e'.
Na' Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', nad', Xiiṉ Chios, aga bi gak gon' tobia'loz', san daa chle'id' chon X̱a'nan' ḻekzannan' chon'.
Ḻa' X̱a'na' chakile' nad' na' chliile' nad' yog' diika' chone'. Na' wli'chile' nad' dii zak'techlə ka diiki, dii gonan ka yibanchile.
Ka chon X̱a'na' chisbane' beṉ' wetka' na' chiyo'e yeḻ' mban c̱hegake', ka'kzə chon nad', Xiiṉe', cho'a yeḻ' mban c̱he nottezə beṉ' cheenid' wi'an.
Na' X̱a'na' aga ga chc̱hogloe' c̱he beṉ', san nad' nak' Xiiṉe', ba bene' lall' na' wc̱hogloa' c̱he yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'.
Bene' ka' kwenc̱he yog' beṉ' koogake' nad' balaaṉna' ka daa chgoogake' X̱a'na'. Beena' bi chgwee nad' balaaṉ, nad' nak' Xiiṉ Chios, ḻekzka' bi chgwee X̱a'na' balaaṉ, beena' bseḻ' nad'.
’Dii ḻi nia' le', beena' chzenag xtillaana' na' chonḻilallee beena' bseḻ' nad', gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi. Na' aga bi de dii gonan ka c̱hoglo c̱he' sak'zi'e, san ba bile' lo yeḻ' wita' na' ba zoe' lo yeḻ' mban daa bi te c̱heyin.
Dii ḻi nia' le', wllin lla kat' beṉ' wetka' yengakile' iṉia' ḻegake', nad' nak' Xiiṉ Chios, na' beṉ'ka' yengakile' kat' iṉia' na' yibangake'.
X̱a'na' nape' yeḻ' wak kwenc̱he wi'e yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ' daa bi te c̱heyin. Ka'kzə ba beṉe' nad' Xiiṉe' yeḻ' wak kwenc̱he wi'a yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ' daa bi te c̱heyin.
Na' ḻekzka' ba beṉe' nad' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he gon' yeḻ' josc̱his daa nak' Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni.
Bi yibanile daa nia' ka', ḻa' wllin lla wllin gor yeni yog'te beṉ' wetka' kat' iṉia' ḻegake'.
Na' ka yengakile' iṉia' na'ch yichejgake' ḻoo bana'. Na' beṉ'ka' ben dii wenna' yibangake' na' si'gake' banez to yeḻ' mban daa bi te c̱heyin, na' beṉ'ka' ben dii mala', yibangake' na' c̱hoglo tegake' lo yeḻ' zak'zi'na' zejḻi kaṉi.
’Ni to bibi gak gon' tobia'loz', san chc̱hogloa' c̱he beṉ' kon ka nllia Chioza' bia' gon', na' kon ka nakannan' wc̱hogloa'n. Ḻa' aga chon' kon ka cheenid', san daa cheeni X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', ḻennan' chon'.
Na' shi nad' wi'a dill' c̱he kwin', ṉezid' aga no shajḻe' c̱ha'.
San zoa to beṉ' cho'e xtillaana', na' ṉezid' daa ne' c̱ha' nakan shḻicha.
Le' bseḻ'le beṉ' jaṉabgakile' Juanna' bi ka iṉe' c̱ha', na' dillaa daa bi'e c̱ha' nakan dii ḻi.
Ḻa'kzi nad' bi chyalljid' we' beṉ' yell-lioni xtillaa; nia' le' diiki kwenc̱he yilale na' bi kwiayi'le.
Juanna' goke' ka to yi' dii bzeeni' na' ḻe bibaile bzenagle c̱he' tolde.
Daa chon' diika' non X̱a' Chioza' lall' na' gon' choe'n dill' c̱ha', na' zak'chin aga ka daa wna Juanna'. Na' chli'lawin Chiozan' bseḻee nad'.
X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', ḻekzka' ba bi'e dill' c̱ha'. Ni shlin bigaṉ' yenile iṉie' ni biṉ' ile'ilene' nak nake'.
Na' cho'a xtilleena' biṉ' sho'n ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena', ḻa' bi chajḻe'le c̱ha', nad' beṉ' bseḻee.
Le' chsedchgale Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' daa chakile ḻe'inna' yillelile naklə ka gonle kwenc̱he gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hele zejḻi kaṉi. Na' ḻa'kzi Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' choe'n xtillaana',
aga cheenile gakle nad' txen kwenc̱he gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hele daa bi te c̱heyin.
’Aga chyalljid' no koo nad' balaaṉ.
Na' nombia' le', na' ṉezid' aga chakile Chioza'.
X̱a' Chioza' bseḻee nad' na' ba bid', na' bi chzenagle c̱ha'. San shi yid beṉ' yoblə tobia'loze', beena'lan ḻe gak c̱hele.
¿Nakrakzə gonle shajḻe'le c̱ha'? Ḻa' gangazə chgoo ljwell-le balaaṉ, na' bi chinole sho'le balaaṉ c̱he beena' zeelo nak Chios.
Bi gakile nad' gaw' xya c̱hele lao X̱a' Chioza', ḻa' zoa sto beṉ' gawe' xya c̱hele. Dii Moiséza', beena' nonle lez gaklene' le', ḻen' gawe' xya c̱hele lao X̱a' Chioza'.
Ḻa' sheḻ' chajḻe'le daa bzej dii Moiséza', ḻekzka' wyajḻe'le c̱ha', sheḻ'ka'. Ḻa' ḻen' bzeje' xtillaana'.
Na' daa bi chajḻe'le c̱he daa bzej dii Moiséza', ¿nakra gonle shajḻe'le c̱he diiki nia'?
Na' ka wde, Jesúza' wyaje' shḻaa nisdo' c̱he Galileana', daa ḻekzka' le nisdo' c̱he Tiberias.
Na' beṉ' zan janogake'ne' daa ble'gakile' yeḻ' wakka' bene' kana' biyone' beṉ'ka' bi shao'.
Na'ch wyep Jesúza' to lo yaa na' wche'lene' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen.
Na' ba zoa gaḻ' lṉi Paskw c̱he beṉ' Israelka'.
Ka ble'i Jesúza' beṉ' zan ba bllin gana' chi'e, na' chi'e Felípena': ―¿Gara lljx̱i'cho dii gao yog' beṉ'ki?
Golle' ka' daa chakile' la'shki bi yee Felípena', ḻa' ba ṉezkzile' nakan gone'.
Na' Felípena' chi'ene': ―Aga waki laxj to beṉ' c̱he x̱on' beo' lljx̱i'yicho dii gao yog' beṉ'ki lat' wej.
Na' sto beena' nak Jesúza' txen lie' Andrés, beṉ' bish' Simón Pédrona', chi'ene':
―Ni ze to bi' xkwid' no'ab' gay' yetxtil de cebada na' zi c̱hop beḻ. Per bizə daa par yog' beṉ'ki.
Na'ch Jesúza' chi'e: ―Ḻi yee yog' beṉ'ka' kwe'gake'. Na' dechga yixdo' gana' lle'gake', na' yog'tie' wche', na' to beṉ' byoka'zə gok ka do gayaa mil.
Na'ch bex̱' Jesúza' yetxtilka', na' bi'e Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken, na' bgone' c̱he c̱he beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' ḻegake' be'gake' c̱he yog' beṉ'ka' chi' na' ax̱t ka beljgakile'. Na' ḻekzka' bene' c̱he beḻka'.
Na' ka beljgakile', na'ch chi'e beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―Ḻi yitop yog'ḻoḻ dii lao'ka' bichooṉan kwenc̱he bibi gakditj.
Na'ch bitopgake'n, biyakte shlliṉ xet' diika' bichooṉan lao yetxtilka' gay'.
Na' ka ble'i beṉ'ka' yeḻ' waka' daa ben Jesúza', na'ch che' ljwellgake': ―Dii ḻi beenin nake' beena' llia bia' yid yell-lioni kwenc̱he c̱hix̱ji'e daa che' Chioza'ne'.
Na' daa gokbe'i Jesúza' cheengakile' yic̱he'gake'ne' kwenc̱he wzoagake'ne' iṉabi'e ḻegake', bicheje' ladje'ka' na' wyepe' toze' zi lat' cha'ch lo yaana'.
Ka ba chaḻ, beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen biyetjgake' cho'a nisdo'na'.
Na' biyoogake' to ḻoo barkw kwenc̱he ziyajgake' yell Capernaúma'. Ba goḻ na' biṉ' yillin Jesúza' kwite'ka'.
Na'ch wzolo wzechga be'na' na' wzolo chas chat' nisdo'na'.
Na' ka do gay' wa x̱op kilómetro ba wza'len barkwa' ḻegake' lo nisdo'na' kat' ble'gakile' Jesúza' zeje' tlo nisdo'na' zjatiḻe' barkwa' na' ḻe bllebgake'.
Na' Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―Nad'kzan, ¡bi illeble!
Na' chibagakile' bigoogake'ne' ḻoo barkwa', na' lii bllintekzgake' gana' chwiagake' illingake'.
Na' betiyo gokbe'i beṉ'ka' bigaaṉ shḻaa nisdo'na' nan tochga barkwa' got' na' to beṉ'ka' nonz Jesúza' txen biyoogake'n na' bi len Jesúza' biyoolene' ḻegake'.
Na' gaozə gana' wdaogake' yetxtilka' ka wde be' X̱ancho Jesúza' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken, bllin sto c̱hop barkw dii za' yell Tibériaza'.
Na' ka gokbe'i beṉ'ka' aga no Jesúza' nḻa' ni beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, na'ch biyoogake' ḻoo barkwka' ziyajgake' Capernaúma' jadiljgake'ne'.
Na' ka bllingake' shḻaa nisdo'na' jadi'gake'ne', na' gollgake'ne': ―Maestro, ¿bat biyedo' ni?
Na' Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', chiyiljle nad' aga daa wyajni'lati'le bi zejin yeḻ' wakka' benan', san daa wdaozle ax̱t ka beljilen.
Bi yilaḻ yizodzile kwenc̱he gat' dii yeej gaole, ḻa' dii te c̱heyin nak daa. San ḻi gaḻ' kwe'no daa goṉ yeḻ' mban c̱hele zejḻi kaṉi, daa goṉ' nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni. Ḻa' X̱a' Chioza' ba bene'n lall' na' wi'an.
Na' che'gake'ne': ―¿Beran chiyaḻ' gonnto' kwenc̱he gonnto' daa cheeni Chioza'?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Daa cheeni Chioza' gonle, gonḻilall'le nad', beṉ' bseḻee.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Bera yeḻ' wak gono' ile'into' kwenc̱he shajḻe'nto' c̱ho'? ¿Bi ka gono'?
Dii x̱ozxto'choka' wdaogake' daa le maná latja' gana' bibi chashj chḻeb, ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' na: “Yeḻ' wawa' daa za' yabana' bi'en wdaogake'.”
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', aga dowaljyeṉ' yeḻ' wao daa za' yabanan' be' dii Moiséza' ḻegake', san X̱a'na' choṉe' daa nak dowalj yeḻ' wao daa za' yabana'.
Ḻa' nad', beṉ' za' yabana', nak' ka to yeḻ' wao dii choe' Chioza' beṉ' yell-lioki kwenc̱he ibangake'.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―Beṉ'do', beṉgach neto' toshiizi yeḻ' wawa' no' ka'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Nad' nak' ka yeḻ' wawa' daa choe'n yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ'. Beena' gake' nad' txen, gake' ka beṉ' nelj nlla'i toshiizi. Na' beena' gonḻilallee nad', gake' ka to beṉ' bichga ibiḻi.
Per kon ka ba wnia' le', ḻa'kzi ba ble'ile nad' bi chajḻe'le.
Yog' beṉ'ka' chon X̱a'na' lall' na', gakgake' nad' txen. Na' beena' gake' nad' txen aga wzoa'ne' ka'lə.
Ḻa' zaa yabana' na' zoa' yell-lioni aga kwenc̱he gon' daa nazan c̱han', san zaa kwenc̱he gon' daa cheeni X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad'.
Na' X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', cheenile' bi wi'a latj kwiayi' ni to beṉ'ka' ba wleje' kwenc̱he gakgake' nad' txen. San cheenile' yisban' ḻegake' ladj beṉ' wetka' kat' illin lla te c̱he yell-lioni.
Na' dgan cheeni X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad': chaklallee gat' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi c̱he yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' gakbe'i nak' X̱iine' na' gonḻilallee nad'. Na' nad' yisbanee ladj beṉ' wetka' kat' te c̱he yell-lioni.
Na'ch beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' wzologake' biz chon chnagake' c̱he Jesúza' daa wne': “Nad' nak' yeḻ' wao daa za' yabana'.”
Na' che'gake': ―¿Aaga beenin Jesús, xiiṉ Joséna'? Nombia'cho x̱axṉa' beeni. ¿Berac̱he naze': “nad' za' yabana'”?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Bibi gon iṉazle c̱heyi daa wnia' le'.
Ni to kono gak gon nad' txen shi X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', bi gone' ḻe' lall' na'. Na' beṉ'ka' nak nad' txen, yisban' ḻegake' kat' te c̱he yell-lioni.
Ḻee librka' bzej dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' kani'yi nan: “Chioza' wli' wsedile' yog'ḻoḻte beṉ'.” Na' yog' beṉ' chzenag c̱he X̱a'na' na' chajni'gakile' daa ne', ḻegaken' chongake' nad' txen.
’Aga ga zoa beṉ' ba ble'ile' X̱a'na'; toz nad', beṉ' za' yabana', ba ble'idee.
Dii ḻi nia' le', nottez beṉ' nonḻilallee nad' de yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
Nadaan nak' ka yeḻ' wawa' daa choe'n yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ' zejḻi kaṉi.
Dii x̱ozxto'leka' wdaogake' daa le maná latja' gana' bibi chashj chḻeb na' bia'kzə witgake'.
San nad' cho'a dill' c̱he yeḻ' wao daa za' yabana', na' beena' gawe'n aga bi yeḻ' wit zejḻi kaṉi ile'ile'.
Nadaan nak' yeḻ' wao daa za' yabana' daa cho'en yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ'. Beena' gao yeḻ' wawi, ibane' zejḻi kaṉi. Na' yel' wawa' daa wi'ane', ḻennan' beli chen c̱ha'ni daa chzanid' kwenc̱he gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni.
Na'ch beṉ' Israelka' wzolo chshesh chṉegake', che' ljwelle': ―¿Nakra gon beeni goṉe' beli chen c̱he'na' gaochon?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, dii ḻi nia' le', shi bi gaole kwerp c̱ha'ni na' shi bi yeejle chen c̱ha'ni, aga wat' yeḻ' mban c̱hele daa bi te c̱heyin.
Ḻa' beṉ'ka' gaogake' kwerp c̱ha'ni na' yeejgake' chen c̱ha'ni, beṉ'kan' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hegake' zejḻi kaṉi. Na' kat' illin lla te c̱he yell-lioni, nad' yisbangakee ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Ḻa' kwerp c̱ha'ni nakan dowalj yeḻ' wao, na' chen c̱ha'ni nakan dowalj dii cheeje'.
Beena' gao kwerp c̱ha'ni na' yeeje' chen c̱ha'ni, nake' nad' txen, na' ḻekzka' nad' nakee txen.
X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', zoe' zejḻi kaṉi na' de yeḻ' mban c̱ha' daa mbane' ḻe'. Na' ka'kzan beena' gao beli chen c̱ha'ni ibane' daa wi'ane' yeḻ' mbanna'.
Beli chen c̱ha'ni nakan yeḻ' waw dii za' yabana'. Ka nak yeḻ' wawi, aga nakan ka daa le maná daa wdao dii x̱ozxto'leka' na' bia'kzə witgake'. Beena' gao yeḻ' wawa' daa za' yabana', ibane' zejḻi kaṉi.
Diikin wna Jesúza' shlak bli' bsedile' beṉ' gana' chdop chllag beṉ' Israelka' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza' yell Capernaúma'.
Na' zan beṉ'ka' nogake'ne', ka bengakile' daa wna Jesúza', na' wnagake': ―Lallj inlleb nak dga chli' chsedi beeni. ¿Notgui gon ka ne'?
Na' Jesúza' gokbe'ile' bi wyazlall'gake' xtillee'na', na'ch wṉabile' ḻegake': ―¿Achakzbanile dga ba wnia' le'?
¿Nakra gonle sheḻ'ka' ile'ile nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, yiyep' gana' wzaa?
Espíritu c̱he Chioza' cho'e yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ', ḻa' beli chenna' aga bi zakiin. Dill'ka' ba wnia' gonan ka soalen Espírituna' le' na' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hele.
Per bia'kzə zoa baḻ-le bi chajḻe'le. Goll Jesúza' ḻegake' ka', ḻa' dezd nechte ba ṉezkzile' no beṉ'ka' bi chajḻe' c̱he' na' non gon ḻe' lo na' beṉ' malka'.
Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Ba wniakz' le' ni to kono gak gon nad' txen shi X̱a'na' bi gone'ne' lall' na'.
Na' lo llana'tez beṉ' zan beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen bkwasgake' bich janogake'ne'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' beṉ'ka' shlliṉ, beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―¿Aḻekzka' lenle cheenile yiyajle?
Na' Simón Pédrona' chi'ene': ―X̱an', aga nochlə c̱heyi zakii wzenagnto', ḻa' tozo' lin' choo dillaa daa chonan ka gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hento' zejḻi kaṉi.
Ba wyajḻe'nto' c̱ho', na' ṉezinto' lin' Crístona', Xiiṉ Chios yaa Chios banna'.
Na' Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―Ba wlej' shlliṉle gakle nad' txen. Per tole nakle dii x̱iwaa txen.
Wne' ka' c̱he Jud Scariota', xiiṉ to beṉ' le Simón, ḻa' ṉezile' nan Juda' gone'ne' lall' na' beṉ' malka', ḻa'kzi wlene' beṉ'ka' shlliṉ.
Ka wde dga, Jesúza' wde' doxen gana' mbani Galileana'. Ḻa' bi goklallee shaje' gana' mbani Judeana' daa cheeni beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' witgake'ne'.
Na' ka ba zoa gaḻ' lṉi c̱he ranshdo'ka' daa chon beṉ' Israelka' yog' yiz,
beṉ'ka' nak beṉ' bish' golj Jesúza' che'gake'ne': ―Bi yigaaṉo' nizə, san wyaj Judeana' kwenc̱he beṉ'ka' ba non li' txen ile'gakile' yeḻ' wakka' chono'.
Ḻa' beena' cheeni seyi c̱he', aga chkwashee diika' chone'. Bachgali chono' yeḻ' wakki, jentegan lao yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'.
Ḻa' ni beṉ' bisheekan' bi wyajḻe'gake' c̱he'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Biṉ' illin lla illin gor gon' daa llia bia' gon'. San le', bat'tez wak shajle.
Beṉ' yell-lioki bibi de dii gonan ka gakzbangakile' le', san nadaan chakzbangakile' daa chepgakee malan' chongake'.
Ḻi shaj le' lṉina'. San nad' bi saa, ḻa' biṉ' illin lla illin gor gak c̱ha' daa llia bia'.
Biyoll golle' ḻegake' ka' na' bigaaṉe' Galileana' zi xtit.
Na' ka wde wza' beṉ' bisheeka', ḻekzka' wzee wyaje' lṉina' do ngash'z.
Na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' chiyiljgake'ne' lo lṉina', che' ljwellgake': ―¿Garaṉzi beena', lla?
Na' ladj beṉ'ka' lle' lṉina', beṉ' zan choe'gake' xtill' Jesúza'. Baḻe' che': “Nake' beṉ' wen.” Na' zi baḻe' che': “Bi nake' beṉ' wen, ḻa' chdaze' chziyee beṉ'.”
Per ni to kono biyaxji we' xtill' Jesúza' ka nḻa'z daa chllebgake' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka'.
Na' ba zej shoṉ tap lla chak lṉina' ka bllin Jesúza' gana' zoa yoodo'na' na' wzoloe' chli' chsedile' beṉ'.
Na' chibani beṉ' Israelka', na' che' ljwelle': ―¿Nakra chak chli' chsedi beeni beṉ', len aga bi nsede'?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Diika' chli' chsedid' aga nakan dii chyiljlall'z', san beena' bseḻ' nad', ḻen' bli' bsedile' nad' diiki.
Nottez beṉ' cheenile' gone' ka cheeni Chioza', wakbe'ile' shi daa chli' chsedid' nakan c̱he Chios wa shi nakan dii chyiljlall'z'.
Beena' tobia'loze' cho'e xtillee, balaaṉ c̱he kwinzen' chyilje', san beena' chyilje' sho' beena' bseḻ' ḻe' balaaṉ, ḻen' cho'e dill' ḻi, na' aga bi dill' wxiye' cho'e.
’Dii Moiséza' beṉe' le' ley c̱he Chioza', na' ni tole bi chonle ka nllian bia' gonle. ¿Bic̱he cheenzile witle nad'?
Na'ch beṉ'ka' lle' na' che'gake'ne': ―Dii x̱iwaan yoo no' ka'. ¿Noran cheeni wit li'?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Tochga yeḻ' waka' ba ble'ile ben' llana' chombaaṉcho na' yog'le chibanile.
Dii ḻi dii Moiséza' bene' byen yog'tele nakle beṉ' byo chiyaḻ' sho'le seṉ daa le circuncisión, ḻa'kzi aga ḻen' wzololene'n, san dii x̱ozxto'leka'ten. Daan chgoole bi' byodo'ka' seṉna' ḻa'kzi nakan lla chombaaṉcho.
Na' shi choe'le latj sho' bi' byodo'ka' seṉ daa le circuncisión lo llana' chombaaṉcho kwenc̱he gak ka na leya' daa bzej dii Moiséza', ¿bic̱he chllaazle nad' daa biyon' to beṉ' llana' chombaaṉcho?
Bi wc̱hogḻizle c̱he beṉ' shi bi chle'ile chone', san cheenin iṉezile nakyeṉ'an nakan kwenc̱he we'le dill' kon ka nakan.
Na'ch baḻ beṉ' Jerusalénka' nagake': ―¿Aaga beenin cheengakile' witgake', lla?
Ḻi wwia ka cho'e dill' ladj lkwe' beṉ', na' ni to kono bi che'. ¿Anti ba chajḻe'lzə beṉ' wṉabia'ka' nan dii ḻi beeni nake' Crístona', beena' wseḻ' Chioza' iṉabi'e, lla?
Cho' ṉezicho ga beṉ' beeni. San kat' yid beena' nak Crístona', ni to kono iṉezi galə za' beena'.
Jesúza' chli' chsedile' beṉ'ka' yoodo'na', na' ka benile' daa wna beṉ'ka' c̱he', na' wṉie' zillj chi'e: ―Chakzile nombia'le nad' na' ṉezile ga beṉ' nad'. Aga zaa tolazz', san zoa beena' bseḻ' nad', beena' chon kon ka chc̱hebe' gone'. Na' le' bi nombia'lene',
san nad' nombi'ane', ḻa' gana' zoen' wzaa, na' ḻen' bseḻee nad'.
Na'ch baḻe' goklall'gake' gox̱'gake'ne', per ni toe' bi bex̱' ḻe', ḻa' biṉ' illin lla illin gor gak c̱he' daa llia bia'.
Na' beṉ' zan wyajḻe'gake' c̱he', na' wnagake': ―Kat' yid beena' nak Crístona', beena' wseḻ' Chioza' iṉabi'e, ¿awli'techle' yeḻ' wak aga ka daa chli' beeni, lla?
Na' fariseoka' bengakile' dillaa daa choe' beṉ'ka' c̱he Jesúza'. Na' ḻegake' len bx̱ozka' chṉabia' bseḻ'gake' beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na' kwenc̱he lljex̱'gake' Jesúza'.
Na' Jesúza' golle': ―Aga sshach soalen' le', na'ch yiyaa gana' zoa beena' bseḻ' nad'.
Na' yiyiljle nad' per aga willelile nad' daa bi gak yidle gana' lljazoa'.
Na'ch beṉ' Israelka' che' ljwellgake': ―¿Garan yiyaj beeni na' bich yillelichone', lla? ¿Anti gana' lle' beṉ' wlall c̱hechoka', beṉ'ka' lle' lall beṉ' zit'kan' shaje' kwenc̱he lljasedile' beṉ' griegoka', lla?
¿Beran zejin daa ne': “Yiyiljle nad', per aga willelile nad' daa bi gak yidle gana' lljazoa'”?
Na' llana' zeelo gok lṉina', llana' nak lla choo lla xen, wzolla' Jesúza' na' wṉie' zillj, chi'e: ―Shi nole chbiḻi, ḻi da yeejle nisa' daa goṉ' le'.
Na' gak kon ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' nan beena' gonḻilallee nad', gak ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena' ka ga chaltit nis yaa nis ban.
Na' daa wna Jesúza' ka', zejin soa Espíritu c̱he Chioza' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beena' gonḻilall' ḻe'. Ḻa' ka gora' biṉ' yidsoa Espírituna' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ' daa biṉ' sho' Jesúza' balaaṉna' daa llia bia' sho'e kat' yiyepe' gana' zoa Chioza'.
Na' baḻ beṉ'ka' bengakile' daa wna Jesúza' na' wnagake': ―Dii ḻi beeni nake' beena' llia bia' yid kwenc̱he c̱hix̱ji'e daa che' Chioza'ne'.
Na' zi baḻe' che'gake': ―Beenikzan' Crístona', beena' chbezcho wseḻ' Chioza' iṉabi'e. Na' zi baḻe' che'gake': ―¿Achakile ladj beṉ' Galileaka' ichej beena' wseḻ' Chioza' iṉabi'e?
Cho'a xtill' Chioza' nan lo dia c̱he dii Davina' galj beena' nak Crístona', na' gake' beṉ' yell Belén ka dii Davina'.
Ka' gok, gokgake' c̱hop shoṉ kwenlə ni c̱he Jesúza'.
Baḻe' goklall'gake' gox̱'gake'ne', per ni toe' bi biyaxji.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na' billingake' gana' zoa fariseoka' len bx̱ozka' chṉabia'. Na'ch che'gake' ḻegake': ―¿Bic̱he bi bc̱he'lene'?
Na' beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na' che'gake': ―Ni to konoṉ' we' dill' ka dillaa choe' beena'.
Na'ch che' fariseoka': ―¿Aḻekzka' lenle ba wxiyee?
Ni to beṉ' wṉabia' c̱hechoka', ni neto' fariseo bi chajḻe'nto' c̱he'.
Per beṉ'ki bi nombia'gake' leya', ba wlliayi'gake'.
Na' farisewa' le Nicodemo, beena' wyaj lao Jesúza' waḻ-lə, chi'e ḻegake':
―Ley c̱hechona' nan aga wak wc̱hoglocho c̱he to beṉ' iṉacho chone' mal shi biṉ' wzenagcho dillaa wi'e kwenc̱he iṉezicho bin chone'. ¿Anti aga kan' nakan?
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Aḻekzka' beṉ' Galilea li'? Bsed kwenc̱he iṉezilo' ni to beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne' biṉ' ichej gana' mbani Galileana'.
Na'ch billeshgake' ziyaj lill c̱he c̱hegake'.
Na' Jesúza' wyaje' lo Yaa Olívoza'.
Na' betiyo ka wyeeni' wizaje' yoodo'na'. Na' beṉ' zan inlleb wbig' kwite'na', na' wchi'e wzoloe' bli' bsedile' ḻegake'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya' len fariseoka' nc̱he'gake' to noolə bidoḻ'lene' to beṉ' byo, na' bzegake'ne' ladj beṉ'ka' lle' na'.
Na' che'gake' Jesúza': ―Maestro, ba bidoḻinto' nooli kon to beṉ' byo.
Na' ṉezinto' leya' daa bzej dii Moiséza' nan chiyaḻ' witcho noolka' chon ka' kon yaj. ¿Shera li', bi ka iṉo'?
Che'gake'ne' ka' kwenc̱hez kwejgake'ne' dill' ga si' sengake' na' gaogake' xya c̱he'. Na'ch Jesúza' bchekee bzeje' lo yona' kon xbene'na'.
Na' daa zeyidgake' chṉabgakile'ne', na' bibe'shawee chi'e ḻegake': ―Beena' bibi saaxya c̱he' de, wak soloe' wtakwe'ne' yaja'.
Na'ch bizchekee chizzeje' lo yona'.
Na' ka goll Jesúza' ḻegake' ka', na' biza' twej tweje', wzolozan beṉ' golka' na'tech beṉ' xkwid'ka', na' stoz noola' bgaaṉlene' Jesúza'.
Na' bibe'shao' Jesúza' dii yoblə, na' chi'ene': ―Noolə, ¿garaṉ beṉ'ka' chao xya c̱ho'? ¿Ani toe' bibi beni li'?
Na' che' noola'ne': ―Ni toe', beṉ'do'. Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Ni nad' bibi gonid' li'. Biyaj, na' bich wx̱iṉj wḻeno'.
Na'ch Jesúza' bizoloe' choe'lene' beṉ'ka' lle' na' dill', chi'e: ―Nad' nak' beeni' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni. Beena' gone' nad' txen bich soe' lo yel c̱hoḻ c̱he dii mala', san ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena' gape' beeni' daa nsa' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi.
Na'ch che' fariseoka'ne': ―Li' choe'zo' xtill' kwino', na' daa choe' xtill' kwino' bi nakan dii shajḻe'cho.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻa'kzi choa' dill' c̱he kwin', ṉezid' nakan dill' ḻi, ḻa' ṉezid' gan zaa na' gan yiyaa. San le', aga ṉezile gan zaa, ni bi ṉezile gan yiyaa.
Le' chc̱hoglole c̱he beṉ' ḻega beṉ' yell-lio. San nad' bi chc̱hogloa' c̱he beṉ'.
Per shi nad' wc̱hogloa' c̱he beṉ', kon ka nakannan' wc̱hogloa'n, ḻa' aga tobia'lozaan chc̱hogloa'n, san X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', naknto' txen chc̱hoglonto' c̱he beṉ'.
Ley c̱helena' nan shi c̱hop beṉ' toz ka chitiḻi xtilleeka' chiyaḻ' shajḻe'cho c̱hegake'.
Na' nak c̱hopnto', nad' cho'a dill' c̱he kwin', na' ḻekzka' X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', cho'e dill' c̱ha'.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Garan zoa X̱o'na'? Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ni nad' ni X̱a'na' bi nombia'le. Ḻa' sheḻ' nombia'le nad', ḻekzka' nombia'le X̱a'na', sheḻ'ka'.
Jesúza' bi'e dill'ki shlak bli' bsedile' beṉ' latja' gana' chi' daa chgoogake' mech c̱he yoodo'na', per ni to kono bex̱' ḻe' daa biṉ' illin lla biṉ' illin gor gak c̱he' daa llia bia'.
Na'ch Jesúza' wizi'e ḻegake': ―Nad' yiyaa, na' yiyiljle nad', na' gana' yiyaa aga wak sa'le, ḻa' lao saaxya c̱heleka' guetle.
Na'ch beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' che' ljwellgake': ―¿Acheenile' yiyit kwinen', lla? ¿Adaan naze': “Gana' yiyaa bi gak sa'le”?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Le' nakle beṉ' yell-lio, na' nad' zaa yabana'. Le' chonle ḻega beṉ' yell-lio, san nad' bi chon' ka le' beṉ' yell-lio.
Daan nia' le', guetle lao saaxya c̱heleka'. Ḻa' shi bi chajḻe'le nadaan nak' beena' ba wnia' nak', na' guetle lao saaxya c̱heleka'.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Norakzə li', shka'? Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Nadaan nak' beena' ba wṉiakz' le' dii nechte.
Dii zan dii gak iṉia' dii gaogakan xya c̱hele. Per beena' bseḻ' nad' cho'e dill' ḻi, na' daa wne' nad' ḻennan' choe'len' beṉ' yell-lioni dill'.
Na' ḻegake' aga wyajni'gakile' shi xtill' X̱e'nan' choe'lene' ḻegake'.
Na' daan chi'e ḻegake': ―Kat' ba bda'le nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, to ḻee yag, kana'chan gakbe'ile nak' beena' ba wnia' nak'. Na' gakbe'ile aga ga de to dii ben' to bia'loz', san kon daa bsedi X̱a'na' nad', ḻennan' cho'a dill'.
Ḻa' X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', ḻekzen' zoalene' nad'. Bi chbej yic̱hje' nad', ḻa' toshiizi chon' ka chazlallee.
Na' ka biyoll be' Jesúza' dill'ka', beṉ' zan benḻilall'gake'ne'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' beṉ' Israelka' ba chajḻe' c̱he': ―Shi le' soac̱hec̱hle gonle ka ba wnia', dii ḻi txenan ba nakle nad', shi ṉaa.
Na' gombia'le dill' ḻi c̱ha'na', na' kat' ba nombia'len, gakle ka to beṉ' ba biyell bila' lao daa ntakw nc̱hejan ḻe'.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―Neto' naknto' xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Abrahama' na' ax̱t ṉaanlla aga noṉ' iṉabia' neto' kwenc̱he gonznto' kon daa iṉe'. ¿Berac̱he nazo' yiyell yila'nto'?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', nottez beena' chon dii mala' nake' ka beṉ' ndoo lawinna' daa chṉabi'an ḻe'.
To wen llin aga toshiizi soe' lill x̱ane'na', san xiiṉ x̱an llinna', toshiizi soe' lill x̱e'na'.
Na' shi nad', Xiiṉ Chios, yisell yiḻaa le' lawi dii mala', dii ḻi wiyell wila'le lawinna'.
Ṉezkzid' nakle xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Abrahama', per cheenile witle nad' daa bi chleble cho'a xtillaani.
Nad' cho'a dill' c̱he daa ba ble'id' gana' zoa X̱a'na', na' le', chonle ka na x̱alena'.
Na' che'gake'ne': ―Xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Abrahama' neto'. Na' Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―Sheḻ' nakle dowalj xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Abrahama', kon ka ben dii Abrahama' chonle, sheḻ'ka'.
Ḻa'kzi ba wnia' le' dill' ḻi daa wna Chioza' nad', kon cheenkzile witle nad'. Dii Abrahama' agaga bene' ka chonle.
Le' chonle kon ka chon x̱alena'. Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―Aga naknto' ka to beṉ' bi wyoo x̱ayin. Toz Chioza' nake' X̱anto'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Sheḻ' lekzile Chioza' nake' X̱ale, wakile nad' sheḻ'ka', ḻa' kwite'nan' wzaa. Aga tobia'lozaan bid', san Chiozan' bseḻee nad'.
Na' aga chajniile diika' nia' le' daa bi cheenile wzenagle dill'ka' cho'a.
Dii x̱iwaan nak x̱ale na' chibaile chonle daa chaklalliin. Ḻa' kana'te dii x̱iwaa nakan to wen xya, na' ni shlin biṉ' gonan daa nak shḻi, ni bi choe'n dill' ḻi. Kat' chziye'n chonan kon ka nan ḻoo lall'do'inna', ḻa' nakan ḻiizelozi dii wxiye' na' nakten x̱an yeḻ' wxiye'na'.
Na' nad', daa cho'a dill' ḻina' aga chajḻe'le c̱ha'.
Ni tole bi gak wli'le shi de saaxya c̱ha'. Na' shi cho'a dill' ḻi, ¿berac̱he bi chajḻe'le c̱ha'?
Beena' nak xiiṉ Chioza' chzenague' xtilleena'. Na' le', bi chzenaglen daa bi nakle xiiṉe'.
Na'ch beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' che'gake'ne': ―¡Aga naznto' nanto' nako' beṉ' Samaria na' yootio' to dii x̱iw'!
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Aga no dii x̱iw' yo'a, san X̱a'nan' chgwaa balaaṉ, per le', chṉit chdele nad'.
Aga chyilj' koo beṉ' nad' balaaṉ. San zoa beena' cheeni sho'a balaaṉ, na' ḻen' chc̱hogloe' c̱he beṉ' kon ka nakan.
Dii ḻi nia' le', beena' chon ka nia', ibane' zejḻi kaṉi.
Na'ch beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' che'gake'ne': ―Ṉaach ba wṉezinto' dii x̱iw'kzan yoo. Dii x̱ozxto'cho Abrahama' wite' na' ḻekzka' yog' beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' kani'yi. Na' li' ṉaa, nazo': “Beena' chzenag c̱ha' ibane' zejḻi kaṉi.”
¿Achakilo' zak'cho' aga ka dii x̱ozxto'cho Abrahama'? Ḻe' wite' na' ka'kzə dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' kani'yi. ¿Noraka chakzi kwino'?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Sheḻ' nadaan chgwaa kwin' balaaṉ aga bi zakiin, sheḻ'ka'. Per X̱a'na', beena' nale nake' Chios c̱hele, ḻen' chgwee nad' balaaṉ.
Ḻa'kzi bi nombia'lene', nad' nombi'ane'. Sheḻ'ka' nia' bi nombi'ane', na' nak' ka le' beṉ' wxiye'. Per nombi'ane' na' chon' ka ne'.
Dii x̱ozxto'cho Abrahama' bibaile' daa wṉezile' ile'ile' llaki zoa' yell-lioni. Na' ba ble'ile'n na' bibaile'.
