Na'ch beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' che'gake'ne': ―Ni shiyon yiz biṉ' gakilo' na' nazo' zle'ilo' dii Abrahama'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le', kana' zi' galjte dii Abrahama', bakz zoa' nad'.
Na'ch lii wdoyotegake' yaja' nan wtakwgake'ne'n, per lii bkwash'tie' na' bizee gana' zoa yoodo'na'. Na' ni bi gokbe'gakile' bidie' ladje'ka' ziyaje'.
Ka zej Jesúza' na' ble'ile' to beṉ' byo beṉ' golje' nc̱hoḻe'.
Na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen che'gake'ne': ―Maestro, ¿berac̱he golj beeni nc̱hoḻe', lla? ¿Anc̱hoḻe' ni c̱he saaxya c̱he'na', anti ni c̱he saaxya c̱he x̱axṉeekan', lla?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Aga ni c̱he saaxya c̱he'nan' ni aga ni c̱he saaxya c̱he x̱axṉeekan', san kwenc̱he wli'lawi yeḻ' wak c̱he Chioza' lo yeḻ' mban c̱he'nan' nake' ka'.
Shlak ṉaa ni de latj, chiyaḻ' goncho xshin beena' bseḻ' nad'. Ḻa' wllin lla kat' kochno bi gak gon.
Shlak ni zoa' yell-lioni nak' beeni' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni.
Na' ka biyoll wna Jesúza' ka', na'ch blle' x̱eneena' lo yona' na' bene' lat' beṉj kon x̱eneena', na'ch wdebe'n jalao beṉ' lc̱hoḻa'.
Na' chi'ene': ―Wyaj jadib jalawo'na' cho'a tanga' daa le Siloé ―na' Siloé zejin Beṉ' Nseḻee. Na'ch wyaj beṉ' lc̱hoḻa' jadib jalawe'na', na' ka bizee na', ba chle'ile'.
Na'ch beṉ' wlill c̱he'ka' na' beṉ'ka' ble'gakile'ne' kana' nc̱hoḻe' che'gake': ―¿Aaga beenin chbi'e chṉabe' mecha'?
Na' baḻe' che': ―Awe, ḻen'. Na' zi baḻe' che': ―Aga ḻen', per ka'tekzə nake'. Na' beena' chi'e: ―Nad'kzan'.
Na'ch wṉabgakile'ne': ―¿Nakra gok ba chle'ilo'?
Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―To beṉ' le Jesús bene' beṉja' na' wdebe'n jalaw'ki na'ch wne' nad': “Wyaj gana' llia tanga' daa le Siloé na' jadib jalawo'na'.” Na'ch wyaa na' ka biyiba'n, na' gok ble'id'.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Garaṉ beena' no' ka'? Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Bi ṉezid'.
Na'ch jwa'gake' beena' gok beṉ' lc̱hoḻ lao fariseoka'.
Na' llana' wdeb Jesúza' beṉja' jalao beena' kwenc̱he ble'ile' nakan lla chombaaṉgake'.
Na'ch fariseoka' ḻekzka' wṉabgakile'ne' nak gok chle'ile'. Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Beena' biyone' nad' wdebe' beṉja' jalaw'ki, na' ka biyiba'n gok ble'id'.
Na'ch baḻ fariseoka' che'gake': ―Aga Chiozan' bseḻee beena', ḻa' chone' daa bi chiyaḻ' goncho llani chombaaṉcho. Na' zi baḻe' che'gake': ―¿Nakra gon to beṉ' saaxya gone' yeḻ' wak ka diiki chon beeni? Na'ch gokgake' c̱hoplə.
Na'ch dii yoblə gollgake' beena' gok beṉ' lc̱hoḻ: ―¿Shera li'? ¿Bi iṉo' c̱he beena' ben ka chle'ilo'? Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Nad' nia' nake' to beṉ' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne'.
Na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' bi wyajḻe'gake' shi dii ḻi gok beena' beṉ' lc̱hoḻ na' ṉaa ba chle'ile'. Na'ch goxgake' x̱axṉeena',
na' wṉabgakile' ḻegake': ―¿Abeenin xiiṉlena', beena' nale nc̱hoḻe' ka golje'? Na' ¿nakra gok ba chle'ile' ṉaa, shka'?
Na' x̱axṉeena' billiigake' xtilleeka': ―Ṉezinto' beenin xiiṉnto'na' na' golje' nc̱hoḻe'.
Per aga ṉezinto' nak gok chle'ile' ṉaa, ni bi ṉezinto' non biyon ḻe'. Ḻi iṉabile', ḻa' aga nake' bi'do' iṉacho bi gak iṉe' non biyon ḻe'.
Goll x̱axṉeena' ka' daa chllebgake' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka', ḻa' ba bgaaṉgake' dill' nottezə beṉ' iṉe' Jesúza' nake' Crístona' bi wlebgake'ne' gana' chdop chllaggake' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza'.
Daan golltezə x̱axṉeena': “Ḻi iṉabile', ḻa' aga nake' bi'do' iṉacho bi gak iṉe' non biyon ḻe'.”
Na'ch dii yoblə goxgake' beena' gok beṉ' lc̱hoḻ, che'gake'ne': ―Bzoashki Chioza' de tasc̱hiw shi leilo' choo dill' ḻi, ḻa' ṉezinto' beena' biyon li' nake' beṉ' saaxya.
Na'ch golle' ḻegake': ―Bi ṉezid' shi nak beena' beṉ' saaxya. Ḻete dii ṉezid', golj' nc̱hoḻ' na' ṉaa ba chle'id'.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―¿Beran benile' li'? ¿Nak bene' kwenc̱he chle'ilo'?
Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Ba wniakz' le', na' bi chzi'le cho'a xtillaana'. ¿Bic̱he cheenzile iṉia'n dii yoblə? ¿Anti ḻekzka' lenle ba cheenile gonlene' txen?
Na'ch wṉegake'ne' zibia', che'gake'ne': ―Lin' nako' beena' txen, san neto' Moisézan' naknto' txen.
Ṉezinto' Chioza' wṉie' Moiséza', san beena', ni bi ṉezinto' ga zee.
Na'ch beena' gok beṉ' lc̱hoḻ chi'e ḻegake': ―¡Nakkzan dii yibanicho daa bi ṉezile ga za' beena' na' ba bene' ka chle'id'!
Ṉezkzicho aga chzenag Chioza' c̱he beṉ' saaxyaka', san chzenague' c̱he beṉ'ka' choe'la'ogake'ne' na' chongake' daa chazlallee.
Dezd ka wxe wzil yell-lioni biṉ' yenicho shi zoa beṉ' chak chone' ka chle'i to beṉ' golje' nc̱hoḻe'.
Sheḻ' beeni bi nake' to beṉ' bseḻ' Chioza', ni to yeḻ' wak bi gak gone', sheḻ'ka'.
Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―Dezd ka goljo' nako' beṉ' saaxya. ¿Ana' chakilo' wli' wsedilo' neto'? Na'ch bibejgake'ne' ladje'ka'.
Na' wṉezi Jesúza' bibej fariseoka' beena' gok beṉ' lc̱hoḻ ladje'ka', na' ka billague'ne' na'ch chi'ene': ―¿Achonḻilalloo Beena' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni?
Na' beena' chi'ene': ―Beṉ'do', wnashki nad' nora beena' kwenc̱he gonḻilallaane'.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Ba ble'kzilo'ne', na' ḻekzen' chshaljleno' ṉaa.
Na'ch lii bc̱hek'te xibe'na' lao Jesúza', na' chi'ene': ―Chonḻilallaa li', X̱an' ―na'ch be'laweene'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza': ―Ba bid' yell-lioni kwenc̱he wc̱hogloa' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni. Zaa kwenc̱he beṉ'ka' nak ka beṉ' lc̱hoḻ ile'gakile', na' beṉ'ka' chakgakile' chle'gakile' yiyakgake' ka beṉ' lc̱hoḻ.
Na'ch baḻ fariseoka' lle' na', ka bengakile' chi'e ka', che'gake'ne': ―¿Achakilo' lennton' naknto' beṉ' lc̱hoḻ?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Sheḻ' nakle beṉ' lc̱hoḻ, aga bi xtoḻ'le de, sheḻ'ka'. Per daa nale chle'ile, daan de xtoḻ'le.
’Dii ḻi nia' le', beena' bi choo cho'a leej c̱he xil'ka' san chiyiljlallee cho'e gan yoblə, beenan' beṉ' wbanna'.
San beena' choo cho'a leeja', ḻen' ngoo lall' nee chape' ḻegakb.
Na' beena' chap cho'a leej c̱hebka' chsalje'n kwenc̱he cho'e, na' xil'ka' lii chiyombia'tegakb shi'ena'. Na' cho'e le to tob na' chbeje' ḻegakb ḻoo leej c̱hebka'.
Na' chde chbeje' yog' xil' c̱he'na' na'ch chbialoe' laobka'. Na' xil'ka' xochi chjanogakb ḻe' daa nombia'gakb shi'ena'.
Aga willjanogakb beṉ' yoblə, san wxoṉjdogakib ḻe' daa bi nombia'gakb shi'ena'.
Bzoa Jesúza' jempli kwenc̱he bzajniile' beṉ'ka'. Per ḻegake' aga wyajni'gakile' bin zeji daa golle' ḻegake'.
Na'ch chize' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Dii ḻi nia' le': Nad' nak' ka cho'a leej c̱he xil'ka'.
Yog' beṉ'ka' bid kana' biṉ' yid', nakgake' ka beṉ' wban. Na' beṉ'ka' nia' nakgake' xil' c̱ha' bi bzenaggake' c̱hegake'.
Nad' nak' ka cho'a leej c̱he xil'ka', na' beena' gonḻilallee nad' bi kwiayee, san gake' ka xilaa, bana' mbalaz choob na' chchejb cho'a leej c̱heba' na' chllelib dii cheej chaob.
’Ka nak wbanna', za'ze' kwenc̱he kwane' na' wite' na' wlliayee ḻegake'. San nad', zaa kwenc̱he wi'a to yeḻ' mban shao' c̱hegake', na' soagake' mbalaz.
Nad' nak' ka to beṉ' chapshi'e xil' c̱he'na', beena' ax̱t chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' ni c̱he xil'do'ka' nape'.
San beena' chap xil'ka' ni c̱he mba laxje'na', ka chle'ile' ba za' to ba zṉia gaob xil'ka', lii chchooṉlall'tie'gakb na' chxoṉje' daa bi nakgakb ba c̱he'. Na'ch chllin ba zṉiana' chox̱'b xil'ka' na' chsheshlesb ḻegakb.
Beena' chzi' laxje'na' chxoṉjtezile' xil'ka', ḻa' daa ikaaz laxje'nan' chibaile', na' bi chakile' ḻegakb.
’Nad' nak' ka to beṉ' chapshi' xil'do'. Na' beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' nad' nakgake' ka xil'do' c̱ha'. Nad' nombi'a ḻegake' na' ḻegake' ḻekzka' nombia'gake' nad'.
Ka chak c̱he X̱a'na' nombi'e nad', na' nad' nombi'ane', ka'kzan nad' nombi'a ḻegake', na' chzanid' yeḻ' mban c̱ha'ni ni c̱hegake'.
Na' ḻekzka' zoach beṉ' yoblə, beṉ' zi' gonḻilall' nad', na' ḻekzka' nakgake' ka xil' c̱ha', per biṉ' gakgake' txen xil' c̱ha'ka'. Na' chiyaḻ' gaxgakee kwenc̱he wzenaggake' c̱ha', na' yog'gake' gakgake' tozə, na' toz nad' gak lall' na'gake'.
’Chaki X̱a'na' nad' daa chzanid' yeḻ' mban c̱ha'ni witgake' nad', na'tech yiban' sto shii.
Ni to kono yikaa yeḻ' mban c̱ha'ni, san kwinkza'n wi'an. Nap' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he wi'a yeḻ' mban c̱ha'ni witgake' nad', na' ḻekzka' nap' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he yiban'. Ḻa' kan' nllia X̱a'na' bia' gon'.
Na'ch dii yoblə beṉ' Israelka' lle' na' gokgake' c̱hoplə ka bengakile' daa wne'.
Zane' che'gake': ―¿Bic̱he chzenagzle c̱he beena'? Dii x̱iwaan yo'e, na' chaktonte'n.
Na' zi baḻe' che'gake': ―Aga choe' beeni dill' ka beṉ' yoo dii x̱iw', ḻa' aga bi yeḻ' wak nap dii x̱iwaa yiyonan to beṉ' lc̱hoḻ.
Na' do kana', goḻ' lṉina' Jerusalénna' daa chisa'lall'gake' llana' bengake' lall' na' Chioza' yoodo'na', na' nak beo' zag.
Na' chda Jesúza' ḻoo koridor c̱he dii Salomónna' daa ze kwit yoodo'na'.
Na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' wyec̱hjyobgake'ne', che'gake'ne': ―¿Ax̱t batrakzə yikwaso' yeḻ' chakc̱hoplall' c̱hento'ni? Shi li'kzan Crístona', beena' chbeznto' wseḻ' Chioza', lla wnatega neto' kwenc̱he iṉezinto'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ba wniakz' le' kan', na' bi chajḻe'le. Yeḻ' wakka' chon', chonlena'n yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he X̱a'na', na' chli'n nan ḻen' bseḻee nad'.
Na' le', bi chajḻe'le daa bi nakle txen beṉ'ka' nia' nakgake' xil' c̱ha'.
Nombi'a beṉ'ka' nia' nakgake' xil' c̱ha', na' ḻegake' chzenaggake' xtillaana' na' nogake' nad'.
Na' cho'a ḻegake' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi, na' bi kwiayi'gake'. Na' ni to kono gak yibej ḻegake' lo ṉi'a na'ni.
X̱a'na' ba bene' ḻegake' lall' na' gapshiigakee, na' ḻen' chṉabia'che' lao nottez. Na' ni to kono gak yikwas ḻegake' lo ṉi'a neena'.
Ka X̱a'na'kz, nad'.
Na'ch beṉ' Israelka' bizgoyogake' yaja' kwenc̱he nan wtakwgake'n Jesúza'.
Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Dii zan dii wen ba ble'ile chonlen' yeḻ' wak c̱he X̱a'na'. Na' ¿nonnan' bi choolall'le daa cheenile' wtakwle nad' yaja'?
Na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' che'gake'ne': ―Aga ni c̱he dii wenka' ba benon' cheeninto' wtakwnto' li' yaja', san daa chonz kwino' ka Chiozan', ḻa' beṉ'zə li'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ley c̱helena' nan, Chioza' ne': “Nad' wnia' le' nakle chios.”
Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' toshiizi nakan ka wne', na' shi cho'en dill' bsi'e “chios” beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee xtilleena',
¿bic̱he nazle nad' chṉia' c̱he X̱acho Chioza' daa nia' nak' Xiiṉe', len ḻen' wleje' nad' na' bseḻee nad' yell-lioni?
Shi bi chon' ka chon X̱a'na', aga wyajḻe'le c̱ha'.
Na' shi chle'ile chon' ka diika' chon X̱a'na', ḻi shajḻe' c̱he diika' chon', ḻa'kzi bi cheenile shajḻe'le c̱ha', kwenc̱he iṉezyeṉ'ile X̱a'na' zoalene' nad' na' nad' zoalenee.
Na'ch dii yoblə goklall'gake' gox̱'gake'ne' na' bene' gan bile' lawe'ka'.
Na'ch bizyaj Jesúza' dii yoblə shḻaa yao Jordánna' jazoe' latja' gana' bchoa Juanna' beṉ'ka' nisa' kana'.
Na' beṉ' zan wyajgake' gana' zoe' na' che'gake': ―Ḻa'kzi bibi yeḻ' wak bli' Juanna', yog' diika' wne' c̱he beeni nakan dii ḻi.
Na' beṉ' zan wyajle'gake' c̱he Jesúza' na'.
Yell Betániana' wzoa to beṉ' bi shao' wlie' Lázaro, na' ḻekzka' na' wzoa beṉ' zane'ka' Maríana' len Mártana'.
Maríana', beṉ' zan Lázarona', ḻen' bwazje' set zix̱a' ṉi'a X̱ancho Jesúza' na' bisbillile'n yish' yic̱hje'na'.
Na' c̱hop bilte beṉ' zan Lázarona' bseḻ'gake' rson lao Jesúza' che'gake'ne': ―X̱an', bi shao' beṉ' zannto'ni, beeni nllaguilo'.
Na' ka beni Jesúza' rsonna', chi'e: ―Bi guetile' yillwe'na', san chak c̱he ka' kwenc̱he sho' Chioza' balaaṉ, na' ḻekzka' nad', nak' Xiiṉe', sho'a balaaṉ.
Ḻa'kzi Jesúza' chakchgaile' Mártana', na' beṉ' bile'na' na' Lázarona',
ka benile' rson bi shao' Lázarona', wllachile' zi c̱hop lla gana' zoe'.
Na' ka wde, chi'e beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―Ḻi sho' Judeana' sto shii.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen che'gake'ne': ―Maestro, kani batchgana' goklallii beṉ' Israelka' lle' na' witgake' li' kon yaja'. ¿Ana' cheenilo' yizajo' na'?
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Aaga shlliṉ goran' de beeni'na' shlla? Na' beena' chda tellalə aga willjac̱hewee daa de beeni'na' yell-lioni.
San shi chde' waḻ-lə, willjac̱hewee daa bi nḻa'.
Na'tech golle' ḻegake': ―Ba ches Lázarona', beena' nllaguicho, na' sha' lljasbanee.
Na'ch che' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―X̱an', shi ba chese', wiyakshao'lall'kzile'.
Jesúza' golle' ka' daa ṉezile' ba wit Lázarona', na' ḻegake' chakgakile' daa cheszen' golle' ka'.
Na'ch be'len Jesúza' ḻegake' dill' ka to shajni'gakile', chi'e: ―Ba wit Lázarona'.
Na' chibaid' bi wzoa', ḻa' chyalljch gon' ka shajḻe'chle c̱ha'. Ḻi sho' shajcho gana' die'.
Na'ch Tomáza', beena' che'gake' Dídimo, chi'e beṉ'ka' sto: ―Ḻi sho'lene' kwenc̱he lencho guetlenchone' shi witgake'ne'.
Na' ka bllingake' yella', na' che'gake'ne' ba gok tap lla bgash' Lázarona'.
Na' Betániana' llian gaozə Jerusalénna', ka do shoṉ kilómetro nḻaagakan.
Na' beṉ' zan beṉ' Israelka' lle' Jerusalénna' wyajgake' jenxenlall'gake' Mártana' len Maríana' daa wit beṉ' zane'ka'.
Na' ka wṉezi Mártana' ba zoa illin Jesúza', na'ch jatiḻe'ne', per Maríana' bigaaṉe' lille'ka'.
Na' ka blline' kwite'na', chi'ene': ―X̱an', sheḻ' zo' ni kana' wḻen yillwe' c̱he beṉ' zan'na' bi wite', sheḻ'ka'.
Na' ṉaa ḻa'kzi ba wite', ṉezid' goṉ Chioza' bittezə dii iṉabilo'ne'.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Wiban beṉ' zano'na'.
Na'ch che' Mártana': ―Awe, ṉezid' wibane' kat' yiban beṉ' wetka' llana' te c̱he yell-lioni.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Nad' chon' ka chiban beṉ' wetka' na' nap' yeḻ' mban dii bi te c̱heyin. Beena' chonḻilallee nad', ḻa'kzi ba wite', wibanchkze'.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' mban na' chonḻilall'gake' nad' bi guetgake' toshiizi. ¿Achajḻi'o dga nia' li'?
Na' che' Mártana'ne': ―Awe, X̱an', chajḻi'a lin' nako' Crístona', na' lin' Xiiṉ Chioza', beena' llia bia' yid yell-lioni.
Na' biyoll wna Mártana' ka', na'ch ziyaje' zjaṉie' beṉ' bile' Maríana', na' chi'ene' xochizi: ―Ba bid Maestrona' chṉie' li'.
Na' kon ka golle' Maríana' ka', lii wzolla'tie' jawie' Jesúza'.
Bilaṉ' sho' Jesúza' yella', ni zetie' gana' jatiḻ Mártana'ne'.
Na' beṉ' Israelka', beṉ'ka' chonxenlall'gake' Maríana' lille'na', ka ble'gakile' wzollee na' zejdoe', na'ch zjanogake'ne' chakgakile' lljc̱helle' cho'a banan'.
Na' ka bllin Maríana' kwit Jesúza', lii bc̱hek'te xibe'na' lawe'na' chi'ene': ―X̱an', sheḻ' zoasho' ni, bi wit beṉ' zan'na', sheḻ'ka'.
Na' ka ble'i Jesúza' chbell Maríana', na' ka'kzə beṉ'ka' zejlengake'ne', na' to dii wal inlleb gokile'.
Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Gara jakwash'lene'? Na'ch che'gake'ne': ―Sho' lljawiacho gana' die', X̱an'.
Na' wchell Jesúza'.
Na'ch che' ljwell beṉ' Israelka' lle' na': ―Ḻi wwia ka gokchgaile'ne'.
Na'ch baḻe' che'gake': ―Beeni bene' ka ble'i beṉ' lc̱hoḻa', ¿Aaga zak bisle' Lázarona', na' bi wite' sheḻ'ka', lla?
Na'ch Jesúza' wizakile' dii wal ka bllingake' cho'a bana'. Na' bana' nakan to blej, na' chi' to yaj nkwasha'n cho'ayinna'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza': ―Ḻi yikwas yaja' ka'lə. Na' Mártana', beṉ' zan beṉ' weta', chi'ene': ―X̱an', ba chḻa' beena' zban, ḻa' ba gok tap lla wite'.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―¿Aaga ba wnia' li' shi shajḻi'o, na' ile'ilo' yeḻ' wak choo yeḻ' wak xen c̱he Chioza'?
Na'ch bikwasgake' yaja' cho'a bana' gana' die'. Na' bḻis jalao Jesúza' yabana', na' chi'e: ―X̱a, chox̱keno' ba bzenago' c̱ha'.
Ṉezid' toshiizi chzenago' c̱ha', per chṉia' li' kwenc̱he shajḻe' beṉ'ki lle' ni nan lin' bseḻoo nad'.
Na' ka biyoll wne' ka', na'ch wṉie' zillj, chi'e: ―¡Lázaro, bichej na'!
Na' lii bichejte Lázarona' ndob ṉi'a neena' lech'ka', na' cho'alawe'na' ndoban to lech'. Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi yizeshe' lechaa na' ḻi yisane' yiyaje'.
Na' zan beṉ' Israelka', beṉ'ka' jen Maríana' txen daa wit beṉ' zane'na', ble'gakile' ka ben Jesúza' na' benḻilall'gake'ne'.
Per baḻe' wyaj lao fariseoka' na' jellgake' ḻegake' ka ben Jesúza'.
Na'ch bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' fariseoka' bitopgake' yog' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka', na' che'gake': ―¿Nakraz ka gonchon, lla? Ḻa' zan yeḻ' wak chli' beeni.
Na' shi iṉacho jwayi beena', yog'z beṉ' gonḻilall'gake'ne' na'ch yid beṉ' Rómaka' na' wlliayi'gake' yoodo' c̱hechoni len yell c̱hechoni.
Na' len to beṉ' le' Caifás, nake' bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xen ka lo yiza'. Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Bi ṉezzilen,
ni bi chakbe'ile wenlan toz beṉ' guet ni c̱he beṉ' wlall c̱hechoka', aga ka daa kwiayi' doxen lallchoni.
Na' aga kon ka wnaz Caifáza' kan', san daa nake' bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xen lo yizan', ben Chioza' ka bi'e dill' guet Jesúza' ni c̱he beṉ' Israelka'.
Na' aga ni c̱he toz beṉ' Israelkan' guet Jesúza', san ḻekzka' ni c̱he yog' beṉ'ka' ba wleje' gakgake' xiiṉe' doxen yell-lionin, kwenc̱he gakgake' toz.
Na' daa goll Caifáza' ka', lo llana' wzolo bengake' toz dill' kwenc̱he witgake' Jesúza'.
Na' daa wzolo chongake' ka', aga wdatekch Jesúza' ladj beṉ' Israelka', san wzee wyaje' to yell dii le Efraín, daa llia gaozə latja' gana' bibi chashj chḻeb, na' na'z wzoe' len beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen.
Na' ba zoa gao gaḻ' lṉi Paskw c̱he beṉ' Israelka', na' beṉ' zan beṉ' yell yoblə wyajgake' Jerusalénna' ka zi' gaḻ' lṉina' kwenc̱he yixi yiyechgake' ka nllia leya' bia'.
Na' chdagake' chiyiljgake' Jesúza', na' shlak lle'gake' lesh' chyoodo'na', chṉabi ljwelle': ―¿Beraka chakile? ¿Awide' lṉina', lla?
Na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' len fariseoka' bengake' mandad shi no ṉezi ga chda Jesúza' do na' lljellgake' ḻegake' ka' kwenc̱he gox̱'gake'ne'.
Zi' x̱op lla gaḻ' lṉi Paskwa' wyaj Jesúza' yell Betániana', gana' zoa Lázarona', beena' bisbane' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle' Betániana' bsini'agake' to xshe' c̱he Jesúza', na' Mártana' bdie' yeḻ' wawa'. Na' Lázarona' wche'lene' Jesúza' cho'a mesa' na' nochlə beṉ'ka' wdaolengake'ne'.
Na'ch bex̱' Maríana' ka do gashj litr set zix̱a' daa le nardo, daa ḻe zak'chga, na' bwazje'n ṉi'a Jesúza', na' tech bisbillile'n yish' yic̱hje'na'. Na' doxen ḻoo yoona' wche' shii set zix̱a'.
Na' len Jud Scariota', beena' nak Jesúza' txen, beena' gone'ne' lo na' beṉ' malka'. Na' golle':
―¿Berac̱he bi betee set zix̱a' na' wi'e mecha' gaklenan beṉ' yesh'ka', lla? Len ḻa' ka c̱he twiz laxj beṉaan zakaan.
Juda' wne' ka' aga iṉacho daa chiyeshile' beṉ' yesh'kan', san daa nake' to beṉ' wbanan. Ḻa' ḻen' gok lall' nee xmeche'ka' na' chbane' lat' wejan.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Bi wllono' gone' ka'. Ba nzoashao'kze' daa kwenc̱he wgone'n llin kat'ka' wkwash'gake' nad'.
Ka nak beṉ' yesh'ka', toshiizin soakz beṉ'ka' ladjleni, san nad', aga toshiizin soalen' le'.
Na' zan beṉ' Israelka' wṉezgakile' zoa Jesúza' yell Betániana' na' wyajgake' na'. Per aga wyajgake' yella' ni c̱he toz Jesúzan', san ḻekzka' kwenc̱he ile'gakile' Lázarona', beena' bisban Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch bx̱ozka' chṉabia' bengake' toz dill' witgake' len Lázarona'.
Ḻa' daa biban Lázarona' ladj beṉ' wetka', zan beṉ' Israelka' benḻilall'gake' Jesúza' na' bich bzenaggake' c̱he bx̱ozka'.
Na' betiyo beṉ' be beṉ' zil, beṉ'ka' lle' yell Jerusalénna' daa chaḻ' lṉi Paskwa', wṉezgakile' ba ngoo Jesúza' nez yilline' yella'.
Na'ch wyajgake' jḻezgake'ne' nox̱'gake' zinka', na' choe'la'ogake'ne', nagake': ―¡Ḻi we'la'o Chioza'! ¡Gonḻeeyshga X̱ancho Chioza' beeni ba bseḻee iṉabi'e cho' beṉ' Israel!
Na' blleli Jesúza' to burr chbando' na' wllie'b. Na' gok kon ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza', gana' na:
Le' beṉ' yell Jerusalén, bi illeble. Ḻi wwia, ni ba za' beena' iṉabia' le' na' llie' to burr chbando'.
Na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen aga wyajni'gakile' diiki ka lo gora'. Ka bibanch Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka', kana'ch gokbe'gakile' nan Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' daa bzej beṉ'ka' kani'yi choe'n dill' c̱he', na' c̱he diika' bengakile'ne'.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle'len Jesúza' kana' bisbane' Lázarona' ladj beṉ' wetka', beṉ'ka' bengakile' biṉie'ne' kwenc̱he bicheje' ḻoo bana', ḻegaken' be'gake' dill' daa bene'.
Daan beṉ' zan jatiḻgake' Jesúza' daa bengakile' ka nak yeḻ' waka' bene'.
Na'ch fariseoka' che' ljwellgake': ―Ḻi wwia ka ba chak, bibi de goncho. Ḻi wwia, yog'ḻoḻzə beṉ' ba nogake' ḻe'.
Ladj beṉ'ka' wyaj lṉina' Jerusalénna' je'la'ogake' Chioza' na' len baḻ beṉ' griego.
Na' beṉ'ki jabig'gake' gana' ze Felípena', beena' nak beṉ' yell Betsaida daa llia yell-lio daa mbani Galileana', na' che'gake'ne': ―Beṉ'do', cheeninto' we'lennto' Jesúza' dill'.
Na' Felípena' jelle' Andréza' ka', na' c̱hoptie' wyajgake' jellgake' Jesúza' ka'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ba bllin lla, nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, sho'a balaaṉ xenna'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', shi to biṉ c̱he trígona' bi igasha'n ḻoo yona', ka'chokzə kwe'n. Per shi igasha'n ḻoo yona', na' yila'n na' yiyakan dii zan wal.
Beena' ze wṉeyi c̱he yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' yell-lioni, ḻen' kwiayee. San beena' chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' bittezə dii gak c̱he', beenan' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱he' zejḻi kaṉi.
Nottezə beṉ' cheenile' gone' xshin'na' chiyaḻ' gone' nad' txen. Na' gana' soa', na'kzə soe'. Na' beena' gon xshin'na', X̱a'na' kwee ḻe' balaaṉ.
’Ṉaatek chakyeshid' dii wal inlleb. ¿Awṉabid' X̱a'na' yisle' nad' lawi dga wtiḻ', lla? Bi gak gon' ka', ḻa' ni c̱heyi dgayeṉ'kzan bid'.
Na'ch golle': ―X̱a, benshki ka shoo balaaṉ. Na'ch wṉe Chioza' yabana', chi'e: ―Ba ben' kwenc̱he wyo'a balaaṉ, na' ṉaa gon' ka sho'a balaaṉ sto shii.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle' na' bengakile' shii Chioza', na' baḻe' wnagake' wziwa'zan wṉe. Na' zi baḻe' wna to anjlan' ba wṉie' ḻe'.
Na'ch Jesúza' chi'e ḻegake': ―Aga ni c̱ha' nadaan wṉe Chioza', san ni c̱he len'.
Na' ba bllin lla gone' yeḻ' josc̱his c̱he yog' beṉ' lle' yell-lioni, na' ṉaa kweje' dii x̱iwaa daa chṉabia' yell-lioni.
Na' kat'ka' wḻisgake' yaga' cha'lə gana' nda'gake' nad', kanan' gat' latj gonḻilall' nottezə beṉ' nad'.
Na' daa wne' ka', bzajniile' ḻegake' nakan guete'.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle' na' che'gake'ne': ―Ba beninto' chlabgake' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' nan Crístona', beena' wseḻ' Chioza' iṉabi'e, soe' zejḻi kaṉi. Na' ¿bic̱he nazo' Beena' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni wḻisgake'ne' cha'lə wwia beṉ' ḻe' ḻee yaga' gana' dee? ¿Nora Beena' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni no' ka'?
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Nad' nak' beeni' c̱he beṉ' yell-lioni, per zi shlollchga soalen' le'. Ḻi sho' lo nez ḻina' shlak ni de beeni'na' kwenc̱he bi gak c̱hele ka chak c̱he to beṉ' chaḻile' kat' ngwee' nez. Ḻa' beena' chda' gana' shc̱hoḻ bi ṉezile' galan zeje'.
Ḻi gonḻilall' nad' ṉaa shlak ni zoalen' le' kwenc̱he sho' beeni' c̱ha'na' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'. Biyoll wna Jesúza' ka' na'ch bizee jakwashi'le' ḻegake'.
Ḻa'kzi beṉ' Israelka' ble'gakile' yeḻ' wak zan daa ben Jesúza', zangake' bi benḻilall'gake'ne'.
Na' daa bengake' ka', gok ka wna dii Isaíaza', beena' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza'ne' kani'yi, daa wne': X̱an' ¿azoa beṉ' ba wyajḻi'e dillaa chyix̱je'nto'? Na' ¿azoa beṉ' ba gokbe'ile' bli'o yeḻ' wak c̱ho'na'?
Na' bi wyajḻe'gake', ḻa' Chioza' bene' c̱hegake' ka na sto dii bzej dii Isaíaza':
Bene' ḻegake' ka beṉ' lc̱hoḻ na' lall'do' c̱hec̱h kwenc̱he bi gakbe'gakile' bi zejin diika' chle'gakile', ni bi shajni'gakile' diika' chengakile', kwenc̱he ki yiyaj yilengakile' na' yiyone' ḻegake' beṉ' wen.
Wna Isaíaza' ka' daa ble'ile' ka nak balaaṉ xen wala' nap Jesúza', na' bi'e dill' c̱he'.
Na' ḻa'kzi ka', beṉ' zan beṉ' Israelka' lente no beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he'ka' benḻilall'gake' Jesúza'. Per bi be'gake'n dill' daa bllebgake' bich wleb fariseoka' ḻegake' gana' chdop chllaggake' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza',
ḻa' wyoolall'chgake' iṉa beṉ' nakgake' beṉ' wen aga ka daa iṉa Chioza' nakgake' beṉ' wen.
Na'ch wṉe Jesúza' zillj chi'e: ―Nottez beṉ' chonḻilall' nad', aga toz' nadaan chonḻilallee, san len beena' bseḻ' nadaan chonḻilallee.
Na' nottezə beṉ' chle'ile' nad', ḻekzka' chle'ile' beena' bseḻ' nad'.
Zaa yell-lioni kwenc̱he beena' gonḻilallee nad' te' lo beeni' c̱ha'na' na' bich soe' lo yel c̱hoḻa'.
Na' shi no beṉ' chenile' cho'a xtillaani na' bi chone' ka nia', aga nadaan wc̱hogloa' c̱he', ḻa' aga zaa kwenc̱he wc̱hogloa' c̱he beṉ' yell-lionin, san zaa kwenc̱he yislagakee na' bi kwiayi'gake'.
Beena' bi cheenile' gonḻilallee nad' na' bi chzenague' c̱ha', de daa gawan xya c̱he'. Cho'a xtillaana' daa ba bi'a, ḻennan' gawan xya c̱he' kat' illin lla te c̱he yell-lioni.
Ḻa' dillaa daa ba bi'a aga to bia'lozan' wnia' ka'. X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', ḻen' nllie' bia' bin chiyaḻ' iṉia' na' bin chiyaḻ' wli' wsedid' beṉ'.
Na' ṉezid' dill' daa nllia X̱a'na' bia' iṉia' nsa'n yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi. Daan, yog'ḻoḻ diika' nia', nakan kon ka wna X̱a'na' nad'.
Ka ba zoa gaḻ' lṉi Paskwa', na' ṉezi Jesúza' ba zoa gao yizee yell-lioni kwenc̱he yiyaje' kwit X̱e'na'. Na' chakchgaile' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall'gake'ne' yell-lioni, na' ka' gokile' ḻegake' ax̱t ga zeelo.
Na' ka chaogake' xshe'na', ba wloolə dii x̱iwaa ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' Jud Scariota', xiiṉ Simónna', gone' Jesúza' lo na' beṉ' malka'.
Na' ṉezi Jesúza' X̱e'na' bene' lall' nee yog' dii de, na' ṉezile' wzee gana' zoa Chioza' na' kwite'na'kzə yilline' dii yoblə.
Na' lo zej chaogake' xshe'na', wzolla' Jesúza' na' bkwase' xe' dii toṉa' ka'lə, na' bc̱heḻe' to lech' lsineena'.
Na'ch wdee nisa' to ḻoo sha' na' wzoloe' chyibe' ṉi'a to to beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen, na' bisbillile'n lechaa nc̱heje' lsineena'.
Na' ka bidoḻ' c̱hibe' ṉi'a Simón Pédrona', na'ch che' Pédrona'ne': ―X̱an', ¿ali'lə c̱hibzo' ṉi'ani?
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Aga chajniilo' dga chon' ṉaa, per techlə shajniilo'n.
Na'ch che' Pédrona'ne': ―Bat wi'a latj c̱hibo' ṉi'ani. Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Shi bi c̱hib' ṉi'ona', bich gako' nad' txen.
Na'ch chize' Pédrona'ne': ―Shi kan' nakan, X̱an', aga toz ṉi'ani c̱hibo' san ḻen yic̱hji na' na'ki.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Beena' nosh' nazje', toz ṉi'enan' chiyaḻ' shech, ḻa' ba nechkz kwerp c̱he'na'. Ka'kzan le', ba nxi nyechle, ḻa'kzi aga yog'le.
Daa ṉezi Jesúza' non gon ḻe' lo na' beṉ' malka', daan chi'e ḻegake': “Aga yog'le ba nxi nyech.”
Na' ka biyoll wdibe' ṉi'eka', na'ch biyakwe' xe' dii toṉa' na' jachi'e cho'a mesa' sto shii. Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Aṉezile bi zejin dga ba ben'?
Le' nale nad' Maestro na' X̱an', na' lekzile, ḻa' kan' nakan.
Na' shi nad', naktia' Maestro c̱hele na' X̱anle, ba wdib' ṉi'alena', ḻekzka' le' chiyaḻ' c̱hib ṉi'a ljwell-le.
Ba ben' dga kwenc̱he bliid' le' kan' chiyaḻ' gon c̱he ljwell-le.
Dii ḻi nia' le', aga zak'chi to mos ka x̱ane'na', na' to beṉ' zej mandad aga zak'che' ka beena' bseḻeene'.
Shi chajniile diiki ba wnia' na' gonlen, na' soale mbalaz.
’Na' aga yog'len nia' ka'. Ṉezid' nolen ba wlej' kwenc̱he nonḻilall'le nad'. Na' chiyaḻ' gak ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza', gana' na: “Beena' chaolentie' nad' txen ba chiyec̱hje' nad' gone' mal c̱ha'.”
Ṉaa nia' le' dga zi' gak, kwenc̱he kat' ba chakan shajḻe'le nak' beena' ba wnia' nak'.
Na' dii ḻi nia' le', beena' wlebe' nottezə beena' wseḻaa, nad'kzan chlebe'. Na' beena' chlebe' nad', lenkz beena' bseḻ' nadaan chlebe'.
Na' biyoll wna Jesúza' ka', ḻe gokyeshii ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena', na' bi'e dill' kwasḻoḻ, chi'e: ―Dii ḻi nia' le', tole gonle nad' lo na' beṉ' malka'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen chwia ljwellgake' chakgakile' nogaken' chi'e ka'.
Na' to beena' nak Jesúza' txen, beena' chakchgaile', chi'e kwite'na'.
Na' Simón Pédrona' bene' seṉ kwenc̱he iṉabi beena' chi' kwit Jesúza' noen' chi'e ka'.
Na'ch jabig'ch beena' gaoch kwit Jesúza' na' wṉabile'ne', chi'ene': ―¿Noran gon ka', X̱an'?
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Wḻeejch' lat' yetxtili ḻo'i dga yoll ḻoo yeeṉi, na' kon beena' wi'an, ḻen' gon ka'. Na'ch bḻeeje' lat' yetxtila' na' bi'en Jud Scariota', xiiṉ beena' le Simón.
Na' kon ka biyoll be' Jesúza' Juda' yetxtila', lii wyoote Satanáza' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena'. Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Daa ba ngoo yic̱hjo' gono', bentegan.
Na' ni to beṉ'ka' chaolengake'ne' bi wyajni'gakile' bic̱he gollze'ne' ka'.
Baḻe' gokgakile' goll Jesúza' Juda' lljx̱i'e bi dii chyalljgakile' c̱he xshe' c̱he'ka', wa wi'e lat' mech beṉ' yesh'ka'. Ḻa' ḻen' nak lall' nee xmeche'ka'.
Na' ka wde wdao Juda' yetxtila' daa be' Jesúza'ne', lii wza'tie'. Na' ba goḻ ka wzee.
Na' ka wde wza' Juda', na'ch che' Jesúza': ―Ba bllin lla sho'a balaaṉ, nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, na' ḻekzka' dga gon', gonan ka sho' Chioza' balaaṉ.
Na' daa gon' ka sho' Chioza' balaaṉ, ḻekzka' kwin Chioza' gone' kwenc̱he nad', Beṉ' Bseḻ' Chioza' Yell-lioni, sho'a balaaṉ, na' lii gontie'n.
Le' xiiṉdawaa, zi shlollchga zoalen' le'. Na' yiyiljle nad', na' chiznia' le' ka gosh' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka': Gana' yiyaa, bi gak sa'le.
Na' to dii kob chllia' bia' gonle ṉaa: Ḻi gaki ljwell-le. Ka chakid' le', kan' chiyaḻ' gaki ljwell-le.
Shi gaki ljwell-le, na'ch iṉezi yog'ḻoḻte beṉ' nakle nad' txen.
Na'ch Simón Pédrona' wṉabile' Jesúza', chi'ene': ―X̱an', ¿garan yiyajo'? Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Aga wak soo gana' yiyaa ṉaa, per wllin lla soo.
Na'ch che' Pédrona'ne': ―X̱an', ¿berac̱he bi gak sa'len' li' ṉaa? Ba nc̱hoglallaa guet' ni c̱ho'.
Na' Jesúza' chi'ene': ―¿Achakilo' ba nc̱hoglalloo gueto' ni c̱ha'? Dii ḻi nia' li', shoṉ shii bi wc̱hebo' shi nombi'o nad' ka zi' kwell-lə shikwteza'.
Bi gakshejlall'le. Ḻi gonḻilall' Chioza' na' ḻekzka' ḻi gonḻilall' nad'.
Lill xḻatj X̱a'na' dii xen latj de. Sheḻ' bi nakan ka', ba wnia' le' ka', sheḻ'ka'. Na' ṉaa yiyaa lljayenshawaa gana' yidzoale.
Na' kat' ba benshawaan, na'ch yiyed' yidxia' le' kwenc̱he lenle soale gana' zoa'.
Na' ba nombia'le neza' daa chillin gana' lljazoa'.
Na'ch Tomáza' chi'ene': ―X̱an', bi ṉezinto' gan yiyajo'. ¿Nakran gonnto' yillelinto' neza'?
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Nadaan' neza' daa chillin lao Chioza', na' chli'a daa nak dii ḻi, na' cho'a beṉ' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi. Aga no yillin kwit X̱a'na' shi bi gonḻilallee nad'.
Daa ba nombia'le nad', lenkz X̱a'nan' ba nombia'le. Na' ṉaa ba nombia'lene' na' ba ble'ilene'.
Na'ch che' Felípena'ne': ―X̱an', ben ka ile'into' X̱o'na' na' x̱enlall'nto'.
Na'ch billii Jesúza' xtilleena', chi'e: ―Felipe, ba wlla zoalen' le', ¿ana' bikzaṉ' gombia'yeṉoo nad'? Beena' ba ble'ile' nad' ḻekzka' ba ble'ile' X̱a'na'. ¿Berac̱he chṉabzo' gon' ka ile'ilene'?
¿Abi chajḻi'o zoalen X̱a'na' nad' na' nad' zoalenee? Diika' nia' le' aga to bia'lozan' chṉia'n, san daa cheeni kwin X̱a'na', beena' zoalene' nad', ḻennan' cho'a dill' na' ḻennan' chon'.
Ḻi shajḻe' daa nia' zoalen X̱a'na' nad', na' nad' zoalen' ḻe'. Na' shi bi chajḻe'le dga nia', ḻa'c̱h' ḻi shajḻe' c̱ha' ni c̱he yeḻ' wakki chle'ile' chon'.
Dii ḻi nia' le', nottez beṉ' chonḻilallee nad', gone' ka diika' chon'. Na' dii zak'techi gone' aga ka diika' chon', daa yiyaa kwit X̱a'na'.
Na' gon' bittez daa iṉabile X̱a'na' daa nakle nad' txen kwenc̱he sho'e balaaṉ ni c̱ha'.
Nad' gon' bittezə daa iṉable daa nakle nad' txen.
’Shi chakile nad', ḻi gon diika' nllia' bia' gonle.
Na' iṉabid' X̱a'na' wseḻee sto beṉ' gaklene' le' na' soalene' le' toshiizi.
Ḻen' Espíritu Sántona', beena' chli' daa nak dii ḻi. Na' beṉ' yell-lioki aga wak wlebgake'ne', ḻa' bi chle'gakile'ne' ni bi nombia'gake'ne'. San le', ba nombia'lene' daa zoalene' le' na' soe' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Aga wikwaaṉ' le' ka bi' wizeb, san wiyedch' soalen' le'.
Aga chllach bich ile'i beṉ' yell-lioni nad', san le' wle'chkzile nad'. Na' daa mban' toshiizi, ḻekzka' le' toshiizi ibanle.
Kat' illin llana' nia' ka', na' gakbe'ile zoalen' X̱a'na', na' le' zoalenle nad' na' nad' zoalen' le'.
Nottez beṉ' chzenague' daa nllia' bia' na' chone' ka nan, beenan' chakile' nad'. Na' beena' chakile' nad', ḻekzka' gaki X̱a'na'ne', na' nad' ḻekzka' gakidee na' gon' kwenc̱he gombia'che' nad'.
Na' Júdaza' (beena' sto, aga Jud Scariota',) chi'ene': ―X̱an', ¿berac̱he to neto'z gonzo' ka gombia'chnto' li' na' bi len beṉ' yell-lioki, beṉ'ka' bi chonḻilall'gake' li'?
Na' billii Jesúza' xtilleena': ―Beena' chakile' nad', wzoe' xtillaa, na' X̱a'na' gakile'ne', na' nad' kon X̱a'na' yidsoalennto'ne'.
Na' beena' bi chakile' nad', bi chzoe' xtillaa. Na' diika' chli' chsedid' aga dii chyiljlallzaan, san X̱a'na', beena' bseḻ' nad', chzajniile'n nad'.
’Yog' diiki choe'len' le' dill' ṉaa shlak ni zoalen' le'.
Na' kat' bich soa' len le', Espíritu Sántona', beena' wseḻ' X̱a'na', gaklene' le' na' wzajniile' le' yog' dii chiyaḻ' iṉezile, na' gone' ka lljadinile yog' diika' ba wnia' le'.
’Yeḻ' mbalaza' chkwaaṉlena'n le'. Na' yeḻ' mbalaz c̱ha'na' choṉ' le' bi nakan ka yeḻ' mbalaz c̱he beṉ' yell-lioka'. Bi gakshejlall'le, ni bi gall illeble.
Ba benkzile nia' yiyaa gana' zoa X̱a'na' na' ḻekzka' wiyedchkz' yidzoalen' le'. Na' shi chakile nad', chiyaḻ' yibaile daa yiyaa gana' zoa X̱a'na', ḻa' zak'che' aga ka nad'.
Na' ba nia' le' diiki zi' gak kwenc̱he kat' gakan shajḻe'le.
’Na' bich bitek dill' we'lench' le' ṉaa, ḻa' ba za' dii x̱iwaa, daa chṉabia' yell-lioni. Per aga wak iṉabia'n nad'.
Ḻa' chon' kon ka nllia X̱a'na' bia' gon' kwenc̱he iṉezi beṉ' yell-lioki chakid' X̱a'na'. Ḻi yizolla'. Ḻi yidó.
’Nad' nak' ka yag uva daa nak dowalj, na' X̱a'na' nake' ka beena' chaz chaaṉan.
Na' yog'ḻoḻ xoz' xka'inna' daa bi chbia, chc̱hogue'n. Na' diika' chbia, chonshao'che'n kwenc̱he zizikli kwian.
Na' le', nakle ka xoz' xka'inna' daa chbia, daa bzenagle ka nak dill'ka' be'len' le'.
Ḻi soatezi soa gonle nad' txen, na' ka'kz nad' soatezi soalen' le'. Ka xoz' xka'inna', shi bi ndiḻ nllagan xyaguinna' aga bi chbian, ka'kzan le' shi bi soatezi soale gonle nad' txen bi gak gonle daa chibaid'.
’Nad' nak' ka to yag uva, na' le' nakle ka xoz' xka'inna'. Shi le' soatezi soale gonle nad' txen na' nad' soatezi soalen' le', na' gakle ka xoz' xka'inna' daa chbiachga. Shi le' bi nakle nad' txen aga bi gak gonle.
Beena' bi gone' ka dii le gone' nad' txen, nake' ka xoz' xka'inna' daa ba bc̱hogue' na' ibillan, na' yitope'n wzaḻeen lo yi'na' kwenc̱he sheyan.
’Shi le' soatezi soale gonle nad' txen na' toshiizi chzoale xtillaana', ḻi iṉab daa cheenile na' gakan.
X̱a'na' cho'e balaaṉ kat' chonle dii wenna', na' daa chonle ka', chli'lawin dii ḻi nakle nad' txen.
Ka chaki X̱a'na' nad', ka'kzan chakid' le'. Ḻi soatezi soa gonle nad' txen kwenc̱he gakbe'ile chakid' le'.
Shi gonle daa nllia' bia' gonle, na'ch gakbe'ile ḻe chakid' le', ka chon' nad', chon' daa nllia X̱a'na' bia' gon', na' ka' chakbe'id' ḻe chakile' nad'.
’Ba wnia' le' ka' kwenc̱he yiba yizaklenile' nad', na' yiyoll yido soale mbalaz.
Na' dgan nllia' bia' gonle: Gaki ljwell-le ka chakid' le'.
Bich bi yeḻ' chaki dii xench de ka c̱he beena' chzani yeḻ' mban c̱he'na' guete' ni c̱he beṉ'ka' nllaguile'.
Len' nakle beṉ'ka' nllaguid' shi chonle ka nllia' bia' gonle.
Bich gon' le' ka mos, ḻa' beena' nak mos aga ṉezile' bin chon x̱ane'na'. San nakle beṉ' nllaguid' ḻa' ba bzajniid' le' yog' diika' wna X̱a'na' nad'.
Aga len' wlejle nad', san nadaan wlej' le' na' ba bzoa' le' shajle lljenle dii wenna' daa bi te c̱heyi. Na' X̱a'na' goṉe' yog' daa iṉabilene' daa nakle nad' txen.
Na' dgan chllia' bia' gonle: Gaki ljwell-le ganga.
’Bibi gakile shi beṉ'ka' bi nombia' Chioza' gakzbangakile' le', ḻa' ṉezkzile ka'kzan gokzbangakile' nad'.
Sheḻ' nakle ḻegake' txen na'ch gakgakile' le', sheḻ'ka'. Per daa ba wlej' le' kwenc̱he gakle nad' txen, daan chakzbangakile' le'.
Ḻi lljadini ka ba wniakz' le': “Aga iṉacho zak'chi to mos ka x̱ane'na'.” Ka ba bsak'zi'gake' nad', ka'kzan wsak'zi'gake' le'. Na' shi bzenaggake' cho'a xtillaana', ḻekzka' wzenaggake' c̱hele.
Yog' diikin gongakile' le' daa nakle nad' txen, ḻa' bi nombia'gake' X̱a'na' beena' bseḻ' nad'.
’Beṉ'ka' bi nombia' Chioza', aga bi doḻ' napgake' sheḻ'ka' bi bidye'len' ḻegake' xtilleena'. Per daa ba bidye'len' ḻegake' xtilleena' bi gak iṉagake' bi chakbe'gakile' chongake' dii mala'.
Beena' chakzbanile' nad' lenkz X̱a'nan' chakzbanile'.
Aga bi doḻ' napgake' sheḻ'ka' bi bli'a yeḻ' wakka' daa konoṉ' gon ladje'ka'. Na' ḻa'kzi ba ble'gakile' diika' chon', bia'kzə chakzbangakile' nad' na' X̱a'na'.
Chak dga kwenc̱he chillinin ka na ley c̱he'ka' gana' nan: “Kon gokzi' gokzbangakile' nad' ḻa'kzi aga bi ben' c̱hegake'.”
’Na' wseḻaa Espíritu c̱he X̱a' Chioza', beena' gaklene' le'. Espírituna', beena' chli' daa nak dii ḻi, see gana' zoa X̱a' Chioza' na' yidyee xtillaa.
Na' ḻekzka' lenle we'le cho'a xtillaana', ḻa' ba gokle nad' txen ka wzoloa' chli' chsedid' beṉ'.
’Ba wnia' le' diiki kwenc̱he bi yidiṉjile' daa chonḻilall'le nad'.
Ḻa' bich wlebgake' le' gana' chdop chllagcho choe'ḻwillcho Chioza', na' wllin lla ax̱t wit beṉ' le' daa gakile' kan' chazlall' Chioza'.
Gongake' ka' daa bi nombia'gake' X̱a'na', ni bi nombia'gake' nad'.
Na' nia' le' diiki kwenc̱he kat' ba bllin lla ile'ile yeḻ' zak'zi'ka', lljadinile ka'kzan ba wnia' gak c̱hele. Bi wnia' le' ka' dii nechte daa ni zoalen' le'.
’Na' ṉaa yiyaa lljazoalen' X̱a'na' beena' bseḻ' nad', na' ni stole bich chṉabile nad' gan yiyaa.
Na' daa ba wnia' le' ka' ḻe chakyesh'zi'le'.
Per dii ḻi nia' le', wakch wen c̱hele shi yiyaa. Ḻa' shi bi yiyaa, beena' gaklene' le' bi yidsoalene' le'. San shi ba ziyaa, na' wseḻaane'.
Na' kat' yide', gone' kwenc̱he gakbe'i beṉ' yell-lioki nakgake' beṉ' saaxya daa bi biyombia'gake' beena' nak dowalj beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', na' gakbe'gakile' chidoḻ'gake' wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱hegake' ni c̱he xtoḻeeka'.
Yiyakbe'gakile' napgake' doḻ' daa bi chonḻilall'gake' nad'.
Na' yiyakbe'gakile' nak' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' daa yiyaa gana' zoa X̱a'na' na' aga wle'chile nad'.
Na' ḻekzka' yiyakbe'gakile' Chioza' wi'e yeḻ' zak'zi' c̱he beṉ'ka' bi chzenag c̱ha', ḻa' ba bc̱hogloe' sak'zi' dii x̱iwaa daa chṉabia' yell-lioni.
’Dii zanch de dii iṉia' le', dii bi shajniile ṉaa.
Per kat' ila' Espíritu Sántona', beena' chli' daa nak dii ḻi, ḻen' wzajniile' le' kwasḻoḻ daa nak dii ḻi. Ḻa' aga dii c̱hiljlall'ze'n iṉe', san iṉe' daa che' X̱a'na'ne', na' c̱hix̱je'ile' le' diika' zi' za' gak.
Na' gone' ka sho'a balaaṉ, ḻa' wzajniile' le' diika' ba wnia'.
Ḻa' yog'ḻoḻte daa na X̱a'na' ḻennan' cho'a dill'. Daan nia', Espírituna' wzajniile' le' diika' ba wnia'.
’Aga chllach bich ile'ile nad', na' ḻekzka' aga wlla yizle'ile nad'.
Na' baḻ beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen wṉabi ljwelle': ―¿Bera zejin daa ne' aga chllach bich ile'ichone', na' ḻekzka' aga wlla yizle'ichone', na' daa natelze' yiyaje' kwit X̱e'na'?
¿Bi zejin daa naze' “aga chllach”? Bi chajniicho bic̱he naze' ka'.
Na' Jesúza' gokbe'ile' cheengakile' iṉabgakile'ne' bi zejin daa wne', na'ch chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Achṉabi ljwell-le bi zejin daa wnia' le' aga chllach bich ile'ile nad', na' ḻekzka' aga wlla yizle'ile nad'?
Dii ḻi nia' le', kwell-le na' gakyeshile shlak beṉ'ka' bi nombia' Chioza' yibagakile'. Na' ḻa'kzi gakyeshile, yeḻ' chakyeshii c̱helena' yiyakan yeḻ' xaba.
Kat' chzan to noolə, chey chle' daa ba bllin gor sane'. Na' ka chiyoll chzane' ni bich chjtinile' yeḻ' chey chlana', daa ḻe chibaile' ba zoa to bi'do' c̱he' yell-lioni.
Ka'kzan chak c̱hele. Ṉaa chakyeshile, na' ka yillagcho dii yoblə kanan' yiba yizakile, na' ni to kono wsej wllon yibaile.
’Na' kana'chan bich bi iṉabile nad'. Dii ḻi nia' le', bittezə dii iṉabile X̱a'na', goṉkze'n, daa nonḻilall'le nad'.
Ax̱t ṉaa ni to bibiṉ' iṉabile X̱a'na' daa nonḻilall'le nad'. Ḻi iṉab bittez dii cheenile iṉabilene' na' goṉkze'n kwenc̱he yiyoll yido soale mbalaz.
’Ba bseesaa jemplka' bzajniid' le' diiki, na' wllin lla kat' bich wzajniid' le' kon jempl, san we'len' le' dill' c̱he X̱a'na' ka to shajniilen.
Na' kat' ba bllin llana', kanan' iṉabile X̱a'na' bittezə dii iṉabilene' daa nonḻilall'le nad', na' bi chonan byen kwin' iṉabidee gaklene' le',
ḻa' kwinkz X̱a'na' chakile' le' daa chakile nad' na' daa chajḻe'le bseḻee nad'.
Wzaa gana' zoa X̱a'na' kwenc̱he bid' yell-lioni, na' ṉaa yizaa yell-lioni kwenc̱he yiyaa gana' zoe'.
Na'ch che' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen: ―Ṉaach ba choo dill' dii najnii, na' bich bi jempl chc̱hino'.
Na' chakbe'into' ṉez nḻe'ilo' yog'ḻoḻte, na' aga chonan byen no bi iṉabzi li', ḻa' ba ṉezlilo' bin iṉabile' li'. Daan chajḻe'nto' dii ḻi zoo gana' zoa Chioza'.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Aṉaach chajḻe'le?
Ba zoa illin lla, wa ba bllinkz llana', illeshlesle na' gala ikaa twej twejle, na' yikwaaṉle toz'. Per aga tozan' yigaaṉa', ḻa' zoalenkz X̱a'na' nad'.
Ba wnia' le' yog' diiki kwenc̱he soale mbalaz daa nakle nad' txen. Yell-lioni biya dii yen ile'ile, per ḻi gondiplall', ḻa' ba ben' gan daa chṉabia' yell-lioni.
Na' ka wde wna Jesúza' diika', na' bḻis jalawe'na' bwie' yabalə, na' golle': ―X̱a, ba bllin gor illagloa' daa llia bia' wtiḻ'. Wloo nad' balaaṉ, nad' nak' xiiṉo', kwenc̱he ḻekzka' nad' kwaa li' balaaṉ.
Ḻa' ba beno' lo na' iṉabia' lao yog'ḻoḻ beṉ', kwenc̱he gon' ka gat' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi c̱he beṉ'ka' wlejo' gonḻilall'gake' nad'.
Na' daa gat' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi c̱he beṉ', zejin nombia'gake' li', nako' dowalj Chios, na' ḻekzka' nombia'gake' nad', beṉ' bseḻoo yell-lioni.
’Nad' ba wlo'a li' balaaṉ lao beṉ' yell-lioki, na' ba biyoll ben' daa bllio' bia' gon'.
Na' ṉaa, X̱a, yiyoṉgacho' nad' balaaṉna' kat' yiyed' kwito'na' ka balaaṉna' daa wdapkz' kana' wzoalen' li' ka zi' x̱e sil yell-lioni.
’Ba beṉo' nad' beṉ'ki wlejo' yell-lioni kwenc̱he gonḻilall'gake' nad', na' ba bzajniid' ḻegake' ka nako'. Lall' non' nakgake', na' beno' ka benḻilall'gake' nad' na' chzenaggake' xtilloona'.
Na' ṉaa ba ṉezgakile' yog' dill'ka' bi'a nakan dii wno'.
Ḻa' ba be'len' ḻegake' dill' daa nllio' bia' we'lengakee na' ba bzenaggake'n. Na' ba gokbe'gakile' dii ḻi wzaa gana' zo' na' ba wyajḻe'gake' lin' bseḻoo nad'.
’Chṉabid' li' gakleno' ḻegake'. Aga chṉab' gakleno' yog' beṉ' yell-lioki, san chṉab' gakleno' beṉ'ka' wlejo' kwenc̱he gonḻilall'gake' nad', ḻa' lall' non' nakgake'.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' ḻekzka' nakgake' lall' no'. Na' ḻegake' ba wloogake' nad' balaaṉ.
’Na' ṉaa ba chiza' yell-lioni. Na' ḻegake' yigaaṉgake' ni. X̱a, li' nako' dowalj beṉ' wen beṉ' shao'. Wdapgach beṉ'ka' ba beṉo' nonḻilall'gake' nad' kon yeḻ' wak c̱ho'na' kwenc̱he gakgake' toz, ka nakcho cho' nakcho toz.
Shlak wzoalen' ḻegake' yell-lioni ba wdap bwia' ḻegake' kon yeḻ' wak c̱ho'na'. Na' ni toe' bi wlliayi', ḻetechokzə beena' ba nakan kwiayee, kwenc̱he gak ka na Cho'a Xtilloona'.
’Na' ṉaa ba zizaa gana' zo'. Na' nia' li' diiki shlak ni zoa' yell-lioni kwenc̱he beṉ'ki gapgake' yeḻ' xaba ka daa nap'.
Nad' ba bzajniid' ḻegake' cho'a xtilloona', na' beṉ'ka' bi nombia' li' chakzi' chakzbangakile' ḻegake' daa bi nakgake' ḻegake' txen, ka chon' nad' bi chon' txen beṉ'ka' bi nombia' li'.
Aga chṉabid' li' yikoo beṉ'ki nonḻilall' li' lo yell-lioni, san chṉab' wkweejgachgako'ne' kwenc̱he ki c̱hitj seni dii mala' daa chda yell-lioni ḻegake'.
Bi nongake' txen beṉ'ka' bi nombia' li', ka chon' nad' bi chon' beṉ'ka' txen.
Bengach kwenc̱he beṉ'ki nonḻilall' nad' gakchgake' ka chazlalloo daa chzenaggake' dill' ḻi c̱ho'na', ḻa' cho'a xtilloona' nakan dii ḻi.
Ka beno' bseḻoo nad' kwenc̱he bidsoa' yell-lioni, ka'kzan chseḻaa ḻegake' kwenc̱he shajgake' ladj beṉ' yell-lioki.
Chzanlallaa kwin' gon' ka no' ni c̱hegake', kwenc̱he ḻekzka' gongake' ka no' daa ba chzenaggake' dill' ḻi c̱ho'na'.
’Aga chṉabid' li' gakleno' to ḻezgake', san ḻekzka' chṉab' gakleno' beṉ'ka' gonḻilall' nad' kat' wzenaggake' cho'a xtillaana' daa we' beṉ'ki.
X̱a, chṉabid' li' gonshgo' ka gak yog'gake' toz, ka nakcho cho' nakcho toz. Ḻekzka' chṉab' gakgake' cho' toz kwenc̱he beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall' li' shajḻe'gake' lin' bseḻoo nad'.
Ba wlo'a ḻegake' balaaṉ ka daa wloo nad', kwenc̱he gakgake' toz ka nakcho cho' nakcho toz.
Nad' nakgakee toz ka nakcho cho' nakcho toz. Bengach ka gakgake' toz ka chiyaḻ', kwenc̱he beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall' li' gakbe'gakile' lin' bseḻoo nad', na' gakbe'gakile' chakilo' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' nad' ka chakilo' nad'.
’X̱a, li' ba beṉo' nad' ḻegake', na' cheenid' soalengake' nad' gana' soa' kwenc̱he ile'gakile' balaaṉ c̱ha'na' daa beṉo' nad' ka zi' x̱e silte yell-lioni daa chakilo' nad'.
X̱a, li' nako' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao'. Ḻa'kzi beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall' nad' bi nombia'gake' li', nad' nombi'a li' na' beṉ'ki nonḻilall' nad' ṉezgakile' lin' bseḻoo nad'.
Na' ba bzajniid' ḻegake' non nako', na' zizikli wzajni'chgakidee kwenc̱he kon ka chakilo' nad' ka'kzə gakgakile' beṉ', na' nad' soalenkzgakee.
Na' ka biyoll wna Jesúza' ka', wza'lene' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen wyajgake' shḻaa yao Cedrónna', na' wyoolene' ḻegake' to yell-lio ga lle' lla' yag olivo.
Na' Juda', beena' bene' Jesúza' lo na' beṉ' malka', ḻekzka' nombi'e latja', ḻa' Jesúza' zan shii wyajlene' ḻegake' na'.
Na' bllinlen Juda' beṉ' zan soldad na' zi x̱oṉj beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na', beṉ'ka' bseḻ' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' len fariseoka'. Zejgake' nox̱'gake' no kandil, no yi' yech, na' dii wṉiagakile'.
Na' Jesúza' ba ṉezkzile' yog' daa zi' gak c̱he', na'ch bcheje' jatiḻe' ḻegake', na' chi'e: ―¿Non chiyiljle?
Na' che'gake'ne': ―Jesús, beṉ' Nazaretan', chiyiljnto'. Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Nadaan'. Na' lengake' Juda', beena' bene' ḻe' lall' na'gake'.
Na' ka goll Jesúza': “Nadaan”, to biza'zgake' jayetgake' wza'che'lə.
Na'ch wizṉabi Jesúza' ḻegake': ―¿Noran chiyiljle? Na' che'gake'ne': ―Jesús, beṉ' Nazaretan'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake' sto shii: ―Ba wniakz' le' nadaan. Na' shi nadaan chiyiljle, ḻi we' latj yiyaj beṉ'ki.
Golle' ḻegake' ka' kwenc̱he billinin daa wne': “X̱a, ba wdap' beṉ'ka' beṉo' nad' na' ni toe' bi wlliayi'.”
Na' Simón Pédrona' no'e to spad, na'ch wleje'n bc̱hogue' tḻaa nag to beṉ' le Malco, de shḻina'. Na' Málcona' nake' xmos bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' Pédrona': ―Bigoo spad c̱ho'na' ḻoo lillinna'. Ḻa' chonan byen gak c̱ha' daa ba nllia X̱a'na' bia' gak.
Na'ch soldadka' len x̱ane'ka', na' beṉ'ka' chap yoodo' c̱he beṉ' Israelka', bex̱'gake' Jesúza' na' bc̱hejgake'ne'.
Na' zigaate jwa'gake'ne' lao Anáza' xtobiiṉ c̱he Caifáza', na' Caifáza' nake' bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xen lo yiza'.
Na' Caifáza', ḻen' beena' golle' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' wenchlan witgake' toz Jesúza' aga ka daa kwiayi' yog' beṉ' wlall c̱he'ka'.
Na' Simón Pédrona' len sto beṉ' nake' Jesúza' txen janogake'ne'. Na' beena' zejlen Pédrona' txen nombia' bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna'ne', daan gok wyoolene' Jesúza' lesh' chyoo c̱he bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna'.
Na' Pédrona' wzie' cho'a leeja'. Na'ch beena' nombia' bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna', bicheje' jashaljlene' bi' nool wewaa chap cho'a leeja' kwenc̱he be'b' latj wyoo Pédrona'.
Na'ch bi' nool wewaa chap cho'a leeja' che'b' Pédrona': ―¿Aaga lenon' nako' beeni txen? Na' che' Pédrona'b': ―Bi len' nakee txen.
Na' moska' len beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na' wlekgake' yi'na' kwenc̱he wbillgake' daa ba chak zag. Na' jselen Pédrona' ḻegake' cho'a yi'na' kwenc̱he billa'ile'.
Na' beena' nak bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xen wṉabyollile' Jesúza' no beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen na' beran chli' chsedile'.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Ladj lkwe' beṉaan ba bi'a dill'. Ba bli' bsedid' beṉ' lesh' chyoodo'na' na' gachlə chdop chllag beṉ' wlallka' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza'. Na' bibi dill' bi'a do ngash'zə.
¿Berac̱he chṉabzilo' nad'? Wṉabi beṉ'ka' ba bli' bsedid' kwenc̱he iṉagake' li' beran ba goshgakee. Ḻa' ṉezgakile' bin ba bli' bsedid' ḻegake'.
Na' ka wde wna Jesúza' ka', to beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na' wdape' x̱agueena', chi'ene': ―¿Bic̱he chilliizo' bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenni dill'?
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Shi bi dii mal ba wnia', wnashki beran ba wnia'. Na' shi shḻikzan ba wnia', ¿berac̱he chitzo' nad'?
Na'ch de nchejzi Jesúza' bde Anáza'ne' lao Caifáza', beena' nak bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xen.
Na' shlak ze Pédrona' chshee cho'a yi'na', beṉ'ka' lle' na' che'gake'ne': ―¿Aaga lenon' nako' beeni txen? Na' bi bc̱hebe', san chi'e: ―Bi nakee txen.
Na' to xmos bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna', beena' nak bish' ljwell beena' bc̱hog Pédrona' nague'na', chi'ene': ―¿Aaga lenon' ble'lenid' Jesúza' gana' lle' yag olívoka'?
Na' stokzə bi bc̱heb Pédrona', na' lii wchellte shikwteza'.
Na' cheeni'ḻesdo' bichejgake' lill Caifáza' na' bic̱he'gake' Jesúza' gana' chon Pilátona' yeḻ' josc̱hisa'. Na' beṉ' Israelka' aga wyoolengake' Jesúza' gana' chon Pilátona' yeḻ' josc̱hisa', ḻa' aga wak gaogake' daa chsini'agake' c̱he Paskwa' shi ba wyoogake' ḻoo yoona'.
Na'ch bchej Pilátona' chi'e ḻegake': ―¿Bi xyan chaole c̱he beeni?
Na' che'gake'ne': ―Sheḻ' bibi dii mal chone' aga widwa'nto'ne' lawo' ni, sheḻ'ka'.
Na'ch che' Pilátona' ḻegake': ―Ḻi yic̱hi'e na' ḻi gon yeḻ' josc̱his c̱he' kon ka na ley c̱helena'. Na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' che'gake'ne': ―Aga bi lsens c̱hento' de witnto' beṉ'.
Na' daa gok ka', billinin ka wna Jesúza' gak kat'ka' guete'.
Na'ch biyoo Pilátona' gana' chone' yeḻ' josc̱hisa', na' goxe' Jesúza' chi'ene': ―¿Alin' nako' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelki?
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―¿Adii chza'z lalloon no' ka'? ¿Awa beṉ' yoblan ba be'lene' li' xtillaana'?
Na'ch che' Pilátona'ne': ―¿Achakilo' beṉ' Israel nad'? Beṉ' wlall c̱ho'kikzan na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' le', ba bengake' li' lo na'. ¿Beran beno'?
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Aga nak yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱ha'na' ka c̱he beṉ' yell-lioki. Sheḻ' nakan ka', beṉ'ka' nak nad' txen wllongake' nad' kwenc̱he bi gox̱' beṉ' wlall c̱ha'ki nad', sheḻ'ka'. Per aga nak yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱ha'na' de yell-lioz.
Na'ch che' Pilátona'ne': ―¿Ana' beṉ' wṉabia'kzan nako', shka'? Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Awe, kan' nakan. Ni c̱heyi daan golj' na' bid' yell-lioni, kwenc̱he wi'a dill' daa nak dii ḻi. Na' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' chzenaggake' dill' ḻina', chzenaggake' c̱ha'.
Na'ch che' Pilátona'ne': ―¿Beran nak dill' ḻi? Na' ka wde goll Pilátona'ne' ka', na'ch bizcheje' kwenc̱he jashaljlene' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka', na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Ni to dii mal bi chillelid' chon beeni.
Na' kon ka yoolole chak yog' yiz chsan' to beṉ' de lillyana' kat' chaḻ' lṉi Paskwi, ¿abi cheenile yisan' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱heleni, le' nakle beṉ' Israel?
Na'ch yog'gake' besyaagake' zillj, che'gake'ne': ―¡Aga beenan' yisano'! ¡Barrabázan' bisan! Na' Barrabáza' nake' to beṉ' wban.
Na' ka' gok ben Pilátona' mandad bet wdingake' Jesúza'.
Na' soldadka' bengake' to bxooṉ de xis yesh' na' bllingake'n yic̱hje'na' ka corona na' bwakwgake'ne' to lech' de morad.
Na'ch wbig'gake' lawe'na' chtitjgakile'ne', chongake' ka beṉ' chgoo ḻe' balaaṉ, che'gake': ―¡Toshiizi sechgayi c̱he beeni chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka'! Na' wdapgake' x̱agueena'.
Na'ch bizchej Pilátona', chi'e beṉ' Israelka': ―Ḻi wwia, ni kwejee kwenc̱he iṉezile ni to dii mal bi chillelid' bene'.
Na' bchej Jesúza' mbinte bxooṉ de xis yeshaa yic̱hje'na' na' nakwtie' lech' morada'. Na'ch che' Pilátona' ḻegake': ―Ni ze beeni chaole xya c̱heyin.
Na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na' ka ble'gakile'ne', na'ch wzologake' chosyaagake' zillj, che'gake': ―¡Bdee ḻee yag cruza'! ¡Bdee ḻee yag cruza'! Na' che' Pilátona' ḻegake': ―Ḻi yic̱hi'e, shka'. Na' ḻi wdee, le'. Ḻa' nad', ni to dii mal bi chillelid' bene'.
Na' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka' che'gake'ne': ―De to ley c̱hento' daa na chiyaḻ' guete' daa nalze' nake' Xiiṉ Chios.
Na' ka gollgake' Pilátona' ka', zizikchli bllebe'.
Na'ch biyo'e sto shii gana' chone' yeḻ' josc̱hisa' na' chi'e Jesúza': ―¿Gara beṉ' li'? Na' Jesúza' bikzə bi dill' billi'e.
Na'ch che' Pilátona'ne': ―¿Berac̱he ki chilli'o xtillii? ¿Abi ṉezilo' nap' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he wdaa li' ḻee yag cruza' na' naptia' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he yisan' li'?
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Aga bi yeḻ' wṉabia' napo' bi gonilo' nad' sheḻ' bi noṉ Chioza'n li'. Daan, beena' bdie' nad' lawo' ni, doḻ' xench nape' aga ka li'.
Na'ch ka beni Pilátona' wne' ka', biyiljlallee naklə ka gone' kwenc̱he yisane' Jesúza', per beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' ax̱t chosyaayigake', che'gake'ne': ―Shi yisano'ne' bi nako' txen Césara', ḻa' nottez beena' iṉa nake' beṉ' wṉabia', Césaran' chizoshyi'e.
Na' ka beni Pilátona' gollgake'ne' ka', bizcheje' nc̱hi'e Jesúza'. Na'ch jc̱hi'e gana' chone' yeḻ' josc̱hisa', gana' le Gábata de dill' hebreo, na' zejin latj ga ntaogake' yaj.
Na' gok dga llana' chsini'agake' c̱he lṉi Paskwa'. Na' ka do gobill goll Pilátona' beṉ' Israelka': ―Ni ze beṉ' wṉabia' c̱heleni.
Na'ch ḻegake' chosyaagake'. Zeyidgake', che'gake': ―¡Wdoyo beena'! ¡Bdee ḻee yag cruza'! Na'ch che' Pilátona' ḻegake': ―¿Acheenile wi'a lsens wda'gake' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱heleni ḻee yag cruza'? Na' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' che'gake'ne': ―Toz Césaran' chṉabi'e neto'. Koch no beṉ' yoblə zoa.
Na'ch Pilátona' bene' Jesúza' lo na'gake' kwenc̱he wda'gake'ne' ḻee yag cruza', na'ch bc̱he'gake'ne'.
Na'ch bwa'gake' Jesúza' yag cruz c̱he'na', na' bc̱he'gake'ne' gana' le Gólgota de dill' hebreo, na' zejin Latj c̱he llit yic̱hj beṉ' wet.
Na' na' bda'gake' Jesúza' ḻee yag cruza', na' ḻekzka' bda'gake' zi twej beṉ' shḻaa wej.
Na' Pilátona' bzeje' to dii bda'gake' yic̱hj yag cruz c̱he Jesúza', na' nan ki: “Jesús, beṉ' Nazaret, beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka'.”
Na' bzeje'n dill' hebreo, dill' latín na' dill' griego. Na' zan beṉ' Israelka' blabgake' daa da' yic̱hj yag cruza', ḻa' gana' bda'gake' Jesúza' ḻee yag cruza' chgaaṉan gaozə yell Jerusalénna'.
Daan bx̱ozka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' gollgake' Pilátona': ―Bi chiyaḻ' iṉan “Beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka'”; san iṉan “Beenin nalze' nake' beṉ' wṉabia' c̱he beṉ' Israelka'.”
Na' Pilátona' chi'e ḻegake': ―Kon ka ba bzeja'n, ka'kzan igaaṉan.
Na' biyoll bda' soldadka' Jesúza' ḻee yag cruza', na'ch bex̱'gake' xe'na' na' bengake'n taplə kweṉche bikaa twej c̱hegake'. Na' ḻekzka' bex̱'gake' xe' dii toṉa' daa nak to shwiḻizə.
Na' che' ljwellgake': ―Bi wxoxjchon, san goncho to wyitj kwenc̱he ila'shki nocho ikaan. Na' ka' ben soldadka'. Na' daa bengake' ka', billinin ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' na: “Biḻaagake' xa'na', na' bengake' to wyitj kwenc̱he got'bia' nogake' wkaan.”
Na' kwit yag cruz c̱he Jesúza' ze xṉeena' len beṉ' bile'na', na' len María, xool Cleófaza', na' María beṉ' yell Magdálana'.
Na' ka ble'i Jesúza' xṉeena', na' ḻekzka' ble'ile' gaozə ze to beena' nake'ne' txen, beena' ḻe chakile', na'ch chi'e xṉeena': ―Beenin yiyoni xiiṉo' ṉaa.
Na'ch chi'e beena' nake'ne' txen: ―Beenin yiyoni xṉoo ṉaa. Na' lo llana' bic̱hi'e xṉa' Jesúza' wzoe' lille'na'.
Na' ka wde, ṉezi Jesúza' ba gok yog' daa llia bia' gakə, na' kwenc̱he yillinin ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza', wne': ―Chbiḻid'.
Na' na' zoa to xwag nakan tolla' vino dii nak zic̱hj zḻa'. Na'ch bḻeejgake'n to dii chzi' nisa' na' bzoagake'n to lo xis kwenc̱he bzoagake'n cho'ena'.
Na' wde weej Jesúza' daa nak zic̱hj zḻa', na'ch wne': ―Ba gok yog' daa llia bia' gak ṉaa. Na' bc̱hek' yic̱hje'na', na' wite'.
Na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' bi goongakile' yigaaṉ kwerp c̱he beṉ'ka' ḻee yag cruzka' llana' chombaaṉgake'. Daan gollgake' Pilátona' gone' mandad lljtishjgake' ṉi'a beṉ'ka' da' ḻee yag cruza' kwenc̱he yob guetgake' na' yiḻetjgake' kwerp c̱he'ka' ḻee yag cruzka'.
Na'ch bseḻee soldad c̱he'ka', na' jtishjgake' c̱hop ḻaate ṉi'a beṉ' necha' da' kwit Jesúza', na' ḻekzka' bengake' c̱he beena' sto da' zi shḻaa kwite'na'.
Na' ka jabig'gake' gana' da' Jesúza' ble'gakile' ba wite', na' bi wdishjgake' ṉi'ena'.
Na' to soldada' wllibe' to ya lo tosh' kwit ḻi'ena' na' lii bchejten chen len nis.
Na' beena' choe' dill' c̱heyi diiki, ḻen' ble'ile' ka gok, na' cho'e dill' kwenc̱he lenle shajḻe'le. Na' ḻe' ṉezile' dill' ḻin cho'e.
Gok diiki kwenc̱he billinin ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' na: “Ni to llitka' yo'e bi c̱hishjgake'.”
Na' gan yoblə ḻee Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' chiznan: “Wwiagake' beena' wllibgake' yana'.”
Na' ka wde gok diiki, José beṉ' yell Arimatéana', wṉabile' Pilátona' wi'e latj yikee kwerp c̱he Jesúza'. Joséna' goke' txen Jesúza' do ngash'zə daa bllebe' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka'. Na' Pilátona' bi'e latj, na'ch wyaj Joséna' bikee kwerp c̱he Jesúza'.
Na' wyajlene' Nicodémona', beena' wyaj jawia Jesúza' waḻ-lə. Na' no'e ka do shichoa kil dii chḻa' zix̱ daa nongake' de mirra na' nc̱hix̱an daa le áloe.
Na'ch btobgake' kwerp c̱he Jesúza' to lech' toṉ na' blla'gake'n daa chḻa' zix̱, kon ka chon beṉ' Israelka' kat' chkwash'gake' to beṉ' wet.
Na' gaozə gana' bda'gake' Jesúza' ḻee yag cruza' de to latj ga nazgake' yag dii chbia dii zix̱, na' na' zoa to blej kob dii biṉ' koogake' ni tlish' beṉ' wet.
Na' daa chakbyengakile' wsini'agake' c̱he llana' chombaaṉgake', lii wlootegake' kwerp c̱he Jesúza' ḻoo bleja' zoa gaozə na'.
Na' lla nech c̱he xmanna', ni shtedo', wyaj María nool Magdálana' cho'a bana'. Na' ble'ile' bich nkwash' yaja' cho'a bana'.
Na'ch bizee ziyajdoe' gana' zoa Simón Pédrona' na' sto beena' nak Jesúza' txen, beena' ḻe gokile', jayelle' ḻegake': ―Ba jalejgake' X̱anchona' ḻoo bana' na' bi ṉezinto' galə jaloogake'ne'.
Na'ch wza' Pédrona' len beena' sto zejgake' cho'a bana'.
C̱hoptie' zejdogake', per beena' to bxoṉjche' aga ka Pédrona' na' zigaate ḻe' blline' cho'a bana'.
Na' bchekee bwie' ḻoo bana' na' ble'ile' lech'ka' chi' na', per bi wyo'e.
Na' ka bllin Simón Pédrona' na' wyo'e ḻoo bana' na' ḻekzka' ble'ile' lech'ka' chi' na'.
Na' lecha' bdob yic̱hje'na' aga lenan chi' kwit lech'ka', san ndoban chi'n ka'lə.
Na'ch ḻekzka' wyoo beena' bllin dii nech cho'a bana', na' ka ble'ile' diika' na' wyajḻi'e dii ḻi biban Jesúzan'.
Ḻa' kana' aga ba wyajni'yeṉ'gakile' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' cho'en dill' yiban Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch beṉ'ka' c̱hop non Jesúza' txen biyajgake' gana' zoagake'.
Na' Maríana' bigaaṉe' cho'a bana' chbelle'. Na' lo zej chbelle' bchekee kwenc̱he bwie' ḻoo bana'.
Na' ble'ile' c̱hop anjl zoagake' do xtil, chi'gake' ḻoo bana', toe' chi' yic̱hjinna' na' stoe' chi' xṉi'alin gana' got' kwerp c̱he Jesúza'.
Na'ch che'gake' Maríana': ―¿Berac̱he chbellzo', noolə? Na' golle' ḻegake': ―Chbell' daa ba bidḻejgake' kwerp c̱he X̱an'na', na' bi ṉezid' galə jaloogake'ne'.
Shintg wne' ka', ka bllii jalawe'na' na' ble'ile' ze Jesúza' kolleena', per bi biyombi'e shi Jesúzan'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―¿Berac̱he chbellzo', noolə? ¿Nodaa chiyiljo'? Na' Maríana' chakile' beena' chap yag zix̱kan', na' chi'ene': ―Beṉ'do', shi ba bibejo'ne', wnagach nad' galə jadix̱jo'ne' kwenc̱he yic̱hi'ane'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―¡María! Na' biyec̱hje' na' wṉie'ne' dill' hebreo, chi'ene': ―¡Raboni! ―na' zejin: beṉ' chli' chsedi beṉ'.
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Bi gox̱oo nad', ḻa' biṉ' yiyep' kwit X̱a'na'. Ḻete biyaj, jaṉe beṉ'ka' nak nad' txen jayellgake' ba ziyaa kwit X̱a'na', beena' ḻekzka' nak X̱ale. Lljazoalen' Chios c̱ha'na', beena' ḻekzka' nak Chios c̱hele.
Na'ch biza' María, beṉ' yell Magdálana', jayelle' beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen nan ba ble'ile' X̱ancho Jesúza'. Na' golle' ḻegake' diika' goll Jesúza' ḻe'.
Na' ka goḻ lo llana' bibane', lla nech c̱he xmanna', ba ndop nllag beṉ'ka' nak Jesúza' txen na' nsejtegake' yoona' daa chllebgake' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka', ka gokbe'gakile' ba ze Jesúza' ladje'ka', na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Soashgale mbalaz.
Na' ka biyoll golle' ḻegake' ka', na'ch bliile' ḻegake' c̱hop ḻaate neena' na' kwit ḻi'ena'. Na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen ḻe bibagakile' ble'gakile'ne'.
Na'ch wize' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Soashgale mbalaz. Ka bseḻ' X̱a'na' nad' kwenc̱he zidsoa' yell-lioni, ka'kzan chseḻaa le' llje'le cho'a xtillaana' yell-lioni.
Na' ka wde golle' ḻegake' ka', na'ch blobe' ḻegake', na' chi'e: ―Ḻi ikaa Espíritu Sántona'.
Na' beṉ'ka' yizi'xenle saaxya c̱he'ka', wiyakxenan. Na' beṉ'ka' bi yizi'xenle c̱heyin, bi yiyakxen c̱hegake'.
Tomáza', beena' che'gake' Dídimo nake' txen beṉ'ka' shlliṉ, na' bi lene' ka jali'lao Jesúza' ḻegake'.
Na' che'gake'ne': ―Ba ble'into' X̱anchona'. Na' Tomáza' chi'e ḻegake': ―Shi bi ile'id' neena' na' wde xben'ni gana' wde klabka', na' wde na'ni kwit ḻi'ena', aga wyajḻi'a.
Na' ka wde x̱on' lla, dii yoblə bidop beṉ'ka' nongake' Jesúza' txen ḻoo yoona' na' len Tomáza'. Na' ḻa'kzi nsejtegake' yoona', wyoo Jesúza' jsie' ladje'ka'. Na' chi'e ḻegake': ―Soashgale mbalaz.
Na'ch chi'e Tomáza': ―Bwia na'ni, na' bṉe'n xbeno'na'; na' bṉe' noona' kwit ḻi'ani. Bi gakc̱hoplalloo, san wyajḻe'.
Na'ch che' Tomáza'ne': ―¡Lin' nako' X̱an' na' naktio' Chios c̱ha'!
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Galj ble'ilo' nad' na'ch chajḻi'o. Chakomba beṉ'ka' chajḻe'gake' ḻa'kzi biṉ' ile'gakile' nad'.
Zan yeḻ' wak daa ben Jesúza' lao beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen bi nyojgakan ḻee libri.
Per diiki nyojgakan kwenc̱he shajḻe'le Jesúza' nake' Xiiṉ Chioza' na' ḻen' Crístona', beena' wleje' iṉabi'e, na' daa gonḻilall'lene' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hele dii bi te c̱heyin.
Ka wde, Jesúza' jali'lawe' sto shii beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen cho'a Nisdo' c̱he Galileana' daa ḻekzka' le Nisdo' c̱he Tiberias. Na' ki gok:
Simón Pédrona' len Tomáza', beena' nsi'gake' Dídimo, na' Natanaela', beṉ' yell Canána' daa llia gana' mbani Galileana', na' c̱hopte xiiṉ Zebedewa' na' zi c̱hop beṉ'ka' nongake' Jesúza' txen lle'gake' Galileana'.
Na' Simón Pédrona' chi'e ḻegake': ―Sha'ch' lljx̱en' beḻa'. Na' ḻegake' gollgake'ne': ―Ḻekzka' wza'lennto' li'. Na'ch wyoogake' to ḻoo barkw zejgake' wxen beḻa', na' ni tlish' kono wxengake' do yel.
Na' cheeni'ḻesdo' bllin Jesúza' cho'a nisdo'na', na' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen aga chakbe'gakile' shi ḻen'.
Na'ch Jesúza' wṉie' ḻegake', chi'e: ―Le' beṉ' bish'dawaa, ¿abiṉ' senle beḻa' gaocho? Na' che'gake'ne': ―Aga no de.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi wzaḻ' yix̱j c̱helena' shḻaa de shḻi c̱he barkwa' na' idoḻ'gakb. Na' bengake' ka golle', na' ka nan yigoyogake' yix̱ja' ḻoo nisa' aga chizogakile'n daa nyichachgan beḻka'.
Na' beena' ḻe chaki Jesúza'ne', golle' Pédrona': ―¡X̱anchonan'! Na' kon ka beni Pédrona' golle'ne' ka', lii biyakwte xe'na', na' bxitee ḻoo nisa'.
Na' beṉ'ka' sto biyajlengake' barkwa' cho'a nisdo'na'lə, zingoyon yix̱ja' daa zinyichachga beḻka', ḻa' aga nakchan zit', ka sto guiyoa metrzan.
Na' ka bichejgake' ḻoo barkwa', ble'gakile' ba chi' yi'na' xṉa na' xoa to beḻ lawinna', na' dete yetxtil.
Na' che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi yiyox̱'to beḻka' zi' wxenle.
Na'ch wyoo Simón Pédrona' ḻoo barkwa' kwenc̱he jaselle' yix̱j beḻa' na' bigoyoe'n ax̱t cho'a nisdo'na'. Na' ḻa'kzi tolla'cha nak yix̱ja' daa ziyoon to guiyoa shiiṉiyon beḻ yeḻka', bi bcheza'n.
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Ḻi da gaole xsila'. Na' ni to beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen bi biyaxjgakile' ye'gake'ne': “¿Nora li'?” Ḻa' gokbe'gakile' X̱ancho Jesúza'kzan'.
Na'ch wbig' Jesúza' na' bex̱ee yetxtila' len beḻa' na' bi'e c̱he c̱hegake'.
Na' dga gok de wyoṉ shii jali'lao Jesúza' beṉ'ka' nakgake'ne' txen ka wde bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na' ka bidaogake' xsila', na'ch che' Jesúza' Simón Pédrona': ―Simón, xiiṉ Jonás, ¿achakchilo' nad' aga ka to chaki beṉ'ki nad'? Na' Pédrona' chi'ene': ―X̱an', ṉezkzilo' chakid' li'. Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Na'len wdap bwia beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' nad', beṉ'ka' nak ka xil'do' c̱ha'.
Na' de wchop shii wizṉabile'ne', chi'ene': ―Simón, xiiṉ Jonás, ¿achakilo' nad'? Na' Pédrona' chi'ene': ―X̱an', ṉezkzilo' chakid' li'. Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Na'len wdap bwia beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' nad', beṉ'ka' nak ka xil' c̱ha'.
Na' de wyoṉ shii wizṉabile'ne', chi'ene': ―Simón, xiiṉ Jonás, ¿ana' chakilo' nad'? Na' gokyeshii Pédrona' daa ba gok shoṉ shii chṉab Jesúza' shi chakile'ne', na' chi'ene': ―X̱an', ṉez nḻe'ilo' yog'ḻoḻte, na' ṉezkzilo' chakid' li'. Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Na'len wdap bwia beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' nad', beṉ'ka' nak ka xil'do' c̱ha'.
Dii ḻi nia' li', ka goko' beṉ' wew', gokw xalaano' to kwinzo' na' wyajo' kon ga wnan c̱ho'. Per kat' ba gox̱oo, wḻi nooka' na' yiwakw beṉ' yoblə xalaano'na', na' wc̱hi'e li' ga bi cheenilo' shajo'.
Na' daa goll Jesúza'ne' ka', bzajniile' ḻegake' ka guet Pédrona', na' daa guete' ka' sho' Chioza' balaaṉ. Na' ka wde golle' Pédrona' ka', chi'ene': ―Btiplalloo benḻilall' nad' toshiizi.
Na' biyec̱hj Pédrona' na' ble'ile' beena' sto, beena' ḻe chaki Jesúza'ne', noe' ḻegake'. Ḻen' wchi'e kwit Jesúza' kana' zeelo wdaogake' xshe'na' kana' wṉabile'ne', chi'ene': “X̱an', ¿norakznton' gon li' lo na' beṉ' malka'?”
Na' ka ble'i Pédrona'ne', na'ch chi'e Jesúza': ―X̱an', ¿shera beeni?
Na' che' Jesúza'ne': ―Shi cheenid', ni mbankz beeni kat' yiyed'. Bi sio' beena' wṉeyi. Lin' btiplalloo benḻilall' nad' toshiizi.
Na' daa golle' ka', wze dill' ladj beṉ'ka' chonḻilall' Jesúza' nan aga wet beena'. Per bi goll Jesúza' Pédrona' bi guet beena', san chi'ene': “Shi cheenid', ni mbankze' kat' yiyed'. Bi sio' beena' wṉeyi.”
Na' beena' nake' Jesúza' txen, beena' ḻe chakile', cho'e dill' kon ka gokə na' bzeje'n ḻee libri. Na' ṉezinto' dillaa cho'e nakan dii ḻi.
Dii zanch dii ben Jesúza' na' bi nyojan. Sheḻ' nyoj yog' diika' bene', chakid' bi gaki yell-lioni ikwa' librka' sheḻ'ka'.
Teófilo, ḻee libr necha' bzej', na' bzej' yog' dii wenka' ben Jesúza' na' diika' bli' bsedile' dezd ka wzoloe'
ax̱t ka bllin lla biyepe' yabana'. Na' ka zi' yizee, bzajniile' postlka' wleje' daa goll Espíritu Sántona'ne' kwenc̱he gongake' llinna' daa bene' lall' na'gake'.
Na' ka wde wite' na' bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', jali'lawe' ḻegake' na' dii zan dii bene' kwenc̱he iṉezgakile' nan mbankzen'. Na' lo c̱hoa lla jali'lawe' ḻegake', na' bzajniile' ḻegake' c̱he yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he Chioza'.
Na' shlak wzoalen Jesúza' postlka', golle' ḻegake': ―Bi illeshle Jerusalénni. Ḻi kwez gak ka bc̱heb X̱acho Chioza' gone', kon ka ba wniakz'.
Dii ḻi Juanna' bchoe' beṉ' nisa', per le', aga chllach yidsoa Espíritu Sántona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Na' beṉ'ka' ndop nllag kwit Jesúza', wṉabgakile'ne': ―X̱an', ¿awibejo' cho' beṉ' Israel lo ṉi'a na' beṉ' zit'ka' ṉaa kwenc̱he iṉabi'o neto'?
Na' Jesúza' golle' ḻegake': ―Bi chidoḻ'le iṉezile bi lla bi gor gon X̱acho Chioza' daa gone', ḻa' toze' ḻen' chṉabi'e na' ba bllie' bia' batan gone'n.
Na' ka yidsoa Espíritu Sántona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena' na' goṉe' le' yeḻ' wak, na' we'le xtillaana' yell Jerusalénna', na' doxen gani mbani Judeani na' ḻekzka' gana' mbani Samáriana', na' doxen zbii zkaaṉ yell-lioni.
Na' ka biyoll golle' ka', wzolo biyepe' yabana' chwiate beṉ'ka', na' wze to bej bkwashaan ḻe' na' bich ble'gakile'ne'.
Na' ka lle'gake' chwiagake' yabana' gana' biyep Jesúza', lii bllinte c̱hop anjl kwite'ka', na' zoagake' do xtil.
Na' gollgake': ―Le' beṉ' Galilea, ¿berac̱he chwiazle yabana'? Kwin Jesúza', beena' ble'ile bichej ladjleni na' biyepe' yabana', kakzan ile'ilene' yiyede'.
Na'ch biyetjgake' lo Yaa Olívoza' ziyajgake' Jerusalénna'. Nakan gaozə, ka to daa nllia ley c̱he'ka' bia' koogake' nez llana' chombaaṉgake'.
Na' ka billingake' Jerusalénna', biyepgake' yoona' llia shkwiana' cha'lə gana' zoagake'. Na' beṉ'kin billin: Pédrona', Jacóbona', Juanna', Andréza', Felípena', Tomáza', Bartoloména', Matewa', Jacóbona' xiiṉ Alfewa', Simón, beena' che'gake' Zelote, na' Judas beṉ' bish' Jacóbona'.
Yog' beṉ'ki chdopgake' yog' lla kon beṉ'ka' nak beṉ' bish' Jesúza' kwenc̱he choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza', na' len Maríana' xṉa Jesúza' na' zi' baḻ noolka'.
Na' llaka' wzoagake' na', Pédrona' wzie' ladj beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' Jesucrístona', nakgake' ka do to guiyoa gaḻjə, na' golle' ḻegake':
―Le' beṉ' bish', benan byen billinin ka goll Espíritu Sántona' dii Davina' na' bzeje'n ḻee Cho'a Xtill' Chioza'. Bi'e dill' nakan gon Juda', beena' bc̱hi'e beṉ'ka' bex̱'gake' Jesúza'.
Juda' goke' neto' txen naknto' postl, na' lenen' nan gone' neto' txen dga ngoo lo na'nto' chonnto'.
Na' mecha' daa bex̱ee c̱he dii mala' daa bene', ḻennan' biziile' to yell-lio gana' bxope' de gozyic̱hjlə na' goshj ḻi'ena' na' bchej yog' xjloe'na'.
Na' ka wṉezi beṉ' Jerusalénka' ka gok c̱he Juda', na' bsi'gake' yell-liona' daa bizi'e Acéldama de xtill'gake', na' zejin Yell-lio Chen.
Ḻa' ḻee libr c̱he Sálmoka' nan: Yidesh yiloashga lill xḻatje'na', na' ni sto kochno soan. Na' ḻekzka' nan: Beṉ' yoblə yiyakshga lo nee daa nan gok lo nee gone'.
’Na' chonan byen kwejcho to beṉ'ki bengake' cho' txen toshiizi kana' wzoalen X̱ancho Jesúza' cho',
beṉ'ki nakgake' cho' txen dezd ka bchoa Juanna' Jesúza' nisa' ax̱t ka biyepe' yabana', kwenc̱he gone' cho' txen we'cho dill' nakan gok biban Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch wlejgake' c̱hope': toe' le Matías, na' sto beṉ' yoo shoṉə leyin, José, Barsabás, na'ch Justo.
Na' be'ḻwillgake' Chioza', che'gake': ―Chios, beṉ' nak X̱annto', li' nombi'o yic̱hjlall'do' yog' beṉ'. Bliyi neto' no beṉ'ki c̱hop ba wlejo'
kwenc̱he gake' neto' txen naknto' postl, ḻa' Juda' ba bṉite' daa ndoḻee yeḻ' wen dii mal c̱he'na' na' ziyaje' latja' gana' chidoḻee.
Na'ch bengake' to wyitj kwenc̱he wṉezgakile' noran ba wlej Chioza', na' bidoḻ' Matíaza', na' wlene' postlka' shnej.
Na' ka bllin lla goḻ' lṉi Pentecostéza', yog' beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' Jesúza' tozga ndop nllaggake'.
Na' tokonganzi bengakile' to sshag ka ga za' to be' wal, za'n yabalə na' wṉiṉ doxen ḻoo yoona' gana' lle'gake'.
Na'ch ble'gakile' dii nak ka beḻ yi' chaḻ'ṉiṉan, na' yog'ze' zen yic̱hje'ka'.
Na' Espíritu Santo c̱he Chioza' wyo'e ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' to toe', na' wzologake' wṉegake' wde wdeli dill', kon ka goklall' Espíritu Sántona' iṉe to toe'.
Na' lo llana' beṉ' zan beṉ' Israelka' lle' Jerusalénna' choe'la'ogake' Chioza', no beṉ' zaak wde wdeli yell dii lle' yell-lioni.
Na' ka bengakile' sshaga' daa chak, na' bdop bllaggake' gana' chak ka'. Na' gokllej gokgaṉgakile' ka biyombia'gake' xtilleeka' daa chṉe beṉ'ka' lle' na'.
Na' ḻe chibangakile', na' che' ljwelle': ―¿Aaga beṉ' Galilea yog' beṉ'ki choe' dill'ki?
¿Nakra chak chakzgake' dill'ka' chṉe to tocho, lla?
Ḻa' ni zoa beṉ' Partia, beṉ' Media, beṉ' Elam, beṉ' Mesopotamia, beṉ' Judea, beṉ' Capadocia, beṉ' Ponto, beṉ' Asia,
beṉ' Frigia na' Panfilia, beṉ' Egipto na' zi baḻe' beṉ' África, beṉ' zaak gaozə yell Cirénena', na' ḻekzka' len beṉ' za' Rómana'te. Baḻcho nakcho beṉ' Israel, na' zi baḻcho choncho beṉ' Israelki txen.
Na' ḻekzka' zoa beṉ' Creta na' beṉ' Arabia. Na' yog'techo chenicho chṉe beṉ'ki xtill' to tocho, choe'gake' dill' c̱he dii wenka' ba ben Chioza', diika' chonan ka yibanicho.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' bdop bllag na', bibangakile' na' gokllej gokgaṉgakile'. Na' che' ljwellgake': ―¿Bi zejin dga, lla?
Na' baḻe' wṉeḻegakile' ḻegake', nagake': ―Zolli beṉ'kin.
Na'ch Pédrona' wzechaile' len postlka' zi shnej, na' wṉie' zillj chi'e beṉ'ka' ndop nllag na': ―Le' beṉ' Israel na' yog'le le' zoale Jerusalénni, cheenid' wzajniid' le' bi zeji dga chak, ḻi wzenagyeṉ' dga iṉia' le'.
Beṉ'ki nak' txen aga zollgakilen' ka chza'lall'zle, ḻa' shzilgaz ṉaa.
Dga chak ki ṉaa, chillinin daa wna dii Joela', beena' bzej daa goll Chioza'ne' kani'yi, na' wne':
Kat' ba zoa illin lla te c̱he yell-lioni, nad' Chios wi'a Espíritu c̱ha'na' soe' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ'ka' lle' zbii zkaaṉ yell-lioni. Na' gon' kwenc̱he xiiṉleka', ka bi' byo na' ka bi' noolə, c̱hix̱je'gakb' daa yep'gakb'. Na' bi' wew'ka' ile'do'gakib', na' beṉ' golka' iṉegakile' yel.
Na' ka'kzə wi'a Espíritu c̱ha'na' yog' beṉ'ka' choe'la'ogake' nad' llana' gak ka', ka beṉ' byo ka noolə, na' we'gake' dill'ka' wx̱oa' cho'a ḻolleeka'.
Na' xan yabana' wli'a dii gonan ka yibani beṉ', na' ka'kzə lo yell-lioni wli'gakidee chen, na' yi', na' llen.
Wbilla' bich wzeeni'n, na' bewaa yiyakan xṉa ka chen ka zi' illin lla choo lla xen c̱he X̱anchona'.
Na' nottez beṉ' iṉabile' X̱ancho Chioza' gaklene'ne', na' yisle'ne' kwenc̱he bi kwiayee.
’Na' le' nakle beṉ' Israel, ḻi wzenag dga iṉia' le'. Ṉezkzile Chioza' wleje' Jesús, beṉ' Nazareta', daa bi'ene' yeḻ' wṉabia'na' kwenc̱he bidyene' ladjleni dii zan yeḻ' wak choo yeḻ' wak xen na' bichlə dii benan ka bibani beṉ'.
Na' beeni goke' lall' na'le kon ka bllia Chioza' bia' gak c̱he', na' béx̱'lene' bénlene' lo na' beṉ' malka' kwenc̱he betgake'ne' ḻee yag cruza'.
Per Chioza' bisbane'ne' ladj beṉ' wetka', na' bi bi'e latj guete' toshiizi, daa bi gok iṉabia' yeḻ' wita' ḻe'.
Dii Davina' bi'e dill' c̱he Jesúza' kani'yi, ka wne': Chle'id' X̱an'na' toshiizi. Na' daa zoe' kwitii shḻaa de shḻini kono gak bi goni nad'.
Daan ḻe chibayi lall'dawaani na' cho'a dill' ka mbalaz zoa'. Na' beli chen c̱ha'ni nonan lez yibanan,
ḻa' aga wsanlalloo nad' toshiizi ladj beṉ' wetka', ni bi wi'o latj gooll' iteb beli chen c̱ha'ni daa nak' lall' no'.
Ba bliilo' nad' nakan nak neza' sho'a kwenc̱he gat'ch yeḻ' mban c̱ha', na' yiba yizakid' daa soalen' li' toshiizi.
’Le' beṉ' bish', ṉezkzicho dii x̱ozxto'cho Davina' wite' na' bkwash'gake'ne', na' ni nakbia'te ṉaa gana' bkwash'gake'ne'.
Na' dii Davina' bi'e dill' diika' goll Chioza' ḻe', na' wṉezile' kwin Chioza' bc̱hebe' wzoe' to xiiṉ dia' c̱he' iṉabi'e.
Chioza' bliile' dii Davina' diika' zi' gak c̱he Crístona', na' bi'e dill' yibane' ladj beṉ' wetka' ka wne' aga wigaaṉe' ladj beṉ' wetka' na' ni bi gooll' iteb beli chen c̱he'na'.
Na' ka' gok, Chioza' bisbane' Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka', na' yog'nto' ble'into'ne' na' choe'nto' dill' bibane'.
Na' ka biyoll bigoyoe'ne' yabana' na' wlekwe'ne' kwite' de shḻina', bene' lo nee bseḻee Espíritu Sántona' ladjnto'ni ka bc̱hebe'. Na' Espíritu Sántona' ba bene' yog' dga ba ben ble'ile ṉaa.
Bi gakile dii Davinan' biyepe' yabana', ḻa' kwine', wne': X̱ancho Chioza' golle' X̱an'na': “Wche' kwit' de shḻi ni
shlak wzoa' xṉi'ona' beṉ'ka' chakzbani li'.”
’Na' nia' le', yog'cho cho' beṉ' Israel chiyaḻ' iṉezicho, Jesúza', beena' betle ḻee yag cruza', Chioza' bzoe'ne' nake' X̱ancho, na' ḻen' Crístona', beena' wlej Chioza' iṉabi'e cho'.
Na' beṉ'ka' lle' na' ka bengakile' goll Pédrona' ḻegake' ka', ḻe nyesh'chga gokgakile', na' wṉabgakile' Pédrona' na' postlka' sto, che'gake': ―Le' beṉ' bish', ¿beran chiyaḻ' gonnto' shka'?
Na'ch Pédrona' chi'e ḻegake': ―To tole, ḻi yiyaj yileni na' ḻi c̱hoa nisa' shi ba chonḻilall'le Jesucrístona', na' yiyakxen xtoḻ'leka' na' yidsoa Espíritu Sántona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Chioza' ba bc̱hebe' goṉe' le Espíritu c̱he'na', na' len xiiṉleka', na' nottez beṉ' zit'. Ḻa' nc̱hebe' wi'ene' yog' beṉ' gaxe' kwenc̱he gonḻilall'gake'ne'.
Na' dii zanch dill' be'len Pédrona' ḻegake', got'yoile' ḻegake', chi'e: ―Ḻi yisla kwinle lao yel' zi'na' daa ile'i beṉ' wen dii malka' bi chajḻe' c̱he Chioza'.
Na' beṉ'ka' wyajḻe' daa goll Pédrona' wchoagake' nisa'; na' lo llana' shoṉa mil beṉ'ka' wlengake' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Jesúza'.
Na' yog'gake' wzegake' wṉeyi bengake' diika' bli' bsedi postlka' ḻegake', na' xochi wzoagake'. Na' bdop bllaggake' be'ḻwillgake' Chioza' na' weej wdaogake' txen.
Na' yog'ze' bibani daa ble'gakile' yeḻ' wak zanka' ben postlka'.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake' Jesúza' gokgake' toz, na' choe' ljwelle' bi ka dii chyallji to toe'.
Na' biyit' bidegake' no yell-lio, no yoo c̱hegake' wa bichlə dii napgake' na' choe' ljwellgake' ka to dii chyallji to toe'.
Na' yog' lla bdopgake' lesh' chyoodo'na' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza', na' ḻekzka' bibagakile' weej wdaogake' txen lill ljwellgake'.
Na' wzoatezi wzoagake' be'la'ogake' Chioza' na' yog'zə beṉ' gokbe'gakile' ka mba chongake'. Na' yog' lla, X̱ancho Chioza' bene' ka wyanch beṉ'ka' benḻilall' Jesucrístona'.
To lla do ka chida shoṉə shlle'na', ka gora' chdop chllag beṉ' Israelka' choe'ḻwillgake' Chioza', Pédrona' len Juanna' wyajgake' yoodo'na'.
Na' cho'a puert c̱he zeena' daa nec̱hj yoodo'na', puert daa nsi'gake' Puert Xochi, chi' to beṉ' nxiṉj ṉi'ena' ka goljtie'. Na' yog' lla chjḻekgake'ne' na' kwenc̱he chṉabe' karidá lao beṉ'ka' chdop chllag yoodo'na'.
Na' ka bllin Pédrona' na' Juanna' gana' chi'e, na' wṉabile' ḻegake' izangakile' lat' mech we'gake'ne'.
Na'ch Pédrona' len Juanna' bwiagake'ne', na' Pédrona' golle'ne': ―Bwiakachi neto'.
Na' beena' bwie' ḻegake', gokile' mechan' we'gake'ne'.
Na' Pédrona' chi'ene': ―Bibi mech nap' goṉ' li', ḻete dii nap' goṉ' li'. Kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Jesucristo, beṉ' Nazareta', nia' li' bizolla' na' bigoo nez.
Na'ch Pédrona' wdoyoe' nee de shḻina' na' bisolléene', na' lii biyakteyi ṉi'ena'.
Na'ch ka beṉ' bxit'zə bene' bizollee. Na' wyoolene' ḻegake' lesh' chyoodo'na' chec̱hj chde' na' chxit'sheshe' choe'lawee Chioza'.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' lle' na' ble'gakile'ne' chde' choe'lawee Chioza',
na' billej bibangakile' daa nombia'gake'ne' chbi'e chṉabe' karidá cho'a puert daa nsi'gake' Puert Xochi.
Na' beena' biyaki ṉi'ena' aga bsane' Pédrona' len Juanna', kon noe' ḻegake'. Na' yog' beṉ'ka' lle' lesh' chyoodo'na' chillej chibangakile' na' wyajdogake' gana' zoa koridor daa le Koridor C̱he dii Salomón gana' zelengake' beena' biyaki.
Na' ka ble'i Pédrona' beṉ'ka' chdop chllag na', golle' ḻegake': ―Le' beṉ' Israel, ¿berac̱he chibanzile daa biyaki beeni? ¿Na' berac̱he chwiazle neto'? ¿Achakile kon yeḻ' wak c̱hento'nan' biyaki beeni? ¿Awa chakile daa zoanto' chonnto' ka chiyoolallii Chiozan' biyakile'? Aga daan.
Chios, beena' be'la'o dii Abrahama', dii Isaaca', dii Jacoba', na' nochlə dii x̱ozto'choka', ḻen' wlo'e Xiiṉe' Jesúza' balaaṉ xenna', beena' benle lo na' beṉ'ka' betgake'ne'. Na' ka goklall' Pilátona' yisane'ne', bi be'le latj.
Lwaa dii nan iṉable yisane' Jesúza', beena' nak ḻiizelozi beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', beṉ' wen xyana'lə wṉable bisane'.
Kan' benle betle Jesúza', beena' choṉ yeḻ' mban daa nak dowalj. Per Chioza' bisbane'ne' ladj beṉ' wetka', na' neto' choe'nto' dill' daa ṉezinto' bibane'.
Daa chonḻilall'nto' Jesúzan', ba biyaki beeni chwiale na' nombia'le. Dii ḻi, daa nonḻilall'nto' Jesúzan' chwiatele ba biyakchaile'.
’Le' beṉ' bish', ṉezid', ka le' na' ka beṉ'ka' chṉabia' le', bi gokbe'ile bin benle ka betle Jesúza'.
Na' Chioza' bi'e latj gok ka' kwenc̱he billinin ka wna dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee xtilleena' kani'yi, daa wnagake' Crístona' biya dii wc̱hi' wsak' beṉ' ḻe'.
Na' ṉaa, ḻi wzenag c̱he X̱ancho Chioza', na' ḻi yiyaj yileni dii malka' chonle kwenc̱he yizi'xene' c̱hele na' wzoe' le' mbalaz.
Na' yiseḻee Crístona', beena' wleje' kwenc̱he iṉabi'e, kon ka wdix̱jee dii beṉ'ka' kani'yi.
Chonan byen yigaaṉe' yabana' ax̱t ka illin lla yiyonshao' Chioza' yog'ḻoḻte dii de, kon ka goll Chioza' dii beṉ'ka' wleje' wdix̱je'gake' cho'a xtilleena' kani'yi.
Ḻa' dii Moiséza' golle' dii x̱ozxto'choka' dill'ki: “X̱ancho Chioza' kweje' sto beṉ' ka nad' ladjleni, beṉ' c̱hix̱je'ile' le' bi dill' we'lene'ne'. Na' ḻi wzenag yog' daa iṉe'.
Na' beena' bi wzenag c̱he', Chioza' kwej yic̱hje'ne' na' bich gak gone' txen beṉ'ka' nak yell c̱he Chioza'.”
’Na' yog'ḻoḻ dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa goll Chioza' ḻegake' kani'yi, wzolozan kon dii Samuela', wdix̱je'gake' gak diiki chak ṉaa.
Len', naki c̱hele daa ba bc̱heb Chioza' lao dii beṉ'ka' wdix̱jee daa golle' ḻegake' kani'yi. Na' ḻekzka' naki c̱hele dii wenna' daa bc̱heb Chioza' gone' c̱he dii x̱ozxto'cho Abrahama', ka golle'ne': “Ni c̱he xiiṉ dia c̱ho'na' gon' dii wen c̱he yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' lle' zbii zkaaṉ yell-lioni.”
Na' ka bseḻ' Chioza' Xiiṉe' Jesúza', zigaate bseḻeene' ladjchoni kwenc̱he gak wen c̱hecho na' to tocho yiyaj yilenicho dii malka' choncho.
Na' ni choe'lente Pédrona' len Juanna' beṉ'ka' dill' ka bllin bx̱ozka' len beena' ngoo lo nee beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na' na' len zi baḻ saduceoka'.
Ḻe chllaagake' daa chli' chsedi Pédrona' len Juanna' beṉ'ka' lle' na' nakan gok biban Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch bex̱'gake' ḻegake', na' daa ba wlle', jḻoogake' ḻegake' lillyana', ax̱t betiyoch bibejgake' ḻegake'.
Per beṉ' zan beṉ'ka' bzenaggake' dillaa be' Pédrona' len Juanna' benḻilall'gake' Jesúza'. Na' ka', wyanch beṉ'ka' benḻilall'gake'ne', na' gokgake' ka do gayaa mil to beṉ' byoka'zə.
Na' betiyo bidop billag beṉ'ka' chṉabia' beṉ' Israelka' yell Jerusalénna', len beṉ' golka' chṉabia', na' beṉ'ka' chli' chsedi leya'.
Na' ḻekzka' len Anáza', beena' nak bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xen, na' Caifáza', Juanna', Alejándrona', na' nokchlə beṉ'ka' nak dialla c̱he bx̱oz choo bx̱oz xenna'.
Na'ch bzegake' Pédrona' len Juanna' gchoḻe'ka', na' wṉabgakile' ḻegake': ―¿No lsens c̱heyi na' no bseḻ' le' chonle diiki?
Na' Espíritu Santo c̱he Chioza' bzajniile' Pédrona' kwenc̱he golle' ḻegake' ki: ―Le' beṉ' wṉabia', na' le' beṉ' gol chṉabia'le yell Israeli,
chṉabile neto' ka nak dii wenna' gok c̱he beeni, na' cheenile iṉezile nakan gok biyakile'.
Cheeninto' yog'ḻoḻ-le iṉezile na' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' Israelka' iṉezgakile', beeni chwiale ze laoleni biyakile' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Jesucristo, beṉ' Nazareta', beena' betle ḻee yag cruza', per Chioza' bisbane'ne' ladj beṉ' wetka'.
C̱he Jesúzan' choe'n dill' daa nan “yaja' daa bi wyoolall'le le' nakle wen yoo, ḻeyeṉ'lannan' yaja' daa ba nc̱hejcha yoona'.”
Bichga zoa sto beṉ' yoblə gak yisle' cho' kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'cho. Ḻa' kochno zoa doxen yell-lioni beṉ' ba wlej Chioza' kwenc̱he yisle' cho'.
Ḻe bibani beṉ' wṉabia'ka' daa chwiagake' bi blleb Pédrona' len Juanna' choe'gake' dillaa lawe'ka', ḻa' nakbia' aga bi nsedgake' na' aga no nakgake'. Na' gokbe'gakile' daa wdalengake' Jesúza' txenan chongake' ka'.
Na' daa ze beena' biyaki ṉi'ena' kwite'ka', bibi gok ye'gake' ḻegake'.
Na'ch bibejgake' ḻegake' shlak be'len ljwellgake' dill' nak koogake' xṉezin.
Che' ljwelle': ―¿Nakra goncho c̱he beṉ'ki? Ḻa' yog'zə beṉ' zoa Jerusalénni iṉezgakile' ba bengake' to yeḻ' wak xen, na' aga wak iṉacho bi nakan ka'.
Na' kwenc̱he bich ides dill'ka' choe'gake', chiyaḻ' kooshebchogake' kwenc̱he kochno we'lengake' dill' c̱he Jesúza'.
Na'ch goxgake' Pédrona' len Juanna' dii yoblə, na' gollgake' ḻegake' bich wli' wsedgakile' beṉ' ni bi we'lengake' ḻegake' xtill' Jesúza'.
Na' Pédrona' len Juanna' che'gake': ―Ḻi wwiayeṉ'shki shi nakan wen lao Chioza' wzenagnto' c̱hele lwaa dii wzenagnto' c̱he'.
Bi gak wsannto' we'nto' dill' daa ben ble'into' c̱he Jesúza'.
Na'ch beṉ' wṉabia'ka' biya dii gollgake' ḻegake' kwenc̱he nan illebgake', na'ch bisanchokləgake' ḻegake', ḻa' bibi billel-lall'gake' gongake' daa yog'zə beṉ' choe'la'ogake' Chioza' ni c̱he daa gok.
Na' beena' biyaki ṉi'ena' kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Jesúza' ba wdeile' c̱hoa yiz.
Na' ka bisangake' Pédrona' len Juanna', biyajgake' gana' zoa beṉ'ka' nonlengake' txen na' gollgake' ḻegake' yog' daa goll bx̱ozka' chṉabia' na' beṉ' golka' chṉabia'.
Na' ka bengakile' daa gollgake' ḻegake', na'ch gokgake' toz be'ḻwillgake' Chioza', che'gake': ―Chios, li' nako' beṉ' zeelo chṉabia'. Li' beno' yabana', yell-lioni, na' nisdo'na', na' yog'te dii de lo yell-lioni.
Na' Espíritu Santo c̱ho'na' bx̱oe' dill'ki cho'a ḻoll' dii Davina' kana' wne': ¿Berac̱he chllaa chlokz beṉ' yell-lioki? ¿Berac̱he toshiizi chgoo beṉ'ki xṉezin gongake' daa bi nxe bi nzak'?
Beṉ'ka' chṉabia' lo yell-lioni gokgake' toz gokzbangakile' na' biṉiatezgake' X̱ancho Chioza' len Crístona', beena' wleje' kwenc̱he iṉabi'e.
