Na' kat' zoa' ladj beṉ'ka' bi nombia' ley daa bzej dii Moiséza', na' chsa' c̱ha' ka nsa' c̱hegake' kwenc̱he gonḻilall'gake' Crístona'. Per bi iṉacho chzoa' ka'lə daa nllia Chioza' bia', ḻa' chzenag' c̱he leya' daa bzoa Crístona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'dawaani.
Na' kat' zoa' ladj beṉ'ka' chaki dii zan dii bi de lsens gongake', na' chsa' c̱ha' ka nsa' c̱hegake' kwenc̱he wzajni'chgakidee c̱he Crístona'. Ba bsa' c̱ha' ka nsa' c̱he yog'ḻoḻgake' kwenc̱he gon' gan yisla' baḻgake' na' bi kwiayi'gake'.
Chon' yog' diiki kwenc̱he wzenag beṉ' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' na' yizi'lengakee banez c̱heyin.
Ṉezkzile ka nak c̱he beṉ'ka' chxoṉj, zangake' chxoṉjgake', per tochokzen' gone' gan na' ikee daa chidoḻee. Na' ka chon beena' chxoṉj kwenc̱he gone' gan, kan' chiyaḻ' gonle, ḻi gon ka dii le gonle ka cheeni Chioza' kwenc̱he goṉe' daa si'le banez.
Beṉ' wyitjka' chsed, chbej yic̱hjgake' daa chzoazi'yaa kwerp c̱he'ka'. Na' chongake' ka' kwenc̱he idoḻ' illongakile' daa yibagakile' xtit shloll na' te c̱heyin. San cho' choncho to dii byen kwenc̱he idoḻ' illonicho to dii biga llia te c̱heyin.
Daan, nad' bi chon' ka beena' kon chxoṉj ni bi ṉezile' gan illine', ni bi chon' ka beena' chdiḻ na' bi chzakile' kwalle' beena' chdiḻ-lene'.
San chṉabi'a kwin' kwenc̱he chon' daa chiyaḻ' gon' kwenc̱he ki, ka yiyoll wli' wsedid' beṉ' nakan chiyaḻ' gone', nad'lə bi sho'lall'zi Chioza' ka nsa' c̱ha'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', bi cheenid' gaḻ-lall'le daa gok c̱he dii x̱ozxto'choka', yog'gake' wloogake' nez xan beja' daa bze Chioza' na' yog'gake' bidegake' lo neza' bsalje' ḻoo nisdo'na'.
Na' yog'gake' nakgake' ka beṉ' wchoa nis daa gokgake' dii Moiséza' txen biyajlengake'ne' xan beja' na' daa bidelengake'ne' lo neza' daa byalj ḻoo nisdo'na'.
Na' yog'ḻoḻe' wdaogake' toz yeḻ' wao daa be' Chioza' ḻegake'.
Na' yog'ḻoḻgake' weejgake' toz nis daa bi'e ḻegake', nisa' daa gol ḻee yaja', yaja' daa zaklebi Crístona', beena' wzoalene' ḻegake'.
Ḻa'kzi yog'ḻoḻgake' wxi'gake' banez diika', zangake' bi biyoolallii Chioza' ka bengake', na' witgake' gana' bibi chashj chḻeb.
Na' yog' diika' gok c̱hegake' chzajniin cho' bi chiyaḻ' selall'cho goncho dii mala' ka bengake'.
Bi chiyaḻ' we'la'ole diika' non beṉ' lwaa lsak' chios c̱he'ka' ka ben baḻgake', ḻa' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: “Wche'gake' weej wdaogake' na' biyolla' bengake' kon daa nazan c̱he beli chen c̱he'ka'.”
Na' bi chiyaḻ' gat'lencho nottez beṉ', ka ben baḻgake', na' daa bengake' ka', shllaz wit shoṉichoa milgake'.
Na' bi chiyaḻ' wzoacho Chioza' gone' daa nazan c̱hecho, ka ben baḻgake', na' daa bengake' ka' wdiṉyaa beḻka' ḻegake' na' witgake'.
Ni bibi gon iṉazle c̱he Chioza' ka ben baḻgake' na' ni c̱heyin bseḻee anjl c̱he'na' beena' bete' ḻegake'.
Na' yog' diiki gok c̱hegake' nakan to dii chzajnii cho' bi goncho ka bengake', na' lliagakan ḻee Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' kwenc̱he chsi'nin cho' mbancho llaki zeelo.
Daan, nottezcho shi chakicho zoac̱hec̱hcho nonḻilall'cho Crístona', chiyaḻ' wsak'cho kwenc̱he bi ibix̱cho goncho dii mala'.
Yog' dii malka' chdiḻ chllagle nakgakan ka diika' chdiḻ chllag nottez beṉ'. Na' wak wx̱enilall'le Chioza' gaklene' le', ḻa' ḻen' bi wi'e latj idiḻ illagle daa bi so sakile, san kat' idiḻ illaglen, ḻekzen' gaklene' le' kwenc̱he so sakile yichejle lawinna'.
Daan, le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, bi we'la'ole diika' non beṉ' lwaa lsak' chios c̱he'ka'.
Chshaljlen' le' ba nteile, na' kwinkzle gakbe'ile shi dga chzajniid' le' nakan shḻi.
Kat' chisa'lall'cho daa wit Crístona' ni c̱hecho, na' cheejcho lat' wej vinona' na' choe'cho Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken, zejin nakcho Crístona' txen daa blalj xc̱hene'na' ni c̱hecho. Na' kat' chxoxjcho yetxtila' na' chaochon, zejin nakchone' txen daa bzani kwerp c̱he'na' wite' ni c̱hecho.
Na' ḻa'kzi nakcho beṉ' zan, toz yetxtilan' chaocho, na' zejin nakcho ka toz kwerp.
Na' ḻi wwia ka chon beṉ' Israelka'. Yog' beṉ'ka' chaogake' xpel' bayix̱'ka' chitgake' lao Chioza' nakgake' toz choe'la'ogake'ne'.
Na' bi gakile nia' lwaa lsak' daa non beṉ' chios c̱he'ka' nakgakan dii zakii, ni bi gakile' bel' c̱he bayix̱'ka' chitgake' lawinka' zak'chgakan ka bittezə bel'.
San ki zejin daa nia' ka': kat' beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall'gake' Chioza' chitgake' bayix̱'ka' chlliagake'n lao lwaa lsak' chios c̱he'ka', dii x̱iw'ka'lan choe'gake'n, na' aga Chiozan'. Na' bi cheenid' we'la'olenle ḻegake' dii x̱iw'ka'.
Bi gak yeej gaocho daa cheej chaocho kat' chisa'lall'cho daa wit X̱ancho Crístona', na' ḻekzka' yeej gaotezcho daa cheej chao beṉ'ka' choe'la'o dii x̱iw'ka'.
Bi chiyaḻ' wshaacho Chioza', ḻa' aga wzo wzakichone'.
Dez dill', nagake': “Wak goncho bittez dii cheenicho.” Dii ḻikzan, per aga yog' daa gak goncho nakan wen. Ḻa'kzi de latj goncho bittezə, aga yog' daa goncho gaklenan bish' ljwellchoka' gakchachgake' lao Chioza'.
Ni tocho bi chiyaḻ' goncho ka gak wen c̱he tozcho, san chiyaḻ' gaklencho beṉ' yoblə kwenc̱he gak wen c̱he'.
Bittezə bel' dii chit'gake' lao yaana' wakə si'len. Na' bi iṉable shi nakan dii blliagake' lao lwaa lsak' chios c̱he'ka' kwenc̱he bi gakc̱hoplall'le c̱heyin.
Ḻa' doxen yell-lioni na' yog'te daa de lawinna' nakan c̱he X̱ancho Chioza'.
Shi to beṉ' bi nonḻilallee Crístona' chaxe' le' lljtaole lille'na', na' cheenile' shajle, ḻi yeej ḻi gao daa goṉe', na' bi iṉabilene' shi nakan dii bllie' lao lwaa lsak' chios c̱he'na' kwenc̱he bi gakc̱hoplall'le c̱heyin.
San shi no iṉa le': “Beli nakan dii wllia lao lwaa lsak' chios c̱ha'ka'”, na' bi gaolen ni c̱he beena' wna le' ka'. Ḻa' beena' wna ka' wakte gakile' malan chonle shi gaolen.
Bi gakile nia' malan gonle gaolen, san nia' ka' ni c̱he beena' gakile' malan chonle shi gaolen. Ḻa'kzi ṉezid' aga bi nonan gaw' bittezə, bi cheenid' gon' ka sa'lall' beṉ' yoblə nan malan' chon'.
Na' shi cho'a Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken c̱heyi daa gaw', ¿berac̱he iṉaz beṉ' malan chon' daa chaw' to dii ba bi'a Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken c̱heyin?
Na' bittezə dii chonle, shi cheej chaole wa shi bichlə dii yoblə chonle, chiyaḻ' gonlen ka sho' Chioza' balaaṉ.
Bi gonle ka ixop beṉ' yoblə gone' to dii mal, ḻaa nake' beṉ' Israel, ḻaa bi nake' beṉ' Israel, ḻaa nake' beṉ' nakcho txen nonḻilall'cho Chioza'.
Ḻi gon ka nad', ḻa' chon' to dii byen toshiizi chon' ka yiyoolallii yog' beṉ'. Aga chon' kwenc̱he to nad'zə gak wen c̱ha', san chon' ka gak wen c̱he beṉ' yoblə kwenc̱he yilagake' bi kwiayi'gake'.
Ḻi wsa' to c̱hele ka nsa' c̱ha', ḻa' nad' nsa' c̱ha' ka bsa' c̱he Crístona'.
Ḻe wen chonle daa toshiizi chjadinile nad' na' ni zejlenle diika' bli' bsedid' le'.
Per cheenid' shajniile dga: Chioza' chṉabi'e Crístona', na' Crístona' chṉabi'e yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' byo, na' beṉ' byoka' chṉabia'gake' nool c̱he'ka'.
Na' nottezə beṉ' byo shi nkwash' yic̱hje'na' shlak choe'ḻwille' Chioza' wa shlak chyix̱ji'e daa che' Chioza'ne', bi chgwee Crístona' balaaṉ.
San shi nottez nool bi wkwash' yic̱hje'na' shlak choe'ḻwille' Chioza' wa shlak chyix̱ji'e daa che' Chioza'ne', na' chṉite' balaaṉ c̱he beṉ' c̱he'na'. Na' shi ka' chone', na' nake' ka to noolə beṉ' nshib ax̱t lo yej.
Na' shi to noolə bi wkwash' yic̱hje'na', wenlan wshibteguen' ax̱t lo yej. Na' shi chido'ile' wshiben', chiyaḻ' wkwasheen.
Na' beṉ' byona' bi chiyaḻ' wkwash' yic̱hje'na' daa nake' lwaa lsak' Chioza' na' chli'e balaaṉ c̱he'na'. Na' noola' chli'e balaaṉ c̱he beṉ' c̱he'na'.
Ḻa' aga kwit ḻee noolan' wlej Chioza' beṉ' byona', san noolan' wleje'ne' kwit ḻee beṉ' byona'.
Na' ni bi bx̱ie' beṉ' byona' kwenc̱he gaklene' noola', san bx̱ie' noola' kwenc̱he gaklene' beṉ' byona'.
Ni c̱heyi daan, na' ni c̱he anjlka' len ladjchoka', chiyaḻ' wkwash' yic̱hje'ka' kwenc̱he nakbia' chapgake' balaaṉ beṉ' c̱he'ka'.
Per cho' nakcho X̱ancho Crístona' txen, ṉezicho noolka' chyalljgakile' cho' beṉ' byo, na' cho' beṉ' byo chyalljicho noolka'.
Ḻa' ka nak daa bchej noola' kwit ḻee beṉ' byona', ḻekzka' beṉ' byona', noolan' chzane' ḻe'; per Chiozan' bx̱e bsile' yog'ḻoḻ.
Na' le'zə, ḻi wwiakachi shi nakan wen we'ḻwill noolka' Chioza' gaḻ' yic̱hjzgake'.
Kon ka yoolocho choncho, chakbe'icho nakan yeḻ' zto' we'z beṉ' byona' latj igol yish' yic̱hje'na'.
San nakan wen we' noola' latj igol yish' yic̱hje'na' na' nakan to balaaṉ c̱he'. Ḻa' Chioza' none'n kwenc̱he wkwasha'n yic̱hje'na'.
Na' shi nole bi chazlall'le dga ba wnia', chiyaḻ' iṉezile ka neto' na' ka yog' kwen beṉ'ka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Chioza', toz ka yoolonto' chonnto'.
Na' ka nak dga iṉia' le', bi gak iṉia' ḻe wen chonle. Ḻa' kat' chdop chllagle choe'la'ole Chioza' lwaayin dii nan gaklenan le', chzoazi'yaalan le'.
Zigaate cheenid' iṉia' le' daa ba benid' nagake' c̱hele nan kat' chdop chllagle choe'la'ole Chioza' nonzə c̱he c̱hel-le. Na' chajḻi'a dii ḻiljakz ka chonlen.
Na' chakljayile chiyaḻ' gakle c̱hop shoṉ kwenlə kwenc̱he wli'lawin nolen chazlalli Chioza' ka chonle.
Na' kat' chdop chllagle na' cheej chaolen ljwell-le txen kwenc̱he chisa'lall'le daa wit X̱ancho Jesucrístona', bi chonlen ka bllie' bia'.
Ḻa' kat' yeej gaole, bi chbez ljwell-le kwenc̱he yeej gaole txen, san to tole lii cheej chaotele yeḻ' wao c̱heleka'. Na' baḻ-le bibi de gaole na' zi baḻ-le ax̱t chzollile.
¿Abi zoa lill-le ga yeej gaole? ¿Berac̱he chonzile nakzi beṉ'ka' nakcho txen choe'la'ocho Chioza' na' chsi'zle yeḻ' zto' beṉ'ka' bibi de yeej gaogake'? ¿Bitgui iṉiale, lla? ¿Achakile iṉia' le' ḻe wen chonle? Bi iṉia' le' ka', ḻa' aga wenan chonle.
Dga ba bli' bsedid' le' nakan daa bli' bsedi X̱ancho Jesucrístona' nad'. Lle'na' ben Júda'ne' lo na' beṉ' malka', X̱ancho Jesúza' bex̱ee yetxtila',
na' biyoll bi'e Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken, na'ch bxoxje'n na' chi'e: “Dgan kwerp c̱ha'ni daa chzanid' ni c̱hele. Ḻi gox̱' lat' wejan gaolen. Ḻi gon dga kwenc̱he lljadinile nad'.”
Na' ḻekzka' biyoll wdaogake' xshe'na', bex̱ee kopa' daa yoll vinona', na' chi'e: “Dga yollə ḻoo kopi zejin x̱chen'na' daa ḻaljə daa gon ka gakḻi dii koba' bc̱heb Chioza' gone'. Ḻi gon dga, na' to to ka yeejlen ḻi lljadini nad'.”
Na' to to ka gaole yetxtila' na' yeejle vinona' ax̱t llana' yiyed X̱ancho Crístona' zejin chyix̱je'ile beṉ' ka nak daa wite' ni c̱hecho.
Nottezə beṉ' gawe' yetxtila' wa yeeje' vinona' daa chonan ka lljadinicho X̱anchona', na' bi chape' balaaṉ ka nak daa chone', toz ka nak xtoḻeena' ka c̱he beṉ'ka' betgake' X̱anchona' na' blaljgake' xc̱hene'na'.
Daan, to tocho chiyaḻ' yiya yiyilj kwincho kat' zi' gaocho yetxtila' na' kat' zi yeejcho vinona'.
Ḻa' Chioza' wsak'zi'e nottez beṉ' konteḻe yeej gawe'n na' bi gone'n ka kwee X̱ancho Crístona' balaaṉ daa bzani kwerp c̱he'na' ni c̱hecho.
Daan, zanle bi shao'le wa zoazi'yaale, na' baḻ beṉ'ka' nakle txen ba witgake'.
Per shi yiya yiyilj kwincho, X̱ancho Chioza' bi wsak'zi'e cho'.
Na' shi chsak'zi'e cho', chone'n kwenc̱he yigooshḻilall'cho na' bi wlliayi'lene' cho' beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall'gake'ne'.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', kat' chdop chllagle kwenc̱he yeej gaole, ḻi kwez ljwell-le.
Na' shi nole chbiḻ chdonle, chiyaḻ' yeej gaole ḻoo yoo lill-le kwenc̱he bi gonle ka gonan byen tele yeḻ' zak'zi' daa bi chonle wen kat' chdop chllagle. Dech diika' cheenid' wzajniid' le', na' kwaa xṉezin kat' yidwia' le'.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', cheenid' iṉezile c̱he diika' noṉ Espíritu c̱he Chioza' gak gon to tocho.
Ṉezkzile kana' biṉ' gonḻilall'le X̱ancho Jesúza', bentezle txen beṉ'ka' choe'la'o lwaa lsak' chioska' diika' ni bi chak iṉe.
Daan, cheenid' iṉezile ni to beṉ' bi iṉe': “Aga bi zakii Jesúza'” shi zoalen Espíritu c̱he Chioza' ḻe'. Na' ḻekzka' ni to beṉ' bi gak iṉe': “Jesúza' nake' X̱ancho” shi bi zoalen Espíritu Santo c̱he Chioza' ḻe'.
Wde wdeli daa choṉ Espíritu c̱he Chioza' to tocho, per ḻekzen' choṉe' yog'tegakan.
Wde wdeli nak xshin X̱ancho Crístona' goncho, per toze' ḻen' nak X̱ancho.
Na' wde wdeli nak daa none' lall' na'cho gon to tocho, per toz Chiozan' chaklene' cho' kwenc̱he chak chonchon.
Chioza' chli'e zoalen Espíritu c̱he'na' cho' daa noṉe' to tocho diika' chak choncho kwenc̱he chaklenan yog'cho.
Na' ba bene' kwenc̱he Espíritu c̱he'na' chaklene' baḻcho choe'lencho beṉ' dill' kon yeḻ' sin' c̱he'na', na' zi baḻcho, chone' ka chajniicho daa nak c̱he Chios na' chak chzajniichon beṉ' yoblə.
Na' zi baḻcho, chon Espíritu c̱he'na' ka chajḻe'chacho gone' daa iṉabichone'; na' zi baḻcho, chone' ka gak yiyoncho beṉ'.
Na' zi baḻcho, chc̱hine' kwenc̱he choncho yeḻ' wak; zi baḻcho, chone' ka chak chyix̱je'cho daa na Chioza' cho'; zi baḻcho, chone' ka chakbe'icho shi dillaa choe' beṉ' dii ḻi nakan c̱he Chioza' wa shi nakan c̱he dii x̱iwaa. Zi baḻcho, chone' ka chak chṉecho wde wdeli dill' dii bi nsedcho; na' zi baḻcho, chone' ka chak chizajniicho bin wna beena' chṉe dillaa.
Na' toz Espíritu c̱he Chioza' chgwee xṉezin goncho yog' diika', na' ḻe' chgone' daa gon to tocho.
Na' ka kwerp c̱hechona' nakan toz ḻa'kzi zan diika' ndiḻ nllagan, ka'kzə cho' nonḻilall'cho Crístona' nakchone' toz ḻa'kzi nakcho beṉ' zan.
Na' yog'ḻoḻcho cho', ka beṉ' Israel, ka beṉ' griego, ka beṉ' ndoo lla yel chone' xshin beṉ', na' ka beṉ' chon xshinkze', Espíritu c̱he Chioza' ba bene' kwenc̱he nakcho ka toz kwerp. Na' toz ḻen' yo'e ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' to tocho.
Na' ka nak kwerp c̱hechona', zan diika' ndiḻ nllagan.
Na' shi ṉi'achona' iṉan: “Daa bi nak' neena', bi ndiḻ nllag' kwerpa'.” Ḻa'kzi shi iṉan ka', ndiḻ nllagkzan kwerpa'.
Na' shi nagchona' iṉan: “Daa bi nak' jalawe'na', bi ndiḻ nllag' kwerpa'.” Ḻa'kzi shi iṉan ka', ndiḻ nllagkzan kwerpa'.
Na' sheḻ'ka' doxen kwerp c̱hechona' nakan jalaocho, ¿nakra goncho kwenc̱he yenicho? Na' shi doxen kwerp c̱hechona' nakan nagcho, ¿nakra goncho kwenc̱he iḻa'icho?
Na' Chioza' bzoe' to to diika' ndiḻ nllag kwerp c̱hechona' kon gana' chakile' nakan wen soa to ton.
Ḻa' sheḻ' toz ka nak yog'te daa ndiḻ nllagan, bi nakan to kwerp sheḻ'ka'.
Na' ḻa'kzi zan diika' ndiḻ nllaggakan kwerp c̱hechona', tozkz kwerpan nakan.
Na' jalaochoka' bi gak ye'gakan na'choka': “Bi chyalljid' le'.” Ni bi gak ye' yic̱hjchona' ṉi'achoka': “Bi chyalljid' le'.”
Na' diika' ndiḻ nllag kwerp c̱hechona' daa chakicho bi nakan wal, ḻeləgakannan' llialote.
Na' diika' ndiḻ nllag kwerp c̱hechona' daa chakicho bitek bi zaka'n, ḻeləgakannan' chapshiicho. Na' diika' bi cheenicho ile'i beṉ' chkwashi'chon xachona'.
Na' diika' ndiḻ nllag kwerp c̱hechona' na' bi chonan ka yiyii yido'icho ile'i beṉ' ḻegakan, bi chonan byen wkwash'chon. Na' ka' ben Chioza' kwerp c̱hechona' kwenc̱he nkwash'cho diika' chonan ka yiyii yido'icho ile'i beṉ' ḻegakan.
Na' yog' diika' ndiḻ nllag kwerpa' chaklen ljwellin daa nakgakan toz.
Daan shi gayi kwerp c̱hechona' chey chla, doxen kwerpa' bi shao'. Na' shi gayi kwerp c̱hechona' chonichon wen, doxenan chibayi.
Na' le' nakle ka kwerp c̱he Crístona' daa naklene' toz, na' to tole nakle ka tkwen wej kwerp c̱he'na'.
Na' ladjchona', cho' chdop chllagcho choe'la'ocho Crístona', Chioza' llialote bzoe' neto' naknto' postl, na'ch bzoe' beṉ' chyix̱ji'e daa chi'ene', na' de wyoṉi bzoe' beṉ' wli' wsedile' beṉ' cho'a xtilleena'. Na'ch bzoe' beṉ' wli'e yeḻ' wak c̱he'na', na' beṉ' yiyone' beṉ', na' beṉ' gaklen bish' ljwellchoka', na' beṉ' chgoo xṉezin c̱he xshine'na', na' beṉ' chṉe wde wdeli dill' dii bi nsede'.
Ṉezicho aga yog'cho nakcho postl. Aga yog'cho chak c̱hix̱je'cho daa na Chioza' cho'. Aga yog'cho chak wli' wsedicho cho'a xtilleena'. Na' aga yog'cho chak goncho yeḻ' wak.
Aga yog'cho chak yiyoncho beṉ'. Aga yog'cho chak iṉecho wde wdeli dill' dii bi nsedcho. Na' aga yog'cho chak yizajniicho bi zeji dill'ka'.
Na' le', ḻi selall' gaklen Espíritu c̱he Chioza' le' kwenc̱he gak gonle diika' zak'chi. Na' ṉaa wsedid' le' to dii llialaotech.
Shi nad' chak' wde wdeli dill' dii chṉe beṉ' yell-lioni na' ax̱t len xtill' anjlka' chak', per bi chakid' beṉ', aga bi zjanayin chak' diika', na' nak' ka to dii nak de ya dii chon daṉe wa ka platiy dii chon sshag.
Na' ḻa'kzi shi chak c̱hix̱ji'a daa na Chioza' nad', na' ṉezid' yog'ḻoḻ daa nak c̱he Chioza' ax̱t daa kochnoṉ' iṉezi, na' ḻa'kzi shi ḻe chajḻi'a c̱he Chioza' ax̱t chon' ka illa' xishna' yaaka', shi bi chakid' beṉ', aga bi zjanayin chak gon' diika'.
Na' ḻa'kzi shi wi'a beṉ' yesh'do'ka' yog' dii de c̱ha', wa izanid' kwerp c̱ha'ni kwenc̱he wzeygake'n, shi bi chakid' beṉ', aga bi gaklenan nad' lao Chioza'.
Shi chakicho beṉ', gapcho yeḻ' chxenlall' c̱hegake', gonicho ḻegake' wen, bi gakxe'icho ḻegake', bi wshalj wshoncho lawe'ka', bi gakcho beṉ' cha'sibə,
bi gonichogake' zban, bi c̱hiljcho daa nak to banez c̱hezcho, bi gakcho zgaaḻ zyil, ni bi koolall'cho.
Ni bi yibaicho kat' no chon mal, san yibaicho kat' no chon wen.
Shi chakicho beṉ', bi goncho dii choo dii xen bittez dii chonile' cho', na' bi sa'lall'cho mal c̱he', san toshiizi goncho lez gone' wen, na' so sakicho bittezə.
Yeḻ' chakina' aga wiyoll widon. San ka nak daa chyix̱jee beṉ' daa che' Chioza'ne', na' daa iṉe beṉ' wde wdeli dill' dii bi nsede', wllin lla bich iyalljan, na' ni bich bi iyalljicho iṉezicho.
Ḻa' lat'chga daa ṉezicho ṉaa, na' lat'chga daa na Chioza' cho' kwenc̱he chyix̱je'ichon beṉ',
per kat' illin lla Chioza' gone' ka gombia'chone' kwasḻoḻ, na' te c̱heyi diika' chzajniin cho' lat' wej ṉaa.
Kana' nak' bi'do', bshalj' ḻega bi'do', ben' pensar ka bi'do', na' wyajniid' ḻega bi'do'. Per ka bgol' bich bsa' c̱ha' ka c̱he bi'do'.
Ka'kzan chak c̱hecho kon daa nak c̱he Chioza' ṉaa. Nakcho ka to beṉ' chwia to lo wan dii bi nḻa'yeṉ'. Per wllin lla kat' ile'yeṉ'ichone' ka chle'i cho'alao ljwellcho. Biṉ' gombia'yeṉ'cho Chioza' ṉaa, per wllin lla kat' gombia'chone' kwasḻoḻ ka nombi'e cho'.
Na' ṉaa diiki shoṉə nakgakan dii llialote goncho: gonḻilall'cho Chioza', gonchone' lez, na' gapcho yeḻ' chakina'. Na' daa llialote lawi diiki shoṉ, ḻennan' yeḻ' chakina'.
Ḻi gon byen gakile' bish' ljwell-leka' na' ḻekzka' ḻi selall' goṉ Espíritu c̱he Chioza' le' to dii gak gonle, na' daa llialoch selall'le gone' ka gak c̱hix̱je'le daa iṉa Chioza' le'.
Ḻa' beena' chṉe dill' daa kono chajnii, Chiozan' chshaljlene', aga beṉ' yell-lionin. Ḻa' Espíritu c̱he Chiozan' chone' ka cho'e dill' daa kono chajnii.
San beena' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza' ḻe', chone' ka gakchach beṉ' lao Chioza', na' chtipe' lall'gake' na' chiyonxenlallee ḻegake'.
Beena' chṉe dill' daa kono chajnii, to ḻe'zen' chaklenan, san beena' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne' chaklene' yog' beṉ'ka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona' kwenc̱he gakchagake' lo xṉeze'na'.
Nad' cheenid' sheḻ'ka' yog'ḻoḻ-le gak iṉele dill'ka' daa kono chajnii, per wibachid' sheḻ'ka' gak c̱hix̱je'le daa iṉa Chioza' le'. Ḻa' dii zak'chi daa chyix̱jee beṉ' daa na Chioza' aga ka daa iṉie' dill' daa kono chajnii, ḻete shi yizajniile' beṉ'ka' bin zeji dill'ka' chṉie' kwenc̱he gakchachgake' lao Chioza'.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', shi nad' yidwia' le' na' iṉia' dill' daa kono chajnii, bi gaklenan le'. Ḻete waklenan le' shi wzajniid' le' to dii ba bli' bsedi Chioza' nad', wa to dii chiyaḻ' iṉezile c̱he', wa c̱hix̱je'id' le' bi iṉe' nad', wa wli' wsedid' le' cho'a xtilleena'.
Kachaka' blleja' wa no dii llia kwerd c̱heyin, kono shajnii bin chkwellgake' shi bi chllaa shiinka'.
Na' kat' chak to wdiḻ, shi beena' chkwell clarínna' bi wkwelle'n kwasḻoḻ, aga no idop illag kwenc̱he shajgake' lo wdiḻa'.
Na' ka'kzan chak c̱hele, shi iṉele dill' daa bi chajnii beṉ', nakra gone' shajniile' bin nale. Na' bibi zakii dill'ka' chṉele shi ṉaa.
Ṉezicho zan kwen xtill' beṉ' de yell-lioni na' to togakan chajnii beṉ'ka' chṉegake'n.
Na' shi bi chajniid' dillaa we'len to beṉ' nad', nak' ka beṉ' zit' par ḻe', na' ḻekzka' ḻe' nake' ka beṉ' zit' par nad'.
Na' daa ba chzelall'le goṉ Espíritu c̱he Chioza' daa gak gonle, ḻi gon ka dii le iṉable daa gaklenan bish' ljwell-leka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona' kwenc̱he gakchachgake' lawe'na'.
Daan, beena' chṉe dill' daa kono chajnii, chiyaḻ' iṉabile' Chioza' gaklene'ne' kwenc̱he gak yizajniile' beṉ' bin zeji dillaa chṉie'.
Ḻa' shi chshaljlen' Chioza' dill' daa bi chajniid', yic̱hjlall'dawaani ṉezin chshaljlen' Chioza', per bi chajniid' bin chepee.
¿Beran chiyaḻ' gon', lla? Chiyaḻ' we'ḻwill' Chioza' kon dill' daa na Espíritu c̱he'na', na' ḻekzka' we'ḻwillee kon dill' daa chajniid'. Na' ḻekzka' chiyaḻ' goḻ' kon dill' daa na Espíritu c̱he'na', na' goḻ' kon dill' daa chajniid'.
Ḻa' shi we'la'ole Chioza' kon dill' daa kono chajnii, ḻa'kzi nakan c̱he Espíritu c̱he Chioza', beṉ'ka' yengakile' dill'ka' chṉele aga gongake' le' txen we'le yeḻ' chox̱ken Chioza' ḻa' bi chajni'gakile' bin nale.
Ḻa'kzi choe'le Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken do yic̱hj do lall'le, bi chaklenan beṉ' yoblə daa bi chajni'gakile' bin nale.
Cho'a Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken daa chṉech' dill' daa kono chajnii aga ka yog'tele.
Per kat' ndop nllagcho choe'la'ocho Chioza' txen, wenchlan iṉia' gay'zə dill' daa chajniicho kwenc̱he wzajniid' beṉ' yoblə, aga ka daa iṉia' ga shi mil dill' daa kono chajnii.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', bi gonzle pensar ka bi'do' biṉ' shajnii, san ḻi gon pensar ka beṉ' golə, beṉ' ba chajnii. Per ka nak c̱he dii mala', ḻi gak ka to bi'do' biṉ' sho' yic̱hjin dii mala'.
Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: “Wc̱hin' beṉ' zit', beṉ' chṉe dill' yoblə, kwenc̱he wzajniid' beṉ' Israelki, per ni ka' bi wzenaggake' c̱ha', na X̱ancho Chioza'.”
Daan, kat' chṉecho dill' daa kono chajnii chonan kwenc̱he beṉ'ka' bi chonḻilall'gake' Chioza' gakbe'gakile' zoalene' cho' per bibi chzajniin cho' ba nonḻilall'chone'. San daa c̱hix̱je'cho daa na Chioza' cho', chaklenan cho' ba nonḻilall'chone' per bi chaklenan beṉ'ka' bi chonḻilall'gake'ne'.
Na' kat'ka' ndop nllagle choe'la'ole Crístona', shi yog'zle choe'le dill' daa kono chajnii, na' sho' beṉ' bi chajniile' bin chonle wa beṉ' biṉ' gonḻilall' Crístona', wak gakile' bi nza'n c̱helenan'.
San shi yog'le chyix̱je'le daa na Chioza' le', na' sho' to beṉ' biṉ' gonḻilall' Crístona' wa to beṉ' bi chajnii bin chonle, na' yiyakbe'ile' nake' beṉ' saaxya na' yiyaj yilenile' dii malka' chone' ka yenile' dill'ka' chyix̱je'le.
Na'ch gonan ka wli'lawi daa yoo ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena', na' wc̱hek' xibe' we'lawee Chioza', na' gakbe'ile' dii ḻicha Chioza' zoalene' le'.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', kat' chdop chllagle de latj kwenc̱he baḻ-le goḻ-le dii koon Chioza' balaaṉ, na' zi baḻ-le wli' wsedile, zi baḻ-le c̱hix̱je'le daa na Chioza' le', na' zi' baḻ-le iṉele dill' daa kono chajnii, na' zi baḻ-le yizajniile dillaa kono chajnii. Yog' diiki chiyaḻ' wc̱hinlen kwenc̱he gaklenan soac̱hec̱hle lo xṉez Chioza'.
Na' kat' iṉele dill' daa kono chajnii, c̱hopzle wa shoṉzle iṉelen, na' yizoayile iṉele, na' chiyaḻ' soa to beṉ' yizajniile' bin wnale.
Na' shi kono zoa beṉ' chak yizajniile' bin iṉale, bi chiyaḻ' iṉelen gana' ndop nllagle choe'la'ole Crístona', san wak iṉelenlen Chioza' de ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'zə.
Na' ḻekzka' c̱hop shoṉzlen c̱hix̱je'le daa na Chioza' le', na' yizoayile iṉele. Na' beṉ'ka' chzenag, chiyaḻ' wzenagyeṉ'gake' shi dii ḻi nakan daa na Chioza'.
Shi shlak to beṉ' chyix̱ji'e dillaa daa che' Chioza'ne', na' iṉe Chioza' sto beṉ' chi'e ladjlena', chiyaḻ' kwez beena' chṉe kwenc̱he c̱hix̱jee beena' sto daa che' Chioza'ne'.
To tole yizoayile c̱hix̱je'le daa na Chioza' kwenc̱he yog'le shajni'chile diika' na Chioza' na' wtipch lall'le.
Na' beena' chyix̱jee daa che' Chioza'ne' chiyaḻ' iṉabia' kwine' kwenc̱he wi'e latj iṉe beṉ' yoblə, shi ṉaa.
Ḻa' Chioza' cheenile' gonle xochi yog' daa chonle kat' choe'la'olene' na' bi gonle kon daa nazan c̱hele. Ka yoolo beṉ'ka' choe'la'o Crístona' yog'te gana' chdop chllaggake',
noolka' chiyaḻ' soagake' llizə gana' chdop chllagle, ḻa' bi de lsens iṉegake'. San chiyaḻ' wc̱hek' yic̱hj wc̱hek' laogake' lao beṉ'ka' chṉabia' ḻegake', kon ka na ley daa bzej dii Moiséza'.
Na' shi de daa cheengakile' iṉezgakile', chiyaḻ' iṉabgakile' beṉ' c̱he'ka' ḻoo yoo lillgake', ḻa' bi nakan wen iṉegake' kat' ndop nllagle.
Bi gakile zigaate ladjlenan' golj wxe cho'a xtill' Chioza', ni bi gakile le'chgan ba bleblen.
Shi nole chakile nakle beṉ' chyix̱jee daa na Chioza', wa chakile Espíritu c̱he Chioza' chzajniile' le', chiyaḻ' gakbe'ile dga chzej' le' nakan dii chon X̱ancho Crístona' mandad.
Na' shi no bi chzenag c̱heyi dga chzej' le', ḻekzka' kono wzenag c̱he'.
Na' le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, ḻi selall' gak c̱hix̱jeele daa na Chioza' le', na' bi wllonle iṉe beṉ' dill' daa kono chajnii.
Per bittezə dii gonle, ḻi gonan kon ka chiyaḻi na' xochi ḻi gonan.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', cheenid' yisaa lall'le dill' wen dill' koba' wdix̱je'id' le' daa ba bleble na' zoac̱hec̱hle chajḻe'le c̱heyin.
Ḻa' ḻennan' yislan le' kwenc̱he bi kwiayi'le shi toshiizi soac̱hec̱hle shajḻe'le daa ba wdix̱je'id' le'. Na' shi bi soac̱hec̱hle toshiizi aga bi zjanayin daa nale ba wyajḻe'le c̱heyin.
Bli' bsedid' le' dga bzajnii Chioza' nad' daa nakan dii llialote: nan Crístona' wite' ni c̱hecho daa nakcho beṉ' saaxya, kon ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza'.
Na' bkwash'gake'ne' na' biyoṉ lla bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', kon ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza'.
Na' bli'lawe' Céfaza', na'tech bli'lawe' postlka' sto.
Na'tech bli'lawe' wdeli gay' guiyoa beṉ' bish'choka' na' beṉ' zanchoka' nonḻilall'gake'ne'. Na' zan beṉ'ka' ni mban lla ṉaanlla, na' baḻgake' ba wit.
Na'tech bli'lawe' Jacóbona', na' wdena' bli'lawe' yog' postlka'.
Na' zeeloteyi bli'lawe' nad', ḻa'kzi nak' beṉ' bibi zakii.
Nad' nak' ḻiizelozi beṉ' bibi zakii ladj beṉ'ka' wlej Crístona' gongake' xshine'na', na' bi chidoḻaa iṉa beṉ' nad' “postl”, daa bsak'zi'a beṉ'ka' chonḻilall'gake'ne'.
Per daa nak Chioza' beṉ' chiyesh'lallii, wleje' nad' wi'a xtill' Crístona'. Na' daa biyeshlallile' nad' bi gokdadzan, ḻa' ba bench' xshine'na' aga ka yog' postlka' sto. Per aga tobia'lozan' bena'n, san ḻen' ba goklene' nad' kwenc̱he bena'n.
Na' ḻa'kzi nad' wa postlka' sto choe'lennto' beṉ' xtilleena', toz ka dill' choe'nto', na' ḻennan' ba wyajḻe'le.
Na' daa chyix̱je'nto' biban Crístona' ladj beṉ' wetka', ¿berac̱he nazə baḻ-le bi yiban beṉ' wetka'?
Ḻa' sheḻ' bi yiban beṉ' wetka', ḻekzka' aga biban Crístona' sheḻ'ka'.
Na' sheḻ' Crístona' bi bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', aga bi zakii daa chyix̱je'nto' cho'a xtilleena', ni aga bi zakii daa nonḻilall'lene', sheḻ'ka'.
Na' sheḻ' bi yiban beṉ' wetka', aga dill' ḻi c̱he Chiozan' be'lennto' le' daa wnanto' Chioza' bisbane' Crístona' ladj beṉ' wetka', sheḻ'ka'.
Ḻa' sheḻ' bi yiban beṉ' wetka', aga biban Crístona', sheḻ'ka'.
Na' sheḻ' Crístona' bi bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', aga bi zjanayin nonḻilall'lene', na' ni napkzle doḻ' c̱he saaxya c̱heleka', sheḻ'ka'.
Na' sheḻ' nakan ka', beṉ'ka' benḻilall'gake' Crístona' na' ba witgake', wlliayi'chokzgaken', sheḻ'ka'.
Na' sheḻ' to lo yell-lionizan noncho lez gaklen Crístona' cho', nyesh'lazch nakan c̱hecho aga ka c̱he yog' beṉ' yoblə, sheḻ'ka'.
Per dii ḻi Crístona' bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', na' daa bibane' neche' ladj beṉ' wetka' zaklebile' dii necha' chizi' chilap beṉ'.
Daa bx̱iṉj bḻen toz beṉ', wyoo yeḻ' wita' yell-lioni, na' ḻekzka' toz beṉ' bx̱ie' daa yiban beṉ' wetka'.
Ka chet yog' beṉ' ni c̱he daa bx̱iṉj bḻen dii Adánna', ka'kzan yiban beena' nak Crístona' txen.
Per to to beṉ' yibane' ladj beṉ' wetka' kat' illin llana' nllia Chioza' bia' yibangake'. Zigaate Crístona' bibane' ladj beṉ' wetka', na' kat' yiyed Crístona', ḻekzka' yiban yog' beṉ'ka' nak lall' nee.
Na' te c̱he yell-lioni kat'ka' wlliayi' Crístona' yog'ḻoḻ yeḻ' wak na' yeḻ' wṉabia' yoblə, na' yiyo'e yeḻ' wṉabia' c̱he'na' X̱acho Chioza'.
Ḻa' Crístonan' chiyaḻ' iṉabi'e ax̱t ki yiyoll yido wzoe' xṉi'ena' yog' beṉ'ka' chakzi' chakzbani ḻe' na' yog' dii x̱iw'ka'.
Na' yiyollin, wlliayee yeḻ' wita'.
Cho'a xtill' Chioza' nan Chioza' bzoe' xṉi'a Crístona' yog'ḻoḻte dii de. Na' daa nan yog'ḻoḻte zoa xṉi'a Crístona', aga len Chiozan' zoe' xṉi'ena', ḻa' ḻen' bzoe' xṉi'a Crístona' yog'ḻoḻte dii de.
Na' kat'ka' yog'ḻoḻte dii de ba zoan xṉi'a Crístona', na'ch kwin Crístona', beena' nak Xiiṉ Chioza', wzex̱j yic̱hje' lao Chioza', beena' bzoa yog'te dii de xṉi'ena'. Na'ch gakbia' nan Chioza' nake' ḻiizelozi beṉ' zakii lao yog'ḻoḻte dii de.
Na' chiznia' sto, ¿bera zejin daa chchoa baḻ beṉ' nisa' lwaa beṉ' wetka'? Shi chakgakile' bi yiban beṉ' wetka', ¿berac̱he chchoazgake' nisa' lwaagake'?
Na' sheḻ'ka' bi yiban beṉ' wetka' ¿berac̱he zoaznto' dii nxoll gak dii gak c̱hento' do lla do yel?
Dii ḻi, le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', yog' lla zoa' dii nxoll guet'. Na' ḻekzka' dii ḻicha ḻe chiba chizakid' c̱hele daa ba nonḻilall'le X̱ancho Jesucrístona'.
Yell Éfesona' wdiḻ-len' beṉ'ka' nak ka ba zṉia nlleb, ¿beratgui gon' gan wdiḻ-lengakee sheḻ'ka' bi yiban beṉ' wetka'? Gonchokljacho ka dillaa de daa na: “Yeej gaotezcho ḻa' wetcho wx̱e willj.”
Bi we'le latj no siye' le'. Ḻa' dill' de, nan: “Shi goncho txen beṉ' malka' na' solo goncho ka chongake'.”
Ḻi yiyeeṉi kwasḻoḻ na' bich gonle dii mala', ḻa' baḻ-le ni bi nombia'le Chioza'. Nia' le' ka' kwenc̱he yido'latile.
Wnalja baḻ-le: “¿Nakra gak yiban beṉ' wetka'? Na' ¿Nakra yiyak kwerp c̱he'ka'?”
Shi ka' nale, nakle ka beṉ' bi nteyi. Kat' chazcho biṉna', bi chila' yagdo'na' shi bi chbiayi' biṉna'.
Kat' chazcho, aga yagdo'nan' chazcho, san biṉ c̱heyinnan' chazcho, na' chila' yagdo'na'. Na' kan' chak c̱he bittezə dii chazcho, shi no trigo wa bichlə.
Na' Chioza' chgwee xṉez xḻatjin chakan ka cheenile', na' to to biṉ chak xyaguinna' kon ka chiyaḻ' gak c̱he to ton.
Aga toz ka nak kwerpka'. Nlla'lə nak kwerp c̱he beṉec̱ha' len c̱he bayix̱'ka'. Na' nlla'lə nak c̱he baka' chzo xan yabana' na' c̱he beḻka' lle' ḻoo nisa'.
Ḻekzka' nak c̱heyi diika' lle' xan yabana' na' diika' chle'icho lo yell-lioni. Nlla'lə yeḻ' xochi c̱heyi diika' chle'icho xan yabana' len yeḻ' xochi c̱heyi diiki chle'icho lo yell-lioni.
Nlla'lə yeḻ' chey cheeni' c̱he wbilla' len c̱he beo'do'na' na' len c̱he beljka'. Na' ladj beljdo'ka' nlla'lə nak yeḻ' chey cheeni' c̱he to togakan.
Na' ka'kzan gak c̱he beṉ'ka' yiban ladj beṉ' wetka'. Kwerpa' daa chgash' ḻoo bana' nakan dii gooll' iteb, san kwerp daa yiyas kat' yibancho ladj beṉ' wetka' bi nakan dii gooll' iteb.
Kwerpa' daa chgash' ḻoo bana' nakan dii bichbi zakii, san daa yiyas ladj beṉ' wetka' gakan to dii zakii nlleb. Kwerpa' daa chgash' ḻoo bana' nak bḻan'zan, san daa yiyas ladj beṉ' wetka' gakc̱hec̱han.
Kwerpa' daa chgash' ḻoo bana' nakan de beli chenzə dii chon llin yell-lioni, san kwerp daa yiyas ladj beṉ' wetka' gakan to dii kob daa goṉ Chioza'. Na' daa ṉezicho kwerp c̱hechoni nakan de beli chenzə, ḻekzka' chiyaḻ' iṉezicho wat' to kwerp kob c̱hecho daa goṉ Chioza'.
Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: “Adánna', beena' gok beṉ' nech, goke' to beṉ' yaa beṉ' ban.” Na' ḻekzka' Crístona' goke' beṉ' yell-lio, per ḻe' choṉe' yeḻ' mban zejḻi kaṉi.
Zigaate chbanlencho kwerp de beli chenni, na'techlan ibanlencho dii koba' daa goṉ Chioza'.
Beṉ' necha' ben Chioza' de bishte yo, goke' beṉ' yell-lio. Na' beṉ' wchopina', beena' nak X̱ancho, ḻen' wzee yabana'.
Kwerp c̱hechona' nakan ka kwerp c̱he beṉ' necha' bx̱e bsil Chioza' de bishte yona'. Na' ka nak kwerp c̱he Crístona', beena' zoa yabana' ṉaa, ka'kzan yiyak kwerp c̱hechona' kwenc̱he lljazoacho yabana'.
Ṉaa nakcho ka beena' ben Chioza' de bishte yo, na' wllin lla yiyakcho ka Crístona', beena' zoa yabana'.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', cheenid' iṉia' le': Aga wak yillinlencho kwerp de beli chenni gana' zoa Chioza' chṉabi'e. Na' kwerpi dga gooll' iteb bi gak gonan txen kwerp daa bi gooll' iteb.
Ni iṉia' le' to dii kono wṉezi: aga yog'cho guetcho, per yog'cho yiyakcho nlla'lə.
Tokonganzi, to ka chshod' chx̱a'z jalaochoki, kat' kwell trompet c̱he Chioza', yiyakcho nlla'lə. Ḻa' ka kwell trompeta', beṉ' wetka' yibangake' kon to kwerp dii bi gooll' iteb. Na' cho' ni mbancho, ḻekzka' yilla' kwerp c̱hechoki.
Ḻa' kwerp c̱hechoni dga gooll' iteb, yiyakan to dii bi gooll' iteb. Na' beli chen c̱hechoni dga ile'i yeḻ' wita', yiyakan to dii bichga guet.
Kat'ka' kwerp c̱hechoni dga gooll' iteb ba biyakan to dii bi gooll' iteb, na' beli chen c̱hechoni dga ile'i yeḻ' wita' ba biyakan to dii bichga guet, na' gak ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' daa na: “X̱anchona' ba bene' gan bsol bṉite' yeḻ' wita' toshiizi.”
Na' ḻekzka' nan: “Yeḻ' wit, li' chsi chc̱hogo' yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ', ¿gaṉ yeḻ' wak c̱ho'na' ṉaa?”
Daa bi choncho diika' bllia Chioza' bia' goncho chli'n nakcho beṉ' saaxya, na' daa nakcho beṉ' saaxya, yeḻ' wita' napan yeḻ' wak kwenc̱he wsol wṉitan cho'.
Per chox̱ken Chioza' bseḻee X̱ancho Jesucrístona' ni c̱hecho kwenc̱he bi saki yeḻ' wita' si' ikaan cho' zejḻi kaṉi.
Daan, le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, ḻi soac̱hec̱h lo xṉez Chioza' toshiizi. Na' zizikli ḻi gon xshin X̱ancho Jesucrístona', ḻa' ṉezkzile xshine'na' aga nakan to llin dii chondadzle.
Na' ka nak mech daa wtople daa we'le beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza', ḻi gon ka ben' mandad gon beṉ'ka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona' to to yell daa llia gana' mbani Galáciana'.
Yog' lla nech c̱he xmanka', to tole chiyaḻ' kwejle lat' wej daa benle gan lo xmanna' na' kooshao'len kwenc̱he bibi wtople kat' yid'.
Na' kat' yid' gana' zoale, wseḻaa beṉ'ka' kwejle lljwa'gake' Jerusalénna' mecha' daa btople, na' wgox̱'gakee yish daa wzej' kwenc̱he beṉ' Jerusalénka' wlebgake' ḻegake'.
Na' shi chonan byen shaa, na' sha'len' ḻegake'.
Chonan byen tia' gana' mbani Macedóniana', na' ka tia', yidwia' le'.
Na' waklja yigaaṉlen' le' shloll wa soalen' le' ax̱t ka yiyollch te dii zaga'. Na' kat' yigwaa nez yiyaa gan yoblə wak gaklenle nad' goṉle daa iyallj ic̱hinid'.
Aga shlollzan cheenid' yidwia' le', san non lez yigaaṉlen' le' ssha, shi X̱ancho Chioza' wi'e latj.
Na' ṉaa cheenid' yigaaṉa' yell Éfesoni ax̱t ka gaḻ' lṉi Pentecostéza',
ḻa' beṉ' zan lle' ni, beṉ' cheeni wzenag xtill' Jesucrístona', ḻa'kzi beṉ' zan chllaagake' daa choe'len' beṉ' xtilleena'.
Na' shi ba za' Timotewa' gana' zoale, ḻi gonile wen, ḻa' ḻekzka' lene' chone' xshin X̱ancho Jesucrístona' ka chon' nad'.
Na' ni tole bi gonilene' nakzi, san ḻi gaklene' yigwee neza' mbalaz kwenc̱he yidwie' nad', ḻa' chbeztia'ne' kon beṉ' bish'choka' sto.
Na' ka nak beṉ' bish'cho Apólozi, ḻe got'yoidee yidlene' beṉ' bish'choki yidwiagake' le', per bi goonile' yide' ṉaa, per widkze' kat' gat' latj c̱he'na'.
Ḻi se kwas na' ḻi soac̱hec̱h gonḻilall'chle Crístona'. Ḻi gakcha lo xṉeze'na' na' bi illeble.
Na' bittezə dii gonle, ḻi gonan ḻega beṉ' chaki ljwellin.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ṉezile beṉ'ka' lle' lill Estéfanazi gokgake' beṉ' nech beṉ' benḻilall'gake' Crístona' gana' mbani Acáyana', na' zoatekzgake' chli' chsedgakile' beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza'.
Chat'yoid' le', ḻi wzenaggach c̱he beṉ'ka' chon ka ḻegake', na' ḻi wzenag c̱he yog' beṉ'ka' chaklen chongake' xshin Chioza'.
Ḻe chibaid' daa ba bid Estéfanazi len Fortunátoni na' Acaíconi gani zoa', ḻa' daa zoalengake' nad' ni, bich chakyeshid' daa biṉ' gak yidwia' le'.
Ba biyoṉgake' nad' to yeḻ' chxenlall' ka daa choṉgake' le'. Ka beṉ'ki na' ka beṉ'ka' chon ka ḻegake', chidoḻ'gake' gaple ḻegake' balaaṉ.
Beṉ'ki chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona' to to yell gani mbani Ásiani chwapgake' le' chiox. Na' Aquílani len Priscílani, len beṉ'ka' chdop chllag lille'ka' chwapgake' le' chiox do yic̱hj do lall'gake' daa nakle X̱ancho Crístona' txen.
Na' yog' beṉ' bish'choka' lle' ni chwapgake' le' chiox. Na' ḻi wwap ljwell-le chiox ḻega beṉ' chaki ljwellin daa nakle lall' na' Chioza'.
Nad', Pablo, kwin' chzej' gani chwap' le' chiox.
Nottezə beṉ' bi chakile' X̱ancho Jesucrístona', wsak'zi'shga Chioza'ne'. ¡Bidagach X̱an'!
X̱ancho Jesucrístona' soalenshgue' le' na' gaklenshgue' le'.
Ḻe chakid' yog'le daa nakcho Jesucrístona' txen.
Nad' Pablo nak' postl c̱he Jesucrístona' kon ka chaklall' Chioza', na' len beṉ' bish'cho Timotewi chwapnto' le' chiox, le' chdop chllagle choe'la'ole Chioza' yell Coríntona'. Na' ḻekzka' chwapnto' chiox yog'ḻoḻ bish' ljwellchoka' lle' gana' mbani Acáyana', beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza'.
Na' chṉabinto' X̱acho Chioza' len X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gaklenshgagake' le' na' wzoagake' le' mbalaz.
Chiyaḻ' we'la'ocho Chioza', X̱a X̱ancho Jesucrístona', ḻa' ḻen' X̱achona', beena' chiyesh'lallile' cho' na' chiyonxenlallee cho' lao bittezə dii chak c̱hecho.
Chiyonxenlallee cho' lao yog'ḻoḻ diika' chzak'zi'cho kwenc̱he ka chone' c̱hecho, ka'kzan goncho yiyonxenlall'cho beṉ' yoblə kat' chzak'zi'gake'.
Daa lennto' chzak'zi'nto' ka wxak'zi' Crístona', Chioza' chtipche' lall'nto' daa nonnto' Crístona' txen.
Na' shi neto' chzak'zi'nto', chak c̱hento' ka' kwenc̱he gondiplall'chle na' yilale bi kwiayi'le. Na' shi Chioza' chtipe' lall'nto', chone' ka' kwenc̱he ḻekzka' le' gondiplall'le na' so sakile' ka yeḻ' zak'zi'ki chen chle'into'.
Nonyeṉ'nto' lez bi gakc̱hoplall'le lao diika' chen chle'ile, ḻa' ṉezinto' daa lenle chtiḻ-le yeḻ' zak'zi'ka', ḻekzka' lenle wtip Chioza' lall'le.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', cheeninto' iṉezile' ka'k'tek dii lalljka' btiḻnto' gana' mbani Ásiana'. Gokan to dii lallj wal dii bich nan so sakinto', na' bich bennto' lez yeḻ' mbanna'.
Goktekzinto' ni bllin lla guetnto' ṉaa. Gok c̱hento' ka' kwenc̱he gokbe'into' bi gak wx̱enilall' kwinnto', san chiyaḻ' wx̱enilall'nto' Chioza', beena' chisban beṉ' wetka'.
Na' Chioza' bisle' neto' na' wislachkze' neto' lao dii nxollka' nsa' yeḻ' wit. Na' nx̱enilall'nto'ne' toshiizi wislachkze' neto'
shi gaklenle iṉabilene' gaklene' neto'. Na' shi beṉ' zan iṉabe' c̱hento', ḻekzka' beṉ' zan we'gake' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken kat' ba goklene' neto'.
De to dii chakyiblennto': daa ṉezyeṉ'into' do yic̱hj do lallnto' nsa' c̱hento' wen ladj beṉ' yell-lioni, ka chazlall' Chioza', na' chonnto' to dii byen chonchnto' wen ladjlena'. Na' aga yeḻ' sin' c̱he beṉ' yell-lionin chaklenan neto' chonnto' ka', san Chiozan' chaklene' neto'.
Diiki chzejnto' le' nakan dii shajniile ka wlablen. Ḻa'kzi ṉaa biṉ' shajni'yeṉ'ile bic̱he nsa' c̱hento' ka', chbez' illin lla shajniilen kwasḻoḻ, kwenc̱he kat'ka' yila' X̱ancho Jesúza', yibaile' daa nonle neto' txen, ka chibainto' nonto' le' txen.
Daa nx̱enlallaa wyajniile dga na' wleble nad', goklallaa tegaxj' yidwia' le', ḻa' gokid' ḻe yiba yizakile yidwia' le' c̱hop shii.
Gokid' tia' wwia' le' ka shaa Macedóniana', na' yidia' wwia' le' sto shii ka zizaa. Na' zak goklenle nad' kwenc̱he yigwaa nez yiyaa Judeana', sheḻ' gokan.
Bi gakile aga do yic̱hj do lallaan wnia' yidwia' le'. ¿Anti chakile chon' ka chon nottezə beṉ' yell-lioki chongake' to “wak” to “bi gakə”?
Chioza' ṉez nḻe'ile' biga chonnto' to “wak” to “bi gakə” laolena'.
Nad' Pablo, len Timotewi na' Silvánoni be'nto' ladjlena' cho'a xtill' Cristo Jesúza', beena' nak Xiiṉ Chioza'. Na' Jesucrístona' ba bli'e toshiizi chon Chioza' kon ka ba wne' gone'.
Na' ni c̱he Crístona' chak yog'ḻoḻ dii chc̱heb Chioza', na' nacho “kan' nakan” kwenc̱he chgoocho Chioza' balaaṉ.
Na' Chioza'kzan chone' kwenc̱he soatip soashoshcho gonḻilall'cho Crístona', ka chone' c̱hento' na' ka chone' c̱hele. Na' wleje' cho' kwenc̱he nakcho lall' nee,
na' Espíritu Santo c̱he'na' nake' ka to sey daa ba ngweene' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'chona' kwenc̱he chakḻiyicho ba nakcho xiiṉe', na' kwenc̱he ṉezicho wllin lla goṉe' yog' dii wenna' daa ba bc̱hebe' goṉe'.
Chioza' ṉezile' biṉ' yid' Coríntona' yidwia' le' daa chap' yeḻ' chxenlall' c̱hele, na' bi cheenid' wsheshlen' le'.
Aga cheeninto' gonnto' byen kon daa iṉaznton' gonle daa nakle Crístona' txen, ḻa' ba zoac̱hec̱hkzle nonḻilall'lene'. San cheenlinto' gaklennto' le' kwenc̱he gapchle yeḻ' chiba chizakina'.
Daan, bc̱hoglallaa bi bidwia' le' kwenc̱he bi yidzoaz' le' nyesh' sto shii.
¿Nora gon ka yiba yizakid' shi ba bidyenyesh'zid' le'?
Na' bzejchoklə le' daa bi goklallid' yid' na' gonyeshile nad', ḻa' cheenlid' gonle ka yiba yizakid'. Na' nx̱enlallaa lenle yiba yizaklenile nad'.
Bzej' le' daa wzechga' wṉeyi nlleb na' gokyesh'chgaid' ax̱t wchellchga'. Na' aga bzeja'n kwenc̱he gonyeshid' le' san kwenc̱he iṉezile ḻe chakid' len'.
Na' beena' benyeshile' nad', aga toz nadaan benile' ka', san lenkzlen benyeshile' lat'. Nia' “lat'”, kwenc̱he bi iṉia' zi'tegala ben beena' c̱hecho.
Yeḻ' zak'zi'na' daa ba benle c̱he' ba gokkzə to ka't'.
Na' ṉaa chiyaḻ' yizi'xenle c̱he' na' gaklenlene' kwenc̱he ki gakshejlallee lo yeḻ' chakyeshii c̱he'na'.
Daan, chat'yoid' le', ḻi wli' ni chakkzilene'.
Ba bzejkz' le' kana' c̱he ka nak dga kwenc̱he wli'shkilaole shi leile gonle yog'te diika' nia' le'.
Na' beena' yizi'xenle c̱he', ḻekzka' nad' wizi'xenkz' c̱he'. Na' shi de dii yiyakxen c̱he', Crístona' ṉezile' wizi'xenkz' c̱he beena' ni c̱hele,
kwenc̱he bi we'cho cho'a xbayi Satanáza'. Ḻa' ṉezkzicho ka nak yeḻ' wxiye' c̱heyinna'.
Ka billin' yell Troaza' kwenc̱he wi'a dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona', got'chga latj c̱ha' kwenc̱he gon' llin c̱he X̱anchona', sheḻ'ka'.
Per daa bi billag' beṉ' bish'cho Títona', na'ch gokshejlall'chga'. Daan, biḻaa beṉ'ka' dill' na' biyaa Macedóniana'.
Chox̱ken Chioza' chone' kwenc̱he toshiizi chonnto' gan lao diika' chḻis chta dii x̱iwaa daa naknto' Crístona' toz. Na' ngoonto' nez choe'nto' xtilleena' kwenc̱he doxen zbii zkaaṉ yell-lioni illiljan, ka chllilj shii xḻa' to dii chḻa' zix̱ sia, na' gombia' beṉ' ḻe'.
Ka bibayi Chioza' shii xḻa' llen yala' daa chḻa' zix̱ sia, ka'kzan chibaile' daa nzoa Crístona' neto' choe'nto' xtilleena' ladj beṉ'ka' yila na' ladj beṉ'ka' kwiayi'.
Beṉ'ka' kwiayi', bi chibagakile' dillii choe'nto' daa chḻa'gakile'n zyeḻ' wit. Na' beṉ'ka' yila, chibagakile'n daa chḻa'gakile'n zix̱ sia daa nsa'n yeḻ' mban c̱hegake'. ¿Notgui gak gone' dga?
Beṉ' zan llialallee yibeje' cho'a xtill' Chioza' mech. San neto' aga kan' chonnto'. Ṉez nḻe'i Chioza' do yic̱hj do lall'nto' choe'nto' xtilleena' ḻega beṉ' bseḻee, daa naknto' Crístona' toz.
Ka choe'lennto' le' dill'ki, ¿achakile ba wizzolonto' chshalj chshon c̱he kwinnton'? ¿Awa chakile chiyaḻ' gonnto' ka chon baḻ beṉ', goṉnto' yish, wa iṉabinto'n le', gana' cho'en dill' nan chonnto' wen?
Le'kzan nakle ka yish daa cho'en dill' chonnto' wen, ḻa' daa nonḻilall'le Crístona' chakbe'i yog' beṉ' choe'nto' dill' ḻi. Na' toshiizi yoole ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'nto'ki.
Na' daa ile'i beṉ' ba bikob Crístona' yic̱hjlall'do'lena' daa be'lennto' le' cho'a xtilleena', nakle ka to yish dii bzej kwin Crístona' nan chonnto' wen. Na' bi nakan to dii nyoj ḻee yish wa dii nyoj ḻee yaj taa, san daa ba bseḻ' Crístona' Espíritu c̱he Chios yaa Chios banna' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena' zejin bzeje'n ḻee lall'do'lena'.
Daa chaklen Crístona' neto', chiyaxjid' nia' chonnto' xshine'na' ka chazlall' Chioza'.
Aga daa ḻe napnto' yeḻ' sin'nan' chonnto' diiki, san Chiozan' chaklene' neto' chonnto'n.
Chioza' ba bli' bsedile' neto' kwenc̱he gak we'nto' dill' c̱he dii koba' daa ba bc̱hebe' gone' c̱hecho. Na' dga bi nakan ka ley c̱he dii Moiséza' daa chlliayi'n beṉ', san dga nakan c̱he Espíritu c̱he Chioza', na' ḻen' cho'e yeḻ' mban c̱he beṉ'.
Ka nak leya' be' Chioza' dii Moiséza', daa byoj ḻee yaj taana', nc̱hogbia'n gat' yeḻ' wit c̱hecho, gokan to dii zakii nlleb na' bsa'n yeḻ' chey cheeni' xen ax̱t ni bi gok wwia beṉ' Israelka' cho'alao dii Moiséza' daa ḻe chey cheeni'n ḻa'kzi gokan dii yinit. Na' shi leya' daa nc̱hogbi'a gat' yeḻ' wit c̱hecho gokan to dii zakii nlleb,
¿alechlə nak yeḻ' zakii c̱he dii koba' daa bx̱e Espírituna'?
Shi leya' daa nc̱hogbi'a guetcho gokan to dii zakii nlleb, na' daa chon Chioza' c̱hecho chizi'xene' xtoḻ'choka', naktechan dii zakii nllebch.
Ka nak yeḻ' zakii c̱he leya', bi bllinan ka nak yeḻ' zak' xen inlleb c̱heyi dga ba bx̱ie' sto.
Na' shi leya' daa ben llin shlollz gokan to dii zakii, dii zak'techi nak dga gon llin toshiizi.
Daa ba de dga nonnto' lez na'chan choe'nto' dill' kon ka nakan.
Na' bi chonnto' ka ben dii Moiséza' kana' bkwash' cho'alawe'na' kon to lech' kwenc̱he beṉ' Israelka' bi ile'gakile' ka chinit yeḻ' chey cheeni'na' cho'alawe'na'.
Na' yeḻ' chajnii c̱he'ka' bi benkzan llin, ḻa' ax̱t ṉaanlla kat' chlabgake' leya' bi chajni'kzgakile'n na' nakan ka to dii ngash'. San beṉ'ka' gonḻilall'gake' Crístona', ḻegaken' shajni'gakile'n, ḻa' ḻen' wsalje' yic̱hjlalldoe'ka'.
Ax̱t ṉaa, kat' chlabgake' daa bzej dii Moiséza', de to dii chsej chllonan shajni'gakile'n.
Per kat' to beṉ' yiyaj yilenile' na' gonḻilallee X̱ancho Crístona', na' yikwas daa chsej chllonan shajniile'n.
Ḻa' X̱anchona', ḻekzen' Espírituna', na' beena' zoalen Espíritu c̱he X̱anchona'ne', bich bi ntakw nc̱hejan ḻe'.
Daan, yog'ḻoḻcho cho' bich bi de wsej wllonan gombia'chone', na' ba nakcho ka to wan gana' chli'lao balaaṉ c̱he X̱anchona'. Na' Espíritu c̱he'na' zejch chiyonshawe' cho' kwenc̱he yiyakcho ka X̱anchona'.
Daa ba biyesh'lallii Chioza' neto', ba bzoe' neto' chonnto' xshine'na', na' bi chidiṉjinto'.
Neto', ni to dii nak yeḻ' zto' bi chonnto', ka diika' chon beṉ' do ngash'zə. Na' bi chziye'nto', ni bi chshok chlewnto' cho'a xtill' Chioza', san choe'nto' dill' ḻi c̱he'na' kon ka nakan. Na' yog' beṉ' wzenague'n, gakbe'i ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'ena' ka nakan, na' ḻekzka' Chioza' ṉezile' ka chonnto'.
Per beṉ'ka' kwiayi', bi chajni'gakile' dill' wen c̱he Crístona' choe'nto', daa ngashaan lawe'ka'.
Ḻa' dii x̱iwaa daa chṉabia' yell-lioni, ba bc̱hoḻ bṉitin yic̱hjlall'do'eka' kwenc̱he bi sho'n beeni' c̱he dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona', beena' bli' ka nakyeṉ' Chioza'.
Aga xtill'nton' choe'nto', san choe'nto' dill' c̱he Jesucrístona', nanto' ḻen' nake' X̱ancho. Na' daa chakinto' Crístona', chonnto' bittez dii gak gonnto' kwenc̱he gaklennto' le'.
Ḻa' Chioza', beena' wna: “Wzeeni' beeni'na' lo yel c̱hoḻa'”, ḻekzka' ba wlo'e beeni' c̱he'na' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'nto'na' kwenc̱he gombia'nto' Jesucrístona', na' kan' gakbe'into' ka nak yeḻ' zakii c̱he Chioza'.
Na' beeni' c̱he dill' wen c̱he Crístona' nakan to dii zakii inlleb. Na' ba nzoa Chioza'n ḻoo lall'do'nto'ni, neto' naknto' beṉ' bibi zakii, kwenc̱he ka we'nto' xtilleena', gakbe'i beṉ' yeḻ' wak xenna' nsa'n nakan c̱he Chios, aga nakan c̱hento'.
Ḻa'kzi chiya dii chak c̱hento', bi nakgakan dii bi yichej yilalennto'. Ḻa'kzi de dii nzen neto' wṉeyi, bi chakshejlall'nto'.
Ḻa'kzi chino beṉ' neto', aga chchooṉlall' Chioza' neto'. Ḻa'kzi chchix̱ chḻoḻgake' neto', biṉ' wlliayi'gake' neto'.
Gattezə chajnto', chsak'zi'gake' neto' na' cheengakile' witgake' neto' ka betgake' Jesúza'. Chak c̱hento' ka' kwenc̱he nakbia' Jesúza' zoe' chaklene' neto'.
Ḻa' shlak mbannto', toshiizi zelennto' yeḻ' wit daa naknto' Jesúza' txen. Chak c̱hento' ka' kwenc̱he nakbia' zoa Jesucrístona' chaklene' neto' lao diika' chllaglo beli chen c̱hento'ni dga guet.
Daa choe'nto' cho'a xtill' Crístona' zelennto' yeḻ' wit, kwenc̱he le' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hele.
Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: “Daa benḻilallaa Chioza', na'chan bi'a dill'.” Na' kakzan neto', daa chonḻilall'nto'ne'n, na'chan choe'nto' cho'a xtilleena'.
Na' ṉezicho Chioza', beena' bisbane' X̱ancho Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka', ḻekzen' yisbane' cho' ka bisbane' ḻe'. Na' ka neto' ka le', yic̱hi'e cho' gana' zoe'.
Yeḻ' zi' dga chllaglonto' ṉaa, chllaglonto'n kwenc̱he gak wen c̱hele. Na' ka zej chanch beṉ' gombia' dill' wen c̱he Crístona', ḻekzka' beṉ' zanch wi'e Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken daa nake' beṉ' wen, na' sho'e balaaṉ xen.
Daan bi chidiṉjinto'. Ḻa'kzi beli chen c̱hento'ni zej chde c̱heyin, yic̱hjlall'do'nto'ni chikob Chioza'n lla kon lla.
Diiki chtiḻnto' ṉaa, nakan dii te toldezə, na' bibi chaktekinto'. Ḻa' ṉezinto' daa chak c̱hento' ki, Chioza' goṉe' to dii wen inlleb c̱hento' dii bi te c̱heyin.
Aga zento' wṉeyi c̱he diiki chle'icho yell-lioni, san diika' bi nḻa'n zento' wṉeyi. Ḻa' yog'te diiki chle'icho yell-lioni, de toldezə c̱he ka diika', na' diika' bi chle'icho ṉaa, nakan dii bi te c̱heyin.
Kwerp c̱hechoni nakan ka to yoo dii te c̱heyin. Na' ṉezicho shi ba wlliayi'n, Chioza' yiyoṉe' sto dii kob dii bi te c̱heyin yabana'. Na' aga nakan dii beni ṉi'a na' beṉ'.
Chibanchgaicho ṉaa zoacho yell-lioni, na' ba cheenchgaicho yobzə lljazoalencho Chioza' yabana' gana' goṉe' sto kwerp kob c̱hecho.
Ka chak c̱he beena' chishaa xe'na' daa ba biyi na' chiyakwe' to dii kob, kakzan gak c̱hecho daa yishaa Chioza' kwerp c̱hechoni dga kwiayi'.
Shlak ni zoacho lo kwerpi, chibanicho na' chakyeshicho. Aga iṉacho chibachgaicho guetchon, san daa cheenicho yobzə ile'icho kwerp kob c̱hechona' daa bi te c̱heyin na' ibanlenchon zejḻi kaṉi.
Na' kwin Chioza' ba none' c̱hecho ile'icho dga, na' ba bseḻee Espíritu c̱he'na' zoe' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'chona' kwenc̱he chakḻiyicho gone' yog' daa ba bc̱hebe'.
Na' daa ṉezicho dga, toshiizi nx̱enilall'cho Chioza'. Na' ṉezicho kwerpi mbanlencho, bi yillinlenchon gana' zoa Chioza'.
Chajḻe'cho dga, ḻa'kzi biṉ' ile'ichon.
Na' cheenicho yobzə yiza'cho yell-lioni na' yigaaṉ kwerp c̱hechoni, ḻa' nxenlall'cho kat' yiza'cho ni, na' lljazoalencho X̱anchona'.
Na' daan, choncho to dii byen choncho ka chazlall' Chioza' ṉaa mbancho wa ḻa'kzi ba witcho.
Ḻa' chonan byen yog'ḻoḻcho lljazecho lao Crístona' gana' wc̱hogloe' c̱hecho, kwenc̱he to tocho ikaacho daa chidoḻ'cho kon ka bencho shlak wbancho, shi bencho wen wa bencho mal.
Na' daa ṉezinto' yog'cho techo lao X̱anchona', na'chan chonnto' to dii byen choe'lennto' beṉ' xtilleena' kwenc̱he gonḻilall'gake'ne'. Chioza' ṉezile' do yic̱hj do lall'nto' chonnto' xshine'na', na' non' lez ṉezkzi yic̱hjlall'do'leka' ka chonnto'.
Aga cheeninto' c̱hibzə kwinnto' laolenan', san nia' le' ka' kwenc̱he yibaile ka chonnto' na' gak yilliile xtill' beṉ'ka' chonz ka ḻe chontegalə na' nagake' ḻegaken' zeelo chongake' dii wenna' per bi chongake'n do yic̱hj do lall'gake'.
Shi baḻ-le chakile chaktontnto'n, Chioza' ṉezile' xshine'nan' chonnto'. Na' shi chakile aga chaktontnto'n, banez c̱hekzle llinna' chonnto'.
Daa ṉezinto' ḻe chaki Crístona' cho', na'chan chonnto' to dii byen choe'nto' xtilleena'. Na' chajḻe'nto' daa wite' ni c̱hecho, zejin yog'cho witcho.
Wite' ni c̱he yog'ḻoḻcho kwenc̱he bich goncho kon daa nazan c̱hecho, san goncho ka chazlall' beena' wit na' bibane' ni c̱hecho.
Ni c̱heyi daan, bich choninto' nottez beṉ' nakzi, shi zakee wa bibi zakee. Ḻa' kana' gokinto' bibi zakii Crístona', na' ṉaa ba ṉezinto' bi nakan ka'.
Beena' ba nake' Crístona' txen, ba bikob Chioza' yeḻ' mban c̱he'na'. Ba wchooṉlallee yeḻ' mban gol c̱he'na', na' ba zoe' to lo yeḻ' mban kob.
Yog'ḻoḻte diiki nakan c̱he Chioza', beena' ba ben ka bizoalenchone' wen daa bseḻee Crístona' wite' ni c̱hecho. Na' bene' lall' nanto' we'lennto' beṉ' dill' nak gongake' yizoalengake' Chioza' wen.
Kwin Chioza' bene' ka cho' beṉ' yell-lio chizoalenchone' wen daa bseḻee Crístona' wite' kwenc̱he biṉitloe' saaxya c̱hechoka'. Na' ba bene' lall' na'nto' we'lennto' beṉ' cho'a xtilleena' kwenc̱he iṉezgakile' nak gongake' yizoalengake'ne' wen.
Daa bzoa Crístona' neto' choe'lennto' le' xtilleena', ḻi gaktezi kwinkz Chiozan' chat'yoile' le' daa nanto' le': “Ḻi yizoalen Chioza' wen.”
Crístona' ni to dii mal bi bene'. Per ni c̱hecho chon', Chioza' benile'ne' ka beṉ' saaxya, kwenc̱he daa gonḻilall'cho Crístona' yiyakcho beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' lawe'na'.
Neto' chonnto' xshin Chioza', chat'yointo' le' gonle ka chiyoolallee daa ba bene' to dii wen c̱hele.
Ḻa' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: Ka byalljilo' wzenag' c̱ho', nad' bzenag'. Ka byalljilo' yisla' li' na' goklen' li'. Na' nia' le', ṉaan' ba bllin lla bllin gor gaklen Chioza' le'. Ṉaan' nakan llana' yisle' le'.
Na' neto' bi chonnto' bittez dii gon ka iṉe beṉ' zban c̱he xshin Chioza' dga chonnto'.
San toshiizi chonnto' to dii byen chonnto' xshin Chioza' ka chiyaḻi. Daan, chonnto' banez ḻaa lo yeḻ' zi', ḻaa chyallj chc̱hininto', ḻaa de dii lallj,
ḻaa chit chyingake' neto', ḻaa chyix̱jgake' neto' lillya, ḻaa lliadia' beṉ' neto', ḻaa chonnto' llin dii nak zii zshab, ḻaa tento' bishgal zi' bishgal ya', ḻaa chbiḻ chdonnto'.
Na' ḻekzka' chli'nto' chonnto' xshin Chioza' ka chiyaḻi daa zoanto' do yic̱hj do lall'nto', daa ba ṉezinto' daa nak dii ḻi, daa napnto' yeḻ' chxenlall' c̱he beṉ' na' chonnto' wen c̱hegake', daa zoalen Espíritu Sántona' neto', daa chakinto' beṉ' do lall'nto',
daa choe'nto' cho'a xtill' Chioza' daa nak dii ḻi, na' daa zoalen yeḻ' wak c̱he Chioza' neto'. Na' dii ḻi dii shao'ka' chonnto' nakgakan ka dii chṉiayinto' kwenc̱he chdiḻ-lennto' dii mala'.
Zoa beṉ' chle'shi'gakile' neto', na' zoate beṉ' chle'zbangakile' neto'. Zoa beṉ' chṉegake' wen c̱hento', na' zoate beṉ' chṉit chdegake' neto'. Zoa beṉ' chongakile' neto' ka to beṉ' wxiye', ḻa'kzi dill' ḻin choe'nto'.
Zoa beṉ' chongake' ka bi nombia' neto', ḻa'kzi nombia'kzgake' neto'. Ḻa'kzi chtiḻnto' yeḻ' wita', ni mbankznto'. Na' ḻa'kzi chit chyingake' neto', biṉ' gongake' gan guetnto'.
Ḻa'kzi de dii zan dii cheenin gonyeshiin neto', toshiizi zoanto' mbalaz. Ḻa'kzi naknto' beṉ' yesh', beṉ' zan chonnto' ka beṉ' wni'a daa choe'lennto' ḻegake' cho'a xtill' Chioza'. Ḻa'kzi bibi napnto' ni, ṉezinto' dii xench nak c̱hento'na' de.
Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', le' lle'le yell Coríntona', ba be'lento' le' dill' kon ka nakan na' ba bli'nto' chakinto' le' do yic̱hj do lall'nto'.
Neto' chli'nto' chakinto' le' do yic̱hj do lall'nto', per le', bi chli'le shi chakile neto'.
Chat'yoid' le', le' nakle ka xiiṉ c̱ha', gonle ka chon neto' na' ḻi gaki neto' do yic̱hj do lall'le.
Bi gonle txen beṉ'ka' bi nonḻilall' Crístona'. Ḻa' aga widiḻi daa nak dii ḻi dii shao' kon dii mala', na' aga wdiḻi beeni'na' kon daa nak yel c̱hoḻ.
Ḻa' ba ṉezkzile bi chidiḻi Crístona' dii x̱iwaa. Na' ḻekzka' beena' ba chonḻilallee Crístona' bi chidiḻile' beena' bi chonḻilalleene'.
Na' bi gak soa daa nak lwaa lsak', diika' choe'la'o beṉ', ḻoo yoodo' c̱he Chioza'. Ḻa' cho' nakcho ka yoodo' c̱he Chios yaa Chios banna'. Ka wna Chioza' c̱he beṉ' Israelka': Soa' ladje'ka', na' nad' gak Chios c̱hegake' na' ḻegake' gakgake' yell c̱ha'.
Na' daan goll Chioza' ḻegake': Ḻi yichej ladj beṉ'ka', bi gonle ḻegake' txen. Bi gox̱'le daa ba wnia' bi nxi nyech. Na' ka' wleb' le',
na' gak' X̱ale, na' le' gakle xiiṉ c̱ha'. Kan' na X̱ancho Chioza', beena' zeelo nap yeḻ' wak choo yeḻ' wak xen.
Kan' nak daa ba bc̱heb Chioza' c̱hecho, le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa. Daan, chiyaḻ' goncho to dii byen gakcho beṉ' nxi nyech lawe'na' kwenc̱he bibi dii mal ta' ichen kwerp c̱hechoni na' yic̱hjlall'do'choni. Na' daa chall chllebcho Chioza' goncho ka dii le gakcho dowalj ka cheenile'.
Ḻi gaki neto' do lall'le. Ḻa' ni to kono biṉ' goninto', na' ni to konoṉ' wsak'zi'nto', na' ni to konoṉ siye'nto'.
Aga chsheshlen' len' nia' le' ka'. Ba wṉia'kz' ka chakchgaid' le' ax̱t ni guetid'.
Nx̱enlallaa chonle wen, na' cho'a dill' c̱hele ka wen ba chonle. Ladj dii zi' dii ya'ka' ni chtiplallaa na' ḻe chiba chizakid'.
Kon ka bla'nto' gani mbani Macedóniani, bibi yeḻ' wixi'lall' c̱hento' got'. Doxenzə chdiḻ chllagnto' dii zed, chakdiḻ-len beṉ' neto', na' za' dii chwall chsheban neto'.
Per Chioza', beena' chiyonxenlall' beṉ'ka' zoa nyesh', biyonxenlallee neto' ka bla' Títona'.
Aga to daa bla'ze'n, san daa choe'yeṉee xtill'le ba chonle wen. Na' be'lene' neto' dill' ka zelall'le ile'ile neto' na' ka chakyeshile daa zele wṉeyi c̱ha'. Na' daa benid' dga zizikli chibaid'.
Ḻa'kzi yisha' bseḻaa benyeshiin le', bibi chaktekid'. Ḻa'kzi gokyeshid' ka bwia' benyeshiin le' shloll,
ṉaa chibaid', aga daa gokyeshile, san daa goklenan le' biyaj bilenile ka cheeni Chioza'. Na' aga bi gok c̱hele ni c̱he daa bzej' le'.
Chioza' chone' ka gakyeshicho kwenc̱he yiyaj yilenicho na' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hecho zejḻi kaṉi, na' bich chakyeshicho daa gok c̱hecho ka'. Per yeḻ' chakyeshii daa nsa' dii mala' choncho chlliayi'n cho'.
Yeḻ' chakyeshiina' daa be' Chioza' latj got' ladjlena' benan ka gokbalile' daa ben beena', na' wda'le nad'. Benan ka bllaale na' wyoosheble, na'tech wzelall'le yidwiach' le', na' bsak'zi'le beena' wdap doḻaa. Na' yog' diiki chli'n bi nonle txen dii mala' bene'.
Na' ka bzej' le', aga bzej' ni c̱he beena' ben dii mala', ni aga ni c̱he beena' benile' zi'bia', san bena'n kwenc̱he Chioza' gaklene' le' gakbe'ile dii ḻikzan zele wṉeyi c̱hento'.
Diiki chaklenan neto' chiyakshao'lall'nto'. Na' zizikchli bibainto' ka ble'into zoa Títona' mbalaz daa btiple lallee.
Ba be'len' Títona' dill' c̱hele, goshee ḻe chibaid' ka chonle, na' bi chido'id' daa goshee ka'. Na' ka dill' daa be'lennto' le' nakan dii ḻi, ḻekzka' gokbe'i Títona' xtill'lena' daa bi'a lawe'na' nakan kon ka goshee.
Na' zizikchli chakile' le' kat' chjadinile' ka bleblene' na' bzenagle c̱he' ḻega beṉ' chiyaḻ' gall illeble.
Chiba chizakid' daa ba nxenlallaa dii ḻikzə chzenagle.
Na' ṉaa, le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', cheeninto' iṉanto' le' ka mba ba ben Chioza' goklene' beṉ'ka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona' gani mbani Macedóniani.
Ḻa'kzi biya dii ba gok c̱hegake', mbalaz inlleb zoagake'. Na' ḻa'kzi chak yeḻ' zi' yeḻ' yesh' c̱hegake', do yic̱hj do lall'gake' bzangakile' bi de c̱hegake' kwenc̱he gaklengake' beṉ' yoblə.
Nad' ṉezyeṉ'id' do yic̱hj do lall'gake' be'gake' mecha' bzangakile', na' bengake' ax̱t ga zeelo gokgake'.
Na' ḻegake' got'yochgagakile' neto' kweṉche we'nto' latj ḻengake' gaklengake' bish' ljwellchoka' nak lall' na' Chioza'.
Bentechlgake' aga ka to daa nonnto' lez gongake'. Zigaate ben kwingake' lall' na' X̱ancho Crístona' kwenc̱he gongake' ka cheenile', na'tech bzenaggake' c̱hento' daa ṉezgakile' nan kan' cheeni Chioza' gongake'.
Ni c̱heyinnan' ba got'yointo' Títona' kwenc̱he yisyolle' wtope' daa chzanile we'le beṉ'ka' chyallj chc̱hini.
Na' ka mbejlaole chonle yog' dii nak wen: daa nonḻilall'chgale Crístona', daa chak we'le dill' mbalaz, daa ḻe chajniile, daa cheenchgaile gonle dii wenna', na' daa ḻe chakile' neto', ḻekzka' ḻi gon byen kwejlaole gaklenle beṉ' we'le daa chzanile.
Aga chontek' byen gonle ka nia', san daa cheenzid' iṉezile ka chibachgayi beṉ' bish'choka' gaklengake' beṉ', na' kan' cheenid' gonle, kwenc̱he wli'le shi lekzilen chaki ljwell-le do yic̱hj do lall'le.
Ba ṉezkzile dii wenna' ben X̱ancho Jesucrístona'. Ḻa'kzi nake' beṉ' choo beṉ' xen, ben kwine' ka beṉ' bibi zakii kwenc̱he gak wen c̱hele.
Daa godwizi wzolole btople mech kwenc̱he gaklenle beṉ'. Na' aga no got'yoi le' btoplen, san benlen do yic̱hj do lall'le. Na' ṉaa iṉia' ka nak daa gonle:
ḻi yisyoll daa wzolole chonle dii nech do yic̱hj do lall'le. Ka bibaile kana' wzolole, ka'kzə ḻi yibayi yisyoll-len. Ḻi we' ka to daa gak we'le.
Ḻa' shi izanilen do yic̱hj do lall'le, na' ixin' lao Chioza', ḻa'kzi lat'zan. Chioza' bi chṉabe' dii bi napcho.
Aga ni c̱he nia' le' gaklenle beṉ' na' le'lə yigaaṉ yesh'le, san gat' dii iyalljile ganga.
Ṉaa le' naple daa chyalljgakile'. Na' shi wx̱e willj ba napgake' bi dii iyalljile, na' yiyaklengake' le'. Na' bibi iyalljile ganga.
Na' gak ka na Cho'a Xtill' Chioza': “Beena' bitop dii zan, aga bi bichooṉan, na' beena' bitop lat'zan, aga bi byalljile'.”
Chox̱ken Chioza' bzie' Títona' wṉeyi ka wṉeyi daa zia' c̱hele.
Na' ḻe bibaile' bc̱hebe' yidwie' le', daa ḻekzka' chaklallee ile'ile' le'.
Na' chseḻ'lennto'ne' sto beṉ' bish'cho, beṉ' ḻe wen zeyi c̱he' lao yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' to to gana' chdop chllaggake', daa ḻe cho'e dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona'.
Na' aga daazə, san ḻekzka' beṉ'ka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona' ni, wlejgake'ne' sa'lene' neto' lljasannto' mecha' bdop. Na' chonnto' dga kwenc̱he sho'ch Chioza' balaaṉ na' kweṉche wli'n nan cheeninto' gaklennto' beṉ'.
Bi cheeninto' bi gon iṉaz beṉ' c̱hento' ni c̱he mech xenni ngoo lo nanto'.
Na' chonnto' to dii byen gonnto'n ka chiyaḻi, aga toz lao X̱ancho Chioza' san lenkz lao beṉ'.
Ḻekzka' chseḻ'lennto' ḻegake' sto beṉ' bish'cho, beena' zan shii ba ble'into' chone' wen, na' ṉaa cheenchlile' gaklene' daa nxenlallee gonle ka cheeni Chioza'.
Na' ka nak Títona', nake' nad' txen chone' xshin Chioza' ladjlena'. Na' beṉ' bish'choka' zi c̱hop wlej beṉ'ka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona' ni, chongake' ka choo Crístona' balaaṉ.
Kwenc̱he iṉezi beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' gan yoblə, ḻi wliyi beṉ'ki chseḻaa nan dii ḻi ba chakile beṉ', na' ḻi wli' chonle wen kon ka choe'nto' xtill'le.
Bich chonan byen wzej' le' iṉia' chiyaḻ' gaklenle beṉ' bish'choka' nak lall' na' Chioza'.
Ḻa' ba ṉezid' ka cheenile gaklenle beṉ', na' ba bi'a xtill'le lao beṉ' Macedóniaki, chepgakee godwizteyi le' lle'le Acáyana' cheenile gaklenle. Na' ka wṉezi beṉ' Macedóniaki ka cheenile gonle, zangake' ba chaklall'gake' gaklengake'.
Ḻa'kzi nakan ka', chseḻaa beṉ' bish'choki kwenc̱he iṉezgakile' nan choe'nto' dill' ḻi daa che'nto'gake' nan chonle wen. Nia' le' ka' kwenc̱he gonchle ka dii le wtoplen.
Ḻa' shi za'len no beṉ' Macedonia nad' ka yidwia' le', na' ile'gakile' bi chonle ka dillaa choe'nto' c̱hele, na' gakan yeḻ' zto' c̱hento' daa nxenlall'nto' chonle wen. Na' le' si'techləle yeḻ' zto'.
Ni c̱heyinnan' chakid' chonan byen wseḻaa beṉ' bish'choki yidwiagake' le' zigaate, kwenc̱he gaklengake' le' yiyoll wtople daa ba bc̱heble. Na' kat' yid', ba xoashawan ḻega dii chzanile, na' aga iṉacho do ki do lall'len choe'len.
Ḻi lljadini c̱heyi dga: Beena' gaz lat'zə, lat'chokzə yizi' yilape'; na' beena' gaz dii xen, ḻekzka' dii xen yizi' yilape'.
To tole we'le ka to daa chzanile. Bi gonlen do ki do lall'le, ḻa' aga no chon byen we'len. Ḻa' Chioza' chakchgaile' beena' chibayi we'n do yic̱hj do lallee.
Chioza' wak gone' ka gakchga wen c̱hele kwenc̱he toshiizi gat'ch yog'ḻoḻ dii chyallj chc̱hinile na' gakteyin gaklenle yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' bibi de c̱he'.
Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' nan: Cho'e beṉ' yesh'do'ka' daa chyallj chc̱hingakile', na' dii wenna' daa chone' biga llia te c̱heyin.
Chioza', beena' choṉ bi dii chaz chbekcho na' dii cheej chaocho, ḻekze'n goṉe' bittezə dii chyalljile, na' gone' ka shesh shanch bi de c̱hele kwenc̱he gonchle dii wenna'.
Na' ka', gapchle dii xench kwenc̱he gak we'chle dii xench gaklenle beṉ'. Na' kat' lljasannto' mecha' daa ba btople lao beṉ'ka' chyalljin, na' we'gake' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Ka nak mecha' daa we'le beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza', aga to gaklenzan ḻegaken', san ḻekzka' gonan ka we'chgagake' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken.
Na' ka ikaagake'n, we'la'ogake' Chioza' daa chonle ka na dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa ba chajḻe'le. Na' ḻekzka' we'la'ogake' Chioza' daa btople mech xen be'len ḻegake' na' nochlə beṉ' yoblə.
Na' daa chwiagake' chaklenchga Chioza' le', na' iṉabgakile'ne' gaklenche' le'.
Chox̱ken Chioza', daa ba bene' to dii wen inlleb c̱hecho. Bichkzə bi dill' chillel we'cho ka to ba bene' c̱hecho.
Nad' Pablo, chat'yoid' le', na' choe'len' le' dill' goll-lall' ka be' Crístona' dill' daa nape' yeḻ' chxenlall', ḻa'kzi nagake' c̱ha' bi chiyaxjid' wsheshlen' le' kat' zoa' ladjlena', na' galjə zoa' zit' chiyaxjid' chṉia' le' zi'bia' ḻee yishka' chzej'.
Na' chat'yoid' le', ḻi gongach wen kwenc̱he kat' yidwia' le' bi lenle wsheshlen' ka wsheshlen' beṉ'ka' naz chon' ḻega beṉ' yell-lio.
Ḻa'kzi naknto' beṉ' de beli chen, bi chdiḻnto' ka chdiḻ beṉ' yell-lioki.
Neto', kat' chdiḻ-lennto' dii mala' bi chc̱hinnto' yesya ka daa chc̱hin beṉ' yell-lioki, san daa chc̱hinnto' nsa'n yeḻ' wak c̱he Chioza' kwenc̱he chlliayi'nto' yeḻ' wak c̱he dii x̱iwaa.
Na' chlliayi'nto' daa yoo ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do' beṉ' daa chsej chllonan gombia'gake' Chioza'. Na' chonnto' kwenc̱he wzex̱j yic̱hjgake' wzenaggake' c̱he Crístona'.
Na' kat' ba nakbia' chzenagle kwasḻoḻ, na' wwianto' nak gonnto' c̱he beena' bi chzenagkz.
Ḻi wwia ka chonnto'. Na' shi chakile nonle Crístona' txen, chiyaḻ' gakbe'ile ḻekzka' neto' naknto'ne' txen.
Aga chido'id' chshalj chshon' daa nia' kwin Crístona' bene' lall' na'nto' we'nto' xtilleena' kwenc̱he gaklennto' le' gakle wal, aga kwenc̱he wlliayi'nto' len'.
Bi cheenid' gakzile chzej' yishki kwenc̱he wsheb' le'.
Zoa beṉ' ne' yishka' chzej' le' ḻe zṉia chṉen, per kat' zoalen' le' ni bi nak' ka beṉ' illeble, na' ni dill' bi chak wi'a.
Na' beṉ'ka' naz ka', chiyaḻ' iṉezgakile' kon ka chzejnto' ṉaa zoanto' zit', ka'kzə gonnto' kat' soanto' ladjlena'.
Bi cheeninto' gaklebinto' beṉ'ka' chyibz kwingake'. Daa chakgakile' ḻe wen chongake' na' daa chsaklebi ljwelle' nochgake' chonch, chli'gake' bi ntegakile'.
Neto', aga wshalj wshonnto' c̱he to dii biṉ' gonnto'. San c̱heyi daa ben Chioza' lall' na'nto' gonnto'n choe'nto' dill', na' ḻe' bseḻee neto' lall-lena'.
Neto' bidye'lennto' le' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' dii nech, na' bi chix̱oa c̱hento' iṉanto': “ki bennto'”.
Bi chshalj chshonlenznto' xshin beṉ' yoblə, san nonnto' lez gonḻilall'chle Crístona' kwenc̱he gonchnto' xshin Chioza' daa nak lall' na'nto' gonnto' gana' zoale.
Ḻekzka' nonnto' lez we'nto' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' kon ga biṉ' illin xtilleena', kwenc̱he bi wshalj wshonlenznto' xshin beṉ' yoblə.
Beena' chshalj chshon kat' bin chone', c̱he Chiozan' chiyaḻ' wshalj wshone'.
Beena' chshalj chshon c̱he kwine', bibi zakee, san beena' iṉa Chioza' ḻe wen chone', beenan' zak'.
Ḻa'kzi chakile biz dill' diika' cho'a, ḻi wzenagan.
Dga chaktek c̱ha' c̱hele za'n c̱he Chioza'. Nad' ba non' le' lo na' Crístona', ka chak c̱he to beṉ' zoa to nool wew' c̱he', bi' napshii kwim', na' chone'b' lo na' beena' gak beṉ' c̱heb'. Na' kan' cheenid' gakle lao Crístona', ka to nool wew', bi' napshii kwinin.
Per chxollid' gak c̱hele ka gok c̱he dii Évana' kana' wxiye' beḻa' ḻe' daa bzenague' c̱heb. Na' chakid' shi ka' gonzle wzenagle bi dill' wxiye' dii gonllejin le', na' bich gonḻilall'le Crístona' do yic̱hj do lall'le.
Shi chla' beṉ' choe'lene' le' dill' nlla'lə aga ka daa ba bsedinto' le' c̱he Jesúza', wa chsedtegakile' le' nlla'lə c̱he Espíritu c̱he Chioza', beena' zoa ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'chona', wa c̱he dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa wyajḻe'le dii nech, na' chajḻe'tezle c̱hegake'.
Ḻa'kzi chakile chajni'chi beṉ'ka' nale nakgake' postl c̱hele aga ka nad', nad' ṉezid' bi nakan ka'.
Leljaile bi chakyeṉaa wi'a dill', per chajni'chid' aga ka ḻegake'. Na' dgan ba bliinto' le' toshiizi lao yog'ḻoḻte dii chonnto'.
¿Achakile malan ben' bentez' ka beṉ' bibi zakii na' aga bi laxj' wṉabid' le' kana' be'len' le' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Chioza'? Goktgui gakle beṉ' zakii lawe'na'.
Bex̱'shaz' mecha' daa beṉ beṉ'ka' chdop chllag choe'la'ogake' Crístona' yell yoblə kwenc̱he bibi byalljid' shlak bli' bsedid' le'.
Na' kana' wzoa' ladjlena' na' byallj bc̱hinid', ni tole bi benid' zed. Beṉ' bish'choka' lle' yell Macedóniana' bidwa'gake' daa byalljid'. Na' ka' bibi zed benid' le', na' biga gonkzid' le' zed.
Dill' ḻi c̱he Crístonan' cho'a, na' nia' ni to beṉ' lle' gana' mbani Acáyana' bi wsej wllone' wshalj wshon' ka to dga chon'.
¿Aṉezile bic̱he nia' ka'? ¿Achakile bi chakid' len'? Chioza' ṉezile' ḻe chakid' le'.
Per gonchkz' ka chon' kwenc̱he bi wi'a latj c̱he beṉ'ka' cheeni wshalj wshongake' iṉazgake' chongake' ka chonnto'.
Beṉ'ki bi nakgake' dowalj postl, na' chdagake' chziye'gake', nazgake' nakgake' postl c̱he Crístona'.
Na' daa chongake' ka' bi nakan ka dii yibanicho, ḻa' ṉezicho dii xiwaa chonz kwinin ka anjl c̱he Chios.
Daan, bi nakan ka dii yibanicho beṉ'ka' chon xshininna' nagake' chsedgakile' beṉ' nakan gongake' yiyakgake' beṉ' wen lao Chioza'. Na' daa chongake' ka', ḻen wlliayi'n ḻegake'.
Sto shii nia' le', bi gakile bizə dillaan choe'len' le'. Wa shi ka' chakile, ḻi gakshazi ka', per ḻi we' latj wi'a dill' kwenc̱he wshalj wshonlataa.
Na' daa chshalj chshon' c̱he kwin', chon' ka beṉ' bi nteyi, ḻa' aga kan' cheeni X̱anchona'.
Daa ḻe chshalj chshon beṉ' zan shi no nakgake', ḻekzka' nad' wshalj wshon' non nak'.
Le' nale nakle beṉ' sin' na' chibazile chleble beṉ'ka' bizə chon chna lat' wej.
Chonzle banez shi bi chgongake' le' gonle, shi chzi' chkaagake' bi de c̱hele, shi kon daa nazan c̱hegake' chongakile' le', wa shi chgap' chball'gake' x̱ag'lena'.
¿Achakile bi chiyaxjid' gon' ka chon beṉ'kin? Ṉezganz bi gaklebid' ḻegake' gon' ka'. Ḻete shi ḻegake' chiyaxjgakile' chshalj chshongake', ḻekzka' nad' wiyaxjid' wshalj wshon', ka chon to beṉ bi nteyi.
Shi nagake' nakgake' beṉ' hebreo, ḻekzka' beṉ' hebreo nad'. Shi nagake' nakgake' beṉ' Israel, ḻekzka' beṉ' Israel nad'. Shi nagake' nakgake' xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Abrahama', ḻekzka' xiiṉ dia c̱he' nad'.
Shi nagake' chongake' xshin Crístona', nad' nia' chontechla'n ka ḻegake'. (Daa nia' ka' chon' ka beṉ' bi nteyi.) Nad' choe'ḻ-lall'ch' chon' xshin Crístona' aga ka ḻegake'. Ḻech ba wyaa lillya ka ḻegake', ba bet wdinch beṉ' nad' aga ka ḻegake', na' dii zan shii ba bila' lo yeḻ' wita'.
Gay' shii ba bet wdini beṉ' Israelka' nad' yid sota' twaljichoa wej,
shoṉ shii bet wdingakile' nad' yaga', na' zi shlin blliagake' nad' yaja'. Ḻekzka' shoṉə shii ka yo'a ḻoo barkwa' wche'lenan nad' yel, na' zi shlla shyel bgaaṉa' lo nisdo'na'.
Shlak chda' ngwaa nez dii zan dii ba ben ble'id'. Ba wzoa' dii nxoll wa' no yao nad', no c̱he beṉ' wban, no c̱he beṉ' wlall c̱ha'ka', no c̱he beṉ' bi nak beṉ' Israel. Ba wzoa' dii nxoll ka wdia' yell xenka', na' ka wdia' lyix̱', na' ka wdia' lo nisdo'na'. Na' ḻekzka' ba wzoa' dii nxoll c̱he beṉ' wxiye'ka' nazgake' ba chajḻe'gake' c̱he Crístona'.
Ba benchga' llinna' ax̱t ba chjx̱akchgaid', zan shii ba wlej' bishgal, ba wbiḻ wdonchga' na' ben banez bi weej wdaw', ba bllagloa' no dii zag na' byallj xalaana'.
Na' ka chllagloa' yog'ḻoḻ diiki, ka'kzan chllagloa' daa zia' wṉeyi lla kon lla c̱he yog' beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' to to yell.
Ḻa' kat' to beṉ' bich chone' ka dii le, kon chakid' nad'kzan chak c̱ha' ka'; wa shi ga zoa beṉ' biz c̱he' chone' na' chchix̱e' beṉ' yoblə lo xṉez Chioza', na' chllaa yic̱hj'.
Shi de dii chonzan ka wshalj wshon', we'tochl' dill' c̱heyi daa chli'n bibi gak gon' tobia'loz'.
Chios, beena' nak X̱a X̱ancho Jesúza', beena' chgoocho balaaṉ toshiizi, ṉezile' cho'a dill' ḻi.
Na' ka wzoa' yell Damáscona', beena' nzoa rey Arétaza' ngoo lall' nee yella' bzoe' beṉ' wdapgake' cho'a yella' kwenc̱he nan gox̱'gake' nad'.
Na' beṉ'ka' zoa gana' bllin', bigoogake' nad' to ḻoo llom, biḻetjgake' nad' to cho'a ventan dii zoa ḻee zee daa nec̱hj yella', na' bi bex̱'gake' nad'.
Chonkzan byen wshalj wshon' ḻa'kzi bibi gon' gan. Na' we'toch' dill' c̱heyi daa ble'do'id' na' c̱heyi daa bli'yi X̱anchona' nad' daa konoṉ' yen ile'kzi.
Nombi'a to beṉ' nake' Crístona' txen. Ba gok shda' yiz Crístona' bc̱hi'ene' yabana' ax̱t gana' lliate Chioza'. Bi ṉezid' shi wyaje' do beli chen c̱he'na', wa shi to bishbe c̱he'na'zan wyaj. Toz Chioza' ṉezile'
shi wyaje' do beli chen c̱he'na' wa shi to bishbe c̱he'na'zan wyaj, per ṉezid'
bc̱he Chioza'ne' yabana' gana' nak mbalaz inlleb. Na' benile' dill' dii konoṉ' yenkzi, dii bi de lsens no wshaljan.
C̱he beena' gok c̱heyin kan' wshalj wshon', san ka nak nad', aga bi de wshalj wshon' ḻete wak wshalj wshon' c̱heyi diika' chli'n bibi gak gon' tobia'loz'.
Sheḻ' cheenid' wshalj wshon', aga iṉacho chon' ka beṉ' bi nteyin, ḻa' dill' ḻin cho'a. Per bi gon' ka', kwenc̱he kono ile'i nad' beṉ' ḻe zakii daa ba ble'id' diika'. Ḻa' diika' chon' na' dill'ka' cho'a, ḻekzgakannan' wli'gakan nakan nak'.
Kwenc̱he bi gak' beṉ' choo beṉ' xen lao yeḻ' mba yeḻ' shao' inllebka' ba bli'yi Crístona' nad', bi'e latj bla' to dii chzak'zi' nad', to dii bseḻ' Satanáza' daa chzoazi'yaan nad', na' chak' ka beṉ' chad' chbibe' yesh'.
Dga chak c̱ha', shoṉ lin ba wṉabid' X̱anchona' yikwase'n.
Na' wne' nad': “Chaklə c̱ho' zoalenkz' li' na' gaklen' li'. Daazan chyalljilo'. Ḻa' yeḻ' wak c̱ha'na' chli'ch lawin kat' de daa chli'n bibi gak gono' tobia'lozo'.” Daan, chibachid' wi'a dill' c̱heyi diika' chli'n bibi gak gon' tobia'loz', kwenc̱he yeḻ' wak c̱he Crístona' soalenchan nad'.
Na' daa chakid' Crístona', chibaid' kat' za' daa chli'n bibi chak gon' tobia'loz', kat' choni beṉ' nad' zban, kat' chyallj chc̱hinid', kat' chsak'zi' beṉ' nad', na' kat' de to dii lallj c̱ha'. Ḻa' kat' za' daa chli'n bibi chak gon' tobia'loz', kana'lan chakbe'id' zoalench yeḻ' wak c̱he Crístona' nad'.
Ba ben' ka beṉ' bi nteyi daa chshalj chshon' c̱he kwin' ni c̱hele, ḻa' le'lan nan we'le dill' nan chon' wen. Ḻa'kzi bibi zakaa, aga chonch beṉ'ka' nale nak postl c̱hele ka nad', beṉ'ka' nale chajni'chgayi.
Daa wzoatezi wzoa' ben' daa yoo lo na' gon' lao yog' diika' btiḻ' na' daa ben' yeḻ' wakka' ladjlena', chli'n nak' dowalj postl.
Bi gakile' benid' le' nakzi aga ka beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' yell yoblə daa bi benid' le' zed bibi wkaa c̱hele. Bi nakan ka'. Na' ḻi si'xen c̱ha' shi bi ben' wen ben' ka'.
Ba chon' wṉeyi yidwia' le' de wyoṉ shii, na' ḻekzka' bi cheenid' gonid' le' zed. Ḻa' aga chzelallaa bi de c̱hele, san len' chzelallaa yidwia'. Ka chak c̱he beṉ' nape' bi'do', aga ḻegakban' wweej wwaogakb' ḻegake', san x̱axṉa'b'kan' segake' wṉeyi wweej wwaogake' ḻegakb'. Kan' chak c̱ha' c̱hele.
Do yic̱hj do lallaa izanid' bi de c̱ha', ax̱t yeḻ' mban c̱ha'ni izanid', kwenc̱he gak wen c̱hele. Ḻa'kzi nad' ax̱t ga zeelo gakid' le', widezile zizikchli gonile nad' kazli.
Ṉezkzile aga bi zed benid' le', per baḻ-le chakile' biyiljlall'zan' kwenc̱he wxiyaa le'.
Wa ḻi iṉashki shi no beṉ'ka' ba bseḻaa ba wxi' wkaagake' bi de c̱hele.
Gosh' Títona' yidwie' le', na' bseḻ'lenee sto beṉ' nakcho txen. Ḻi iṉashkilja shi bi wxi' wkaa Títona' c̱hele. Ṉezile bi nakan ka'. Ḻa' toz ka nsa' c̱hento' na' toz ka cheeninto' gaklennto' le'.
Shi chakile' choe'nto' dill'ki kwenc̱he bibi sa'lall'le c̱hento', aga kan' nakan. Choe'nto' dill' lao Chioza' daa naknto' Crístona' txen. Le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, yog'ḻoḻ diiki chonnto' nakan dii gaklen le' kwenc̱he gakchale lo xṉez Chioza'.
Chxollid' kat' yidwia' le' bi chonle ka cheenid' gonle. Na' le', aga wyazlall'le ka gon' c̱hele ka yid' gana' zoale shi ṉaa. Chxollid' shi ka yid' ba chdiḻ chsheshlenz ljwell-le, ba chakxe'zi ljwell-le, ba chllaaz ljwell-le, ba chonz c̱he c̱hezle, bizə ba chon chnaz c̱he ljwell-le, ba chc̱hitjzle dill' c̱he ljwell-le, ba chep cha'lall'zle, na' bichkzə nkaani'a xṉezi daa chonle.
Ḻekzka' chxollid' shi kat' yidwia' le' sto shii, si'a yeḻ' zto' lao Chios c̱ha'na' ni c̱hele, na' kwell' ni c̱hele. Ḻa' zantele chonle dii mala', na' biṉ' yiyaj yilenile diika' ba benlenle beli chen c̱helena' kon ka nazan c̱hele.
Dga gak shoṉ shii yidwia' le'. Ṉaach yidyen' ka na cho'a xtill' Chioza': Shi zoa beṉ' chawe' xya c̱he to beṉ', na' bibi gak gone' shi bi zoa c̱hop shoṉ beṉ' iṉagake' kan' nakan.
Kana' bidwia' le' de wchop shiyi, gosh' beṉ'ka' chongake' dii mala' bich wwialoz' c̱hegake'. Na' ṉaa zoa' zit', ba nia' le' ka' sto shii, bich si'xen' kat' yid' dii yoblə.
Gon' ka' ni c̱heyi daa cheenile ile'ile shi lekzidaan cho'a dill' kon ka cheeni Crístona'. Ḻa' Crístona' bi nake' ka beṉ' bibi gak gon ladjlena', san nape' yeḻ' wak kwenc̱he yigwee shḻi lall'le.
Dii ḻikzə Crístona' bḻex̱j yic̱hje' wdee ḻee yag cruza' ka beṉ' bi nap yeḻ' wak, per ṉaa zoalene' yeḻ' wak c̱he Chioza'. Na' ḻekzka' neto' lennto' Crístona' naknto' ka beṉ' bi nap yeḻ' wak, per daa naknto'ne' txen ḻekzka' zoalennto' yeḻ' wak c̱he Chioza' kwenc̱he gonnto' xshine'na' ladjlena'.
Ḻi yiya yiyilj kwinle shi dii ḻi ba nonḻilall'le Jesucrístona'. Na' ḻi gakbe'yeṉii shi zoalenkze' le', wa shi bi nonḻilall'kzlene'.
Na' nonto' lez gakbe'ile zoalenkze' neto'.
Chṉabinto' Chioza' gaklene' le' bibi dii mal gonle. Aga chṉabinto'ne' dga kwenc̱hezə wli' wzez c̱hento' ḻe wen bennto' xshine'na' ladjlena', san cheeninto' gonle dii wenna' daa chiyaḻ' gonle ḻa'kzi iṉa beṉ' bi chak gonnto' xshin Chioza'.
Bi gak bi iṉanto' c̱heyi daa nak dii ḻi, san zeelo chaklennto' kwenc̱he wli'chlawin.
Chibainto' shi le' nakchale na' bi chonan byen wc̱hinnto' yeḻ' wṉabia'na' nak lall' na'nto', ḻa'kzi zoa beṉ' chle'ile' neto' ka beṉ' bi nap yeḻ' wṉabia'. Na' iṉabchinto' Chioza' gaklene' le' gakle doxen ka cheenile'.
Chzej' le' ṉaa kwenc̱he kat' yid' bi iṉetek' le' zṉia. Ḻa' X̱anchona' noṉe' nad' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he gaklen' le' gakchale lo xṉez Chioza', aga beṉe'n kwenc̱he wlliayaa le'.
Dga zeelo nia' le', le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', llialallaa soale mbalaz na' we'ḻ-lall'le gakle doxen ka cheeni Chioza'. Ḻi wtip lall'le, ḻi gak toz na' soalen ljwell-le mbalaz. Na' Chioza', beena' chakile' cho' na' chzoe' cho' mbalaz, soalene' le'.
Na' ḻi wwap ljwell-le chiox ḻega beṉ' chaki ljwellin daa nakle lall' na' Chioza'.
Na' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'ki ba bixi biyech lao Chioza' chwapgake' le' chiox.
Nad' Pablo, nak' postl c̱he Jesucrístona', na' aga no beṉ' yell-lio wleje' nad' na' bseḻee nad' wi'a xtilleena', san kwin Jesucrístona' na' X̱acho Chioza', beena' bisbane'ne' ladj beṉ' wetka', bseḻ'gake' nad'.
Nad' na' yog' bish' ljwellchoki chwapnto' le' chiox, ka le nonḻilall'le Crístona' to to yellka' lle' gana' mbani Galáciana'.
Chṉabid' X̱acho Chioza' na' X̱ancho Jesucrístona' gaklenshgagake' le' na' wzoagake' le' mbalaz.
Jesucrístona' bzani kwine' wite' ni c̱hecho daa nakcho beṉ' saaxya, kwenc̱he bisle' cho' lao dii mala' de yell-lioni, kon ka goklall' X̱acho Chioza' gone',
beena' chidoḻ' sho' balaaṉ zejḻi kaṉi. Kan' nakan.
Ḻe chibanid' c̱hele daa ba biḻaala'odozle Chioza', beena' gox wṉab le' na' bliile' le' yeḻ' chiyesh'lalli c̱he'na' daa bseḻee Crístona' wite' ni c̱hecho, na' ba zjanozle to dii yoblə daa bi nak dill' wen dill' kob c̱he'.
Aga iṉacho de sto dill' wen dill' kob yoblan, san zoaz baḻ beṉ' cheengakile' gonllej gongangakile' len', na' chsha'zgake' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona'.
Shi ga za' beṉ' yishee dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa ba wdix̱je'into' le', Chioza' wsak'zi'shgue' zejḻi kaṉi nottezə beena' gon ka', ḻaa neto' wa no anjl beṉ' za' yabana'.
Ba wṉiakzə' le' ka', na' ṉaa chiznia'n sto shii: shi no chsha' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa ba wdix̱je'into' le', Chioza' wsak'zi'shgue'ne' zejḻi kaṉi.
Aga cheenid' ile'shii beṉ' nad' daa nia' ka', san cheenid' gon' daa chazlall' Chioza'. Shi cheenid' gon' ka chazlall' beṉ', aga wen llin c̱he Crístona'chan nak'.
Cheenid' iṉezile dga, le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa wdix̱je'id' le' bi nakan dii wdiljlall' beṉ' yell-lioni.
Ni to beṉ' yell-lio bi bli' bsedile'n nad', san kwin Jesucrístona' bli' bsedile'n nad'.
Ba benkzile' ka bsa' c̱ha' kana' ni noa' ley c̱hento'na', neto' beṉ' Israel. Na' bsak'zi'a beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza' daa nonḻilall'gake' Crístona', goklallaa yisḻengakee.
Kana' ni noa' ley c̱hento'na', wlejlaw' ladj beṉ'ka' nak ljwell' daa ben' to dii byen wnoa' yog' diika' bkwaaṉlen dii x̱ozxto'nto'ka' neto'.
Per Chioza', kana' zi' galjtia', ba ngwee xṉez xḻatjin yiyesh'lallile' nad', na' wleje' nad' kwenc̱he gon' xshine'na'. Na' ka bllin llana' nllie' bia',
bene' ka bembi'a Xiiṉe'na' kwenc̱he llji'a xtilleena' lao beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel. Na' ka gox wṉab Chioza' nad', ni tlish' beṉ' yell-lio bi wṉabid' wzajniile' nad' daa chiyaḻ' gon'.
Ni bi biyaa Jerusalénna' lljawia' beṉ'ka' wlej Crístona' nakgake' postl c̱he' kana' zi' kweje' nad'. San lii wyaatia' gana' mbani Arábiana', na'tech biyaa Damáscona' sto shii.
Na' ka wde shoṉ yiz, biyaa Jerusalénna' kwenc̱he bembi'a Pédrona', na' bigaaṉlenee shda' wbill.
Ḻekzka' ble'id' Jacóbona', beena' nak beṉ' bish' X̱anchona', na' kochno postl yoblə ble'id'.
Chioza' ṉezile' dga chzej' le' bi nakan de wxiye'.
Na'tech wyaa gana' mbani Síriana' na'ch Cilíciana'.
Per beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' Judéana' biṉ' gombia'gake' nad'.
Zeelo ba bengakile' nagake': “Beena' bsak'zi'e cho' kana', ba chde' choe' dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa goklallee yisol yiṉite' kana'.”
Na' be'la'ogake' Chioza' daa ba chyix̱ji'a xtill' Crístona'.
Wde shda' yiz biyaa Jerusalénna' sto shii, na' wza'len Bernabéna' nad' na' ḻekzka' bc̱hi'a Títona',
ḻa' Chioza' bene' ka wṉezid' nan chiyaḻ' sha'. Na' jashaljlen' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' lao beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona', na' to nad' to ḻegake' bzajniid'gake' ka nak dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa choe'len' beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel. Ḻa' goklallaa iṉezgakile' bin chli' chsedid' kwenc̱he bi iṉagake' daa ba ben' na' daa ni chon' nakan dii bibi zakii.
Na' ni Títona', beena' zyaalen', naktie' beṉ' griego, bi bengake' byen sho'e seṉ daa le circuncisión,
ḻa'kzi wzoa beṉ' aga do lall'gake' lengake' neto' nx̱enilall'nto' Cristo Jesúza' san bidwia bidyizgake' shi ni chonnto' ka na ley daa bzej dii Moiséza'. Ḻa' goklall'gake' toshiizi idakw ichejnto' gonnto' doxen ka na leya'.
Na' neto', biga bennto' ka goklall'gake', daa cheeninto' iṉezile bich chonan byen gonle daa na leya', san chiyaḻ' gonle daa na dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' daa nak dii ḻi.
Ka nak beṉ'ka' chṉabia' lao beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona' yell Jerusalénna', ḻa'kzi nakgake' beṉ' mbejlawin bitek zia' wṉeyi shi no nakgake', ḻa' yog'cho toz ka zak'cho lao Chioza'. Bi wnagake' chonan byen yishaa diika' chli' chsedid' c̱he Crístona'.
San gokbe'gakile' Chioza' ba bene' lall' na' wi'a dill' wen dill' kob c̱he Crístona' lao beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel, ka bene' c̱he Pédrona' bene' lall' nee c̱hix̱je'ile'n beṉ' Israelka'.
Ḻa' Chioza', beena' wleje' Pédrona' kwenc̱he nake' postl c̱he' na' c̱hix̱je'ile' cho'a xtilleena' beṉ' Israelka', ḻekzen' wleje' nad' nak' postl c̱he' kwenc̱he c̱hix̱je'id' cho'a xtilleena' beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel.
Jacóbona', Pédrona', na'ch Juanna', beṉ'kin mbejlaogake' lao beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Crístona', ka gokbe'gakile' chaklen Chioza' nad' kwenc̱he chon' xshine'na', na' bli'gake'n chongake' nad' na' Bernabéna' txen daa bex̱'gake' na'nto'ka'. Ḻa' gokgakile' wenan gonnto' xshin Chioza' lao beṉ'ka' bi nak beṉ' Israel shlak chli' chsedgakile' beṉ' Israelka'.
